Momee Gombe:
Maimuna Gombe Abubakar o janja momee Gombe (duu…ìi daigo; 28 Korse, 1997) …óun …ìuri an…óirki Mou Momee Gombe e Mou …óer sirgito…ìe filmi e Kannywood latido mo kode mu…óun …óaari e nduungu 2020.
Distinorde Margo.
∆äun …óanyi jarumijo Momee Gombe e gelle nder Diiwal Gombe gon…óe …óer hautugo Naajeeriya mo jangi janngir…óe firamare e sakandare fuu e gelle Gombe.
Nastuki maako kuugal filmi.
Mo ummoyke e yidde jon…óe go‚Äôo gada jarumi‚Äôen filmi Rou…ìe to gada o pamaro hama mo …óarata wala go…óun wurtaki …óer siryago filmi shaidarowomo bonne.
Jarumijo mo he…ìi nasru nastugo sanago siryago filmiji e ta jungo Usman Mu‚Äôazu goto e …óer siryato…ìe filmi a nduundu 2017 …óenbo …óun fu…ó…ói haskaki filmwol maako …óen artu…óun bia…óun Ango. 
Gimi maako.
Momee Gombe mo yimi gimi e …óu…ó…ói …óu…óirka maji yaaari 40 yaari 50 …óenbo mo huuwi leg yimo…ìe ∆ôori…ìe …ìe woyla Najeeriya bano be Adam A Zango, Hamisu Breaker, Garzali Miko, Umar M Shareef …óen e luttu…ìe.
Asaluu inde maako.
Momee Gombe mo holli nomo he…ìiri in…óe maako e wiigo in…óe kakamaako …óebbo un Maimuna …óen enom danyo…ìe maako e semtai in…óe maako gam un esirawo hai …ìe noddirta mo Momee.

Aisatu N‚Äôjie-Saidy:
Aisatu N‚Äôjie-saidy (…ìe …óon binda inde maako be Aisatu N‚Äôjie-said) (O …óanyaama nder yinde jebire lewru Silto hitaande 1964) …ìi tufleeji leddi Gammbi. O me…ói jo…óugo ballitigo jamu laamu haa leddi Gammbi daga yan…óe Logas lewru Mbooy hitaande 1997 yahugo sappo e jowetati lewru Janayru, hitaande 2017.
Kanko‚Äôon debbo aran…óejo …ìi Gammbi o me…ói jaggugo laamu ballitowo jaamu laamu o n…óen dow aran…óe rewbe haa tufleeji hirna Afrika, kan…ìe‚Äôon me…ói yahugo haa n…óer …ìe dari manga.
Taariihawol maako be anndal.
∆Åe danyi Njie-saidy haa kuntaya, haa lewru Maris saffoy jay, hitaande 1952 North Bank Division. Daga …óen hitaande 1959 yehugo hitaande 1964, o yehi janngirde firamaare je Brikama, …óenbo hitaande 1964 be hitaande 1970, o yehi janngirde sakandarere be Armitage, George Town. Hitaande 1971 o yehi jaangirde Kwaleji ekkitan gwa…ìe mallam‚Äôin je yun…óum, o he…ìi, kuugal janngine hitaande 1974. Daga lewru Je…ó…óa…ìurdu 1979 be lewru sappo e …ói…óa…ìurdu hitaande 1979. O janngi haa jaburu numugo an…óiigo ko yahata Janngirde be fasahaje Delft, Netherland, ha…ìe hokkimo …óerewol mangol je difulooma wakkere andigo filu manga. Daga lewru jeena…ìurdu yahugo lewru sappo hitaande 1981, o janngi haa Janngirde Piliifins, haa to o he…ìi …óerewol man do larugo fillel filu fetel be halaji. ∆äer lewru jeena…ìurdu hitaande 1988, o timmini Msc yahugo yeesu …ìe he…ìa no…ìe mo…ìan jawjije Janngirde Suwannsiyaa.
Sungulla tufleeji.
Daga lewru jeena…ìurdu, hitaande 1983 yahugo lewru jeena…ìurdu hitaande 1989. Njie-saidy ol ati …ìallawo sekerter o lati bollowowo faada rew…ìe, hukuuma je …ìulwata do rew…ìe je leddi. Du…ìi …ói…ói …ìawo …ìe walliti laamu Gambia nder dungu 1994 hayake Yahaya Jamme jafti lamu ha leuru Yulie hitadee 1996 N‚Äôjie-saidy …ìelanminimo …óer …óe minista jamo benonugo bel…óum jamaje be sungulla ro…ìe.Yan…óe logas leuru Maris be hitadee 1997 libbi saali …ìawo cu…ìol lam…óo ma…ì…ìe je hitadee 1996 Yahaya Jamme yamii su…ìol man…ìe lammini N‚Äôjie-saidy …óer …óe mako ballito lam…óo ha liddi Gambia olati ballowo sakatariya sungullaji larugo jamu be nanugo …ìel …óum jamaje be sungullaji ro…ìe. 
Obolwi be obindi boi do hala koyali ro…ìe ha liddi Gambia. Ha leuru Disamba hitadee 2015, …ìe he…ìi ha…ìor …ìe …óon bonda hakku…óe N‚Äôjie-saidy be Jamme …ìeddi biligo. Bigo jarida ha Freedom, …ìadi…óo be jamme oyar…ìiti hala …ìeya…óa larugo Aisatu N‚Äôjie-saidy. Obangini Aisatu ‚Äúwala gonga‚Äù kanko‚Äôon balliti wakkere lamo mangakkiti Jamme tabitini yum…ìe mako Omaran Fillel Aisatu N‚Äôjie-saidy. Naage saffoi jetai leuru Janairu, hitadee 2017, Njie-saidy udiffi do lamo ma…ì…ìe hitadee 2016-2017, hauta…óe be yim…ìe fere/ministas lamu …óud…ìe.
Tegal.
N‚Äôjie-saidy owodi tegal owodi bukkwa nayi. Wo…óon nana …óingal dud…óum, kadibo: man…óinka, ful…ìe, wolof, English, Francais.

Halima Buba:
Halima Buba mou pullo …ìiyi Naajeeriya un godowo lumo …óen kumowo e banki latti…óo gurtoyi…óo gada Diiwal Adamawa e kononi jonii e mo huwa e …óau maw…óo bankiwal Sun Trust Bank Plc. 
Distinor…óe Jande.
Halima mo himmini digiri maako artu…óun e …ói…óa…ìun e…óau kononi lu…ìe fuu e Janngir…óe Maiduguri. Jongu…óo kiido e Janngir…óe Laagos …óen un membajo e wuudu kutirka Banki …óun leydi …óen bo kuwowo e wuudu jahiroru hokko…ìe shaawaraji. ∆äun …ìilimo e …óau maw…óo bankiwol Sun Trust Bank e lewru haraamji (January) 2021 gada mo huwii e …óu …ìallitowo maw…óo e Ecobank.

Aishatu Dahiru Ahmed:
Aishatu Dahiru Ahmed (O dan√±aama11 gu Jawjawngel 1971) mo …óun …ìou an…óirki Binani o pullo …ìiyi Naajeeriya …óan bo un mo siyasajo e les shubtugal All Progressive Congress (APC). Honko woni sanatajo yamowo e jonii lati…ói wakilti…óo subtir…óe Diiwal Adamawa shakajo e jo…óerde hautu…óo. E gada mo latake wakiilijo jo…óer…óe e hautujo mo wakiltake shubtur…óe Yola woylajun/Yola fombinajun/Girei e les shubgugo People Democratic Party (PDP) e zaman jo…óer…óe de 7 (2011-2015). 
Distinore Margo/Jan…óe.
Binani mo jangi jan…óe maako e janngir…óe maw…óe e Birtaniya inare e mo he…ìi shaidago diploma e …óau woiinki hite karaabati (lantarkie) e janngir…óe Southamthom University. E jondde jonii han ko woni maw…óo komiti‚Äôen jo…óar…óe …óottien …óau kononi farugo yeso tabbitowo (SDGs) …óun henlim mo e…óau yamu…óo subtugo wurtinki gonien e subtugo gwamnaen Diiwal Adamawa e les subtirgo APC ga…óa mo he…ìi kunaji 430 …óun mo doii sobojo tetgo maako mo ha…óe Nuhu Riba…óo, ardi…óo hukuma konojun e yamgo kiine e wonnugo dun Naajeeriya kanko he…ìi kuri‚Äôaji 288. 

Buba Yero:
Abubakar …ìiyi Usmanu Suban…óe (b.c 1762-1841) mou …óun …ìuri an…óirki Buba Yero han kou tiggi lamor…óe Gombe. Mo lattake lami…óo Gombe artu…óo in…óe lamorde maako haire wonii moddibo Gombe. E …óungu gu 1804 Buba Yero tiggi lamor…óe Gombe ga…óa mo ja…ìi tutawal e…óau ar…óujo konu Shehu Usman ∆äanfodio. 

Boubou Cisse:
Boubou Cisse (…óun dayi mo e …óungu gu 1971) un mo siyasa les…ói Maali en gon…óo latti…óo firaministajo Maali gada Bannjaaru Aranndu (April) 2019 yaari jippaki maako ga…óa waylutugo lamu Maali …óun 2020 e lewru Jawjawngel (August) mo …óenbo lattake ministajo hautugo jaudi e cede e …óenbo minista kowoni …óer leydi e luu…ìe te…ìe. 
Distinor…óe margo.
Boubou Cisse un …ìiyi lasgol Ful…ìe mo wo…ói jon…óe digiri maako …ói…óa…ìun e janngir…óe Auvergne …óenbo mo wa…ói digiri maako tata…ìuri e kononi hautugo jaudi e janngir…óe Aix-Marserlle.
Kuu…óe.
Cisse mo fu…ó…ói kuugal maako e …óau an…óu…óo hautugo jaudi …óun bankiwal duniyaru e Washintong D.C, Aameerik e…óer 2005. E…óer 2008 …óun …ìeydanimo mangu yaari maw…óo an…óu…óo hautugo jaudi …óun wuttudu fago yeso …óun adungen. Ga…óa …óen mo huwi …óer Naajeeriya e Niiser e…óau wakilijo banki duniyaru. ∆äun …ìi lii Cisse e…óau firaminista Maali e nduungu 2019 ga…óa jippago go soumeylou Boubeye Maigu e ar…óugal maako. Mo lattake ministajo …ìe soggugo e kowoni …óer leydi e 2013 ministajo hautugo jaudi e cede tun 2016. E yal…óe 18 …óun Jawjawngel 2020, Cisse hauti e ar…ói…óo Ibrahim Boubacar Kaita e joga ke…ìe han…ìe e sojien unminob fitina e…óer waylutugo lamu 2020 …óun Maali. Fa…ó…óugo gelle hauti e lagguki ki ar…ói…óo Keita wa…ói jo…óar…ói e ardugal …óun itti Cisse e…óau jodargal maako e yal…óe go‚Äôo 1 …óun lewru Haaram (Janairu) 2021 …óun nangi ban…óuwo Cisse Aguibou Tall e wo…ì…ìe jo‚Äôwoo game‚Äôe hollugo waylutuki lamu e…óun bo seka…ìe Boubou Cisse amma …óun nangayimo sabo e lamu anda e mo wonii. 

Muhammad Banaru Abubakar:
Kii…óo kuuwo…óo hukumaji e hautugo Naajeeriya
Muhammad Banaru Abubakar (Yarkooma 1939 ‚Äì jolal 2015) un kii…óo jahirowo …óen bo kiido kuuwowo e hautugo Naajeeriya mo soitii e alasarer yade asawe 21 …óun lewru jolal 2015. )
Mo lattake …ìiyi hukuma pamarun Akko gon …óun Diiwal Gombe mo filake kotoye e kuutirde e jon…óe maw…óe sakatarejo e hukumawal Diiwal Bauchi. 
Distinorde maako.
∆äun danyi mo e …óungu 1939 e kumo gon …óu hukuma pamarun Akko dun njoni Abubakar mo halartake janngir…óe firamarere …óe Kumo e maw…óe janngir…óe …óe Gombe hakku…óe 1948 yaari 1955, gada …óer mo saali janngir…óe lardiji Bauchi inare …óe mo sakandare e 1960.
Himmatore maako faro tefgo ilmi yaari mo janngir…óe Obafemi Awolowo University gon …óun Ile-Ife Diiwal Osun inare e mo he…ìi saidago himmimki jande e …óer fannu harkaji ngomnatiji e …óungu 1977. Tun e …óungu 1961 yaari 1962 mo jangi janngir…óe ekkitaki larabankore e joonni dun noddirta Abdullahi Bayero College for Arabic Studies Kano.
Mo hartake kosji …óu…ó…ói e kautu…ói …óereji shaidago go certificate in modern management e Ahmadu Bello University Zaria (1977), certificate of service, repartorion corps, federated press, Kano (1964), citizenship and leadership certificate, sea Lagos (1979) ee ko lutti.
Kuugal.
Banaru mo fu…ó…ói kuugal edau kokkowol habaruji (juranalist) giloto…óo e kano e …óungu 1964 e mo haute habaruji e kotuji pamari.
E …óungu 1964 mo nasti sarkitago ngomnatiwo woyla Naajeeriya e jonde maw…óo biowo nodi wa…óata mo huwi e kuuti…óe fere-fere. Gada …ìawo e …óungu 1968 …óun turakemo gonajo woyla faaro fuuna e mo huuda e kuu…óe fere-fere …óer ha e ofisji soja …óun huwo…ìe.
Banaru …óun …ìilimo sole manager …óun hukuma pamarun Ningi gada …ìawo …óen bo Katagum hakku…óe 1985 yaari 1986. Mo yaaari jon…óe sakatarejo maw…óo e 1988 e kigal Diiwal Bauchi.
Bana mo jogake jogade go…óe jodarle e jon…óe siyasaje matakire diiwal e hautugo kautu e komishinajo hautugo hukumare …óa‚Äôa …óun hautugo.
Laamu.
Jo…óarde lamorde Gombe …óe hokkorimo laamu cuu…ói finaatawaaji …óun Barayajo Gombe e …óun 1990.
Maide maako.
Muhammad Banaru mo soiti e alasarare yalde asawe 21 …óun lewru Novembae mo soiti e mo woodi …óuubi 76 e duniyaru.

Abubakar Shehu Abubakar:
Abubakar Shehu Abubakar (be …óanyimo nder nyal…óe 17 …óun Lewru Bowte, duu…ìi 1977) e gelle Gombe e hawtugo Naajeeriya. ∆äun laamii…óo cuu…ói finaato'en e …óer Naajeeriya mo …óun Laammini Laamii…óo Gombe mo sappo e go‚Äôo 11 e lewru Morse, hitannde 2014.O Lattake Laamii…óo Sawo mayde day…óa mo, Shehu Abubakar Lami…óo sappo 10 jo may…óo e yal…óe 27 …óun lewru Duujal, duu…ìi 2014. Abubakar Shehu Abubakar. Hanko wonii …ìi…ó…óo …ói…óa…ìo mo kinna…óo Shehu Abubakar.
Distinorde margo maako e jannde maako.
∆äun danyi Abubakar Shehu Abubakar e gelle Gombe gon…óe Naajeeriya. Mo halartake janngirde "Gombe Children Primary School" e ndunngu 1982 yaari 1988 …óen e bo "Government Science Secondary School Gombe" gader 1989 yaari 1995. Shehu Abubakar mo janngi digiriwal maako artugal e fannu ann…óal tayaka siyaasaje (political science) e Janngir…óe Maiduguri inare e mo janngi gader …óungu 2001 yaari haa wakkatire …óe mo himmini jann…óe maako 2005.
Kuugal maako.
Abubakar o me…ó…ói lattaki kannsilajo kakkilero wo e hukuuma pamarun Gombe gada nduungu 2006 yaari 2007. Gada 2007 yaari 2009 mo huuti e jon…óe ballitowo mo sakkooma mo daraaktawal jahirgal e huutirde taadugal Naajeeriya gal hautude Abuuja. Gada …ìawo mo lattake maw…óo kamfaniwal kliptoun lagoon Naajeeriya led …óenbo e jon…óe daraktajo mo Horizon Interlinks Global Reesources.
Laamu.
Day…óo Abubakar Shehu Abubakr lami…óo Gombe mo sappojo 10 mo maayi sana…óu Nyawu ladde e gelle London yal…óe 27 …óun lewru Mayie 2014 …óun lamini mo dow donu…óu Shehu Abubakar e fu…ó…óu go‚Äôo lewru Julie 2014, sakatarejo hukuma Diiwal Gombe (SSG) Abubakar Bage han ko hokki Abubakar Shehu Abubakar …óerewol laamu …óun e julirde maw…óe …óe gelle Gombe e yal…óe 6 …óun lewru Julie 2014. Inare e …óun wa…óii fiijo laammiki laamu maako.

Shehu Abubakar:
Shehu Usman Abubakar (c. 1938 ‚Äì 27 Duujal, 2014) un Lam…óo cuu…ói finaatawaaji gal Naajeeriya latta…óo jogi…óo lamu lamorde Gombe …óun 10 gadu Siilo 1984 yaari haa maide maako lewru Mayie 2014. Abubakar mo ardake tigguki Diiwal Gombe go tun e …óer leydi Naajeeriya 36 …óe Naajeeriya e 1996. Mo bo lattake maw…óo lam…ìe tun 1984.
Martibina…óo lamio Gombe
Distinorde maargu maako e Jan…óe maako.
∆äun danyi Abubakar e gure doma e …óer gelle Gombe e …óungu 1938 han ko woni …ìi…ó…óo jowa…ìo e …óer …ìi…ì…ìe lami…óo Gombe joweenajo 9 modibbo Abubakar Umar mo jangi e janngir…óe Elementary e Bauchi Middle School. Abubakar himmini jande Sakandarere e …óun Barewa College gon …óun Zariya e …óungu 1966.
Kuugal.
Abubakar mo fu…ó…ói kuugal maako gal e ngomnatijo kii…óuwan diiwal Gombe e jonde ballitiwo injiniyajo …óenbe mo huuwi e wuudu ekkitingi e ha…ì…ìondin e gollitir…óe …óun Kaduna ekkitingi e ha…ì…ìondin e gollitir…ói …óun Kaduna Institute of Administration. Abubakar …óen bo mo nasti …óer huutirde hii…ìe ngomnatien wayla Naajeeriya kautu…óun …ói…óurkii …óun ngomnatiji diiwal woyla faaro fuuna ngomnatire sarkita…óe Diiwal Bauchi e jonnii e …óen mo latti sakatarejo duumo …óun Parastatals hukumaji pamari animal forest and establishment.
Mo …óen bo me…ó go lattaki maw…óo sakatarejo e lattaki membajo mo hukumaji hakkilanowo e janngir…óe maw…óe …óe leydi (NUC) ha …óe …ói…ói.
Mayde maako.
Lami…óo Shehu Abubakar mo soitii e Asibiti Royal marsden gon …óun …óau lawok Fulham e gelle London inare e mo jiyoto nga ladde e yal…óe 27 …óun lewru Mayie 2014 e mo woodi du…ìi 76 e duniyaru …óun wa…ói Jana‚Äôiza maako e danmugal lamorde Gombe.
∆äun …ìili (lammini) …ìi…ó…óo kinna…óo Shehu Abubakar bia…óo Abubakar Shehu Abubakar e jon…óe lami…óo keeso mo Gombe e fuu…ó…óano lewru Julie 2014.

Sa‚Äôidu Kumo:
Sa‚Äôidu Kumo (5 Nuwamba 1959-27 Disamba 2020) o gim…óo Shubtal Naajeeriya mo…óun subti e sanatajo wakiti…óo Gombe shakajun e Diiwal Gombe e Naajeeriya e artu…óun publisher e ta naya …óun e ta Naajeeriya mo…óarake tefgo e shuu…ìal All Peoples Party (APP) hanjun ga…óa…óon latti All Nigerian Peoples Party (ANPP) mo fu…ó…ói kuugal e yalde 29 …óun mayu 1999. 
Siyasaji (shubtule).
Ga…óa mo nyegi jo…óorgal majalisa dotti‚Äôen e leuru junie 1999 Kumo …óun …ìilimo e jon…óe komiti‚Äôen e konononii ko yiloto firoje dau, hautir…óe hiite lantarki e jam…óe cede e han…ói…óirki cede yilaru umtuki gite e neesuji e faruki jon…óe yeso e fiijoji. 
Mo lattake ballitowo ar…ó…ói…óo komitijo kuu…óe mo majalisa dotti‚Äôen. E lebru Afrilu 2002 Kumo mo wa…ói bol…óale e ar…ói…óo diiwal Borno Mala Kashalla battu…óe yaadu …ìaawo subtal giagal PDP inare e mo wiii hanko un gim…óo subtal mo pirowal shubtule mo…óodoto e maako. 
Asal (Furtuu).
∆äun …ìilii Kumo e jen…óe sakatarejo shubtal All Nigerian Peoples Party (ANPP). E …óungu 2007 mo jaa…ìi jon…óe dokkowo ar…ói…óo leydi Umaru Musa Yar‚Äôadu‚Äôa shawari …óun musamman mo…óun subti e shubtugal PDP e leuru Fabrairu 2009 …óun riiwiimo ga…óa wuuro maako ngo ]]Kum] gon…óun hukuma pamarun Akko ngo diiwal Gombe gamma sekuukimo e wa…óuki kiifoje nyamuuki kiine e ja…ìuki go…ó…óun e juu…óe yim…ìe e sekukumo hawtuki kon…óu…óe e subtugo PDP jogigo laamu. 
Mo daraake tefgo laamu diiwal Gombe e…óer Gommanjo e yal…óe 26 …óun Afrilu 2011 amma Ibrahim Hassan ∆äankwambo mo shubtal PDP doiimo. Ga…óa timminki shu…ìal mo wiii PDP e diiwal Gombe soba‚Äôen maagu-INEC soji‚Äôen …ìeta…óugal …ìalewal (Police) …ìe NYSC …ìe kauti kon…óuu…óe faaro wa…ógo gonga e diiwal Gombe e jikii shubtuule 2,218 e wakkatire su…ìal shaaligal. 
Mai…óe.
Kumo mo maayi e yal…óe 27 …óun Disamba 2020 ga…óa Covid-19. 

Muhammad Inuwa Yahaya:
Muhammad Inuwa Yahaya(be …óanyiimou e yalde 9 …óun lewru Yarkooma duu…ìi 1961) un gim…óo luumo e Naajeeriya …óen un gim…óo siyasajo. Han ko woni ar…óujo Diiwal Gombe e jonde ngomnajo mo …óun subti e yal…óe 9 …óun lewru Sedto, duu…ìi 2019 e les subtugo APC. . Muhammad inuwa yahaya mou dayanmo nalde 9 lewru yarkooma moungou 1961 lysidi sunngulla eii lysidi siyasa'en Naajeeriya doon Diiwal Gombe eii wai,on nalde 8 lewru mbooye moungou 2019, bidi,on jam,iya .
Distinorde maako.
∆äun danyimo e yal…óe a …óu lewru yarkooma 1961 e Jekadafare, Diiwal Gombe gu hautago Naajeeriya. Danyowo maako Alhaji Umar un taggu luumo.
Jande.
Yahaya mo halartake janngir…óe Central Primary School …óenbo e janngir…óe Government Secondary School gon…óun Gombe. Gada a mo jangi e janngir…óe Ahmadu Bello University gon…óun Zariya, inare e mo hee…ìi digiriwal maako artugal e fannu limgal ceede (Accounting) e …óungu 1983. 
Kuugal.
Yahaya mo huwwi e ko nooni ngomnatiwal e kanfaniji mo fu…ó…ói kuugal e kamfaniwol rufu jariwal e resirde …óun Diiwal Bauchi inare e mo latti Accountierjo maw…óo gada …óungu 1984 yaari 1985. Mo lattake jagor…óo maw…óo mo kamfaniwal A.Y.U Civil Engineering Company Ltd gada 1993 yaari 1999.
E …óungu 2003 ar…ói…óo Diiwal Gombe, Danjuma Goje …ìilimo komishinajo ceede e hautuki jaudi.
Hauteji Sanaa‚Äôaji.
Yahaya mo membajo e …óer …óir hauteji ∆ôoridi Association of Nation Accountants of Nigeria (ANAN), Nigeria Innstitute of Management (NIM), Chartered Institute of Taxation of Nigeria (ACITN).
shubtuje/Siyasaje.
Yahaya mo nasti shubte e dungu 2003 e shu…ìal ngomnajo e …óungu 2015 mo lattake tefowo jo…óorga ngomna e subtugo APC e Diiwal Gombe e yal…óe gp‚Äôo …óun lewru Octoba 2018. Mo nyami subtal wurtinki ardoto…óo …óun diiwal Gombe …óun su…ìal All Progressive Congress (APC) e kuri‚Äôaji …ìurdi …óu…óuki e kuri‚Äôaji 859 inare e mo doy sobajo tefuki maako Muhammad Jibrin Barde ke…ìu…óo kuri;aji 463.
E yal…óe 9 gu lewru Maries 2019 …óun an…óini yim…ìe Yahaya kanko ke shubtago e jodargal ar…ói…óo diiwal Gombe …óun 2019. Mo hee…ìi kuri‚Äôaji 364,179 inare e mo doy subtago tetgo maako mo subtal PDP Sen Usman Bayero Nafa…óa keb…óo kuri‚Äôaji 223,868.
Bangal e yalji.
Yahaya mo …ìaagi rou…ìe …ói…óo …óen bo e mo wodi bacci jewe …ói…ói …ìe fu ma…ì…ìe e …ìe jodi …óer gelle Gombe.

Mahmood Yakubu:
Jande.
Farfesoje Mahmood Yakubu mo jangi jan…óe maks e jangir…óe firamare pamar…óe …óun takobii gon…óun n…óer gelle fororde modi…ì…ìe gon…óun Toro …óer diiwal Bauchi e…óer mo himmini njan…óe mako …óun sakandaree. Eta yeso njan…óe jangir…óe mau…óe bo farfesoje Yakubu waa…ói njan…óe mun …óe digirimun artu…óun e jangir…óe Shehu Usmanu Danfodio gon…óe diiwal Sokoto e hirna faaro woila Najeeriya e…óen mo njangi jan…óe …óistinirgo.
Farfesajo Yakubu …óenbo o waa…ói jan…óe digiri mako …ói…óa…ìun e jangir…óe Wolfsen gon…óun England e Cambridge inare emo njangi huudugo e yim…ìe leydi e leydi …óun mo himmini e …óungu 1987 mo bo waa…ói digiri mako tata…ìuun e…óau …óistinore Naajeeriya e jangir…óe Oxford gon…óe Birtaniya …óunmo himmini e …óungu 1991.
Kuugal.
Farfesajo Yakubu mo ne…ìii emo njangina e ajngir…óe faraki soljien Naajeeriya ngon…óun Kaduna e…óen mo hen…óito inare emo janginta dabareji konu fuu deita e…óenbo areji noni…óe e …óistinore e kautal ley…óe e ley…óe.
Jogago Mangu.
Farfesajo Yakubu mojagake mangu e mo haa…óe sakatarejo shede e lamu …óu hautugo lesdi e lesdi …óun…óun wa…ói e hautugo Naajeeriya e …óungu 2014. Denbo e ga…óa…óon wato e lewru octoba …óungu 2015 ar…ói…óo Muhammadu Buhari …ìilimo e dau maw…óo hukumar subtuge jo…óorigo hore mun biago (INEC). Farfesajo hanko ardi subtal mauga gal 2019 …óenbo …óun gomna‚Äôen diiwal …óe…óun yahirta wakkatire fere-fere subtal. ∆äen ar…ói…óo Muhammadu Buhari fuuiti …ìilkimo e dau hukuma subtugo njo…óorigal haremun biagas (INEC) e …óungu 2020.

Ibrahim Hassan ∆äan∆ôwambo:
Ibrahim Hassan ∆äan∆ôwambo be danyee mou (e yal…óe 4 Aprilie 1962) mo gim…óo siyasa,en lysidi Naajeeriya me medgo lattaki ngomnaajjo Diiwal Gombe e hautugo Naajeeriya. 
Distinorde Maako E Kuugal.
Dun danyi Dankwambo …óer yal…óe 4 …óun lewru Aprilie 1962 e Herwagana, Gombe. Mo timmini gon…óe maako e janngir…óe Ahmadu Bello University e …óungu 1985 inare e mo wa…ói digiriwal e fannu limgu (Accounting). Mo he…ìi digiri …ói…óa…ìun e fannu hautugo jaudi e janngir…óe University of Lagos e 1992 …óenbo mo wa…ói digiri tata…ìun e fannu limgal gada janngir…óe Igbinedion University. Mo fu…ó…ói kuugal e Cooper & Lybrand e dungu 1985, …óun mo huwwi e Banki maw…óun …óun Naajeriya gada 1993 yaari 1999. Gada …óen …óun …ìilimo akkantajo janar …óun Diiwal Gombe, e mo joogi …óu un mangu ha yaari 2005 …óun …ìilimo akkantajo janar mo hautugo 20 Aprilie 2005 mo …óenbo huwwi e Bankiwal mangal gal Naajeriya. Mo jogake …óu un mangu ha sai …óe mo wa…ói jippaki (resign) mo fu…ó…ói kuu…óe tetgal subtugo maako …óun ar…óujo Diiwal Gombe e lewru Haaram ru 2011. 
Subtuugo.
E shubtal ga…óagal e yal…óe 26 …óun lewru Aprilie 2011 Dankwambo mo hee…ìi kuri‚Äôaji 596,481, e mo hee…ìi nasru e…óau sobaen tetgo maako Alhaji Abubakar Aliyu mo subtugo CPC he…ìi 841,959 …óenbo e sanatajo Sa‚Äôidu Umar Kumo mo subtogo ANPP e kuri‚Äôaaji 84,959.
Ngomnajo (ar…ói…óo).
E jonde maako …óun ar…ói…óo, ∆äankwambo mo relli ballitowo maako David Mayims Albashi mo njomirawo ja…ìi bal…óe mu…óun e yal…óe 4 …óun lewru Novemba 2011 e go…ó…óun Asibiti …óun leydi Jamus sababu naunaki kimo nauni e do‚Äôeere motawa e yal…óe 28 lewru Augustie 2011. E yal…óe 17 …óun lewru Disemba 2011, Dankwambo mo …ìiili Tha‚Äôanda Rubani e jon…óe ballita ngomnajo ga…óa (…ìawo) fuutuka subtaki maako e …óungu 2015, Charles Ya‚Äôu Iliya mo lattake ballitowo mo a jon…óe maako …óe ngomnajo Diiwal Gombe ha yaari keral wa‚Äôaaduwal maako …ói…óa…ìal e 2014. 
Ungiiyaaji.
Mo membajo:

Halima Kyari Joda:
Hajja Halima Kyari Joda (Alkaman Gudi) hanko ke debbo artu…óo mowoonii fu…ó…óu…óo lamaki hukuma pamarun e …óer jajirka Diiwal Yobe latti emo jogii mangu maw…óo hukuma pamarun …óun Fika e jonii …óo.
Distinor…óe Margo Maako.
Halima …óun …óayimo e gellel Gadaka e …óer hukuma pamarun Fika e diiwal Yobe …óenbo un …ìiyii lasgo Ngamo en gon…óun hukuma pamarun …óun Fika …óun diiwal gal Yobe. Un gim…óo sarre eton …óun …óayimo. Abbaldi maako un maw…óo firamare (Headmaster) latti maw…óo modi…ì…ìe firamare.
Jan…óe.
Mo janyi firamare e central gon…óun gelle Potiskum. Ga…óa mo himmini …óen hai mo dilli janngir…óe hakuma gon…óe Nguru bi a…óun GSS Nguru mo he…ìe shaidejo himminki sakandarawol. Gada …óen hala …óun …ìagi mo ga…óa …óon hai mo dilli janngir…óe kuugal geesee mo he…ìi diflomawol e kononni margo shagge ladde gada …óon sai mo …ìeddi dillugo janngir…óe Maiduguri mo he…ìi an…óitago go digirte artu…óu e wuttudu himarii …óemle.
Hajja Halima moyahii kos e janngir…óe College of Agro Forestry ton magungu gon…óun Nairobi, Kenya e gesa mai zube …ìiyaka maizube Farms gon…óun Gelle Minna e Diiwal Naijer e …óenbo school of forestry Kano.
Kuugal.
Mo huwii e hutir…óe hakkilango shagge ladde e hutir…óe geesee e hutir…óe moiinoja jo…óor…óe e diiwal Yobe amma mo ummorak e…óau ku…óe kautu…óe mo…ìuri yi…óuki amma mohuwagi kuugal hautu…óe gal ma hai…óe mo wa…ói ritaya ehore maho e …óungu 2012 …óemo wa…ói ritaya hai mo wa…ói ko huwanki unguyati (hautu…óe) e ballital hore e hore.
Nasruji.
Hajja mo he…ìi nasruji …óu…ó…ói gam e wakka …óemo huwata hukumaji e hutir…óe helanaki shagge ladde e helanaki jo…óor…óe e hutir…óe kuugese mo darake sem…ìe faro …óaruki …óun tooyaki go…ó…óo ba …óen fuu inare edun he…ìi tonnigal e…ìe jahai …ìe …ìoiina …ìonni…óun figo e …ìeidugo mohe…ìe nasru yamgo jo…óargal hukuma pamarun Fika e les subtal APC e subtugo ga…óago yal…óe 27 …óun lewru Fabrairie 2021.
Huttude.
Ha wakkatire …óemo huwata kuugal hukumaji mo wowii e kuttu…óe sabo e mau…óe kuttule …óe kauti …óe wuro e …óe otis e…óe bo fijanki bacci rennuki bacci. E wuttu…óa kuu…óe ungiyaje lattaki maako mo ardake National Council for Women Society of Nigeria (NCWS). Runfaru hautir…óe rou…ìe dol…óoo…óe rou…ìe dau ko nyouwuki…ìe e sem…ìe wo…ì…ìe daya…ìe e…ìe shu…óa bacci ma…ì…ìe to dun wanni …ìe te…óe ainan …óun bo …óun wailitata. Daraki ma…ì…ìe e e…óau non wa…ói ha ardi…óo Ibrahim Gaidam wanginoyi dekawal ha…ì…ìuki gonki eyonki dau mo…óun nanyi…ói e gangal badgal fitinki bacci de…ì…ìi.
Mobgiji.
Mobgiji …ói mowooni …óer kanji ngoni National Council for Women Society of Nigeria (NCWS) e mobgal gal remo…ìe marorii e…óenbo moble …óe remo…ìe fuu …óun leydi (All Farmers Association of Nigeria) hau bo mobgal sun flower association e mobgal remo…ìe Alkamari (wheat Farmers Association).

Mohammed Danjuma Goje:
Mohammed Danjuma Goje (be danyiimou e gal longu lewru Octoba 1952) un ar…óujo Diiwal Gombe kii…óo go hautugo Naajeeriya e les …óoudi subtugo PDP inare e mo ja…ìi laamu e yal…óe e 29 nga lewru Mayie 2001 e wakkatire subtugo Diiwal Gombe …óun 2003. E jonni bo …óun gim…óo subtal All Progressive Congress (APC) …óun. 
Distinore maako e Kuugal.
∆äun danyi Goje e gelle Pindiga gon…óun Akko e Diiwal Gombe mo jangi tayaka Siyasajo e janngir…óe Ahmadu Bello University (A.B.U) Zaria. Mo medgo lattaki majaliisaajo dokaji Diiwal Bauchi gada …óungu 1979 yaari 1983. Goje mo lattake Sakatarejo wuudu linyitojun njamu gon…óun yabi Diiwal Lagos e …óungu 1984, e mo jogidun ha yaari 1989. E yal…óe 25 dun Aprilie 1998 mo darake tetgo …óen bo mo hee…ìi yamgo jo…óargal ngomnajo Diiwal Gombe. Sanatajo wakilti…óo Gombe e les subtugo United Nigeria Congress Party e hukuma subtugo …óun leydi (NECON) …óun, …óun wattini e subtuki gonijo gurtina…óo e laamu Janar Sani Abatcha 1999 …óun wa…óani kamfani …óun inde danyawo maako Hajja Zainab. Goje darake tefuki sanatajo e majaliisaa dokaji Naajeeriya e …óungu 1998 …óenbo mo lefti ministajo pamaro mo hiite e jam…óe gada 1999 yaari 2001 les ar…óugal Olusegun Obasanjo. E subtal Aprilie 2011 dun subta sanatajo wakilti…óo Gombe shakajun e …óau tikitiwal PDP.
Teefuuki mawngu majalisu Dottien.
Sanatajo Goje mo darake tefgo maungo majalisa dottien …óun Naajeeriya amma gada …ìawo mo …óacci gada tafki kin mo …óalani sanatajo Ahmad Lawan ga…óa mo joddake e ar…ói…óo leydi Muhammadu Buhari e yalde Almahisab …óun lewru Julie 2019. 

Amina Bashir:
Farfesajo Amina Bashir be …óanyee mou e …óer gelle Pataskumo gon…óe …óer Diiwal Yobe, Naajeeriya e yal…óe jewenayi 9 ga lewru Morse …óun ndungu 1960, mo wurtoike gada Daya e hukuma pamarun …óun Fika. Mo lattake farfesajo e …óungu 2009 lati e destinore diiwal Yobe kanko woni debbo artu…óo yaki jon…óe farfesajo debbo latti…óo bano Ngorko e fanuu tefgo ilmu e janginki …óun.
Danyowo maako.
Kinna…óo Alhaji Garba Daya, mo hakimijo Daya …óen madakijo Fika, hanko wonii dayawomako mo an…óu…óo edau kononi koirinoje …óen emo …óer …ìe hautir…óe wa…óugo korinaje eta woila Naajeeriya. Gada mo wa…ói ritiya wutau himminago hai mo ma…ì…ìiti sarirde hautugo hoirir…óe …óe …óun wo…óani in…óe Daya pharmacy.
Jan…óe.
Farfesa Amina Bashir mo fu…ó…ói firamare e central primary school jon…óun Nguru. ∆äenbo sakotake nattugo firamare St. Patrick primary school go…ó…óun pamarun …óun yim…ìe missionary school. Firamare …ìur…óun mangu e gelle maiduguri e wakkatire …óe …óun wanni …óayawomako sakii go inare kuugal yauri gelle maiduguri …óe dai …óun fuuiiti sakitanaki a…ì…ìuldi mata inare kuugal …óenmo himminki jangir…óe artu…óo firamaremake e Damboa …óer gelle potiskum go…óa …óen mehe…ìe algo jan…óe e koleji …óun Rou…ìe gon…óun maiduguri inare emo he…ìi himmingo andago go sakandare e …óungu 1977.
Lattaki mako debbo …óenbo gurtoyi…óo gadi sare an…óu…óe daraja jan…óe …ìe hokku…ìe famgo himma sem…ìe …ìe alayimo mo jo…ói e jon…óe …óe wala …ìeddago ko jon…óe renugo go…ó…óun ba, e ila …ìe farimo jangir…óe hebgo famgo kimiyajire e lattu…óe jangir…óe jonde Mubi e diiwal Adamawa komo he…ìa yago jangir…óe Ahmadu Bello gon…óun Zariyaa.
Mo he…ìi nasaru himmango jangir…óe ABU …óunne e …óungu 1981 emo he…ìi famgo edau an…óuki go digiri edau …óemgal we…óugo wato ingilishire, koe fiijomo daraki mo go…óaki go…ó…óun mo …ìili jan…óe mako e tefgo digiri …ói…óa…ìur. Biya…óur master‚Äôs emo jangi jan…óe jangin e jangir…óe maiduguri kadima mo wa…ói digiri digirgir biya…óun PhD edau …óemgal ingilishire (English Sociolinguistic) e jangir…óe mo wa…ói watau Ahmadu Bello University zaria.
Kuugal.
Farfesajo Amina Bashir motu…ó…ói kuugal mako tun e …óungu 1982 komo mo yahamo huwana lesdi wata corper mo wa…óii kuugal e jangir…óe maiduguri mo huwii sem…ìe e…óau mo an…óugo dau digiri …ói…óa…óun e se…ó…óa e hakkilo ha mo latti ar…ói…óo jangir…óe janginare …óemgal inglishi …óun jangir…óe Maiduguri e …óungu 2010 ha mo latti jon…óe farfesojo gam mo huwi sem…ìe e …óendae wakkatire. Enon fu …óah kuugal e jangir…óe maiduguri …óen mo farii jangir…óe hautu…óe gon…óe Dutse, e…óan mo latti balattiwe mau…óo jangir…óe …óen (Deputy Vice Chancellor) e …óungu 2016 …óunbo mo latti mau…óo fana fango go no…óunjodarto (Dean Faculty of Arts and Social Sciences Federal University Dutse) ekowaddi han…óe hanko woni dau jo…óergal gal.
Ballital.
Farfesajo Amina Bashir e an…óama sem…ìe ha mo jaar jahowo sumpo jangir…óe fere-fere e inaje fere-fere ga…óa …óer jangir…óe …óe mo sumpi wauti e wallu e jon…óe mako …óe farfesajo …óe kauti e jangir…óe B.U.K gon…óun Kano e …óungu 2014, jangir…óe Usman Danfodio gon…óe Sokoto e hakku…óe (2014 yaari 2016) jangir…óe fadi…ìe wonde wudu e hakku…óe 2016 yaari 2017 e …óenbo jangir…óe diiwal Yobe ga…óa 2017 ha yaari han…óe.
Komoandira.
Mo lattake bawu…óoo dau kononi janginki e…óon mo an…óira mo nebdi ema sem…ìe mo bawu…óo gal mo …ìuru du…ìi 35 en wa…óagal …óen ebo emojiita e himari egun jangir…óe fere-fere mo win…ói …óeroji ko yari tati 3, artikuji e ji…ì…ìina…óe ko…ìuri 40 …óun mo hollinta wadgo e jangir…óe fere-fere molatake editajo e mujallaji fere-fere e …óistinar…óe margo mako.
Mauninago (Awards).
Farfesajo mo ja…ìi lambaji manineki ko …óu…ó…óun kautu…óun …óu…óuki e marde mako nangu gada jango…ìe, kautu ardi…óe eko latti kautu…óe jo…óani…ìe koe muuen, e jiki nan …ìelu mako siddi dau emo latti hodere e…óer rou…ìe namu e diiwal Yobe tan ma ha e ge…ì…ìal woila faro fuuna gaba go‚Äôo fuu.

Bola Tinubu:
Bola Ahmed Adekumle Tinubu (be …óanyiimou e yal…óe 29 Mbooye duu…ìi 1952) hanko wooni ardii…óo leddi Naajeeriya. Un accountajo …óenbo un gim…óo siyasajo …óun Naajeeriya. Mo lattake laati…óo jagar…óo shubtal gal "All Progressive Congress" (APC) gal lego tun wakkatire figgukigal e duu…ìi 2013. Mo me…óii wa…ógo Gomnajo Diiwal Legas ga…óa 1999 yaari 2007, e Sanatajo Laagos hirna e wakkatire rammina…óe jamhurigam tataure. E lewru Janairu 2022 mo hollini aniyawal maako e …óaraki tefgo ar…óaaki Naajeeriya e shubtugal APC e shu…ìal maw…óo leydi …óun 2023. Mau…óo hafsajo soji‚Äôen Diiwal Laagos mo 12 Tinubu mo wa…ói jan…óe maako e fombina faaro hirna Naajeeriya, mo jangi lamgal cede e Aamerik komo huwane liddi yaasi …óun …óuu…ìi …óu…ó…ói mo wartii Naajeeriya e shaaka duu…ìi 1980 …óenbo waa…ói ko kuugal wailutuuki cede komo nasta siyasaje e jon…óe tefowo sanatajo hirnajun e …óungu 1992 e les tutawal shubtu Social Democratic Party ga…óa laamoto…óo mo laamu soja‚Äôen Sani Abacha ko maaya majalisa dotti‚Äôen e …óungu 1993.
Tinubu mo lattake ga…óowo gurtinawo e gurtoto…óo gam yiiki …óun wuitinoyi laamu Democracy e jon…óe go…ó…óun kautal sangarewal …óun ungiyaji National Democratic Collition Movement. Fuu e wiikii …óun tilastake …óoggu…óu ga…óa e wooni e …óungu 1994, Tinubu mo warti ga…óa mai…óe Abacha e 1998 mo wurtinoyi faaruki saakiitaki sa…ì…ìo yaari jamhuriwal naya…ìal. E subtal goiina diiwal Lagos artu…óo ga…óa sakiitaki sa…ì…ìo, Tinubu wa…ói nasru e …óa…óuugo …óu…ógo e jon…óe …ìiiyi subtal Alliance for Democracy e dau Dapo Sarumi mo subtal Peoples Democratic Party e …óenbon nosirudeen kekere. Ekun mo su…ìal All Peoples Party. Ga…óa …óuu…ìi naayi masaakitake yamgo laamu yaarimo wa‚Äôadu …ói…óa…óun e dau Funsho Williams e subtal PDP e lattu…ìe.
Du‚Äôun wa‚Äôadu …ói…óa…óun …óun Tinubu dau …óun hollini woinininki gelle gal Lagos ebo haure maako e gomnatiwal hautugo leydi les subtal PDP. Tun …óalukimako laamu e 2007 Tinubu wa…ói ko jogaaki manguuma …óun go‚Äôo e …óer mau…ìe-mau…ìe …ìe siyasajo e Naajeeriya gommna so…ìira…ìe maako e…ìe kebbina mau…óe mukamiji e yajirka go…ìal fombinawal faaro hirna …óenbo mo hollini gammol ngol …óun darata faaro tigguki subtal All Progressive Congress e 2013.
∆äun nee…ìi e…óun wa…óa wiu-mi-wiiaa an…óinki Tinubu …óun nee…ìi e…óun waa…óa wiu-mi-wii‚Äôaa mo fuskantake sheeke-sheeke yamgo kinne e tetugo e dem…ìo nyame ngonga edau …óestinore maako. Margu artu…óun …óun …óanyi Tinubu e yal…óe leuru Maris 1952 e diiwal Osun, Naajeeriya. Dai…óomo Abibatu Mogaji un gim…óo luumo latti…óo ga…óa …ìaawo mo latti Iyaloja eta diiwal Lagos
Ilmu.
Mo halartake jangir…óe firamare …óe St. John gon…óun Aroloya e Lagos e dem…ìo jangir…óe hollutuki e bacci gon…óun Ibadan e fombina faaro hirna Naajeeriya. Ga…óa …óen hai Tinubu midilli America e 1975 inare emo fu…ó…ói jon…óe e kolleji Richard J. Daley gon…óun Chicago, Illinois …óenbo mowaa…ói jan…óe e jangir…óe diiwal Chicago. Mo jippini jan…óe e …óungu 1979 hauti e hebgo digiri artu…óun e fannu limgal accounting.
Kuugal Artugal.
Tinubu mo waa…ói kuugal e kamfaniwal America Arthur Andersen, Delatte haskins Sells e GTE Services Corporation. Ga…óa mo warti Naajeeriya e 1983, Bola Tinubu mo nasti Mobil Oil Nigeria, …óembo mo lattake mau…óo kamfanuji.
∆Åangal E Yalji.
Tinubu mo jul…óo emo …ìaga Oluremi Tinubu sanatajo wakilti…óo Lagos shaaka ejooni minyira…ìe maako Adewale Tinubu hanko woo mau…óo kamfaniwal Oando. Dai…óo Tinubu, Abibatu mogaji mo soiti e yal…óe 15 …óun leuru Julie 2014 emo woodi duubi 96. Yal…óe 31 …óun Octoba 2017 …ìiyiiko ji…óe Tinubu mo nangaake nawool …ìerdee e wakkatire n…óe mo wooni London …óen ga…óa…óon …óun ta…ì…ìitini mai…óee maako.
Mangu Laamor…óe.
Tinubu emo jogi e laamuji Asiwaju Lagos e lamor…óe foo…óuyeesu …óun borgo e diiwal neeja Naajeeriya.

Bilkisu Muhammad Abubakar:
Bilkisu Muhammad Abubakar un bin…óowo e woyla Najeeriya mo laati in…óema an…óa ga…óa mo waari tata e ba…óal Hikayata 2018 …óun BBC wadata.
Distinorde margo.
∆äun …óanyi Bilkisu on e gelle Kano gon…óun shiyajun woyla faaro hirna hautugo Naajeriya joni …óo‚Äôo non un jangowo e Janngir…óe Bayero Universy …óun Kano inare e mo jangata Shari‚Äôah bi a …óun Law.
Nasru maako e BBC.
Habaru maako dun mo windi …óun in…óe Zama hanjun yaari mo jon…óe lattaki maako tata…ìo e fiijo Hikayata ngo BBC Hausa ngo …óun waa…ói e ndungu 2018.

Abubakar Habu Hashidu:
Abubakar Habu Hashidu Un kii…óo ar…ói…óo mo Diiwal Gombe …óun hautugo Naajeeriya
Alhaji Abubakar Habu Hashidu (10 Aprilie 1944 ‚Äì 27 Julie 2018) un gim…óo Subtuugo e Naajeeriya …óenbo un kii…óo ar…ói…óo Diiwal Gombe gon…óun shiyawal woyla faaro fuuna hautugo Naajeeriya gada Mayie 1999 yaari Mayie 2003.
Kuugal.
Hashidu mo mee…ói jogaki mu∆ôaami ministajo albarkai ndiyam …óenbo mo me…óu ministajo deemal e maruki saareji e wakkatire laamu sajien …óun janarjo Ibrahim Badamasi Babangida. Mo lattake membajo e hautugo Vision …óun janar Sani Abacha tiggi gamma tsarake taswirawo farugo leys…ói yeeso. 
Siyasaje E Laamu.
Hashidu hanko woni shubtugo ngomnajo Diiwal Gombe artu…óo e Naajeeriya, Nyegu…óo laamu e yal…óe 29 …óun Mayie 1999 e les subtugal All Peoples Party (APP). 
Ballitowo ngomnajo hanko woni Joshua Lidani e lewru Januarie 2003. 
Shubtal "All Nigerian People‚Äôs Party" gal amintani e Hashidu e jon…óe tetowo ngomna e subtal gal Aprilie 2003. Mo saldari fuu‚Äôutuki subteki maako …óembo mo amintake e manago …óun hukuma subtugal …óun leydi jodori dun horemu …óun. Mo fuu‚Äôutuki daraki tefgo ngomnajo Diiwal Gombe e dungu 2007 e subtal DPP …óun nangimo e lewru Mayie du 2007. ∆äen bo …óun joynimo e yeeso kotuwal …óau haure …óe …óun seekaata fu…ó…ói gada fu…ó…óa go tefki subteki maako. Tokku…ìe maako e jogi Areji Haure …ìe koowi kotu majistri e …óun inare e …ìe njofoyi Hashidu ha …ìe nauni alkalijo on ar…ói…óo shari‚Äôa …óun. 
Hashidu mo soiti e wuro maako e peu…óun pin…óe yal…óe 27 …óun lewru Julie 2018 gada mo yaari bone e shiya njamu.

Alhaji Muhammad Adamu Dankabo:
Dun …óanyi kinna…óo Alhaji Muhammad Adamu Dankabo e yal…óe 4 gu leuru Afril …óungu 1942 e Hukuma pamaren kabo Diiwal Kano.
Jan…óe.
Mo jangi jan…óe Qur‚Äôanawal e gelle kabo mo fu…ó…ói firamare e gelle Gwarzo diga …óun mo he…ìi jo…óer…óe jan…óe e ge…ìal jangir…óe lardi gon…óun Kano. Kinna…óo dilli jangir…óe faraki e kuugal firowal dau (girgiwal) eta FTC Kaduna e …óun jangir…óe bo gon…óun leydi Amerik. Mo he…ìe jamminago diflomawol e harkaji suruki girgije dau.
Kab…óugal.
Mo yari bone gab…óugal ga…óa kononii kuugal …óer wuro yaari ley…óe go…ó…óu…óe ha ga…óa jon…óe kakkilanowo firote ha mo latti dokkowo nyam…óu enan mo yaari mallaki…óo firowal gal hare mako e kanfani mako …óun Kabo Air.
Lamor…óe.
Lattaki mako Adamu Dankabo mo wurtake ga…óa diiwal Kano nanbo Naajeeriya e kuu…óe ya…óuu firoje dau saboe …óu…ó…óun himmanu …óun Dankabo wa…ói e martibinago mako waa…ói lami…óo Kano Ado Bayero …ìilimo edau jo…óer gal jarmajo Kano artu…óo e jon…óe lamu ful…ìe Kano.
Mobo kokkimo kuugal e…óer kuu…óe kese kau…óe hukuma pamarun Kano …óun …óun wurtinoyi gada kautugal Gwarzo emo huwagal ha njomirawo ja…ìi yonkimako e yal…óe 4 …óun lewru Afrilu …óungu 2002.
Andaki Mako.
Jarmajo Kano an…óirama faro kuu…óe alheri e mo houni fuu e yim…ìe zaman mako saboe iri haliji mako …óun hokkitirki mo he…ìe lammineki …óu…óki e jajirke lesdi …óin …óe…óun hauti e Sardaunajo kagoro, Galadimajo Pankshin, Ida Idaha ke Iburutu …óun Calabar.
Maide Mako.
Kinna…óo jarmanjo Kano Alhaji Muhammad Adamu Dankabo mo maayi e yal…óe 4 gu leuru Afrilu …óungu 2002 emo woodi dau 60 Muhammad Dankabo mo maayi mo…óa yalji mako …ói …óu…ó…ìe.

Luumo Sabon Gari:
∆äun nyi…ìii gongon hamo ngo sabon gari e gelle Kano e …óungu 1914 ammanbo ngo fu…ó…óayi kuugal nangugal hai e …óer 1915.
Inare Maago.
Go‚Äôo hango luumo wuuro sabon gari gor, he…ìinigo e wakkati …óe …óun hauti larduji woyla, fombina …óenbo e lasgo …óe latti huugotun, hai …óun latti yim…ìe fombina najeeriya …ìe ummoike yaari gelleji woylanko‚Äôen …óe latti e woodi neesuji fer-fere e …óenbo diinahji hai …óun latti e …óenton wakkatire hautugo ho…ì…ìe e …ìe gelle…óen …óokki bone e kowa…ói non hai …óun nyoppini…ìe e gal…óon gebal. Hai …óun latti e…ìe ga…ói ko yahirki lu…ìee ma…ì…ìe e inaje …óe…ìe ngoni. Etanor lumo sabon gari he…ìira.
Nyiptaki Ngo.
∆äun fuuiiti nyiptakigo a les ardurlleji Kano e nyibgal kamam gal zaman e …óungu 1983. …óun nyi…ìanigo runfaji e buloje …ìo…óeji gongo e …óun…óun zaman hanjun woni ga…óa e yibgal. Ngo‚Äôo luumo hango wooni luumo maugo e Kano.
Areji ∆äi…óun So…óata
E…óun he…ìa ko…óume areji …óun …óun sorata, …ìornugal, lati…óun kamani …óun turanko‚Äôen, pa…ó…óe mo…óe te…óe …óe turanko‚Äôen e …óume kolutti fu e gon…óun luumo.

Yacine Diallo:
Yacine Diallo (hitadee …óanyigoy: lewru oktoba 18-1897 hitadee mayugu lewru Aprilie 14, 1954) go…ó…óor siyasa ha leydi Gine go…ó…óa mahuyi ha majaalisa je Faransi daga hitadee 1946 yahugo hitadee 1954. 
Taariki Maako.
Yacine Diallo …ìe …óanyimo hawuro la…ìe, ha leydi Gine hitadee 1897 umayi yande saffoi naayi ha lewru hitadee 1954 ha wuro Conakry. 

Hindou Oumarou Ibrahim:
Hindou Oumarou Ibrahim …ìi lesdi Caadi fullo'on wo…óontefa fa…ó…óugo fellel an…ói…óo numugo leddi kanko'on …óon laara koyaal. Rou…ìe je "Association of Peul Women and Autochthonous People of Chad (AFPAT)" ohuyi kugal mangal wo…óon yacce…ìe ko …ìe huwata je "pavillion of the world indegeneous people‚Äôs initiative …ìe pavillion je COP21, COP22 …ìe COP23".
Wa…óon Hafda An…óirgo…ìe.
Hindou owondi wo…óon fadda fellel kanko‚Äôon wo…óon huwa doo yimm…ìe maako asli je mbororoji ha leddi/leys…ói Caadi ojangi ha Ndjamena birniwol mangal ha leydi Caadi shutare maako manfat …óer le√±ol maako …óer asli mbororo en oshutataman mo…ìuri an…óigo …ìe asli ma…ì…ìe …óura…ìe, …óura…ìe na‚Äôi …ìe bali. Yaake janngir…óe maako yake ofamti be …óau follomo jananku fuu…ìe an…óigo wo…óon fellel man …óer …óe maako asli …óer leddi man no…ìe hauti …ìe san…óiti le√±ol maako asli maako mbororo‚Äôen …óer ma…ì…ìe woo…ói …ìi he…ìi lawul janngir…óe man banano ohe…ìi. Gamman …óer 1999, otiggi kautal Association of Peul Women and Autochthonous People of Chad (AFPAT), kanko‚Äôon kawtal ummatoore owartire hakkilo maako gikku bukkwai ro…ìe …ìe asli mbororo‚Äôen …óer jama‚Äôaje mbororo‚Äôen …ìe hawtigo teddingo ar…óigal be dawrongo yim…ìe fa…ó…óugo fellel. Kautal man he…ìi laawul wa…óugo kugal maako hitadee man 2005 daga yakeman wo…óon nasta daurango leydi be leydi wailittigo wakkati yakugo yeesu ju…ó…óun bee tagali fer-fere bee fa…ó…óugo felle. 

Khady Diallo:
Khadi Diallo (…ìe …óanyimo ha hitadee 1955) …ìi leddi Kodduwaar o wodi andal al‚Äôadaji Faransi.
∆Åe takkimo …óe taffugo aran…óe …ìe ‚Äúlegrand dictionnaire encyclopedique de la Cote Divoire‚Äù. Kanko‚Äôon …óon aina al‚Äôadaji (biiruki) ma…ì…ìe Kodduwaar ha birniwal leydi Faransa …ìe lammini mo …óer …óe je sakatare janar ha hatidee 2014.
Taariki Maako.
∆Åe…óanyimo Khady Diallo ha wuro mangoman leddi Ivory Coast; Abidjan hitadee je 1955. Otimmini janngir…óe maako hitadee 1973 owarti an…óa…óo wawo…óo be wakkere wa…óugo sauti …ìe larugo je Societe de Production hitadee 1977. Ha hitadee 1979 owurti …óer tasha ‚ÄúI LOVE TV‚Äù ngam rufugo taskara ma…ì…ìe ha leddi Ivory Coast. Maw…óo yattingo …óun kanko‚Äôon Roger Fulgence Kassy. Hitadee 1983 onnumi fu…ó…óugo dictionary be encyclopedia ha leddi Cote Divoire kanko‚Äôon Raymond Borremans onnumi daftare man. ∆Åesendi kugal man …ìetaffi daftare jon…óe jego …óer hitadee 1986 …ìawo…óon je New African Editions gwandal fulu loggere andal …ìe balliti …ìe be ceede taffugo …óereji. ∆Åeheyi yesu taffugo ha encyclopedia gam yahugo yesu man. Der hitadee 1996 golnasti …óer haa…ìe …ìolwundiri haa…ìe taskata bolugo dohala AIDS hasare television leddi Ivory Coast. Hadeer hitadee 2010 kanko‚Äôon he…ìi nu…ìe kuje faune haa world Festival of Black Arts bernuwal Dakar. Kanko‚Äôon …óon lara al‚Äôadaji ma…ì…ìe Ivory Coast ha bernuwal Paris hitadee je 2007 …ìe lamminimo de maw…óo sakatare annaji Francophone je leddi Cote Divoire ha hitadee 2014. Khady Diallo hawowo‚Äôon je Ivorian I‚Äô Odre cultural merit.

Fatumata Djau Balde:
Fatumata Djau Balde kanko‚Äôon woni ministajo sungullaji yaaci nder leddi Gine-Bisaawo saida …ìe wai litima ha lewru Septemba hitandee 2003. O jangi nder le…óe …óu…ó…óum ha gurbarnama leddi Gine-Bisaawo. 
E mo me…ói wartigo sakatare je hawtugo hore yim…ìe be kuugal, e ministajo wancigo ma…ì…ìe tugogite, e wa…óigo ministajo sungullaji yaasi. O wa…ói ministajo nder ha gubarnama, hanko on woni ar…ói…óo kumba yala maw…ìe su…ìi. 
Shartumar kugal man ne…ìai soja‚Äôen wailittigo lamu ha lewru satumba hitadee 2003.

Muhammadu Sa‚Äôad Abubakar:
∆äun …óanyi Sultan Muhammadu Sa‚Äôad Abubakar e nyal…óe 24 …óun leuru Juko duu…ìi 1956 …óen un …ìi…ó…óo mo lami…óo jul…ìe mo 17 Modibbo Abubakar mo tata…ìo 111 ga…ó…óo lamu jara…óun njutirka du…ìi 50.
Marga Mako.
Sa‚Äôad Abubakar hanko ma mo nlattake ga…óa e…óer Sultan mo 17 Saddiq Abubakar Usmanu latti…óo foo…óugo du…ìi ko…ìuri sappoje joyi edau jo…óargal lamu. Sultan Sa‚Äôad mo nasti kuugal sojien e…óungu 1975 …óenbo ga…óa mo himmini foraki sojien mo latti lattanana bia…óo mo aniniel gotel ga…óa …óun‚Äôun …óun …ìo lami…óo jul…ìe waadi jange-jange e…óer eyasi Naajeeriya e les…óe kamano Indiya e Kanada ga…óa wartuki mako wuro o latti keman…óaje sojien tankawa sojien hokko…ìe reno…ìe …ìe ardi…óo lamu janaire Ibrahim Badamasi Babangida e n…óungu 1980.
Ga…óa …óen maho mo lattake komondajo dakaje balliroje …óun jo…óo jam …óun mabgan OAU e Chadie. Ha e han…óe lami…óo jul…ìe mo lattake wakilijo soji …óun Naajeeriya e mobga ECOWAS ga…óa lattake wakilijo hautugo sojien Afrika hirnajun go …óojun kuugal jon…óe jam e Saliiyo. 
Ko…óun …ìilamo lami…óo jul…ìe …óun 20 Sa‚Äôad Abubakar lattake wakilijo sojien Naajeeriya e ofisjun jipporde Naajeeriya e Pakistan …óen e jonimabo emo woodi …óebbo tegal ebacci (…ìiyakol).
Elenyol.
Sultan Sa‚Äôad Abubakar hanko wooni …ìi…óor pamaro mo jewe…ói…ói (7) bia…óo Sultan Abubakar Sadiq …ìigel Usman ga…ó…óo lami…óo jul…ìe ha ko yuutiri du…ìi 50. Abubakar dan Usman hanko ke …ìiyi Usman Shehu Usman …óen taanu Mu‚Äôaz gada lasgo Shehu Usman …ìiyi Fodio lati…óo ummin…óo …óe e daulare …óe Usmannniya eko …ìuri du…ìi 200 shalli …ói. Eko waddi kinna…óa lami…óo jul…ìe mo 19 shoitu …óo Sa‚Äôad hanko ke mo 5 donu…óo leso lamu ngon.
Jan…óe.
Bello njunaidu …óun wuudu kautoru …óistinor…óe daulare Usmaniyya e Sokoto mo wiii lami…óo hee…ìi ilmu diina eka zaman tun e faro ummirajo mako. Mo wa…ói jan…óe allowal e jangir…óe gon…óe julir…óe Shehu haade e wuuro lami…óo jul…ìe mo wa…ói jan…óe e jangir…óe Doma e Sokoto komo dilla jangir…óe Barewa gon…óe Kaduna e Zariya ga…óa…óun bo mo salake jangir…óe kuugal sojien gal Naajeeriya biagal Naajeeriyan Defence Academy …óer …óungu 1975. Mo jange e hebgo foreki e Indiya e kan e jon…óe sojijo emo…óer dillu…ìe hautugo mango go hautugo duniyaru e ballitogal jon…óe jam e …óustugo nastinoiki areji haure …óun…óun waa…ói e gellel Accra …óun leydi Ghana.
Manguji Dimo Jogi.
Sultan Muhammadu Sa‚Äôad Abubakar III mo he maugu second lieutanant e …óungu 1977, emo ga…óa …óo mo latti komandajo mo musamman e reno…ìe mau…óo leydi mo lamu sojien e wakkatire …óe lamu Ibrahim Badamasi Babangida kazalika mojogake mangu gu nasto…ìe hakku…óe ga…óa wuttudi maro…ìe hautugo jaudi Afirika biago ECOWAS ga…óa ndungu 1995 yaari 1999. 
Kuugal.
Lami…óo wa…ói kuu…óe …óu…ó…óe edau ballital jon…óe jam e Naajeeriya e Afirika ko lutti lesde duniyaru. Lami…óo Sa‚Äôad mo ardake hauta…óe hauta…óe sojien Afirika e les hautu…óe lesde Afirika …óe …óunjoini gan hebanke lesdi Chadi jon…óe jam e du…ìi 198. Hanko woni komandajo ar…ói…óo bataliyawal 231 go sojien ECOMAG e koonu Saliyo ga…óa 1999 yaari 2000.
Wakiltago.
Ga…óa …óungu 2003 yaari 2006 Sultan Muhammadu Sa‚Äôad Abubakar mo lataki wakilijo Naajeeriya dokkowo shawari eda renuugo e lesdi Pakistan. Denbo saboe holluku wawuki kuugal e nasr…óun …ìeidi mangu kuugal maako ga…óa Pakistan yaari Iraki e Iran e Afganistan e Saudiyya e jon…óe dokkowo shaworiji ekononi renugo e zaman lamu Obasanjo.
Algo Kuugal (Ritaya).
Mo yaari jon…óe Burgediya janarjo ko mo latto lami…óo jul…ìe. Mo wa…óii ritaya e yal…óe bo…óu leuru December 2006 go…óa goggu…óo duu…ìi 31 e kuugal sojien.
Laamu.
E nyal…óe 2 …óun leuru Nuwamba 2006 mo ja…ìi lamu lami…óo jul…ìe Naajeeriya ga…óa maide mauniko (maunirawo) Sultan Muhammadu Maccu…óo e do‚Äôoyaki firowal (jirgiwal AD) …óalgal Abuja yahaii Sokoto e yal…óe 29 …óun leuru octoba 2006.
Ga…óa lattakimako lami…óo jul…ìe Muhammadu Sa‚Äôadu III mo …óenbo hee…ìi jon…óe mau…óo haugo jul…ìe …óun Jama‚Äôatul Nasril Islam (JNI) …óenbo mau…óo jo…óer…óe …óefuu …óe diinah Islama …óun Naajeeriya (NSCIA).
Nonbo e 2015 mo nasti jeriwol yim…ìe an…óa…óe he…ì…ìe mauninago Global Seal of Integrity (GSI) dau gamol gol mo wamii faro hautuki koe ummatore Naajeeriya e…ìe wuttu…óu.
Diiwal Sokoto.
Denbo e zaman mako …óun fasarake …óereji jaddadi…óo …óun Usman Danfodio e Abdullahi Fodio e Muhammadu Bello e Nana Asma‚Äôu gamma ummatore. Jonii mo hauti…óiri kuu…óe fassirgo e kinna…óo Abubakar Imam wa…ói e kuu…óe ga…óa…óe zaman lami…óo jul…ìe Dasuki no an…óudo daulare Usmaniyya Bello Njunaidu.
Enon bo gada …óer kuu…óe mako maroje ilmu e fago yeso yim…ìe lami…óo ∆ôir∆ôirake won…óe jo…óar…óe fau gal…óe Almahisa …óun …ìai…óanki bandira…ìe an…óuki dau matsalaji hande e ko…óega …óon …óun no…ó…óoita mo…ói…ìe gara …ìia go…ó…óun eduu …óereji go…ó…óun mau…óui.
Lami…óo …ìei…ói maruki famgo e lummatore Sokoto …óe ar…ói…óo leydi ki…óo Shehu Shagari ardi bia…óe Sokoto Development Trust. Fuu wakkatire habbir…óe (Sallah) lami…óo e …óen hauta lam…ìe e ar…ói…óe e …ìe jaudi …ìe …ìolwa dau masala jan…óe e maguki…óun …óenbo …óun hautana resarde …óen shede.
Bello Njunaidu mo wii e…óun wada antani e shede dese …óen faro ekkutuki yim…ìe kuugal jungo gal …ìe jogarto koe ma…ì…ìe kamani ekkitaki komfita nyotol eko lutti kuu…óe juu…óe fure. Nyi…ìol julir…óe-an…óu…óo …óistinore daulawal Usmaniyya mo hollin wigo lami…óo jul…ìe nyi…ìi julir…óe e inaje …óu…ó…óe e komo holli …óun an…óa kerol majema. Mo nyi…ìi julir…óe e Nasarawa e Kogi …óenbo …óun an…óa kerol majebo nomo wii. Wo inki hubbare-wooinki hubbuje artu…ìe mai…ìe e…óun …óer ballital lami…óo Sa‚Äôadu.
Lamorde hautir…óe …óe …óe wii lami…óo Sa‚Äôadu mo moini inare hubbare Muhammadu Fodio danyawo Usman Dan Fodio mo…óun uwii e ge…ìal gwadabawa.

Alpha Oumar Barry:
Alpha Oumar Barry (1925-1977) …ìi siyasa ha leydi Gine …ìi majalisa minista jagwar…óo Ahmed Sekou Toure jamhuriya Gine je arande …ìawo nungugamo o mayii je camp boyro.
Taariki maako.
∆Åe …óanyimo Alpha Oumar ha hitadee be 1925, ohe…ìi ekkitigo kugal doktor ha Bardeaux …ìe Faransa. ∆Åe lamminimo maw…óo molarata jaamu ha kindia …ìe lammini Alpha Oumar minista fetel …ìe canjindiri ha majalisa minista‚Äôen dee…ìe yaccika yon…óe 19 je lewru yuni hitadee 1972. Otawama …ìi siyasa je jam‚Äôiya (parti) Democratic Party of Gine (DPG). Ha fere muftur…óe da…ó…ìi to…ìe habaruji yan…óe …ói dafre lewru ha Augusta hitadee 1976, Sekou Toure ohokki yenigo nannugugo conakry wii…ìe fere hauti be telli Diallo, Alpha Oumar Barry, lamine kouyate be Alioune Drame. ∆Åe fat ma…ì…ìe Alpha Oumar be Alioune Drame. 
∆Åe …óon won…ói sobi ra…ìe Telli Diallo daga …ìe famar…ìe. ∆Åawo nongugomo kwamanda babal yum…ìe Sekou Toure, oyar…ìi lilal ko…óu…ói …ìe yarana Alpha Oumar daga ar…ói…óo Toure oyi…óino obawono obiiya kanko hauti tifule man kanko‚Äôon wailika lari wailitika. Ragere man woja…ìi…ìe Alpha Oumar …óen omani. Yan…óe saffoi …ói…ói hitadee fabairu 1977, Alpha Oumar be luttu…ìe …ìe hauti…ìe do…ìe le…ìe …ìe numi be ha…ói…ìe yamdu be diyam. Omayi yende nogas ejego ha lewru fabairu hitadee 1977.

Ousmane Balde:
Ousmane Balde (omayi hitadee 1971) an…óu…óo horerisku ha leydi Gine …ìi siyasa. Kanko‚Äôon jaagor…óo maw…óo banki je leydi Gine hitadee 1963-1964, o wa…ói minista horerisku be ceede. ∆Åe sargimo be wonugo …ìiyumgu yari yake Portokeesi taari ha leydi Gine, …ìe nangi mo den…ìo …ìe …ìilimo …ìekitayimo je 1971 je Ibrahim Barry, magassouba mariba kaita kara…óe sofiane be luttu…ìe. 

Amsatou Sow Sidibe:
Amsatou Sow Sidibe (…ìe …óanyiimou hitaande 1953) Mallum jo‚Äôon bo lauya‚Äôon …ìi siyasa …ìi‚Äôon ha leydi Senegaal. Hitaande 2012 kanko‚Äôon debbo arn…óe wo…óon deer yim…ìe wurti beesu…ìa…ìe cubol mu‚Äôar danta…ìe ha leddi. Amsatou farfesa wakkare kiita ha Jami‚Äôah Cheikh Anta Diop (Jami‚Äôa je Dakar) wo…óon huwa kanko‚Äôon darekta je jaburu ye…ìugo hore …ìi…ìe Adama be Donde jam. O tiggi …óenbo o huyi …óer …óe maako ha ar…ói…óo be kautal yahugo yeesu ro…ìe Afirik (RAFET), woni ha wuro Dakar. Derku…óe maako fere-fere Amsatou daurini…ìe diflomasiyya gam jaamu ro…ìe andal fundigo taagale, ballitirgo no…óun wa…óata sardiman gam yamugo ne…ó…óaku ro…ìe be taskugo sardi‚Äôon fan…óigo tagali Senegaal hitadee 2010, moyi…ói jam‚Äôiyya siyasa cu…ìol …óer saare je leydi gam ∆¥e…ìugo ro…ìe wakkati gotel. Ko fam…ói areta kan…ìe‚Äôon derini…ìe.
Amsatou o bii ‚Äúro…ìe …óon boliwa gam fotiggo ha toifu ho …óer laddi‚Äù. denbo o bii …ìe yi…ói be daara ha …óer de manga gam ta‚Äôugo dourugo hundeman tilim …óum. Amsatou Sidibe o heyi janngir…óe University of Paris II, o he…ìi digiri tata…ìo wakkare kiitabe kimiyya siyasa.

Ousmane Sow:
Ousmane Sow Cehoowo haa Senegal (10 Octoba ‚Äì 1 Decemba 2016) go…ó…óo leydi Senegaal wo…óon safa yim…ìe dud…ìe.
Tariha Maako.
Be danyimo haa Birniwol Dakar leydi Senegaal yan…óe saffo (10) lewru Octoba hitande 1935. …ìawo mayugo Baba maako hitande 1956 o‚Äô acci leys…ói Dakar wudilli jangugo leydi Faransi haaton o he…ìi digiri …ói…ói wakkere andal dim…ìogo …ìandu. O hoti Senagaal …ìawo …ìehefti laamu mam…ìe hitadee 1960 o fo…ó…ói kuugal doktore …ìandu.
∆Åawo …óon olori Faransi wodin…ìi …ìandu maako olori olorti Senegal hitande 1978. Umayi haa Dakar yinde go‚Äôo lewru Decemba hitande 2016 o wo…ói du…ìi (81) haa duniyaru.
Kuugal.
Ousmane Sow o he…ì…ìi saatal koffi hi…ìugo hotoji leni riefenstalil jee yim…ìe nuba wono…ìe funbin a Sudan bee hitande 1984 o fu…ó…ói se…ìigo derkujeji tokkindiri kujekayafi der yim…ìe masla…ìe dimbobe …ìandu haa nuba. Gammam…ìe o fu…ó…ói taskare kesum kuje hugo kesum.
Se…ìe …ìe ohollata be Centre Culturel froucaisde Dakar haa hitadee 1987. Sow …ìawo …óon ose…ìi yim…ìe maasai, haa zulu, Fulfulde ya huga yagere hitadee 1990s be yim…ìe leydi Amerik.
Nasaru Maako.
O mafti yim…ìe luumo andal leydi be leydi du…ì…ìe der mom…ìe be Documenta IX be kassel der hitadee 1992 be Palazzo Grassi be venice yakeman be hitadee 1995. ∆Åe wondi man Pont des Art ha Paris der du…ìi hitadee 1999. 
∆Åe hokkimo lamba mauugo wakkere Prince Clouse du…ìi hitadee 2008, manugo al‚Äôaada …ìandu go…ó…óo wo …óon der yim…ìe saffo go‚Äôo he…ìigo nasru. Yinde 11 lewru Aprilie hitadee 2012 …ìe su…ì…ìi mo Sow haa der…óe Membre Associe Etranger (mo…ì…ìe hauti koffi ma…ì…ìe hayase) je Academie des Beaux-arts jee Institute de France, mu wari mari Fillel Andrew Inyeth kanko‚Äôon go…ó…óo …ìalejo mu…ìe arti su…ìugo gom memba. 

Aminata Diallo Glez:
Aminata Diallo Glez Neddo filmi ha Burkina Faso …ìe purodusa Aminata Diallo Glez (hitadee danyigo 1972) …ìe danyimo haa dori Burkina Faso, Bingel filmi be purodusa mo…ìe…ìuri andigo inde Kadi Jolie.
Taariki maako.
Aminata Diallo go to ma…ì…ìe dir…ìilawai je nai je Hassan Diallo, doktor dabbaji hautigo be mandy Togoyeni ku…ìe danyi.
Daga o ye…ói o warta doktor ammon Baba mayi hitadee haa 1983. Yake man wa …óon janngir…óe sakandirere o yehi yesu be janngir…óe maako ha wemtenga, wakkare ouagadougou. ∆Åawo hautigo be Theatre de la Fraternite o fotti be fujo…ìe filmi je Jean-Pierre Guingane …ìawo o timmini janngir…óe onesti der ummatore. Do‚Äôo yahaye so do janngir…óe maw…óo do‚Äôo he…ìi fillel janngir…óe haa wakkere andal dinga ha janngir…óe Ouagadougou University, o warti maw…óo fijirje filmi kanko be Theater de la Fraternite. Hitadee arande 1990 Fanta Regina nacro o accimo uwarta ha der filmi inde Puk-Nini. Haa …óon on …ìe andimo ubangi tulim…óo. Kanka‚Äôon maw…óo tulimdo filmi je Kadi Jolie, o he…ìi sobi ra…ìe wakkere Afirik.
O tiggi kamfaniwal maako inde man Jovial Productions, kamfaniwal maako o he…ìi filmi ju…ó…óe duddum hautibe Trois Hommes, Un Village (mubari he…ìugo sahu filmi bo…óugo (Best Series) ha fillel FESPACO 2005), Trosi Femmes, un village be super flicks (konanun marc be malika). Hitadee 2006 o tiggi fillel …ìangal al‚Äôaadaji be ‚ÄúFest Arts‚Äù. 
O bangi Damien Glez bindowo kuje janli…óeje Jeune Afrique.
O wurti jahagal se…ó…óa fofugo nder ummatore gam oyaha osikula dada maako yaunan gimo kansa o mayi hitadee 2019. 

Khadidiatou Diallo:
Khadidiatou Diallo danya…óo leydi Senegaal bindiwo un Pulaar kanko‚Äôon tiggi kautal man Groupe de Femmes Pour l‚ÄôAbolition de mutilations Sexuelles (GAMS) ha liddi Beljik.
Taariha maako.
∆Åe me…ói sekugo Khadidiatou Diallo daga wo…óon mari du…ìi be …ói…ói wo…óon mari du…ìi saffo …ói…ói …ìe …ìangimo o anda go…ó…óo mar…óo du…ìi caffouetati-etati ko …ìe danyimo. 
O yetti leydi Beljik der …óu…ìi hitande 1980s. Mar…óo …óubi logas inayi, jangugo bindigo o fu…ó…ói bindigo taariki maako.
Bindirde maako ballitimo hataskuko o nati hader kusali.
Hasre be satal hore haddigo ro…ìe Khadidiatou o tiggi kkautal man inde man Groupe de Femmes Pour l‚ÄôAbolition des Mutilations Sexualles (GAMS) hitadee 1996. 
Saahugo/∆Åesahimo
Der hitadee 2005, …ìe hokkimo lamba manugo Prix Femme de l‚Äôanne marie Popelin daga …óon Conseil des Femme Francophones de Belgique.
Dereji maako
Khadidiatou Diallo, mon destin entre les mains les mains de mon pere, Bruxels, ed. Alpha Alpha 2016.

Djaili Amadou Amal:
Dajaili Amadou Amal binndoowo‚Äôon leydi Kamerun o wurti der Ful…ìe wowe…ótefa faddigo hakke rew…ìe.
Taariki maako.
Djaili Amadou Amal fullo‚Äôon asli maakon diamane wayla leydi …ìe Kamerun. O mawni haa wuro …ìiri maunugo maroua bo bindi do al‚Äôaadaji Ful…ìe …ìe numugo jonde Ful…ìe je nani be jee jonta. Ku…óeji maako …óon lara jonde ro…ìe Fulbe be sungullaji maako no o jo…ói haa Sahel, no…ìe jo…ói be falai robe. Der …óereji maako hautibe walande, wo…óon bol wa dou daute e go debbo ko…ìori gotel hakkunde Fulbe …ìe boyi te e go ro…ìe ko …ìori gotel. 
Walande o hokki habar ro…ìe fere …ìe nayi …ìe …ìangal gurko gotel.
Dereji …ói…ói der …óereji maako kanjim o a mistiriijo be la mangeuse d‚Äôames (be inngilis wodon numa, ‚ÄúThe Eater of Souls‚Äù) luttano binder …óe maako o bindi…óe be Faransi.
Manur…óe/Omana…óo.
Yande …ói…ói lewru Decemba, hitadee 2020, Djaili Amadou be …óerewal maako les impatientes o he…ìi …óerewal manugo adabi Faransankore caffan e tati ‚Äì e tati, Prix Goncourts des lyceens dar…óe maako arandejo kanko‚Äôon bindiwoje Afirik kanko‚Äôon yotti yagare gasar adabi. Bannibo …ìe wati …óereji maako dardee Choix Goncourt de l‚Äôorient yolade je tati lewru Disamba hitadee 2020, Choix Goncourt UK yaladee saffoi je tati lewri Marie je choix goncourt Tuniisi yaladee tati lewru Aprilie 2021. Non non …ìelanmini mo bindiwo man jakadia ha UNICEF o hoyi kuugal hairu yande jo lewru Marie hitadee 2021 o balliti ummatore UNICEF wode…ótefa o ballita bukkuwai fetel fetel. 

Mohammed Inuwa Bawa:
Kanal Mohammed Inuwa Bawa rtd (6 Aprilie 1954 ‚Äì 26 Mayie 2017) …óun …ìiliimo e jahiro e Diiwal Ekiti, Naajeeriya e wakkatire laamu solja …óun janarjo Sani Abatcha Gada …óen hai …óun …ìilimo e dau jahirowo e Diiwal Gombe gada lewru Augustare 1998 yaari Mayie 1999 inare e mo likaani shi…ìa mo humnere ranere e artu…óun jamhun naya…ìun …óun Naajeeriya.
Distinore.
∆äun danyi Bawa e yal…óe 6 …óun lewru Aprilie 1954 e yaari Diiwal Kebbi mo janjan…óe e janngir…óe Koleji ngomnatiwal gon…óun Keffi e bi…ó…óa …óen bo mo fari janngir…óe Ahmadu Bello University gon…óe Zariya. Ga…óa mo jangi e janngir…óe Madras …óe Inndiya. Nastuki solja …óun hokkimo jon…óe laftanarjo …ói…óa…óo e 1976 kebbudu…óo latti e 1980 kaftinjo e 1985 e maw…óo e 1990.
Kuugal.
Dun …ìili e jon…óe jahirawo …óun diiwal Ekiti ga…óa dun tiggigal e lewru Octoba 1996 e ta gonyal ge…ìal gal diiwal Ondo. Ga…óa maide janarjo Sani Abatcha, donu…óomo janar Abdulsalami Abubakar mo soitimo diiwal Gombe e wakkatire hokkutuku laamu e laamu democracio dun …óun himmini e lewru Mayie 1999. E jonde maako …óe kakkilanowo diiwal Gombe, mo fu…ó…ói hakkilanki e Niijeer gon…óu…óe keerol e Naajeeriya gam …óustuki hultuki keeri …ói kono…ìe yim…ìe.
Siyasaji.
Mo he…ìayi nasru e jon…óe lattado tefowo jo…óorgal diiwal Kebbi e dan…óal Action Congress (A.C) e shubtal Aprilie 2007. Bawa mo soitii Asibitiwal Jos, Naajeeriya e yal…óe 26 …óun lewru Mayie 2017 sababu nyawu kemgu mo sababu tiyata …óun …óun wannimo mo soiti e mo wodi …óuubi 63.

Jaangir…óe Laagos:
Jaangir…óe Laagos n…óe …óun …ìun an…óireka e UNILAG un janngir…óe e gelle Lagos, laamorde Diiwal Laagos, Naajeeriya. E …óe golo e…óer janngir…óe ∆ôarnuwal artugal e Naajeeriya …óen bo …óun tiggigal e …óungu 1962. 
Janngu…ìe hii…ìe.
Janngir…óe …óe hebani an…óa…ìe yim…ìe …óu…ó…ìe bano hautu…ìe e: 

Janngir…óe Bayero Kano:
Janngir…óe Bayero Kano n…óe …óun …ìun an…óireka e BUK un jaangir…óe n…óer gelle Kano, …óer Diiwal Kano, Naajeeriya. Dun tiggigal e nduungu 1962 e gal wodi jango…ìe 37,747. Maw…óo janngir…óe …óen hanko woni Farfesajo Muhammad Yahuza Bello. 
Guttuli jannginki.
Janngir…óe Bayero e …óe wodi fannuuji jannginki feere-feere …óu…ó…ói kawtu…óii haa bano: 
Janngu…ìe maagal hii…ìe.
Janngir…óe …óe hebani an…óa…ìe yim…ìe …óu…ó…ìe bano hawtu…ìe e:

Audu Idriss Umar:
Audu Idriss Umar be danyiimou e yalde 28 gal lewru Decemba 1959) …óun subtimo sanajo wakiltiido Gombe shakajun e Naajeeriya. Inare e mo ja…ìi laamu e yal…óe 29 …óun lewru Mayie 2007 …ìiyi subta All Progressive Congress (APC) …óun. 
Distinore maako e jande.
Dun danyi Abdullahi e yal…óe 28 …óun lewru Decemba 1959 mo hee…ìi digiri digirgir (LLB Hon). Mo arti mo jangi jan…óe Shari‚Äôah …óun Naajeeriya gon…óun Victoria Island, Lagos. Inare e mo latta ke…ì…ìidin…óo lauyajo.
Siyasawal/Shubtule
Dun subtimo e jon…óe majalisajo waakiilie‚Äôen e …óungu 1999, …óenbo …óun fuiti subtukimo e 2003, …ìawo mo nyegi jo…óergal maako e majalisa‚Äôen …óun ndotti‚Äôen e 2007 ‚Äì 2011. Mo lattake maw…óo kwamitiji e dau hautirde solji‚Äôen dau gelle maw…óe huwirde shede e shari‚Äôaa e enshiwal …ìiyi taagu e shari‚Äôaa. E nder tantanshaki henyugu e sanata‚Äôen ngadi e lewru Mayie 2009. Thisday wi i mo wala go…ó…óun ∆ôuduri kamati …óun e ga…óa ammo …ìe koshi teddu…óu yahirki ∆ôuduraji …óin.
E jon…óe maako de maw…óo kwamitiwal shahintegal renugo …óun majalisu dotti‚Äôen dau konooni nyamdu, mo ho…óorake nyairi dam …óun Kafin Zaki …óun …óun holirta holo dau majun …óer lewru Aprilie 2009 hauti e ja…ìuuki nyibgo helirgo ndiyam. Hai den Ahmad Ibrahim Lawan mo Yobe e ta woyla mo noddi …óun ho…óero kuutiro …ìe e juggol ngol jama‚Äôare ko mo hosha manga…óun. E lewru Augustie 2009 Sanatajo Lawan mo wolwii e dau sirgago Dam …óun. Mo hollimi wiigo ndiyam kela…óam …óan tig e Shallawa gon…óun dallal Ha…óejia …ìe arti …ìe …óusti dogginirdi ndiyam e leddi sembe dembo dallol Jama‚Äôare hanjum ke furtu maw…óu …óu ndiyam e dallol Yobe. Mo wi‚Äôi kelirdi ndiyam …ói …óimiri e shiya maw…óun e …ìeidago laddel …ìagol e haure hakku…óe remo…ìe e duuro…ìe. 
Gada …óon hai ar…ói…óo leydi Goodluck Ebele Jonathan mo …ìi limo ministajo ko yilorte w …óungu 2011 ga…óa maidee ar…ói…óo Umaru Musa Yar‚Äôadua.

Janngirde Ahmadu Bello:
Janngirde Ahmadu Bello …óe …óun …ìuuri ann…óirkii ABU un janngirde Gomnaatiiwal e …óer hawtugo Naajeeriya gon…óum Zaariyaa e …óer Diiwal Kaduna …óun tiggigal e √±al…óe 4 …óun lewru habbirdu 1962 duu…ìi …ói…óii …ìaawo hebtuuki hoore Naajeeriya. Artu…óun …óun wii…óe janngirde wayla Naajeeriya. ABU was founded on 4 October 1962, as the University of Northern Nigeria. 
Janngirde …óen e …óe woodi dammu…óe ha …ói…ói Samaru (mahol aranndewol janngir…óe …óen) e Kongo …óer Zariyaa. E woodi lisal maare …óun wuwuki dan…óal e gelle Funtuwa latti…óe go…óu…óe foo…óigo kilomiteer se…ó…óa gada …ìaawo nyii…ìol yol…óe janngir…óe …óen nyolde maw…óe …óen e …óe Samaru kayre woodi cuu…ói jangikii famgo (ilimu) hakkilango njaamu. 
Tayaaka nyumtugo margu, tayaaka no…óun jo…óerto, diidugoo ‚Äì diidugoo famgo …óemle, tayaaka na…ó…óugo njo…óerte, injiniyaaku, tayaaka …óaro…ìe jaamu, tayaaka demal …óenbo e inaje li‚Äôutuki, nyol…óe Kongo …óembo …óen ke sashiwa yahirki woni …óun bo wodi baano janginki baano limgal cede, ilmu wadgo luumo, ilmu ekkitakii yaadu e laamu e ko lutti.
Janngirde …óen dai …óe nyaami innde Sardaunajo Sokoto on, Alhajijo Sa Ahmadu Bello un hanko ke firimiyajo wwoyla artu…óo Naajeeriya.
Janngu…ìe hii…ìee.
Janngir…óe Ahmadu Bello n…óe waa…ói an…óaago faaro an…óinki e yim…ìe an…óaa…ìe e ardii…ìe Naajeeriya e …óer haa e Gomnaa‚Äôen hii…ìe e minista‚Äôen …óu…ó…ìe dega …óer janngu…ìe hii…ìe e wodi: 

Janngirde Maiduguri:
Jaangirde Maiduguri e andira e inde UNIMAID, Jami'are Maiduguri Jaangiirde den e Lamurde Maiduguri Diiwal Borno nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Doum tiggi Jami'are den nder ndungu ngu 1975 hauti e muraduuji janngirle den be latto go‚Äôo nder mawde maw…óe janngirle leydi Naajeeriya. Jami'are Maiduguri e hokka famtugo ilimu wodude to jangobe bo no kanuurien e Ful…ìe burbe duuduki nder Jami'are nder.
Jami'are Maiduguri e wodi yimbe burbe dubuje sappande didi e jowi (25,000). Maw…óo Jaangirde den hanko woni farfesajo Ibrahim Njodi.
Guttuli jannginki.
Jaangirde Maiduguri e …óe wodi guttuli jannginki e …óu…ó…ói kautud e bano: 

Nasir El-Rufai:
Nasir El'Rufai o neddo Naajeeriya dimaande Kaduna go…ó…óo siyasajo Naajeeriya, Ardii…óo Diiwal Kaduna.

Rabiu Musa Kwankwaso:
Rabiu Musa Kwankwaso Rimande Kano n…óer dungu/duu…ìi abli e jowe nain e sappande jowi e jowe go'o (1956) nder lewru sappo (October). 
O neddo rimande kwankwaso nder Kano Naajeeriya, e mo nder maube maube be siyasen lesdi Naajeeriya.
O ardake diwal Kano dow Ardido jogido gwamnati diwal ngal, ko sa'i 1999-2003 e kadin yaki 2011 - 2015.
O warti ministajo larnuki jonde jam nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ardido lesdi Naajeeriya mo denno biyetedo Olusegun Obasanjomo ardare ministajo ko lutti sa'i 2003-2007.

Janngir…óe Joseph Ayo Babalola:
Jangirde Joseph Ayo Babalola un jangirde jo…óori…óe hoore mu…óun gon…óe Naajeeriya ngon…óe ikeji-Arekeji Diiwal Osun, Naajeeriya …óe …ìe mallakiwal churwal Christ (CAC) Tiggi e …óunmgu 2004 e jon…óe magal e Duuniiyaru. In…óe jangirde …óen un in…óe mau…óo churwal "Apostolic Christ" Joseph Ayo Babalola (1904-1959); E…óe …óon e inare njomirawo e noddi lila…óo mo fa…ó…óa ogobungo ogre e 1928. Jangirde Joseph Ayo Babalola un huwiirde heu…óe. Jangirde …óen ede jangina coursji …óu…ó…ói e jangirde …óen bani: Taayaka deemal, Taayaka ji…óorde yin…ìe, laamu,Taayaka yahirgo,Taayaka …óimgu e Taayaka no …óun joodorto Taayaka njaamu. <ref>https://web.archive.org/web/20220519125114/https://jabu.edu.ng/about-us/our-history/

Stefania Turkewich:
Stefania Turkewich-Lukianovych yo debbo dimado nyande sappande …ói…ói e jowi nder lewru afrilu dungu abli jowe tati e sappande jowe nain e jowe tati (12th Colte, 1898) bo o mayi jowetati nder lewru afrilu dungu afli jowe nain e sappande jowe didi e jowe didi no Holli do ninnan. (25 Sedto, 1898 - 8 Sedto, 1977)
Stefania yo debbo gimowo e fidu wurdidu. Kanko woni debbo burdo wawuki fiki wurdighol e gime. Hanko woni debbo arandejo nder lesdi Ukraine burdo wawuki fiki wurdughol ghol e gimol nder jaman maabbe. Ranmo e mo buri ko moi wawuki fiki wurdughol jaman maabbe Amman lesdi maako de soviyet hadi moo yimuki e fiki wurdughol ghol nder lesdidin.
Tariha Maako.
Holli o …óanyaama nder lesdi biyetedi Lviv gondi nder auztriya (Austria) nder lesdi Hongiri (Hungary)
Da'nyudomo e noddire Ivan Turkevich bo da' nyudo dan'domo (kaka maako) woni don e noddire Lev Turkevich. ∆Åe modibbe maube nder cociya maabbe. Madujo maako kadin e noddire Sophia Kormoshiv bawudo fiki wurdugol. Tariha Holli ahali maako fuu ebe bawi fiki wurdugol e be kadin wawi gimi Amman ke keuta moo gham o …ìuri be fuu.
Njangirde Maako.
Stefania fu…ó…ói njangirde maako de gimol to neddo biyetedo Vasyl Barvinky ko fu…ó…ói nder dungu abli jowe nain e sappo e nain (1914) yahinki abli jowe nain e sappo e jowe go'o (1916). O njangi wojjeji gimol e fiki wurdugol to lesdi biyetedi Vienna.
Nder dungu abli jowe nain e sappo e jowe nain o fuddi bindi maako arandeji dou gimol e fiki wurdugol ghol. Haa Joni nder dungu abli jowe nain e sappande didi e jowi o howa maa to Robert Lisovkyi moo o dillidi e maako yaki lesdi Balin (Berlin) to be joddi ton nder abli jowe nain e sappande didi e jowe didi (1927) yahinki abli jowe nain e sappande tati, (1930).
Stefania Mayi/ wati nyalande de jowe tati e lewru afrilu nder dungu abli jowe nain e sappande jowe didi e jowe didi nder lesdi biyetedi kanbrij to ingila (Cambridge England).

Magaji Abdullahi:
Magaji Abdullahi (dannya mo 22 lewru Noowamba 1947 - 24 lewru Luulde 2016) ko politikal lesdi Naajeeriya. O laati maw…óo Diiwal Kano diga 2003 haa 2007. Abdullahi ardii…óo Fedde Fuu…óuki e Ha…ì…ìuki ndiyam (WRECA) nder Diiwal Kano, Sakatareejo nder Ministry of Works e Housing, Direkto janaarjo Ministry of Works, Housing e Transport, Commissioner Ministry of Works , Housing e transport.
Maayi.
Abdullahi maayi ha 27 July 2016 nder Lopital Aminu Kano nder Kano, Naajeeriya.

Haliru Dantoro:

Lome:
Lome un hautirde gelle mau…óe der lesdi . E…ói woodi …óu…óirka yim…ìe haa bano 837,437 …óen e joo…ói…ìe kamani1,477,660 hisaago …óungu 2010

Dutse:
Dutse woni laamorgo Diiwal Jigawa to woyla lesdi Naajeeriya. O …óon joo…óodi Fedde ∆Åamtaare, Dute tiggi nder lewru Noofambar 2011. Ha≈ãkadi e fedde Jaangoore duute woodi kadi Kuftaaji Gannde ngam Daande (Sub-Station) be Polytechnic dowlaaku haa dooledu…óe …óo Jigaawa State Poly Technic ina jogii kool mum College of Business and Management Studies ha Dutse.
Joogaraafiwol e Leydi.
E yim…ìe 153,000 (2009),Dutse woni wuro …ìur…óo mawnude nder leydi Jigawa, Hadejia (111,000), Gumel (43 000) e Birnin Kudu (27,000). Dutse woni laamorgo lesdi Jigawa nder leydi Naajeeriya. Laamorde nden tiggi hitaande 1991 wakkati laamu konu Ibrahim Badamasi Babangida . Dutse (Dutsi, nder note fu…ó…óii…óe) he…ìi innde mum diga topografije kaa∆¥e …óe jeyaa e nokkuure nden. Footi yi'a laa…ì…óum feere-feere haa yim…ìe …óu…óti dow wuro ndin fuu.[1 Fuuji …ìur…ói mawnude bee koode maale …óen …óon mari nafooreeji …ói …óum wa…ói: duts√© ("Hawsare" ngam darnde). Nokkuure nden …óon haani e topografiji …ìur…ói yaawde bee kooreeje. inndi Jigaawa (jo jigeyi) …óum wa…ói to Topology non.Dutse woni yim…ìe …ìe …ìuri heew…ìe haa lesdi woyla hirnaange, ngam maajum fu…ó…óii hawtaade Hawsa be Ful…ìe.[2Ngam he…ìugo leydi lam…ìe, yim…ìe Dutse …ìuri …ìe'e remooje; kuu…óe feere …óe je …óon haandi nder fannu maa e woodi.
Dental Diiwal.
Fuu…óugo ngam tiggingo leydi Jigawa wa…ói hooreejo Malam Inuwa-Dutse, komisaar…óo ja≈ãde e jawdi tagle nder lesdi Kano (ji hawti bee jamanuje Kanwo be jigewaa) wakkati gomnati Alhagi Audu Bako. O fu…ó…ói haa sakkatii…ói 1970s amma …óum ha…ì…ìii bana daliila pucu militaaru. Nde weltaare ngam tagida dowla fu…ó…óiti ha nder duu…ìi 1980s, yim…ìe Jigawa …ìe …óon mbaawaa …ìeydaade wolde ma…ì…ìe. Wakkati je'e jaalorgal wa…ói haa saabe arande 1990 August 1991, hakkiilo wakkati laamu konu hooreejo Ibrahim Badamasi Babangida . Ko ngam weltaare forugo leydi wonnoo, …ìurgal goomuje je …óon mari laamu nder warngo habaru fu…ónaaku dow tagdi lesdi …ìe halki e …ói keso. Wo…ì…ìe nder nokkuuje …óe ∆¥iwoyi hawti e Albasu, Ajingi , Wudil, Sumaila, Kachako be Takai. ∆äe se…ó…óa tan won…ìe …ìe …óon …ìeyda ngam wa…óugo leydi nde'en ngoni goonga haa Dunyaaji Kesam (Jigawa lesdi Allah bana tagdi dowla).alisde Jigawa Naajeeriya

Gusau:
Gusau un Birniwol gon…óe woyla faaro hirna Naajeeriya kanje ke gelle mau…óe Diiwal Zamfara. Non …óenbo in…óe hukuma pamarun (LGA) goduugal jajirka leydi kilomita 3,364 e …óuu…óirka yim…ìe 383,162 e limgal duu…ìi 2006. Gusau e ta woyla e laawol ngol…óun foo…ói ga…óa kebbe yaari Kano e Naajeeriya gal hauti lasgi fere-fere ammano …óuu…ó…ìe …ìen un Ful…ìe, hai Hawsa‚Äôen, Yarabanko‚Äôen, Igala e Nupe.
Distinor…óe.
E zaman warka laamu bo…óejo mallakotoo…ìe gelle Gusau …óe mauni …óe lattake gelle bo…ó…óe wuuduu luu…ìe e…óen bo yiile-yiile saboe laawol bodgol ngol girgiwal less …óun gal woodi.
Ngomnatiwal.
E …óungu 1999 ngomnajo Ahmed Sani (Yariman Bakura) mo hollini wadgo Shari‚Äôa jul…óaaku e gelle…óen haa e ko wa…ó…ói han…óe. Gelle Gusau e jooni …óo‚Äôo e …óe ngoo…ói laamii…óo HRH Alhaji Ibrahim Bello sa…ìon sarkin Katsinan Gusau …ìaawo mai…óe kinna…óo Alhaji Kabir Muhammad …óen baba mo ngomnajo kii…óo Abdulaziz Yari lammini e nduungu 2018.

Mai Mala Buni:
Mai Mala Buni (be …óan∆¥iimoo 19 Nuvembeer 1967) un gim…óo subtuugo Naajeeriya (siyasajo) …óun …óanyimo e gelle Buni Yadi, Hukuma Pamaren Gujba e Diiwal Yobe Wayla iga Faaro Fuuna Naajeeriya Kanko Wooni ngomnajo Diiwal Yobe, Naajeeriya …óenbo maw…óo jogi…óo tummu…óe …óun shubtal "All Progressives Congress" (APC). ∆äun subtiimo gomnajo e wakkatire shubtal maugal Naajeeriya …óun …óungu 2019 e les shubtugo All Progressives Congress (APC) ko…óun subtamoo gomna kanko wooni sakatarejo shubal partiwal All Progressives Congress (APC) …óun leydi. 
Jann…óe.
Kamani no …óun wa…óata e neesu wayla Naajeeriya Buni mo fu…ó…ói ekkitaki haddawal Alqur‚Äôanawal ga…óa mo pamaro e les hakkilanki …óanyo…ìe maako e mo…ó…ói…ìe komo nasta jangirde firamare …óun Buni Gari inare emo hee…ìi shaidawal timmingo jan…óe maako artu…óe e …óumngu 1979. ∆Åawo himminki jann…óe maako …óe firamare Buni hee…ìi nastugo jangir…óe sakandare …óun Goniri e …óungu 1979 …óenbo mo hee…ìi …óerewol shaidaago majakii go…óar…óun Afrik hirnawal e …óumngu 1985.
E non e mo …óer harkaji subtal (siyasaje) Buni waadi registawal e jon…óe jangowo mo nya…ì…ìugo renuuki e jangir…óe formation …óun espan jamhuriwal Benin inare emo hee…ìi digiriwal "Bsc Degree in international relation" e 2014. Mo waa…ói digiri-digiriwal e…óau huu…óuukie yim…ìe e jangir…óe Leeds Becket …óun leydi Inngilaa (England).
Luumoji (Luu…ìe).
Buni mo ∆ôorantake e harkaaji luumo e yiilaaru …óun yalji hankoma o mo…óakee harkaji luumo ga…óa mo pamaro …ìawo mo himmini jan…óe maako …óe sakandare mo waa…ói himmari tigguki lumor…óe e…óe tiggi kamfaniwal jo…óorigal hore muu…óum e …óer areeji yaari Mai Mala Buni koleeji taayaka e gollital inare e mo hee…ìi shaideki diploma e nduungu 2012.
cubtal (siyasaje).
Mai Mala Buni mo fu…ó…ói yaadu mako …óu siyasaje e …óungu 1992 wakkatire …óe mo teefi subteeki kansilajo …óenbo mo subta …óun e les shubtal National Republican Convention (NRC) gam wakiltaki gunduumare Buni e hukuma pamarun Gujba. Ga…óa …óon …óun subtimo e jon…óe …ìasti…óo majalisu.
Mo lattake maw…óo ballitowo …óun majalisu e majalisu mobgal Naajeeriya e …óungu 2000. ∆äenbo e …óungu 2004 …óun …ìiliimo membaajo majalisu jahirojun …óun jangir…óe Uyo.
E nduungu 2006 …óun subtimo efuu go‚Äôo maw…óo shubal Advance Congress of Democrats (ACD) e diiwal Yobe. ∆äenbo e …óungu 2007 tokku…ìe shu…ìal Action Congress …óun diiwal Yobe …ìe ka…ì…ìi…óiri sobaku e Advance Congress of Democrats inare e…ìe tiggi go…ó…óun she…ì…ìi…ó…óun e dandal shubal. Action Congress (AC) sobaku …óun …óun daraki fiijo e…óen …óun hokkimo maugu ar…óujo shubtal gal Action Congress …óenbo …óun subtimo e jon…óe mau…óo ga…óa …óungu 2007 yaari. 
E nduungu 2011 Buni mo hooti shubal ANPP lamoto…óun diiwal Yobe inare e …óun …ìilimo …óokkowo gomnajo shawariji Ibrahim Geidam mo musamman e…óau harkaji siyasaji e dokaaji. E …óungu 2013 …ìawo hautuki mau…ói siyasaji Naajeeriya …ìe tiggi shu…ìal All Progressive Congress (APC) Mai Mala Buni o lattakake sakatarejo shutal gal e diiwal Yobe …ìawo …óenbo …óun subtimo e mau…óo shu…ìal gal mo diiwal Yobe. E …óungu 2014 Mai Mala Buni lattake shubta…óo e…óau sakatarejo shubtal gal All Progressives Congress (APC) mo lesdi artu…óo.
Kanjun dai …óun…óona laamu …óun shu…ìal mo waddi gomnatiwal Muhammadu Buhari e …óungu 2015 himari …óun mo hollo e…óau huwanki partiwalgal ehore …óari …óun hokkimo jon…óe sakatarejo lesdi e 2018.
E wakkatire …óe mo jogi …óu…óin…óun maugu sakatarejo shubtal mo leydi …óenbo mau…óo kakkilanowo piroje …óer diiyam …óe Naajeeriya …óun subtimo …óun amintanakemo …óenbo …óun subtimo edau ar…óujo e jon…óe jogoto…óo tutawal shubtal APC shubal gomnatiwal diiwal Yobe gal 2019. E wakkatire subtuu…óe mau…óe 2019 Hon. …óun subti Mai Mala Buni e jon…óe gomnaajo diiwal Yobe nayaa…ìo e wakkatire mo hee…ìi kuri‚Äôaji 444,013 inare e mo doii sobajo tefgo maako Alhaji Bello Iliya mo shubtal PDP ke…ìu…óo kuri‚Äôaji 95,703 tan.
E lewru yulie 2020 …óun sarkiti komitiwal kuu…óe …óun shubtal APC …óun lesdi e dimma-maajun …óun ∆ôaddami e hes…ìe jogoto…ìe hanko Hon. Mai Mala Buni hai bo latta mau…óo komitiwal hautugo maugo ngo shubtal gal. 

Janngirde Diwal lokoja:
Janngir…óe Laamu, Lokoja e janngir…óe mawde wonde ha der gelle Lokoja, …ìur andirego Fulokoja (Federal University Lokoja) woni wuro mawgo¬† der Diiwal¬† Kogi Hindi funa ta Chaina leydi Naajeeriya. Lokoja un hakkude wurgo Naajeeriya e Benuwe. Jangirde mawde wonde ha der lokoja …óum mahide wakati ujuneje …ói…ói …ìe chappande sappo e go'o (2011), lamu leydi mahi de.dum mahide e dau …óum …ìedda 
Janngir…óe e der leysdi eder janngir…óe den e wodi fattude de janginki baninni:

Janngir…óe Ndemri, Zuru:
Janngir…óe Ndemri, Zuru un janngir…óe maw…óe wonde Zuru, Diiwal Kebbi, Naajeeriya.¬† kayre me arandere janngirde demal. Jangirde den denno e de hawtii e Janngirde Ahmadu Bello, Zariya. ∆Åawo …óun un ma…ì…ìitii¬† National Board for Technical Education (N.B.T.E) e nduungu 1977 laamu Naajeeriya tabbitini ilmu dau kuugal jungo e der leydi N.B.T.E fu…ó…ói hakkilango fattude jangiki. 
E ujuneje …ói…ói …ìe chappande sappo (2020)¬† jangirde Mawde¬† …óun fu…ó…ói hakkoki …óe ardii…óo leydi Muhammadu Buhari su…ìi Musa Isyaku Ahmed¬† maw…óo¬† jangirde e (2021),bo un …óum¬† hokki Eze Eberechi N. Dick maw…óo janngir…óe bo hanko ne arandejo der¬† maw…ìe jangirde den.

Janngir…óe Gashua:
Janngir…óe Laamu, Gashua e dum no dirade be (FUGA), wonde ha der Diiwal Yobe, Naajeeriya. Janngir…óe Laamu, Gashua e dun der Gashua ta funa gelle …óum mahide e dau dalila shiya ilmu baci lardi Yobe gammana¬† habe ma …ìeke…ìa ilmu maudum, …óum mahide wakati Janngir…óe …óen wakati lami…óo Naajeeriya mo nane goodlock jhona than.dum mahide wakati ujuneje …ói…ói …ìe chappande sappo e tati (2013)
E der janngir…óe den¬† e wodi fattude janginki baninni.¬† 

Edmund Doukoru:
Edmund Maduabebe Doukoru (…ìe …óanyiimou yande 13 lewru Oktoba 1943) neyejo‚Äôon kanko‚Äôon fetel yite ha Naajeeriya …óenbo kanko‚Äôon maw…óo sakatare kautal hore les…óe mari risku ya…ì…ìan fetur (OPEC) ha hitan…óe 2006. Owarti Amayanabo, ko bo lam…óo …ìoima mo lamur…óe nembe ha hitan…óe 2008. Banniman jagwa…óo balbal lamudo funbina je lamu neyejo jagwar…óo Naajeeriya, Goodluck Ebele Jonathan.
Taariki Maako.
∆Åe …óanyi Doukoru ha yan…óe 13 leuru Oktoba 1943 ha nukkure Bayelsa mumari risku ya…ì…ìam fetur. 
O he…ìi digiriwal (Ph.D) ha wakkere geology daga kwaleji Imperial je woni ha London. Kamfani ya…ì…ìam je Shell International Petroleum Company osimu kugal daga hitan…óe 1970, ha o‚Äôummi daga mau…óo lintigo liddi be liddi yahugo ha mau…óo linyigo ha Naajeeriya. Ha hitan…óe 1992 owarti manaja‚Äôon kanko‚Äôon …óaurata…ìe je kamfani ya…ì…ìam je Naajeeriya. 
Siyaasaji.
Ha hitan…óe 2003, Doukoru ha mangu Amayanabo ko lam…óo …ìoima mo lamur…óe nem…ìe ha nukkure Bayelsa in…óe mako mingi XHI. Tarihi holli hakkun…óe ma…ì…ìe …ìe ki…ó…óun fitinaje hakkun…óe ummatore bassambiri be Ogbolomabiri mo lamur…óe ki…ó…óum nembe, mu he…ì…ìi asaliman joo hitan…óe 200.
∆äer lewru Afrilu 2010 gwamnati nukkure Bayelsa kadibo Olorinika fistigo sungullaji man, ha ohauti Doukoru …ìe Ralp Iwowori, Amanyanabo mo nembe bassambiri, be littu…ìe lamu…ìe he…ìigo nu…ìe burta. ∆Åawo muftigo lam…ìe …ói…ói be biyi …ìe…óon sati koffi …ìe wawan fistigo kowani jama‚Äôaje‚Äôon nu…ìe bondata, ha hakkun…óe ma…ì…ìe. Ha lewru Agusta 2010 fere …óerki‚Äôen …ìe …óon hosi kuje habre …óer kumbuwal doggata …ìe yari kunu ha fadaman Doukoru be haf…ìi yum…ìe ga…óiman, …ìe wujji kuje boima woni ha fellel man …ìe boonni fadaman. 

David Ejoor:
David Akpode Ejoor RCDS, PSC, (10 Silto duu…ìi 1932-10 Fabrairu 2019) bindiwo‚Äôon maw…óo soja Naajeeriya kanko‚Äôon huyi …óer …óe manga mau…óo hafsa soja‚Äôen (COAS). O bindi …óefte …ói…ói bakko o maya ha hitaande 1975.
Wa…óon Lorna Fofa.
David kanko‚Äôon kwamanda Naajeeriya aran…óe mo kwaleji fa…ó…óigo je Naajeeriya …óen ome…ói jo…óugo hakkilango yi…ì…ìa …óum woni ha mid-western. Ejoor owoni kanko‚Äôon gwamna ha nukkure caaka hirna Naajeeriya, yake hafre Biafra. ∆äenbo ojoggi mangu maw…óo soja‚Äôen daga lewru Janairu 1971 yahgo yulie 1975. Ejoor omayi Lagos yan…óe 10 leuru Fabrairu 2019. O soytii emo woodi …óuu…ìi 87 e duuniyaaru. 

Anna Banner:
Anna Ebiere Banner (∆Åe …óanyii …óebbo haa yan…óe 18 lewru haaram …ói…óaabru 1995) …ìi fim‚Äôon o medi tahugo gasa Sarauniya bo…óugo je Naajeeriya. ) ∆Åe su…ìi mo ha darde …óebbo mo…ìuri bo…óugo ha hitan…óe 2012 les. MBGN, Queen Isabella Ayuk ha hitaan…óe 2013 o‚Äôardani Naajeeriya ha gasa Sarauniya bo…óugo je dunya (miss world) ha hitaan…óe 2013 …ìe lammini mo darde ballitiwo je fere al‚Äôadaji be wanciru mabbutigo gete je gwamna Henry Dickson …ìe kotukki …ìawo …ìe lammini mo dar de mangu sarauniya bo…ó…óum je Naajeeriya (MBGN) ha hitan…óe 2012. Ha hitan…óe 2014 ofu…ó…ói burtigo ha fijir…óe ikkitigo je super story. 

Ayo Adesanya:
Ayo Adesanya (∆Åe…óanyi debbo haa yan…óe lewru juko 1969) …ìi fijigo fim …ìe Naajeeriya director‚Äôon …ìe furadusa‚Äôon. Ayo Adesanya wa…óon burta ha fim yo ruba‚Äôen be je inglizi.
Kof…óe maako.
Ayo Adesanya owurti ha wuro dagun, Ijebu ha nukkure Ogun …óe woni fonbina wala…óu hirna. Ayo Adesanya oheyi jangir…óe man st. Anne …óe woni Ibadan, berniwol mangol je nukkure diiwal Oyo, haaton otimmini jangir…óe makoje firamare …ìe sakandare. Daga…óon usali jami‚Äôa Ibadan ha…óon ohe…ì…ìi digiri aran…óe ha wakke kugal jarida. 
Fiilu.
Ayo Adesanya ofu…ó…ói kugal mako haa hitaan…óe 1986 …ìawo otaski kuwango liddi (NYSC) ha hitan…óe 1996, Ayo Adesanya onasti …óer filu fim je Naajeeriya ("Nollywood") ha ofu…ó…ói filu ikkitigo fijirje ofu…ó…ói …ìurtigo ha fere fim je Tunji Bamishigbin jamo in…óe ‚Äúpalace‚Äù. Daga …ìawo Ayo Adesanya ta shiga onesti …óer filu …ìe…ói fim je …óingal yoruba‚Äôen ha o…ìurti …óer man otaski fim …óu…ó…ìe Ayo Adesanya wa…óon …ìurta …óer fim …óingal inglizi.
∆Åe hauti Yii…óel.
