Goodluck Ebele Azikiwe Jonathan:
Goodluck Ebele Azikiwe Jonathan (o ndannya 20 November hiitaade 1956) O …ìi Diiwal Bayelsa lesdi Naajeeriya gim…óo siyaasajo Naajeeriya. O …ìagi Dame patience Jonathan, e …ìe goodi bacci …ói…ói Ariwera(gorko) e Aruabai (debbo). Innde ndayoo…ìe maako Lawrence Ebele (baba maako) gim…óo wadgo jirgwal ndiyam, e Eunice Ayi Ebele Jonathan (inna maako) gim…óo ndemal. O me…ói lattaki jagordo latti…óoo ardii…óoo lesdii Naajeeriya diga hiitaade 2010 yaarii 2015. O relli korowal ardaaki lesdi ndiin wakkacire …óown wa…ói shubtal jagordo hiitaade Febuary, 2015 boh hanko'on woni ne…ódo siyaasajo Naajeeriya latti…óoo aranndeejo ja…ìow…óo do'aande (Defeat). Nden boh O me…ói wadgo ballitoowo jagordo lesdii Naajeeriya hiitaade 2007 yaarii 2010 les ardotoo…óo Umaru Musa Yar'Adua …ìi Diiwal Katsina Naajeeriya. O me…ói boh wadgo ballitoowo jagordo Diiwal Bayelsa hiitaade 2005 yaarii 2007 les ardotoo…óo Diepreye Alamieyaseigha innde maako.
Njangde maako.
O njangi e njangirde jaami'awa Port Harcourt lesdii Naajeeriya …óon o hawti degree maako e ilmi dabbaajii (Zoology), o wa…ói degree …ói…óaajum e fanni hydrobiology be fisheries biology (dow ndiyam e dowrowol li…ó…ói), o wa…ói degree tatorjowm (PhD) e ilmi dabbaajii (Zoology). 
Ngomnaajo Diiwal Bayelsa.
O latti…óoo ballitoowo jagordo Diiwal Bayelsa hiitaade 1999 yaarii 2005, diga …óon assembly Bayelsa innii mow/lattini mow jagordo Diiwal Bayelsa (Gomnaajo) …ìe itti gomnaajo Diiwal gal gam sekowgoo guljol shede. 
Hooreejo-leydi Naajeeriya.
O latti…óoo ballitoowo jagordo lesdii Naajeeriya les Umaru Musa Yar'Adua diga hiitaade 2007 yaarii 2009, diga nden assembly lesdii Naajeeriya innii mow/lattini mow hanko woni jagordo lesdii Naajeeriya hiitaade May, 2010 gamma ardotoodo goden yamaaki (sick) o wowrtinaama lesdii Saudi Arabia e November, 2009. Nden boh o inni ballitoowo mow koowgal ardogal mo innde Namadi Sambo hanko'on woni jagordo Diiwal Kaduna e wakkacire maai 
Jawdi maako.
Hiitaade 2007 o wanginii dow owon miliyonji temeeje …ói…ói e shaffan…óe jeynai ( ‚Ç¶295, 304, 420).
Manngu o he…ìi.
Lesdii Naajeeriya innii mow dow hanko woni; Grand Commander of the Orde of Federal Republic (GCFR)
Lesdii Nijar republic innii mow dow hanko woni;
Grand Commander of the Orde of the Niger (GCON)
Lesdii Namibia maa innii mow dow hanko woni; 
First Class of the Orde of the Most Ancient Welwitschia Mirabilis (22 March, 2014).

Maayo Ha…óejia:
Maayo Hadejiaa (Hawsare "Kogin Hadejia") maayo‚Äôon ha wuro Jigawa ha woyla Naajeeriya ya boo wakkere‚Äôon jey Maayo Yobe (komadugu Yobe). Daaga nder guureji bee berniiji deebe don waali koo kombi bee fomowade woodi Hadejia be Nguru. Dumboni maayo bee gaambe nuumi reemu go ceedu gamman danyi sonde ndiyam ha wakkere (Hadejia ‚ÄìNguru wetlands) maayo man noo wadata be walowa Nguru. Ha jotani maayo hadejia don hales geebe 80% habeta‚Äôe ndiyam manje tiga tayta bee Callawa wooni ha wuro Kano.

Mowente DR Umaru Kwayranga LAMIDO Fulbe Gombe:
'Dun moye yite Alaji (DR Umaru Kwayranga (Lamido Fulbe Gombe)?
Ngam famtuki be anda moye yite Lamido fulbe Gombe.
DR, Umaru Kwayranga dun bi jafado Alh Muh'd Kwayranga (Lamido Fulbe Gombe Arandejou).
¬† Jafado Muh'd Kwayranga mo ardido, gaddo kugal gomnati, mowodi hagalare nder lamorde Gombe.
DR, Umaru Kwayranga Lamido Fulbe Gombe e hande mo jeyi jande digree nde arande Bsc less (Business Admin) nder Jami'are Maiduguri, digree didaure (Msc) mo jangi (Finance and Governance) e jami're (LiverpoolJohn Moores University Limited Kindom), enta digree tataure (Phd) mo jangoyi e (igbinedion University).
¬† DR, Umaru Kwayranga hauti andal felleji duddi enta shaydaji ba ni,i.
1_mo yara emo wartira ngam tabbitinki kamfaniwa hautande.
2, mo yara mo wartira ngam hakkilanobe kamfaniwa ngan.
3, shaydaki kamfaniwa kimminbe kuugal nder leddi Nigeria.
¬† DR, Umaru Kwayranga¬† mo hauti jande dunde ta heje shede e nder leddi Nigeria enta lesde yasi mo jangi ko fa'i shede e lumo e nder (Harvard University New York).
E hande hanko warti ardido heje moftande yimbe kawti :
1, (Finmal Financial) kudeji moftande yimbe hakkilanobe kamfaniwa.
2, Asusuwa (Jaiz Bank Plc)
3, Mo ardido (Axa Mansard pension).
4, Mo ardido (Waila Microfinance Bank Ltd).
5, Hanko ardini (Gombe Microfinance Bank Ltd).
6, Enta (First Bank Of Nigeria Mortgage Bank Ltd).
7,Nda (Kano Electricity Distribution Company).
8, Enta (Council Member Nigeria Stock Exchange).
9, Nda (Present Certified Pension Institute Of Nigeria).
10, Nda (Council Member Institute Of Stockbrokers).
Hanko himmini kude e felleji duuddi nder don fuu kamfaniwa ciminti ngonga (Ashaka Cem Plc ), les Funakaye nder duwal Gombe enta felleji duddi.

Dabinooje:
Dabinooje.
Dabinoje …óe unnoddata e "Dabino" e …óemngal hausare, …óe godi fa‚Äôidaji njamu masin denbo …óikauti hoirinki …ìaawo he…ìtuki …óum du…ìi ujunaiji sali…ói. Bo wakkatire andu…ìe kakkilano…ìe jamu …ìe tabbitini, …ìikkon le…ó…óe belkom n∆¥i…ì…ìu kon daga lokaci∆¥elgel …ìe latti …óer (jeri) ¬†ba goro.
In…óe Turanci der dabinoje jo'or…óe e kolutti pat. ∆Åikkoy le…ó…óe Dabinoje …óegala. Maw…óum e …óum ¬†darde e kowari …ìaawo fat. Innde botanical kannjum Phonex dacylifera.
E Nigeria üá≥üá¨ e kewayen diiwalji wayla iri Nasarawa, Sokoto, Kano, Kaduna e ko lutti iri diiwalji wayla ta fuuna, warti na diyam jemmaaje ∆Åe ∆äu…ó…ìe don wa…óika sorki dabinoje.
Go…ó…óo anndu…óo nyamnduuji nahooji …ìanndu, "Toyin Fayiga" oyi dabinoje woodi ¬†sinadiraiji ∆äu…ó…ói masin ba nebbam, calcium, magnesium ekolluttifu, …ìur…óon hoshii (shukar/sugar) se…ó…óa ba glucose, fructose e dextrose wadanda …óum ∆äon …ìesda semmbi…óina …ìon take.
‚ÄúDabiino woodi nafuda e der (magnesium), …óun woodi magani …ìutuki reedu ∆äum hannde e janngo, ba ∆¥awuji laral …ìanndu e ko luttifu.

Water:
Ndiiyam (Water)..
∆äuun kowndere Wonnde nder duniyaaru lattidu nafujum kila ko woni nder faat, nangi diga foofoojowm yaarii har ko foofata. ∆äan won foomula (H2O) kolloojowm element hydrogen …ói…ói e Oxygen go'o, …óan…óon boh hoo∆¥aa foow koondeejii nder maajam (solvent), …óan daneejam, walaa ∆¥iwre (dark), …óan jaaraytee…óam walaa bel…óum ko kashshowdown maajam, kanjam boh hoo∆¥ii …óu…ó…óum felle nder duniyaaru men dow tatawru ndow (Earth) e adadow (71%). Felle/nokkowje/babal maayo, jowggii, sow'ii li…ó…ói ho∆¥ii adadow (96.5%) nden boh felle lowttow…óee kanjee hooshiy (1.7% ground water).∆äan…óon nder ndoolay (cloud), ∆äan …óon nder kaa∆¥e (Solid), ndiiyamjii loofe/moddow…óam(Liquid) e hendow (air). Kanjam boh hawti …ìanndu …ìii aadama e adadow 75-80%. 
Nafoojii Ndiyam (Uses of Water).
Ko foofaata faat …óon yaara ndiyam, …ìii aadama …óon naftarow ndiyam adadow 70% e gese ma…ì…ìe e…ìe nduraa li…ó…ói, e…ìe ndema ∆¥andowjii ma…ì…ìe (Agriculture and Fishing). ∆äowm…óon wa…óa jahaale be laanawal (boat) e…óun ho∆¥a kareejii diiga felle go…ó…ói…óe eder ndiyam, …óowm…óon loota kolte, felle, nokkowje, wowroojii e maajam, …óowm…óon fewna felle e maajam, …óowm…óon fewna ndiyam e ∆¥andowjii be Malamalloo( kaa∆¥a ndiyam), le…ó…óe gese …óon yaara ndiyam …óon hawta nyamdow be maajam ko…óown ∆¥i'ete Photosynthesis.
Dabbaajii nga…óoo…ói ∆¥eewowgo maaji nder ndiyam …óon naftarow e maajam, …óown…óon fa…ó…óa hiite e maajam, …óowm…óon defeera ∆¥amdowji e maajam. 
Waylitaaki ndiyam ( Change of States).
∆äandon watta diiga ndiyam …óan warta hendu (evaporation), diiga hendu …óan warta ndiyam (absorption), diiga hendu …óan warta kaa∆¥a ndiyam/ice block (Condensation), diiga kaa∆¥a ndiyam …óan warta hendu (Sublimation), diiga kaa∆¥a ndiyam …óan warta ndiyam (melting), diiga ndiyam …óan warta kaa∆¥a ndiyam (Freezing).
Teddowgo ndiiyam Density.
Diyam lab…óan …óan walaa tuundi (impurities) ∆äanwon mangow density 1.000 Kg/m3 
Ja…ìungol hiite (Electricity conductivity).
Ndiyam lab…óan …óon ja…ìa hiite se…ó…óa se…ó…óa, tuundi to nastoi nder maajam …óan…óon jaa…ìa hiite masin ndenkam. ∆äown howraa hiite e…óun henda hankowde hydrogen e Oxygen kanjam …ìe ngi'ata(Electrolysis), lawol gol yi…ói hiite masin adadow( 285.8 kj/mol kobo 15.9 MJ/Kg). 
Nder Downiyaaroow men tatawru (On Earth).
Diyam …óan…óum hebta nder downiyaaroow men dow e les maarow kanjowm ∆¥i'e Hydrosphere. Adadow maajam yaarii 333 million cubic milles (1.358 billion cubic metre). 

Oladipo Ogunlesi:
Theophilus Oladipo Ogunlesi (12 Yuli 1923 ‚Äì 19 Janewuri 2023) maa…ìinaako wurotude ngal heew…ìe e ∆¥ellitii…óo mumuye daa…ìe mumuye laamu ngal nguu heew…ìe e Naajeeriya. ∆äum maa…ìinaako …óum faam…óino rokkude ngal nguu e ta∆¥ar Asibiti e Ibadan kala ga Koliyaa…ìe Ilimi eii Naajeeriya.
Njaafii…óo e Haw…ói.
Ogunlesi …óo hawdi 12 Yulii 1923 toon mboos…óo ngu…óo ko wondiije mboroyaa…óo to Sagamu, Dega Osun. E 1931-35, …ìeydi ko laam…óo St. Paul toon Sagamu e oo wiyete sekondere (secondary) toon CMS Grammar School to Lagos toon 1940. Wiyete cikkitaar to Higher College e Yaba toon 1942. Ogunlesi …ìamii ko oray toon sahaa…óu hee e sante (profession) nii ko Yaba Medical School toon 1947 e o addani ko University of London toon 1953 toon o yaltii na ngo …ìaleeje e Biritaniyaa.
Sante (Profession).
Ogunlesi yaltii ko laam…óo to Arewa (Western) State Civil Service e 1950-56. O da…ó…óii na Medical Officer to Arewa Nigeria Civil Service (WNC) toon 1950-56. O naatii University of Ibadan toon 1961 e o …ìamii ko Professor laam…óo jama‚Äôa ce…óe…óe e 4 heen sappu. O wo…ó…ìe yaltinool laam…óo na farko cikin jama‚Äôa ce…óe…óe na Najeriya. E …óuum…óoo yaltu…ìe o wo…ó…ìe tawi ko Vice Chancellor University of Ibadan, Professor Isaac Folorunso Adewole, tawi ko yaltinool ta∆¥irgol tarii…ìe na Pan African Association of Neurological Sciences, Professor Ka ayode Oshuntokun, kadi tawi ko Professor Yombo Awojobi (Alalde be∆¥…óe) nde faamaako toowo …ói…ói (surgeon) hono…ìi. O taalii heen tawi ko …óumii 1983 toon da…óii heen sappu.
Fellowship e Membership.
E 1977 o ajiya…ìe na asosiyan Nigerian Academy of Sciences.
Nana (Personal).
Ogunlesi …ói woo…óii Susan Olorunfemi Peters toon 1950. Nde maa…ìo ndeeji…óo 7, …ìeydu ko Adebayo Ogunlesi, kadi ngenndi ndi ko carku…ó…ói Donald Trump‚Äôs economic team.
Hakiiki.
Ogunlesi nda…óii toon 19 Janewuri 2023, ko woni …ìaleeje 99. Sariyar Dapo Abiodun toon Osun taawnoo won heen remark:
"Nde wani hankadi no wa…ói so o wonaa sariyar miiji, ko wani hankadi kese …óum ko leydi maa…ìi e kala ta∆¥ar Asibiti ndeeji…ói maa…ìde ina anndani …ìur."

Namadi Sambo:
Namadi Sambo.
(O ndanyaama ∆¥andeere 2 lewru Agustus hiitaande 1954) o ndan'yaama e gelle Zariya e Diwal Kaduna lesdii Naajeeriya. ∆äun …ìi lesdii Naajeeriya gim…óo siyaasajo Naajeeriya, o me…ói wadgo gomnaajo Diiwal Kaduna, o …ìe…ói latti…óoo ballitoowo jagordo lesdii Naajeeriya les Goodluck Ebele Jonathan hiitaade 2010 yaarii 2015.
Njande Maako(Education).
O wa…ói njangirde haa…ìe (baptist Primary) e gelle kakuri e Diiwal Kaduna, bako o yaahan firamari Kobi e gelle Bauchi, Diiwal Bauchi, nden boh o yeehi town school No.1 e gelle Zariya. Diiga hiitaade 1967 yaarii 1971, o wa…ói njangirde (now Alhuda-Huda college) e zariya.
Nden boh o wa…ói njangirde famarde (basic school) e jaami'awa Ahmadu Bello e gelle Zariya. Diiga …óon o saalii o wa…ói degree edow njande lawol mahaale (Architecture) o …ìesdi wadgo degree …ói…óa…óum e dow non e njangirde nden. O wa…ói njanganaakii lysdii maako e diiwal Oyo Lesdii Naajeeriya be Ministiri Wowroojii e ku…óe (NYSC) hiitaade 1979. 
Gomnaajo Diiwal Kaduna.
O lattake latti…óoo jagordo shubtaa…óo wa…óoo'wo gomnaajo e Diiwal Kaduna hiitaade 2007 les jam'iyya maako ka PDP siyaasa Naajeeriya. o innii anniyaaji maako dow sembi…óinki rew…ìe e sukaa…ìe Diiwal Kaduna. 
Ballitoowo jagordo lesdii Naajeeriya.
O…óon wa…óa gomnaajo e Diiwal Kaduna e hiitaade 2007 yaarii 2010, …óon jagordo Goodluck Ebele Jonathan hanko'on woni ronoow…óo sooy'tow…óo(died) ardoo…óo lesdii Naajeeriya Umaru Musa Yar'Adua, hoo∆¥imo wanginii anniya Maako dow o wa…óa namo ballitoowo jagor…óown lesdii Naajeeriya e lewru (15 May, 2010). O lattake ballitoowo jagordo lesdii Naajeeriya les Goodluck Ebele Jonathan diiga (May, 2010) yaarii (Febuary, 2015).

Kabiru Ibrahim Gaya:
Kabiru Ibrahim Gaya (O dan√±yaama nder nyal…óe 16 lewru Morse …óumngu ngu aliif 1952 O Gim…óo Siyaasaaji Naajeeriya nden haa kadi annduu…óo √±yimle mo…ó…óune subti majalisu 16 …óotti'en naajeeriya. O halartake janngir…óe sakandare Gomnaati n…óe haa birnin kudu dega …óumngu 1969 yaahri 1973 inaare n…óe o hee…ì …óereewol. jannde afrik hirnaare (WAEC) e lakkol Gwamnati Birnin Kudu (WAEC) e ilmu
gollital e tayaaka dega 19 74 - 1975 inaare emo hee…ìi JMB. o hee…ìii digiriiwalgiri arann…óewal fannu - mahe-maheeji dega janngirde Ahmadu Bello 1977.

Kabiru Ibrahim Gaya
11 ga Yuni, 2019 -

GORO TULA E FAMUJI:
GORO Tula E FAMUJI WON NDER.
Goro tula dun don nodda dun (snot apple) nder demngyal nasara, dun bikkon lekki ngokki nanduki e lekki goro ki anduden ammanbo nadun lekkikin, arande goro tula dun boddun, dun borodun, ba hako bokko,dun haccha , dundon kuda emajun nder lesde Africa edo maganiji.
¬† Nda famuji dun goro tula wadata:
1, dun don wadda yoruki yeso debbo, to rewbe don habda e shiya ndakam ta ndari dun borodun wala seko, dun fodanay rewbe ngarta marbe ndakam e fewdun yeso.
2, Dun don fodana rewbe qoyire daygol (ovolution) be bawata wadduki qoyire, say dun wadaka yarki dun nder yogurt dun lamma.
Dundon fadda ngyawu fewol, ngyangyande yeso rewbe, ngyangyande kobo futte yeso.
4, Dundon fadda tutol ngyawu (Asma) to hude nden ummake dun ngata gotel, dun hoyray.
5, Dun waray ngyawu les redu e fowdun sarde da'ngyuki .
Edun wada urnegol bafe lekki kinngam dingol.
7, Edu foyna bafe den, dun urna bandu ngam buduki bandu e ngyawu ladde (blood cancer).
8, jarobe taba ngata goro tula ngam don walla huhure(lever) ustuki tuurre.
9, Don usta sembe ngyawu kalkowu bandu(HIV-AIDS) dun wada shondi goro dun nder diyam Lipton hauta e njuuri.
10, Gorko giddo ndiyam (sperm) mudun warta boredun waway wadaka waduki nder yogurt e yara.
Nda famuji sedda nder goro tula, bo dun sada, dun wala bone hebuki.
Bo goro tula dun gi,oton du,un wala edun heboto nder laddi Nigeria fat sayta wari GORO Tula E FAMUJI WON NDER.
Goro tula dun don nodda dun (snot apple) nder demngyal nasara, dun bikkon lekki ngokki nanduki e lekki goro ki anduden ammanbo nadun lekkikin, arande goro tula dun boddun, dun borodun, ba hako bokko,dun haccha , dundon kuda emajun nder lesde Africa edo maganiji.
¬† Nda famuji dun goro tula wadata:
1, dun don wadda yoruki yeso debbo, to rewbe don habda e shiya ndakam ta ndari dun borodun wala seko, dun fodanay rewbe ngarta marbe ndakam e fewdun yeso.
2, Dun don fodana rewbe qoyire daygol (ovolution) be bawata wadduki qoyire, say dun wadaka yarki dun nder yogurt dun lamma.
Dundon fadda ngyawu fewol, ngyangyande yeso rewbe, ngyangyande kobo futte yeso.
4, Dundon fadda tutol ngyawu (Asma) to hude nden ummake dun ngata gotel, dun hoyray.
5, Dun waray ngyawu les redu e fowdun sarde da'ngyuki .
Edun wada urnegol bafe lekki kinngam dingol.
7, Edu foyna bafe den, dun urna bandu ngam buduki bandu e ngyawu ladde (blood cancer).
8, jarobe taba ngata goro tula ngam don walla huhure(lever) ustuki tuurre.
9, Don usta sembe ngyawu kalkowu bandu(HIV-AIDS) dun wada shondi goro dun nder diyam Lipton hauta e njuuri.
10, Gorko giddo ndiyam (sperm) mudun warta boredun waway wadaka waduki nder yogurt e yara.
Nda famuji sedda nder goro tula, bo dun sada, dun wala bone hebuki.
(LGA)¬† hebeto.GORO Tula E FAMUJI WON NDER.
1, dun don wadda yoruki yeso debbo, to rewbe don habda e shiya ndakam ta ndari dun borodun wala seko, dun fodanay rewbe ngarta marbe ndakam e fewdun yeso.
2, Dun don fodana rewbe qoyire daygol (ovolution) be bawata wadduki qoyire, say dun wadaka yarki dun nder yogurt dun lamma.
Dundon fadda ngyawu fewol, ngyangyande yeso rewbe, ngyangyande kobo futte yeso.
4, Dundon fadda tutol ngyawu (Asma) to hude nden ummake dun ngata gotel, dun hoyray.
5, Dun waray ngyawu les redu e fowdun sarde da'ngyuki .
Edun wada urnegol bafe lekki kinngam dingol.
7, Edu foyna bafe den, dun urna bandu ngam buduki bandu e ngyawu ladde (blood cancer).
8, jarobe taba ngata goro tula ngam don walla huhure(lever) ustuki tuurre.
9, Don usta sembe ngyawu kalkowu bandu(HIV-AIDS) dun wada shondi goro dun nder diyam Lipton hauta e njuuri.
10, Gorko giddo ndiyam (sperm) mudun warta boredun waway wadaka waduki nder yogurt e yara.
Nda famuji sedda nder goro tula, bo dun sada, dun wala bone hebuki.

Umaru Musa Yar'Adua:
Umaru Musa Yar'Adua o wa…ói ∆¥ee…óowki/gordam maako diiga 1951 yaarii 2010. ∆äuun gim…óo siyaasajo Naajeeriya o me…ói wadgo gomnaajo e ardaaki lesdi Naajeeriya hiitaade 2007. 
Tariihi maako.
∆äuun nda∆¥iimo 16 lewru Agustus hiitaade 1951 e gelle Katsina lesdi Naajeeriya. Baba maako …óuun ministaajo Diiwal Lagos sa'ii maai. O …ìagi koreemako Turai Yar'Adua hitaande 1975, …ìegon bacci jeew'…ói…ói (7) wor…ìe …ói…óo rew…ìe njeyo (5) be taaniraa…ìe ∆äu…ó…ìe. O …ìangi Hauwa Umar Radda hiitaade 1992 yaarii 1997 …ìe ke…ìii bacci …ói…ói.
Gomnaajo Diiwal Kebbi saalii…óo Usman Dakingari …ìangi …ìinngel maako Zainab Yar'Adua, nden boh Gomnaajo Diiwal Bauchi saalii…óo Isah Yuguda ha∆¥own ma …ìangi …ìinngel maako Nafisa, se Gomnaajo Diiwal Katsina roonu…óo mo mo innde Ibrahim Shema hanko ma …ìangi …ìinngel maako Maryam. 
Njande maako.
O fu…ó…ói njande e Rafukka Primary School Hiitaade 1958, o saalii njangide Dutsinma e Katsina 1962. O hawti njangirde e gell Keffi hiitaade 1965 yaarii 1969. Hiitaade 1971 o ja…ìii …óerewol manngol e njangirde Barewa College. O wa…ói degree maako aranndeeri(1972 yaarii 1975) e …ói…óawru(1978) e jaami'awa Ahmadu Bello edow ilmu kemistiri (Kimmiyya).
Kuugal Artuungal.
O fu…ó…ói huwugo be njangirde Holy Child College e legos (1975-76). O Moodibbo njanginoowo e njangir…óee College of arts, science and Technology Zaria, Diiwal Kaduna (hiitaade 1976) e College Of Arts Science (hiitaade 1979). O wa…ói manajaajo (ardii…óo) ngesa Sambo e gelle Funtua, diiwal Katsina. O wa…ói membaajoo edow njandeeji be ndemal e Diiwal Katsina(1978 yaarii 1983). O ardake felle …óu…ó…óe …óe kuugal masin.
Gomnaajo Diiwal Katsina.
O lattake jagordo shubtaa…óo ga…óoowo Gomnaajo Diiwal Katsina hiitaade 1999 har yaarii 2007. Hanko'on woni jagordo aranndeejoo wangin…óo ko'o mari eder jaowdii (Assets) maako, boh o lattini diiwal Katsina nder nga…óo…ìe shari'a jowldanku wakkaci maako. 
Ardoo…óo lesdii Naajeeriya.
O lattake jagordo shubtaa…óo ardotoo…óo lesdii Naajeeriya les jam'iyya maako ka PDP hiitaade 2007 …ìawo o wanginii anniya maako dow daraaki tebgo laamowki Naajeeriya. ∆äuun wa…ói shubtal gal o do'ii luttu…ìe (Muhammadu Buhari of ANPP and Atiku Abubakar of AC). Saini boh kam…ìe …ìe nja…ìai e shubtal gal.
Diiga nden boh o inni/wanginii ballitoowo mo ardoogal lesdii Naajeeriya, o hoo∆¥ii Goodluck Ebele Jonathan dow wallitamo ardooki, hanko'on woni jagordo Diiwal Bayelsa koden. 
Anniyaaji maako jey…ói…ói.
∆Åawo o lattake jagordo shubtaa…óo o wanginii anniyaaji maako jey…ói…ói (7) dow mahowgo lesdii Naajeeriya bakoo …óuun yaara dungu 2020, kanjii woonii …óoo les; 
1. Mahaale bo…ó…óe, wod'ingow hiite lesdii
2. Sha'aniijii ∆≥amduu lesdii
3. ∆äu…ó…óingo jaowdii lesdii
4. Wod'ingow Jahaale lesdii
5. Wod'ingow laa…ìee lesdii
6. Tabbitayki njoode njam e lesdii 
7. Wod'ingow sha'aniijii Ilmu lesdii. 
seiny boh o he…ìai o hawti anniyaaji maako …ói'o inni gamma o ∆¥am…óa/∆¥aawi dow …ìoo∆¥ee (Kidney disease) diiga …ìawo bow o sooy'ty (died). O wa…ói shiya njamow …óun wurtiinii mo les…óe yaasi tebgo njamu maako, assembly lesdii Naajeeriya lattini ballitoowo mo ardoogal dow ardoogal lesdii ndin hiitaade 2010. ∆Åawo nango habarow sooy'tukiy maako …óon …ìe tabbitini ballitoowo mo ardoogal mo innde Goodluck Ebele Jonathan dow o latto ardootoo…óo lesdii ndin yaarii ∆¥andeere shubtal yeesowal. 
Jawdi maako.
Wakkacire o wanginii anniya maako dow daraaki tebgo laamowki Naajeeriya o wanginii jawdi maako faat. Owon shede ko yaarii ‚Ç¶856,452,892. ‚Ç¶19 million …óuun koreemako.
Mayde maako.
∆≥andeere 24 Febuary, 2010 …ìe ngartinii mo lesdii Naajeeriya diiga lesdii Saudi Arabia …óun wurtinai khabaru ngonga dow waalaki maako shiyajamow. ∆äu…ì…ìe ndaaroimo e Abuja, …ìawo …óon o sooy'ty ∆¥andeeree 5 May, 2010 eder wowro gomnaaty Naajeeriya. 

Bauchi Emirates:
Laamorde diiwal Bauchi
Laamor…óe Diiwal Bauchi (Bauchi Emirates).
Laamor…óe Diiwal Bauchi tiggaama hiitaade 19th Centoory les ∆¥im…ìe Fula e gelle Bauchi kaapiital Diiwal Bauchi nden. 
Taarihi Maade (History).
Bakoo wadgo jihaadi pullo mujaddadiijo Shehu Usmanu …ìii Fodio, gelle Bauchi won …óel…óe …óu…ó…óe boldatee…óe, won Hausaare e kaabiila'en wo…ì…ìe be Jowl…ìe masin. 
Hiitaade 1809 yaarii 1818 ∆¥im…ìe Fula (Ful…ìe) jabtii ardoogal gelle …óen les ardoogal Yakubu Gerawa hanko'on woni …ìii go…ó…óo laamii…óo e felle …óen boh o njangi e njangirde fullo mujaddadiijo Usmanu …ìii Fodio e diiwal Sokoto. 
Laamor…óe nden lattake les ardoogal ∆¥im…ìe Fula yaarii 1902 wakkacire towranko'en (British) jabtii ardoogal walaa hawree, …ìe battitii laa…ìe ndongidirkii Laamor…óe Diiwal Bauchi. 
Laamii…ìe Laamor…óe Nden.
(Diiga 1805 yaarii 1845) Yakubu I …ìii Dadi
(Diiga 1845 yaarii 1877) Ibraahima …ìii Yakubu
(Diiga 1877 yaarii 1883) Usmanu …ìii Ibraahima
(Diiga 1883 yaarii 1902) Umaru …ìii Salmaanu
(Diiga 1902 yaarii 1902) Muhammadu Mo'Allah ∆¥i…ói …ìii Ibraahima
(Diiga 1903 yaarii 1907) Hassan …ìi mamuda
(Diiga 1907 yaarii 1941) Ya'qubu II …ìii Usman
(Diiga 1955 yaarii 1982) Adama jumba …ìii Yakubu
(Diiga 1982 yaarii 2010) Suleiman Adamu 
(Diiga 2010 yaarii jotta, present years) Rilwanu Suleiman Adamu. 

Laam…óo Diiwal Gombe (Emir Of Gombe):
lamido Diiwal Gombe
Lamido Diiwal Gombe( Emir Of Gombe).
Alh Abubakar Shehu Abubakar
Tariihi maako.
Abubakar …ìi Shehu Abubakar …óuun dan∆¥imoo ∆¥andeere 17 December hiitaade 1977 e gelle Gombe, nder Diiwal Gombe lesdii Naajeeriya.
Hanko'on woni laamii…óo Diiwal Gombe saffo e go'oojo (11th Emir). O latti…óoo laamii…óo Gombe tin wakkacire babaa maako sooy'ty (died) Alh Shehu Usman latti…óoo laamii…óo Gombe saffoojo (10th Emir) e hiitaade 27 May, 2014. O lattake …ìi…ó…óo …ói…óawjo nder …ìi…ì…ìe laamii…óo saalii…óo/sooy'tow…óo. ∆äuun …óon ∆¥ii'amo lamido daba Naajeeriya (Sarkin Daban Nigeria). ∆äuun …óon nodda mo inndeejii banii; Abba Jikan Abba, ∆äawisu Sarkin Ado e Giwa. 
Njande Maako (Education).
O wa…ói njangirde famarde hiitaade 1982 yaarii 1988 e njangirde (Children Primary School) nder gelle Gombe. ∆äon boh e yahii njangirde shakawre ndee (Government Science Secondary School, Gombe) hiitaade 1989 yaarii 1995. O hawti degree maako aranndeere dow ilmu siyaasa (Political Science) e njangirde jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nde gelle Maiduguri (University Of Maiduguri) hiitaade 2001 yaarii 2005. 
Kuugal Artuugal.
O me…ói howky dow ndaarukii hukuumaje Diiwal Gombe hiitaade 2006 yaarii 2007. Diiga 2007 yaarii 2009 o lattake …≤e…ó…óo …ìadii…óo ballitoowo ministaajo darii…óo dow reenowgo Naajeeriya (Minister of Defence) e Abuja nder Gomnaaty Naajeeriya. O latti…óoo ardii…óo felle kuu…óe …óee kamfaaniiji (Companies) Kliptown Lagoon Nigeria Ltd e Horizon Interlink Global Resources. 
Wakkacire babaa maako sooy'ty dow ∆¥awkiy Cancer, Gomnaaty Diiwal Gombe les ardoogal gomnaajo Ibrahim Hassan Dankwambo …ìe inni/tabbitanii …ìo laamowki Diiwal Gombe e nder Jowlirde Laamor…óe Diiwal Gombe dow o roona babaa maako e hiitaade 6 June, 2014.
Manngu Lesdii Naajeeriya..
E hiitaade 2022 Gomnaaty Naajeeriya les ardoogal Muhammadu Buhari …ìe inni mo/ …ìe tabbitinanii mo manngu Lesdii dow " Commander of the Order of Federal Republic" (CFR). 

Maayo Jama'are:
Maayo jama‚Äôare moobe buri anndigo bee maayo bunga ha heeji oburtayi, waadon fudda daaga kooseeje je wooni ha kombi bee gruel Jos je wuro plateau haa Naajeeriya o tokki waila waladu fuunaaje wuro Bauchi bee wuro Yobe bakko hawta bee maayo Hadejia waarta maayo Yobe. Ha baawo ‚Äìbaawo don be waadi bolle bedon taaska maahugo tayta ndiyam je kafin zaki haadow don maayo‚Äôon bee hulling wannaree dow sakittu ndiyam mbee bakeejam bee ndiyam yarrgo bee noon man dannyen.

Maayo Imo:
Maayo imo (Igbo; imo) woodon ha fommbina waladu fuunaa Naajeeriya bo o woodi 150 miles (240 km) nder maayo filitiingo Atalantik. Ha wuro Akwa Ibom, waato inyang imo beye waylita yaahugo maayo njawdi. (Ibibio; inyang, imo woodon nuuma njaindi).nuhhure maako waadon kombi man bee 40 kiilomita (25 ml) yaajirka bo maayo owoodi bee ikigo je duubu-duubu je cubic kilometres (1.0 cu ml) yaajigo fellel man 26,000 je coofnaadum ruumtunde. Maayo imo kambe‚Äôon otamiri bee oramirukiwa. Be buuyibe hales laamu jaggu/koloninkeejum je Biritisu mo Naajeeriya ha hitaande 1907-1908 be 1911 bee arannde yaahugo Aba boo yaahugo udo kombi bee umuahia. Koobe jagganta koo Alusi je maayo kanko‚Äôon debbo Imo kanko‚Äôon ummatoore jeetaari be bee maayo be waadi imaanako ha demngal Igbo don nuuma ndiyam koo iyeende. 
Bedon waada banngal je Alusi fuu hitaande hakkunde leinru mayu bee yuli. Maayo imo owoodi bee 830 metres (2,720 ft) katarko ha naasturde hakkunde wuro Rivers bee wuro akwa ibom.

Maayo Komadugu-Gana:
Maayo Komadugu-Gana ko maayo Misaw maayo‚Äôon nder basin Caad haa woyla waladu fuunaa Naajeeriya jehawti Maayo Yobe e Damasak haa feetel laamu‚Äôon mobbar jey Diiwal Borno. O ummi daaga woyla Bawci.
Biiyugo humpitina je nduubu mo 2011 je international union for conservation of nature ndiyam‚Äôon maayo o acci wargo Yobe. 
Be hebti koombowal Dufuna je maari hitaande 1987 feetel laamu Fune.

Maayo Katsina Ala:
Maayo Katsina Ala (koo Katsina-Ala) maayo‚Äôon ha caaka Naajeeriya, kanko‚Äôon ha caaka fellel maako je caaka. Woodon huuwa ha darn de nasturde mannga maayo Benuwe e Naajeeriya. Dooforde je wooni ha woyla walada hirnaa Cameron.don el a 320 kilomertes (200 ml) wayla waladu hirnaa e Kamerun, o ilna dow keerol Naajeeriya bee Kamerun yaahugo Naajeeriya.
Babal.
Bedon heeba maayo Katsina Ala burna fuuha wuro Benuwe je Naajeeriya, baawo o iyabbiti dow keerol hakkunde Naajeeriya be Kamerun bakko o rufa ko wooni nder reedu mako yahugo maayo benue.
Gureeji.
Katsina Al] berniiwol mango boo gruel manngoje feetel laamu katsina-Ala ha Diiwal Benuwe Naajeeriya. Bedon heeba ha hundukomaayo katsina-Ala bee gruel duddum haadow laawul woodi loomu mannga je nyaamata ha alaamusa yalti.

Maayo Oramiruka:
Maayo Oramiruka waloowul/coofol on ha in Uro Imo, Naajeeriya je baniidum/dared kilomerte 14 (9 ml) laawul ilata nder maayo Otamiri.

Maayo Owala:
Maayo owala maayo on ha ifon Osun, diiwal Osun, haa Naajeeriya, kombi gure bee illie. Maayo maan yaari bana kilomere 72 be waawann samjigo yahugo kersol/tayla bee boo yaarni go ndiyam gaama boddim geedal je luttaano leddi be leddi jey barkaaji taari maayo maan.

Maayo Kalaaba:
Maayo Kalaaba je wooni wuro Cross River haa Naajeeriya otakki woyla daaga cross river baana 8 kilometres (5.0) yahug fommbina.
Maayo Kalaaba Kalaaba o don heeba bee jipporde koombowal tagaali dum luggudum baras bee riftirde hawtigo bee 6 metres (20 ft). maayo Kalaaba deefuu asli mawdo maccube deebe jiffata daaaga nder gam adiigobe yahugo hirrnaa ha coggu maccube je atlantic. Ha hitaande 1860 on be acci jaggugo hoorbe.

Maayo Rima:
Maayo Rima maayo on ha wayla Naajeeriya. Ha wakkerewoyla don hawta bee maayo goulbi de maradi. O tokki fommbina waladun hiirnaa hawtubee maayo sokoto, kombi bee sokoto o yeehi yeeso bee fommbina yahugo maayo niger. Rima je dooridoroongel maayo on je joodannde boo don ila on mere ha yak dunngo. Be taaski Zawro, mannga hokkugo ndiyam, nduubu saalin o hokkan ndiyam 10,572 hectare (26,120 acres) ngeese ha nokkuure rima je wooni hakkunde Argungu be boo berniiwol Kebbi.

Maayo Sakkwato…ìe:
Maayo Sokoto jebee buri anndigo bee gulbi kebbi) maayo on ha woyla waladu hiirnaa Naajeeriya boo waaloowol on jey Maayo Niiser. Dooforde maayo on don kombi Funtua haa fommbina wuro Katsina, baana 275 kilometre (171 mi) don foorti daanyi daaga Sakkwato…ìe. O tokki woyla waldu hirnaa o saali Gusau ha wuro Zamfara, haabe darnni ndiyammaan ha Gusau o heebi woloowol heeydum gruel ndiyam. Ha less maayo maan nassti wuro Sakkwato…ìe nde o saali ha sokoto hawtu bee maayo rima ndaayago o waylitti fommbina o tokki je berniiwol Kebbi haa Diiwal Kebbi. 
Baana 120 120 kilometres (75 ml) fommbina bee berniwal kebbi o yotti hewta maako bee Maayo Niiser. Babalji jetaari maayo maan bedon reema dum maasin boo bedon huutindira bee maayo maan ha darned asli maayo maan bedon nyaarna. Maayo boo kimmidi niidum laalwul adiraaku on. Tayta on bakolori, baana 100 kilometres (62 ml) daaga dow daaga sokoto, waloowol maaga onha maayo sokoto. O waadi, sakittu baras haadow reemu go waalowul jey hales.

Maayo Komadugu Yobe:
Maayo Yobe, moobe buri aandigo be Komaduugou Yobe ko komadougou-yobe ha demngal francias, maayo feere on haa hiirnaa Afrik lee ilata yahugo lake chade laawul Naajeeriya be Niiser. Ha maayo maan dum hawti bee maayo hadejia, bee maayo jama‚Äôare bee boo maayo kamadougou gana. Maayo leddi hakkunde Niiser be Naajeeriya. Woodi firtindirgo bee caanjigo kuujeeji maan haadow gam iligo bee ndiyam maayo, bee noo wooni sigaagi bee boo nbuugo fellel maayo, noodum wooni jotta kanjim on tayta. Ontiga ha nder wuro Kano bee hawtal taas kugo carwootital jamaa kafin zaki dam ha nder wuro Bawci.
Berniije mawde je jewooni ha ha kombi maan bee maayo hawyi be Gashuwa, Geidam, be Damasak e Naajeeriya, be Diffa haa Jamhuriyawol Niiser.

Maayo Yewa:
Maayo Yewa maayo feere on seali keerol hakkunde Jamhuriyawol Benen be Naajeeriya dume on ilata haa fuunaa maayo filitingo Benen haa wakkati gootel o‚Äôoyebbii keerol lesde dadi. Luttano seendindirgo innde maan kambe on Yeoua, Yewa, Yeoua, be Yewa. Baniidum maako kondim dared maayo filitingo mannga asliijum on yewa kanjim maayo atan bee iloro.yewa dam to oyidow nder badagty creek je maysii, don to kkindiiri, yahugo jieeorde koombawol je lagos.maayo maan don nder wakkati guldum je hiirnaa Afrik boo kimmindiniidum asliijum gawrtigo liddi on gaam joodugo ha nukkure maan. Feere kimmidiniidum gam haala naagugoliddi je saare ngarke on sarwaajum (callinectes amnicola). Baawo noongugo liingu, maayo o wood, kimmidiniidum hunnde maan ha fellel hungo saffogu leddeje bee njaareend. Feere diga nder koofuudidi je joodi ha nder maayo bee fomownde ndiyam kambe on sedges (irin maan cyeerus articulates, cyperus papyrus, bee paspalum vaginatum) bee dibinoohi (iriin maan pandanus candelabrum raphia lookeri, bee phoenix reclinata).
Innde maan burtayi diga lawru on Yoruba yewa gam kamjim on lawru do maayo ,aan caahiidum boo hunnde koobe jagganta wade, woodi, sirri, yeeweende, mbattudi, guddal bee hiilaajo/kiiloowo.

Maayo Okpara:
Maayo Okpara maayo feere jey Benin. Asiili maako ha nder babal man borgou, don ila yahugo fommbina boo warti dold keerol hakkunde Naajeeriya be Benin bakko oloor Onitsha nder Benin dum ila yahugo maayo ouemw, mo reegere je ili yahugo maayo filitingo Atalantik.
Gureji dude jey wooni ha honndiko maayo man bedon nyeddindira hakkun de Benin be Naajeeriya.

Maayo Zamfara:
Maayo Zamfara maayo‚Äôon ha banngeere woyla Naajeeriya. Asiili maako daaga wuro zamfara, owoodon yahaa baana 250 kilometres (160 mi) hirrnaa yahugo nder wuro kebbi haa o hawti bee maayo wuro sokoto baana50 kilometres (32 ml) fommbina waladu hirrnaa berniwul kebbi. Ha kooburi manngu darned maako maayo zamfara o tokkiri heedi nukkare jee 188 metres (617 ft) haadow takkindira.
Maayo filitingo. Woodi innde feere-feere je zamfara ha nukkujee feere-feere je zamfara maako maayo zamfara o tokkiri heedi nukkare jee 188 metres (617 ft) haadow takkindira.
Maayo filitingo. Woodi innde feere-feere je zamfara ha nukkujee feere-feere je zamfara ha nukkujee feere-feere bee tokki nder je mabbe. Feere nder mabbe kambe on maanabe hawtube: gulbi gindi, gulbi zamfara, maayo zamfara, bee maayo gindi. Maayo man don e latitude 12.2‚Äô2.22 beeboo longitude: 4. 2‚Äô22.85

Maayo Ninorie:
Maayo Ninorie maayo on haa Naajeeriya duma seelinder owerri, seeli nder maayo otamiri e nekede. Juutal maayo daaga daaforde yahugo fellel maako kanko on 9.2 km.
Maayo dum bonni waabiliire ha hitaande 2017 feetel laamu obaarri gaam na be naafuude ndiyam daaga maayo on.

Maayo Niiser:
Maayo Niiser en don yaunaamo bee maayo niger je woodi dar nde kilomwtre 4,180. Luggage man yeehi baana kilometer 2,11ha leddi. Feetel jaawal maako 5,589 m3/5 jenaandi ndirayi daaga jaawol 500 m3/5 yahugo 27,600 m3/5. Fuddano maako daaga koseeje gine fommbina waladu fuunaa Gine. Waloodi feetel maako kombe maayo bani, maayo benin o tokki nder malo, niger bee Naajeeriya yahugo maayo Atilantik otakki niger bee Naajeeriya yahuga maayo atlantic otakki niger delta. Di berniiji dum don heeba ha maayo Niiser; tembakounda, Bamako,Timbuktu, Niamey.

Maayo Ngaji:
Maayo Ngaji maayo‚Äôon ha woyla Naajeeriya. O heebi asiili‚Äôon daaga nukkujee coofnaadum lesdi je gruel gadaka ha wuro yobe, owoodi daayiidum kilometres 40 fommbina yaahugo ngalda boo hawtube bee maayo ngalda daayi gokilometre 22.2 fommbina bee gruel fika.

Maayo Ngadda:
Maayo ngadda maayo feere‚Äôon wooni ha nder Naajeeriya je ilaata hader lake Caad bee maayo Caadi. Ndiyam maayo daarnidam Alau jeebe babal ndiyam didgudum coofnaadum je wakkati ha banngeere je Maiduguri.

Maayo Kwa Ibo:
Maayo Kwa Ibo (boo maayo quaibo) maayo‚Äôon don imam kombi bee umaahia ha wuro abia e Naajeeriya, boo o tokki fommbina waladu fuunaa je wuro akwa 16 o yaahugo maayo filitigo Atilantik.
Maayo‚Äôon odon nyemmna nukkure feereje waalowol‚Äôon mangrove je maari ngondal be geelode ndiyam be waaloji jee seendirtabe bee maayo bee njaarindi feetel jee sedda. Ibeno, ha wakkere fuunaa je maayo kwa ibo ponnda kilometres 3 kilomeres (2 ml) daaga honndiko maayo gootel nder fellel gawtugo liddi mannga man ha fuunna maayo filitingo Naajeeriya.

Kawu Peto Dukku:
Kawu Peto Dukku.
O ndanyaama ∆¥andeere 14 Lewru Aranndeeru dow january dungu 1958 e gelle Dukku, nder Diiwal Gombe. Gim…óo siyaasajo Naajeeriya wadgo senataajo e diiwal Gombe ta woila hiitaade 2007. 
Taarihi Maako.
O wa…ói ∆¥ee…óowki maako diiga 1958 yaarii 2010. ∆äun ndanyii mo 14 Lewru Aranndeeru dow january dungu 1958 o sooy'ty (died) ∆¥andeere 2 lewrow aprilu 2010. O hawti njande diploma Maako edow ilmu luu…ìe. 
Kuugal Artuugal be Siyaasa Maako.
O fu…ó…ói kuugal e njanginki, diiga nden o nastiy nden kamfaniwa nebbam ngonga e gelle Maiduguri. O latti…óoo …ìii majaalisa assembly Gombe shubtaa…óo diiga dungu 1999 yaarii 2007. ∆äuun …ìeddu shubtowki mo dow o ardo o wa…óa senatajoo Diiwal Gombe ta wayla (Gombe North) les jam'iyya maako ka PDP. ∆Åawo wartuki maako senatajoo …óun inni moh hanko woni ballitoowo jagordo dow diiwal e hukuumaje pamar…óe pamaareeje e wowro senata'en ardotoo…ìe lesdii Naajeeriya. Wo…ì…ìe ngii hanko on naa o wolwoo'wo nder wowro senata'en ardotoo…ìe lesdii Naajeeriya ba. 
Sooy'tukiy maako (Hisa Death).
O sooy'ty e gelle Kaduna gamma o ∆¥am…óa o ∆¥aawi ∆¥andeere 2 lewrow aprilu dungu 2010. O wodi bacci jeygo'o(6), rew…ìe tatoo (3) be taana inna maako.

Aliyu Akwe Doma:
Aliyu Akwe Doma.
O wa…ói gordam maako diiga 1942 yaarii 2018. ∆äun gim…óo siyaasajo Naajeeriya o me…ói wadgo gomnaajo Diiwal Nassarawa eii les jam'iyya maako kah PDP siyaasa Naajeeriya.
Tariihi maako.
O da∆¥ama √±aldeere aranndeere 1 e lewru september, …óumngu 1942 e gelle Doma hukuumare pamarde e diiwal Nassarawa diga kaabiila'en Alago. 
Njande Maako.
O djanngii njangirde aranndeere nde Primary e Doma 1951, o kadi …ói…óawre nde Secondary e lafia dungu 1957. O nden boo kadi njangir…óee maw…óe haa Katsina e Gombe dungu 1963. O wa…ói njangirde jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga Ibaadan University Of Ibadan hiitaade 1964 yaarii 1966. O njangi boh e lesdii England (London dungu 1968) oyehi boh lesdii Italy dungu 1973. O yahii njangirde jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga Zaria( Janngirde Ahmadu Bello …óumngu 1976 e Janngirde Ambrose Alli , Ekpoma …óumngu 2002 …óon o he…ìoy degree maako …ói…óarjum edow ilmu ndongidirkii ummatore (Public Administration). 
Kuugal Artuugal.
Eder handowgo maako, o fu…ó…ói wadgo sakatareejo Gomnaaty Diiwal Jos hankowdee 1976 yaarii 1983. Diiga …óon boh o warti latti…óoo ballitoowo jagordo Diiwal filato. Gomnaaty Naajeeriya lattini mow nder memba'en kawtal kuu…óe …óu…ó…óe. 
Gomnaajo Diiwal Plateau.
O lattake Gomnaajo jagordo shubtaa…óo ardotoo…óo diiwal Nassarawa dungu 2007 les jam'iyya maako ka PDP siyaasa Naajeeriya. O …ìeddi tebgo ardoogal diiwal gal e dungu 2011 saini gim…óo siyaasajo Naajeeriya Umaru Tanko Almakura do'ii mo hanko ∆¥ami korowal gal e les jam'iyya maako ka CPC.
Mayde maako.
O sooy'ty ∆¥andeere 6 March, 2018 …ìawo ∆¥awky/shiyajamow maako ton lesdii Israel.

Maayo Anambara:
Maayo Anambaara (Igbo: omambala) don ela 210 kiilomitaji (130 MI) yahugo nder Maayo Neeja fahin wo…óon haa Anambaara, Naajeeriya. Maayo man boo …ìurdu…óo kimmi…óinii…óum haa yarnigo be maayo Neeja be ndiyamje wooni haa berniiwol Lokoja. Ndiyam bee maayo Omambala …óer rufa nder maayo filitiingo Atalaantika haa elaagwol ndiyam feere-feere nde …óum …ìofti kilomitaji 25,000 sukuya kiilomitaje (9,700 sa MI) …ìanngeere Neeja Delta.
Banngeere maayo Anambaara be biiruki Omambala kanjim‚Äôon nde koo…ìe gendo jaangonta gam maayo man jey dogga be lees lesde mouzo-uwa-ani yahugo algulere, anam, nsugbe be onicha axis, haadum hainti bee maayo nkisi e Niger-kwaro/mgbakili e yaandu mabbe yahugo maayo filitingo atlantika, hawtugobe haabaru asili mabbe wuro. Nonnon boo maayo ezu e exichi bedon dillindiri nder maayo Anambaara ha agbanabo be Oda. Wood. Taali e siiri be duddum je taar be Omambal a je waandi haadi haalaji feere-feere bee kabilaji bee ummatore koburi duduugo, gam non annasaara linyugo je arande kobe arti boolugo omambala haa aderde Anambaara. Hiddeko tageefo guure dude bedon naalra kalmaaji omambala mo booyma inde baangeere mo moisi banngeeji Anambaara mohaande geebe maayo, Enugu be boo Ebonyi, je bibbe asiili nukkure man.
Haala dotta bibbe asiit Aguleria, anam, Nsugbe, Umueri, Anaku, Nteje, umunya, nando, igbariam, nkinelle-ezunanka, nzam, akwkuzu, ogidi, ogbunike, jabbere ayamelum, bee luttube bedon inaada hake biiyugo kanbe‚Äôon asiili mobibe omambala mo ndonu.
Yim…ìe Omambala be woodi demde feere-feere, gondina. Biiruki, be wooda-derderiijo molaytugol noobe …ói…ó…ói gondina duddum je imraanewol be Esoteric di mawna-dokkeejo darajaaji dow mbeelu dow jaarji-seedamku boo bedon jaagabe hawtugo be paffube je biiruki, …óemngal, biiruki diina be maayo Omambala do …óum waadi gaam gondal seem bidum be hawtal hoore je wooni ha hakkkunde mabbe be elto donki jomirawo be Ecosystem kuudukiijum-mobuga jawdi beebiiruki-sigaago, be laamorinkeejum. Be bote banngeeji Omambala oyaari geebe Edo, Delta, Imo, River, Abia, Taraba, Benue, Niger, Nasarawa, Plateau, Akwa-ibom & Cross-river. Naajeeriya haa yahugo Niiser, Caadi, Kamerun, Mali, Central African Republic, etc.

Kashim Shetima Mustafa:
Kashim Shetima Mustafa …óuun …ìi gelle Mayduguri, Diiwal Borno, lesdi Naajeeriya. ∆äuun gim…óo siyaasajo Naajeeriya o me…ói wadgo ngomnaajo e senatajoo Diiwal Borno boo hanko'on woni ballitoowo jagordo shubtaa…óo hooreejo lesdi Naajeeriya ndungu 2023.
Tariihi Maako.
∆äuun dan∆¥yimo 2 september, 1966 e gelle Maiduguri Diiwal Borno, e wayla lesdii Naajeeriya. Innde la∆¥ol ma…ì…ìe Shetima Mustafa Kuttayibe, o …ìangi Nana Shetima …ìegon bacci taty (3). 
Njande Maako.
O wa…ói njangirde famarde e lamisula e gelle Maiduguri hiitaade 1972 yaarii 1978, o wa…ói njangirde shaakare nde Secondary e gelle Biu fombina diiwal Borno diiga …óon o wuiti nde gelle Potiskum (hukuumare pamaru eii diiwal Yobe jotta) …óon o hawti njande maako e dungu 1983. O wa…ói degree maako dow ilmu ndemal e jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga gelle Maiduguri (University Of Maiduguri) hiitaade 1989. O saali lesdii Naajeeriya ta fombina o wa…ói jagganaaki lesdii e gelle Calabar, diiwal Cross River diiga 1989 yaarii 1990. O wa…ói degree maako …ói…óarjum edow ilmu ndemal e jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga Ibaadan (University of Ibadan) dungu 1991. 
o warti jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga gelle Maiduguri e…óon o janginta o lattake moodibbo e…óon diiga 1991 yaarii duubi 1993. 
Kuugal Artuugal.
O howdi bankiiji/e…óuun resata shede e gelle Ikeja, diiwal Legos …óon o dari diiga 1993 yaarii 1997. Diga dungu 1997 o howdi banki low…ìe …óe les…óe downiyaaroow yaarii dungu 2001 hanko woni ballitoowo jagordo bankiwa ngan …ìaawo …óon o latti ardoo…óo bankiwa ngam. O lattake jagordo bankiwa Zenith e gelle Maiduguri, …óon boh o warti ballitoowo jagordo bankiwa ngan e lesdii Naajeeriya fowna-ta-wayla lesdii (Northeast) diiga …óon …ìe inni mo/lattini mow hanko woni ardotoo…óo bankiwa ngan hiitaade 2007. ∆Åawo …óon Gomnaajo Diiwal Borno lattini mow hanko woni ardotoo…óo sha'aniijii shede e Gomnaaty diiwal Borno les ardoogal Ali Modu Sherif.
Siyaasa Maako.
Diiga 2007 yaarii 2011 o lattake ardii…óo wakkerereji/ministiriji joo'y(5). ∆äuun wa…ói shubtal aranndewal nder jam'iyya ANPP …óuun shubty Modu Fannami Gubio seiny …ìawo …óon …óuun fa…ó…ói mo ∆¥imm…ìe bindigaaji, …óon …óuun shubty moh hanko woni darotoo…óo tebgo Gomnaajo e dungu 2011. O ∆¥amii Gomnaajo e kuri'aajii ∆äu…ó…ói 531,147. ∆äuun hokkomoh …ìanngow masin dow wadgo gomnaajo …ìur…óo kila gomnaa'en faat e lesdii Naajeeriya. 
Dungu 2019 o lattake jagordo shubtaa…óo ga…óoowo senatajoo Diiwal Borno ta shaka …óon o rooni Babakaka Bashir.
Ballitoowo Hooreejo Lesdii Naajeeriya..
E dungu 2022 shubtaa…óo ardotoo…óo lesdii Naajeeriya Ahmad Bola Tinubu inni mo/ lattini mow hanko woni ballitoowo mo ardoogal lesdii Naajeeriya e shubtal gal …óuun watta e 2023. Jam'iyya ma…ì…ìe ka APC hanka ∆¥ami shubtal gal kam…ìe boh ardoto lesdii ndin diiga dungu 2023.

Usman Bayero Nafada:
∆Åii gelle Nafada Diiwal Gombe lesdii Naajeeriya. ∆äun gim…óo siyaasajo Naajeeriya mee…óugo wadgo ballitoowo spiikajoo lesdii Naajeeriya (Deputy Speaker), o me…ói wadgo membaajo gelle Nafada, o wa…ói membaajo Gomnaaty …ìaw…óum latti…óoo waakiiliijoo gelle Nafada e Dukku dungu 2015.
Taarihi Maako.
∆äun dan∆¥iimo lewru aranndeeru January, dungu 1961 e gelle Nafada. O jangi e janngirde Jaami'awa Ahmadu Bello e Zaria Diiwal Kaduna, …óon o hawti degree maako aranndeejum dow ilmu limngal accounting, o jangi e janngirde Jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga gelle [ (University Of Maiduguri), Diiwal Borno. 
Siyaasa Maako.
O mee…ói wadgo spiikajoo (Speaker) assembly Gomnaaty diiwal Gombe dungu 1999 yaarii 2003, O latti…óoo shubtaa…óo membaajo waakiiliijoo gelle Nafada e Dukku nder Diiwal Gombe e Gomnaaty mau…óum dungu 2003. ∆Åawo jo'iingo kuugal Babangida Ngauroje dow shiya gonga …óun tawii Patricia Etteh, Friday Itulah gim…óo diiwal Edo lattini Bayero Nafada hanko woni ballitoowo sipiikajo lesdi Naajeeriya. O lattake jagordo Diiwal Gombe ta wayla (Gombe North) hiitaade diiga 2015 yaarii 2019. Hiitaade 2018 hanko be ∆¥im…ì…ìe maako 14 wurtake diiga jam'iyya APC …ìe guity PDP gam o inni/wanginii anniya maako ka daraaki tebgo Gomnaajo Diiwal Gombe e dungu 2019, saini o wa…óai nasaraaku. 
Manngu Laamor…óe.
Hanko'on woni laam…óo hawree gelle Nafada (Sarkin Yaqin Nafada), ∆Åii Rimi gelle Gona, Madawaaki gelle Akko, Hanko ∆¥i'e durbin tangalee, Maje Keran Funakaye, Enyi ∆¥im…ìe Igbo, Garkuwan Matasan Arewa nden boh hanko woni kep…óo mangu lesdii Nijar …óuun Commander of the Order of Niger (CON). 

Babatunde Hunpe:
Babatunde Hunpe.
O ndanyaama 2 lewrow Agustus, hiitaade 1963. ∆äun gim…óo siyaasajo Naajeeriya. Hanko'on woni membaajo waakiiliijoo felle Badagry e diiwal Legos lesdii Naajeeriya. Wakkacire ardoogal Babatunde Fashola dungu 2011 hanko'on woni ballitoowo mow dow shaawariiji ndongidirkii Gomnaaty maako. E dungu 2015 bo Gomnaajo jagordo shubtaa…óo ardotoo…óo diiwal Lagos Mr Akinwunmi Ambode lattini mow hanko woni ballitoowo mo dow sha'aniijii felle e diiwal ].

Babatunde Samuel Adejare:
Babatunde Samuel Adejare ∆äun likitaajjo boo gim…óo siyaasajjo Naajeeriya, o me…ói wadgo membaajjo gelle Agege eii Diiwal Lagos hankowdee 2011 yaarii duubi 2015.
Tariihi maako e Njande Maako.
O nda∆¥aama e 6 Dujjal, 1961. O njangi e njangirde St. Paul's Catholic Primary School e gelle Ebutte Metta e diiwal Lagos hankowdee 1967 yaarii 1973. O yehi njangirde nde Gramar e gelle Esure, Ijebu mushin, e diiwal Ogun lesdii Naajeeriya diiga 1974 yaarii 1980 …óon o hawti njande o he…ìi …óerewol "West African School Certificate" (WASC). O he…ìi …óerewol manngol gol Higher School Certificate (HSC) e gelle Ibadan jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya (University Of Ibadan). ∆Åawo njande maako nde Likitanko'en e jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga Ilorin (University Of Ilorin) o hawti degree maako …ói…óarjum edow ilmu njamowji …ói ummatore (Public Health) diiga Jaami'awa diiwal Lagos.
Kuugal Artuugal.
O me…ói howky dow hanko woni …ìaow…óo e asibitiwa gelle Ikeja. O lattake ballitoowo ∆¥awii…ìee dow tefanki …ìe laa…ìe ndongidirkii ∆¥awtaaki ma…ì…ìe.
Siyaasa Maako.
O wa…ói membaajo e siyaasa diiwal Lagos pamara nde …ói…ói diiga 2003 yaarii 2011. O ardaake kawtal assembly dow njamowji. Dungu 2011 o lattake shubtaa…óo membaajo Gomnaaty lesdii Naajeeriya hanko'on woni membaajo mo felle Agege e diiwal Lagos. Dungu 2015 Gomnaajo Diiwal Lagos inni mo dow hanko woni ardotoo…óo sha'aniijii felle nden boh e dungu 2018 o …ìeddi innow ki mo ardoogal njamowji faat e diiwal Legos les ardoogal Gomnaajo Mr Akinwunmi Ambode. 
O …ìeddi tebgo ardoogal felle Agege e diiwal Lagos bo o ∆¥ami korowal gal les jam'iyya maako ka APC dungu 2019.

Abubakar Garbai Borno:
Abubakar Garbai Borno.
Innde maako Abu Bakr …ìi Ibrahim al-Kanemi …óuun …óon ∆¥i'e moh inndeji banni; Bukar Garbai ko Abubakar Garbai). Hanko'on woni Shehuujo Borno (Shehu of Borno II) …ói…óa…ìo, diga dungu 1902 yaarii 1922. Bakoo wadgo Shehuujo Borno o me…ói lattaki Shehujo gelle Dikwa (Shehu Of Dikwa). E dungu 1907 of tiggi Yerwa dow hande woni caapiital maako. Abubakar Garbai hannko woni …ìi Shehu Ibrahim Kura …ìi Borno nden boh …óuun Bandiraawo Shehu Sanda Kura. Hanko'on Shehu Sanda Kura hanko ronoow…óo bandow maako Bukar Garbai …ìawo sooy'tukiy maako. ∆äuun Jowl…óo …óuun uwwi moh haa gelle Kukawa.

Bukar Kura Borno:
Bukar Kura of Borno.
Bukar Kura bin Umar al-Kanemi.∆äuun dan∆¥iimo dungu1830, o wa…ói Shehuujo Borno (Shehu of Borno)nder dubii taty (3) diiga hiitaade 1881 yaarii 1884. Hanko ∆¥i'ete roonoow…óo baba maako Umar …ìi Muhammad Al'amin. O wa…ói laa…ìe ndongidirkii Laamu maako, o…óon nja…ìaa shede haraajii (Tax) wakkacire nden, yim…ìe siraati'en (Kanuri) …óon nodda haraajii …óuun be Kumoreji.Ne…ó…óo towrankejoo mo innde Heinrich Barth yottake diiwal Borno hiitaade 1851 o tawii Shehuujo Borno Bukar Kura wakkacire nden duu…ìi maako 12, o yi bo hanko woni …ìi…ó…óo maw…óo nder …ìi…ì…ìe Umar al-Kanemi. ∆äuun Jowl…óo boh O sooy'ty (died) 1885 …óuun ouwiimo e gelle Kukawa.

Umar Dan Muhammad Borno:
Umar Of Borno.
Umar I …ìi Muhammad Al'amin o wa…ói Shehuujo kanem Borno (Shehu of Borno). Hanko'on woni roonoow…óo baba maako Muhammad Al'amin al-Kanemi. O lattake laamii…óo …ìawo baba maako sooy'ty dungu 1837, o wanginii laa…ìe ndongidirkii Laamor…óe maako lootiraa…ói …ói baba maako. Hanko o waddi ballitoo…ìe mo ardoogal …ìe…óun ∆¥i'ete waziiri'en(Wazirs) ham…ìe ballitata mo e shaawariiji ndongidirkii Laamor…óe. Umar o laamii Kanem Borno diiga dungu 1837 yaarii dungu 1853 diiga nden bandow maako Abd-ar-Rahman …ìi Muhammad Al'amin jabtii ardoogal gal hanko woni Shehuujo Borno yaarii dungu 1854. Umar japtii ardoogal gal 1854 laamii Kanem Borno yaarii 1880. Diiga nden boh ∆¥im…ìe fu…ó…ói ustaaki gam shiya ndongidirkii Laamor…óe ba…ó…óum. E dungu 1894 Rabih az-Zubayr ardake ∆¥im…ìe …óu…ì…ìe sooja'en diiga fowna Lesdii Sudan …ìe nasty Bornu …ìe japtii ardoogal gal. 
Umar …ìi Muhammad Al'amin …óuun Jowl…óo, boh o sooy'ty (died) e dungu 1881 …óuun ouwiimo (burial)e gelle Kukawa.

NDA HABAR DEBBOJO MARDO DABARE HAJE GORUN MuN:
NDA DABARE DEBBOJO GORUM MUN WARTI KUGAL.
Remowo warti gyami debbo mun? Mo wi to ndi, to ko, to ngal, to dam?, Debbo ba wi, ndandi, ndakko, ndan ngal, ndaddam.
Yar ndi, Yar ko, Yar ngal, yar dam.
Bu'u ndi, bu'u ko, bu'u ngal, bu'u dam.
Nda no hunde nden wontiri, ta nani dun noddi ndi, to dun ngyri,to dun noddi ko bo, dun hako,to dun noddi ngal bo dun shobbal, to dun noddi dam bo dun kosam.
Bolwowo nde fu hefti ka, mo wolwata nde bo dun dacchi mo e bawo.

Aliko Dangote:
Aliko Dangote¬†GCON¬†(un danyiimo ∆¥ande 10-4-1957) O maw…óo der …ìe Luumo e Naajeeriya, wanda hanko latti darnii Mangu, bo Mangu Dangote, (∆ôungiya) mau…ìum (pelle-kugal) e hirnaa Afirka. E wi'uki Bloomberg Billionaires Index, …óum kiyastake dongu Dangote e dou, dala Amurka biliyan,en 19.9 e lewru 1/2023, non holli o warti …ìur…óo komoye shede e Afrika e laral …ìalewal bo e duniyaru.
Un danyiimo 10 Afrilu 1957¬†(duu…ìi¬†65)
O janngirde (Education Government College, Birnin Kudu) e (Al-Azhar University Occupation Industrialist).
Mo shede …ìur…óo ko moye e Afrika, Aliko Dangote, tiggi manngu e kamfani mako Dangote Siminti, ga…ìuri kogane e Afirka, woodi koyari kashije 85% ∆äum simintin ko o soranta jama'are e junngo kamfaniho les…óe (saffo 10) e Afirka.
∆Åaawo duu…ìi ∆äu…ó…ói e kamfani taki …óum Dangote e Najeriya o fu…ó…ói kuugal e lewru 3-2022.

Kanem Bornu Empire:
Laamor…óe Kanem Bornu.
Kanem Bornu …óuun fellere laamowki ko hawti felle Naajeeriya, Nijar, Cameroon, Libiya e Chadii. ∆äuun andiraa…ìe laarabanko'en (Arabian) …ìe ilmu geography, dungu 8th hiitaale downiyaaroow (8th Century) har yaarii hiitaade 1900s. 
Taarihi Laamor…óe nden.
Kanem Bornu(700-1380) e jotta, ∆äuun felleji hawti Chadii, Naajeeriya be Libiya. ∆äun won keerol e wo…ó…óaaki diiga lesdii Chadii, fombina lesdii Libiya, fowna Lesdii Nijar, wayla-ta-fowna lesdii Naajeeriya be wayla lesdii Cameroon. Innde "Kanem" waari diiga "anem" (waiy fombina Teda e …óemngal kaanuuri). 
Hiitaale downiyaaroow (8th Century), Wahb …ìi Munabbih …óon ∆¥i'e yim…ìe Teda-Tubu edow innde Zaghawa, hanko ma Muhammad …ìi Musa al-Kwarizmi inni innde ma…ì…ìe dow zaghawa bano …ìii al-Nadim yi'i eder debtere maako nde al-Fihriz e 10th Century.
Yim…ìe bolwoo…ìe be …óemngal Kanembu …óon warta felleji Kanem, ham…ìe balliti ummago yim…ìe Kanuri. Yim…ìe Kanuri …ìe zaghawa …ìe kauty gowrof (group) innde ma…ì…ìe Magumi. Hennduki lesdii sahaara waddi felle …ói…ói; wodi …ìe …óemngal Teda-Daza fowna-ta-wayla maayo Chadii, wodi …ìe …óemngal Chadic …ìe…óon hirnaa maayo Chadii(Bornu e lesdii hausanko'en/Hausa)
Wakkacire Ardoogal Duguwa (700-1086).
Kanem …óon hawti …ìe yim…ìe luu…ìe diiga gelle Bilma eder felle Kawar. ∆äuun …óon wadda korii…ìe diiga nder Kanem eder laawol luumo gol. Sayf b. Dhi Yazan wa…ói ardoogal …ìurgal gal duroo…ìe …ìe innde Magumi hankowdee 9th e 10th Century. Yim…ìe Mais ardake ∆¥im…ìe siraati'en e Ngalaga, Kangu, Kayi, Kuburi, Kaguwa, Tomgra be Tubu. 
Al-Yaqub e hiitaade 1872 ∆¥i'ii hande Laamor…óe Kanem nde …óon nder Laamor…óe taty maw…óe. O yii yim…ìe Zaghawa ham…ìe ∆¥iite Kanin. Hanko bo Al-Muhallabi yi'i woodi gelle …ói…ói e Laamor…óe nden. Woodi Manan, laam…óo ma…ì…ìe yi hanko hokkata njamu be ∆¥awky, hokkata fooflee be mayde. Al-Bakri yi diiga 11th Century …óuun fu…ó…ói noddowgoo Laamor…óe nden Kanem. E 12th Century boh Muhammad Al-Idris …óon yi'a manan dow gelle famarde …óe ngala maheele. E 13th Century boh hanko ibn Sa'id Almagribi yi'i Manan kanjee woonii caapiital Kanem ham…ìe woodi sembe Laamor…óe Jowldanku. 
Wakkacire Sayfanko'en (1085-1846).
Siraati'en Jowl…ìe Sayfanko'en tefii ardooki Kanem, diiga yim…ìe ful…ìe nduroo…ìe …ìe zaghawa edow luu…ìe ma…ì…ìe …óe korii…ìe gelle Bilma e mannda e 9th Century ko nden. 
Kaabiila'en diiga fombina maayo Chadii …ìe…óon ∆¥i'e Kafirun …ìe…óon soora…ìe dow fuushshi e bindigaaji e gelle zawiila. Adadow korii…ìe …ìen 1,000 e 7th Century yaarii 15th Century boh …ìe …ìeydake yaarii 5,000. Mai Hummai fu…ó…ói ardoogal hiitaade 1075 o lattake Jowl…óo boh gam moodibbo maako Muhammad b. mani jowl…óo, o hawti gelleeji kay, Tubu, Dabir be Magumi. Hanko'on woni laamii…óo jowl…óo aranndeejoo e kanem. 
Wakkacire Mai Dunama.
Hanko'on woni roonoow…óo Hummai hiitaade (1210-1259), hanko omti Laamor…óe Kanem nde yaaji masin, omti laawol woolduki be Sultan …ìe les…óe wayla Africa, o tefi dow …ìee omtaa njangirde al-Rashiq e Cairo gam kuugal hijjow. O omti hawree be kaabiila'en …ìadii…ìe e sooja'en yaarii 41,000, o yahii hijjow nde taty bako wartuki maako Aidab. O habdi be Bulala eder bal…óe jay…ói…ói (7), lewru jay…ói…ói (7), e dungu jay…ói…ói (7). O tiggi Gomnaajo e gelle Traghan. 
E 14th Century, Kanem hendake wurooji gamma hawreji/ka…ìe. Hawre be Sao fa…ó…ói laamii…ìe nayo (4); Selemma, Kure ghana es saghir, Kure Kura alkabir e Muhammad I fuu ma…ì…ìe …óuun …ìi…ì…ìe Abdullahi b. Kadai. 
Hawre be Bulala fa…ó…ói laamii…ìe nayo (4) hankowdee 1377 yaarii 1387, kam…ìe woni les; Daud Nigalemi, Uthman b. Dawud, Uthman b Idris be Abu Bakr Liyatu. Dungu 1387 Yim…ìe Bulala farti Mai Umar b. hoo∆¥i yim…ìe maako yaari…ìe Bornu(hirnaa maayo Chadii) diiga Kanembu o …óali Njimi. Dungu 1460 Ali Gazi habdi bo farti nga∆¥∆¥o ma…ì…ìe, tiggi gelle Ngazargamu(fellere hirnaa maayo Chadii kanjuum ∆¥i'ete Naajeeriya e jotta). E 16th Century Laam…óo Idris Katakarmabe habdi bo farti Bulala jabti gelle Njimi. Ali Gaji hanko'on woni laamii…óo aranndeejoo latti…óo Khaliofajo (Caliph). Bornu yaaji wakkacire laamii…óo Idris Alooma …ìuri hausanko'en e yim…ìe Ahir be Tuareg. 
Hankowdee 1574 yaarii 1583 Sultan Bornu hawti be Ottaman sultan Murad III be sultan morocco. ∆Åi Furtu …óon nodda Idris Alooma innde Aamiiril mu'uminin (ardee…óo muumini en)gam wadgo shari'a jowldanku. 
Sultan gelle Agadez ham…ìe jogii felle …óuun hoo∆¥ata Manda gam luumo …óe Bilma dungu 1750. Wakkacire 17th e 18th Century,Bornu lattake fellere njande islaama.
Wakkacire Jihaadi Ful…ìe.
Fullo Mujaddadijo Shehu Usman …ìi Fodio tefi nastowgo Borno, japti Ngazargamu. Hawre maako nawni…ìe masin saini o jabta Laamor…óe nden.
Shehuujo Borno.
∆Åawo hawreji saalake, Umar …ìii Muhammad hanko woni Shehuujo Borno o waddi laa…ìe ndongidirkii Laamor…óe nden kesuum, o waddi waziri'en ballitoo…ìe dow laamuki. Dungu 1893. Rabih az-Zubayr nasty Bornu be yim…ìe maako diiga fowna Lesdii Sudan o jabti Laamor…óe nden. O fa…ó…ói Shehu Ashimi, Shehu Kyari be Shehu Sanda Wuduroma. Towranko'en inni mo hanko woni Shehuujo Borno yaarii hiitaade 1900 wakkaci hawre kousserie …óon Faransanko'en fa…ó…ói mo. Faransanko'en tiggi Abubakar hanko woni Shehuujo Dikwa …ìawo …óon towranko'en foo…óimo o warti Shehuujo Borno. Shehu Garbai hanko tiggi Yerwa hitaande 1907. 
∆Åawo hawre downiyaaroow aranndeere, yim…ìe Deutsch-Bornu ham…ìe laamooto Bornu. Sanda Kura warti Shehuujo Borno …ìawo mayde baba maako hiitaade 1922, …ìawo …óon Sanda Kura Shehuujo Dikwa hanko warti Shehuujo Borno 1937. Hiitaade 1961 jogii…ìe Bornu shubty dow nastoky nder laamii…ìe Naajeeriya. Hande woni Laamor…óe Diiwal Borno e jotta (present years). 

Laamor…óe Diiwal Borno:
Borno Emirates (Laamor…óe Diiwal Borno).
∆äum Laamor…óe mau…óe e lesdii Naajeeriya wonde diiwal Borno, ronaade diiga Laamor…óe Kanem Bornu. ∆äun tiggi nde e 20th Century fuu laamii…ìe Laamor…óe nden e jooni …óun roonu…ìe laamii…ìe Laamor…óe Kanem Bornu duu…ìi ∆äu…ó…ói saalii…ói(ko …ìuri 1000). Kila Laamii…óo Laamor…óe nden fuu …óun …óon yi'a …óun innde Shehuujo Borno Shehu of Borno.
∆Åe…óon nga…óa fuu kuujeeji …ói laamii…ìe Kanem Bornu wa…óata, …ìe…óon njoo…ói e gelle Maiduguri Diiwal Borno …óon …ìe …óuu…ói, …ìegon bo bandiraa…ìe …ìe …óemngal kaanuuri yaarii miliyonji 4 e keddo'en.
Muhammad Al'amin al-Kanemi hanko'on woni Shehuujo Bornu aranndeejoo fartu…óo Safwanko'en diiga laamu o jabti Laamor…óe nden e 19th Century. 
Taarihi Laamor…óe nden.
Laamor…óe Bornu wonnataake (collapses) wakkacire Rabih Zubayr …ìi Fadlallah o jabti sembee ndin hoori…óum gelle Dikwa e hitaande 1893. Yim…ìe Faransanko'en (French) fa…ó…ói Rabih Zubayr on …ìe …ìili Sanda Kura warti Shehuujo Dikwa e hiitaade 1900. ∆Åawo …óon banndu maako Umar Abubakar Garbai hanko latti ardoo…óo Shehuujo Bornu. ∆Åawo …óon laamor…óe …óen latti …ói…ói, Shehuujo Dikwa e Shehuujo Borno.
Laamii…ìe Laamor…óe Nden.
Diiga 1902 yaarii 1922 (Umar Abubakar Garbai …ìi Ibrahim)
Diiga 1922 yaarii 1937 (Sanda Kura)
Diiga 1937 yaarii 1967 ( Umar …ìi Muhammad/Sanda Kyarimi)
Diiga 1968 1974 (Umar …ìi Abubakar Garbai)
Diiga 1974 yaarii 2009 (Mustapha …ìi Umar Kyari El-Kanemi)
Diiga 2009 yaarii jotta/jooni (present years) Abubakar …ìi Umar Garbai. 
Hukumaaje Pamaru Famaareeje saffo e joo'y (15) gon…óe les ardoogal Laamor…óe Diiwal Borno, kanjee woni les …óoo;.
Abadam
Chibok
Gubio
Guzamala

Muhammad Al'amin al-Kanemi:
Muhammad Al'amin al-Kanemi.
Shehuujo Al-hajj Muhammad Al'amin al-Kanemi lattake jagordo moodibbo boh gim…óo siyaasajo. Hanko'on woni Shehuujo Borno aranndeejoo, ∆äuun dan∆¥iimo hiitaade 1776 yaarii 1837 nder gordam maako. Hanko farti yim…ìe Safwanko'en boh o tiggi yim…ìe maako e Laamor…óe kanem Borno yaarii handemen. ∆Åinngel maako Umar latti…óo Shehuujo Borno hanko himmiti japtuki ardoogal gal diiga jow…óe Safwanko'en …ìawo …ìe laami Laamor…óe nden du…ìi 800 (800years).
Taarihi jabtowgo ardoogal laamuki.
Hanko Muhammad Al'amin al-Kanemi baba maako …óuun la∆¥ol Kanembu en, inna maako boh …óuun la∆¥ol Shuwa Arab en diiga gelle Murzuk(kanjee ∆¥i'e Libya e gotta). Yim…ìe Ful…ìe Mujaddadiijo Usmanu …ìi Fodio …ìe anniyyi nastowgo Borno …ìe njapta ardoogal gal hiitaade 1808 les laamu Dunama XI Lefiami(Mai borno). ∆Åe ke…ìii felle se…ó…óa, …ìe gowly(burnt) caapiital maako gelle Ngazargamu …ìe …ìuuri sembe maako. ∆äon o tefoo'yi ballitoo…ìe dow yim…ìe ful…ìe, o noddi Muhammad Al'amin al-Kanemi dow wallitamo hawree, hanko boh o noddoiy la∆¥ol ma…ì…ìe …ìe Kanembu e Shuwa Arab. ∆Åe nootaake moh …ìe japtii hawre nden boh. Laam…óo on (Dunama XI Lefiami) mo gelle Borno hokki Muhammad Al'amin al-Kanemi manngu hanko woni Shehuujo Borno, diiga nden o latti hanko woodi tokkoy…ìemo …óu…ì…ìe, e sembe bolwowo be Laamor…óe Sokoto nde ful…ìe mujaddadijo Shehu Usman …ìi Fodio. Kawuu Dunama XI Lefiami ittimo diiga laamuki dungu 1809, saini Muhammad Al'amin al-Kanemi wartini mo dow kujeerawal gal (mai of Borno) 1813. 
Reenuki yim…ìe maako diiga Sokkotan ko'en(Yim…ìe Sokoto).
Hawre maako be Laamor…óe ful…ìe nde diiwal Sokoto foowii masin, o…óon lildanay…ìe …óereeji dow hawre nden …ìawo habduki be bindigaaji. ∆Åe…óon nga…óa non tin laamu Shehu Usman …ìi Fodio har yaarii dow …ìinngel maako Muhammad Bello. Hanko al-Kanemi o…óon tefa hakki yim…ìe maako Keddu…ìe maako dow nastoiki ma…ì…ìe diiwal Borno latti…ìe Jowl…ìe yaarii duu…ìi 800. Haalaaji dow noh jihaadi ma…ì…ìe e ardoogal Jowl…ìe hanjum latti haalaji ko wolwete e jotta.
Laamu maako e Laamor…óe Bornu.
∆Åawo hawreji maako be yim…ìe Ful…ìe …ìe Sokoto o japtii ardoogal gal nden boh o sankitay laa…ìe ndongidirkii Laamor…óe nden …óuun Safwanko'en tiggi, o …ìili yim…ìe maako e korooje yim…ìe Safwanko'en …ìen …óun (Chima chidibe). Hanko bo mo innde Cohen yeddi dow tigguki ardoogal siyaasa hiitaale 19th(Century) dow bandiraaku …óuun wa…óete, o yeddi dow al-Kanemi tigga dow bandiraaku/em…óuuki bandowm. Hankowdee 1823 yaarii 1918 …óuun yinndi …óereeji dow joo…óaaki njam …ìuri temeere (100). Yim…ìe jeygo'o (6) daraake e …ìawo maako dow laamuki Borno, kam…ìe woni;
Al-Hajj Sudani(soobaajo baccaaku maako)
Al-Hajj Malia (Soobaajo luumo maako)
Mauniraawo kore maako ardoo…óo Kanenbu Kuburi e kanem dow hanko woni Shettima Kuburi, 
sai yim…ìe tato (3) diiga nder Shuwa Arab en, 
Mallam Muhammad Tirap(…ìi baghirimi)
Malam Ibrahim Wadaima (…ìi wadai)
Malam Ahmad (…ìi gonomi).
Diiga nden …óuun fu…ó…ói sekowgoo dow ko hanko al-Kanemi o …ìuri Dunama sembe e diiwal gal. Taarihi hollii al-Kanemi lattake Shehuujo Borno hiitaade 1810s waala kaa…ìay (fight/competition)bako 1820. al-Kanemi lattake …ìur…óo sembee faat har Dunama onma. Yim…ìe won…ìe …ìawo Dunama XI Lefiami, ∆¥ii kam…ìe yarii hawre (attack) dow al-Kanemi dow …ìe fa…ó…óamo e hiitaade 1820. 
Dunama be laam…óo Burgomanda …ìi baguirmi …ìe inni fartuki al-Kanemi be kawtal hoore e yim…ìe lesdii yaasi, saini …ìe ke…ìai nasaraaku dow non, …óuun lattini bamdow Dunama dow hanko wani mai(mai of Borno). Diiga nden boh al-Kanemi lattake Shehuujo Borno mo ardoogal …ìurngal. 
E hiitaade 1814, al-Kanemi mahii caapiital maako e gelle Kukawa …óon o nootooto innde Shehuujo Borno …ìurnaa…óo. Diiga hiitaade 1819-20 mai Dunama o nastiy hawreji/ka…ìe be al-Kanemi …ìawo …óon o fa…ó…óama(killed).
E nder hiitaale 1820s al-Kanemi fartii ful…ìe …ìe Sokoto diiga nden Bornu, o japtii gelle Deya-Damaturu won…óe junngo Laamor…óe kotoko ngoodu…ìe gelleeji; Kusseri, Ngulfai be logone …ìaawo duufuki yim…ìe bagirmi e dungu 1824. 
Yim…ìe Safwanko'en(sayfawa) warti dow laamu …ìawo maayuki al-Kanemi e dungu 1837. E hiitaade 1846 laam…óo (mai of Borno) omti hawree wondee, …ìi al-Kanemi Umar hanko woni fa…ó…óu…óo hiite hawre nden. Umar diiga …óon o latti ardoo…óo felle …óen …ìau…óo fa…ó…óu…óo kila hawreji/ka…ìe dow laamuki faat.
Major Dixon Denham noyii'ri al-Kanemi.
Hiitaade 1823, Dixon Denham be Hugh clappertor njottake diiwal Borno, …ìe ngiidi be al-Kanemi, …óon hanko Dixon Denham noyii'ri al-Kanemi haalaaji bel…ói …óu…ó…ói boh, kannji woni …óoo les; 
"Hanko al-Kanemi …óuun risku…óoo be gikkuuji bo…ó…ói …ói ardoogal, …óun adal…óin…óo bo, o woodi to…ó…óinaakiy dow ngonga, o manaa…óo dow salaaki japgo o latto Sultan"
~~ Dixon Denham 
Mayde maako (His Death).
Muhammad Al'amin al-Kanemi (Shehuujo Borno aranndeejoo) o maayi dungu 1837, …óuun wa…óa nii mo yanaade e gelle Kukawa, diiwal Borno e lesdii Naajeeriya. 

Oluseyi Abiodun Makinde:
Oluseyi Abiodun makinde ( Eriminmo 25 lewru Bowte duubi 1967) eii lysidi Naajeeriya loumou toe siyasa'en jornii eii gwamnajjo Diiwal Oyo gada 29 lewru Duujal duubi 2019.

Bajoga:
Bajoga 
∆äuun gelle hedkota hukuumare pamarde nde Fuunaka∆¥ee e diiwal Gombe ta wayla, lesdii Naajeeriya. Hankowdee gelle …óen …óon wodi wo…ó…óugo yaadu 9km e Ashaka (…óon kamfaniwa nnamoonga leddi warta siminti ko howrete e maheele downiyaaroow).¬† Alhaji Ibraahima Cheldu hanko'on woni jagordo shubtaa…óo ardii…óo hukumaare Pamarde Famaareere nde Funakaye e diiwal Gombe. Hanko boh Alhaji Yakubu Muhammad Kwairanga nnaya…ìo (4) e Laamu hanko woni laamii…óo hukuumare pamarde nde Fuunaka∆¥ee o ronii korowal gal diiga mauniiko (Alhaji Mu'azu Kwairanga) o maayi lewru Agustus hiitaade 2022. Lam…óo gelle Bajooga hanko ∆¥i'ete Abubakar Garba Muhammad. ∆äuun gelle Ful…ìe, fulfulde …óemngal woni …ìuurnaagal e gelle …óen, wodi ∆äengaal siraati'en (Kanuri), Bolawa. 
Njangir…óee hukuumare pamarde nde Fuunaka∆¥ee.

Yamaltu Deba:
Yamaltu Deba.
∆äuun gelle ∆¥i'ete Yaamaltuu Deeba e nder Diiwal Gombe ta shaka, nder lesdii Naajeeriya. ∆äuun Hukuumare pamarde e diiwal Gombe, Deeba …óon ∆¥i'e hedkota hukuumare nden. Yim…ìe Ful…ìe be Kaabiila'en …óemngal Tera ham…ìe …ìowri ∆äuu…óuki e gelle …óen. Alh Abubakar Ali hanko'owoni jagordo laamii…óo hukuumare pamarde nde Yaamaltuu Deeba, Q S Usmanu bo hanko woni laamii…óo gelle Deeba. Hanko boh Alhaji Shuaibu Umaru Galaadiima (Walin Deeba) hanko'on woni jagordo shubtaa…óo ardotoo…óo hukuumare pamarde nde Yaamaltuu Deeba. Jowl…ìe ham…ìe woni …ìuurnaa…ìe e gelle …óen, maayo gelle dadin kowa …óon waali ta gelle Deeba …óen e adadow 1,981km2. ∆Åegon adadow yim…ìe 255,248 e hiitaade 2006 wakkaci …óuun hawti adadow yim…ìe lesdii Naajeeriya. 
Njangir…óe e Yaamaltuu Deeba.
∆Åegon njangir…óe …óuu…ó…óe …óe fu…ó…óuki njande, shaakare e mau…óe fuu, kanje woni les …óoo;

Alkaleri:
Alkaleri.
∆äuun gelle nder Diiwal Bauchi e lesdii Naajeeriya, …óuun Hukuumare pamarde e diiwal Bauchi ta wayla. Gelle …óen woodi yim…ìe adadow 329,424(e habaru dungu 2006 wakkacire …óuun wa…ói limngal yim…ìe lesdii Naajeeriya/census). Gelle …óen woodi njayri adadow 5,918km2, nden boh …óe gon nambaaji limngal gelleeji 743(postal code). 
∆äuun gelle Ful…ìe …ìe fulfulde, woodi siraati'en/ Kanuri, woodi Duguraawa, woodi Guruntaawa be kaabiila'en Labur(∆¥im…ìe jaku) fuu. 
Gelle Alkaleri won gelle e les maare, woodi Pali, Duguri be Gwana. Pali woodi nguron pamaaron ba Fanti, Gar, Gokaru, Guma be Gwaram. Duguri bo won Yankari, Badara, Dagudi, Dan, Gajin Duguri, Mainamaji, Yashi be Yelwan Duguri. Gwana bo …óon ta fombina gelle Alkaleri.

Kumo:
Kumo.
Gelle Kumo …óuun mau…óe lattide hedkota hukuumare pamarde nde Akko e diiwal Gombe. Nde lattake gelle …ói…óawre …ìaawo gelle Gombe e hoje wadgo luumo/luu…ìe. ∆äuun …óon wa…óa luumo dabbaajii pamarji e mau…ói, woodi luumo kareejii ∆≥amduu fuu(Masardi,muuri, biriiji,∆¥ebbe fuu). Yim…ìe Ful…ìe …ìe fulfulde ham…ìe ∆¥iite …ìuri …óuu…óugo sey boh Tangalee en be Hausanko'en(Hausa people). ∆äuun …óon wa…óa yaadu 40km hankowdee gelle Gombe e gelle Kumo. ∆Åegon laawol tokkugol nder gelle Gombe e Billiri.
Yim…ìe anndaa…ìe mau…ìe e gelle Kumo.

E lewru Agustus hiitaade 2022 jagor…óo lesdii Naajeeriya Muhammadu Buhari omti laa…ìe mahaa…óe …óe adadow 66km kawtu…óe diiwal Gombe, Taraba be Adamawa gam hoygo jahaale e luu…ìe fuu.

Janngirde mawde gollital Abdu Gusau:
Janngirde Abdu Gusau Gusau un janngirde gollital diiwal hukuma jottoriide n…óer Talata marafa, diiwal Zamfara, Naajeeriya.
√ëawnuu…óun tiggi fannuwal,tiggu…óo taarihi nde gollital un tiggaangal n…óer 1992 …ìaawo nde Gomnaajo diiwal Sakwotobe kii…óo, Yahaya Abdulkarim wanni junngo e dow he…ìaango janngirde maude gollital diiwal nder Talata marafa.
