Yim…ìe Irigwe:
Yim…ìe Irigwe (rigwe neIrigwe; Hawsare miyango) bedon he…ìabe haa fellel fetel annadi bassa je nukkuure Pilato, middle belt (caaka) Naajeeriya. Bedon bolwa be …óemngal rigwe (shima nkorigwe), …óemngal filato‚Äôon. Mangaman biro konjim wuro miango, hirna be wuro mango wuro manjos.
Besendindiri.
Irigwe Yim…ìe be he…ìata haa bassa, jos haa waila be jos fommbina fetel-fetel annaji je nukkuure filato be haa kawru fetel je fommbina nukkuure Kaduna, Naajeeriya.
Al‚Äôadaji/Biiruki Ma…ì…ìe
Womugo.
Nobe womurtaje Irigwe, derkr‚Äôen remobe Irigwe koburi dudugo bedon diiwa gam sen biddigo napuda demri haa derbarle o hawtibe demri reemugo luttano kawtal ma…ì…ìe kude be koutal andibe bana kiila, pidobe, sebobe ledde kanbe ma belwodi nobe fiyata baude ma…ì…ìe.bodde.
Non non bo pidobe donwawa bonnigo dimbigo dabbaji doulawul al‚Äôadaji wodon von‚Äôina dabbaji ladde be asuttini hulgo.
Teegal.
Sangree (1969) obindi:.
‚Äúnobe watta teegal man je Irigwe hakobe jaabimo koyidi obangal robe be war…ìe ro…ìe …óu…ó…óum haa wakkere fere-fere haa yake yayi ma…ì…ìe jey maw…ìe o hadi sirgal kotai. O hokki habr patrivirilocal obibi denbo onatihi dadirabe bukkwai je debbo danyi be goriko debbe Jodi be goriko hareeji. Gam man robe don wailiti hala ya hango warbe …óudbe jutal balde ma…ì…ìe senibe danyi beden yaare bone wakkati-wakkati yahugo lewru feere je children dependentan bukkwai maisata be ma…ì…ìe.kawtal tsafa morgo belu, houtibe befat mobbe robeje linyol.
Behakki yenigo Yim…ìe kududi Irigwe beden tokka dina jananbe dergebe 620% je dudugo ummatre, 28.0% tokkobe di na kirista‚Äôen (bedi be hore ma…ì…ìe 55.0% furotesta 25.0% be roman katolika 20.0% yake tokkobe dina islama bedon mari gebe 10.0% dudugo ummatore.
Laamu.
Haa al‚Äôadaji ma…ì…ìe, ma…ì…ìe, Irigwe wakkere mon hore ma…ì…ìe bedon sendindiri mowala jargwardo je siyasa gonde beedorde beburi maanugo dou al‚Äôadaji ma…ì…ìe beboyi hokkugo dottien kiristoci mo wakkere‚Äôen lenyol man be dudugo konbe don hakkilana al‚Äôadaji mabba ‚ÄúDumburi nibe‚Äù be nodum dillindiri gam jon de jam Yim…ìe be lenyol.
Diina.
Behokki yenigo Yim…ìe kududi Irigwe bedon tokka diina lenyol dergebe 62.0% mo dudugo ummatore, 28.0% tokkobe diina kirista‚Äôe (be Jodi be hore ma…ì…ìe 55.0% furostesta 25.0% be roman katolika 20.0%) yake tokkobe dina islama be dergebe 10.0% je dudugo jamaje.

Yim…ìe Isoko:
Yim…ìe Isoko hawta‚Äôen gam golle bedonjodi haa wakkere isoko je nukkuure delta. Be bayelsa gam Naajeeriya.
Yim…ìe ma…ì…ìe‚Äôon haa nukkuure fanbina Naajeeriya kombi waila waladu hirna niger delta. Nukkuure delta be bayelsa je der nukkuure 36 mo kawtal Naajeeriya.
Demngal.
Yim…ìe isoko bedon bolwa be dingal isoko, nadi be dingal man sosaai be dingal urhobo, dingal epie-atissa, dingal/engenni james w.welch otabitini be biyugo dingal isoko mo je dingal urhobo, be Yim…ìe dudbe be sendigo ko‚Äôonumi.
Al‚Äôada isoko wodon wandi be al‚Äôadaji dude haa nukkuure neja-delta je houtibe, urhobo, ijow bw anioma. Urhobo bedon hawtindiri be dingal be al‚Äôadaji ma…ì…ìe,nodun fuddi danyigo fitina man halawuindebe kawtal al‚Äôadaji ma…ì…ìe urhobo be isoko haa dared sobo. Fat lenyol ma…ì…ìe be saali inde man.

Yim…ìe Olukumi:
Yim…ìe olukumi tokkere‚Äôen je Yoruba je wakkere Aniochaa mo waila haa nukkuure Delta, Naajeeriya. Olukiwumi be mai sibe ummatore jetati hirma mayo neja, be hande be audibe bedon wondi derdi rabe odina haliddi anioma. Hader tarihaa ma…ì…ìe, odianis kambe on bandirabe yarbanke‚Äôen haa wakkere al‚Äôadaji ma…ì…ìe anioma. Wuro‚Äôen ukwu Nzu (ECO EFUN) kanjumo‚Äôon hedikwata tarihaje Yim…ìe olukwami denbo haa al‚Äôadaji obi mo UKWU NZU, Agbogidi kanko‚Äôon ardibe haa nowoni jotta obi konko‚Äôon HRM obi ogoh 1. Kawyeji olukwumi bedon aradibobe be pondi nobe subata okpala obi, de kanko‚Äôon okpala (gerontocracry) je Yoruba.odianias hande bedon larabe igbos hader nukkuure delta, don hawti be ezechime nodun wadi derdi derdi rabe idumuje. Yim…ìe aniochaa (enuani be olukwumi, ndokwo (ukwuani), ika, be oshimili je nukkuure delta.
Dume Habar Tesde.
Olukwumi asili ma…ì…ìe haa wakkere hirna puuna mayo nejo haa nyamo. Wakkere‚Äôen ma…ì…ìe man be wodi fetel siiga alli be koolin jeberburi andigo be ‚ÄúNZE‚Äù haa dingal Yoruba, nowoni be al;adaji Yim…ìe wakkere man debe wasatadun bedon kutundira be man gam al‚Äôadaji fere-fere.
Biidi.
Bigo olikwumi fere daubiya bedon numa ‚Äúsabojo‚Äôam‚Äù nanon ‚Äúsabajo‚Äùam‚Äù haa dingal Yoruba.
Taariihawol.
Hawtigo be al‚Äôadaji hondiko je olukwumi, olukwumi dum hawti hondiko je olukwumi, olukwumi dum hawti be oran asili ibo be cedol dago owo,akure ko tai akoko haatibe wuro man olukwumi bedon bolwa domon. 
Gam hawtigo yesu be badigo kawye ma…ì…ìe hawtande be bulwobe be Enuani, hande bedon bowa be dingal olukwumi be mo Enuani je bolle igbo. Nonno bo be don sembina du‚Äôaji be du‚Äôaji hader dingal ma…ì…ìe je asili‚Äôen, yake bedon hafda todigo gam bolwugo be dingal man dabukkwai ma…ì…ìe be denbe ummatore ma…ì…ìe fat.
Dergure ma…ì…ìe deiwoni dir lanyol ma…ì…ìe odiani, ugbadu be ukwu-nzu‚Äôen kanko‚Äôon tan donbolwa be dingal didi be luttube‚Äôon bolwa be dingal enuani. Haa biigo yenande naage 24 october hitande 2010, bedon taska jangitiko be hula hondiko be gasa haa olukwumi gam feddigo dingal. Andibe andal demde kambe bedon mofta bolle demde.
Jutugo dubi 40 chief GB nkemnacho, lauya fere daga asili olukwumi obindi tahiri Yim…ìe mako banana dotti‚Äôen bi‚Äôe ha‚Äôder kujeni saawi jatal baide be al‚Äôadaji hondiko.

Yande Julde:
Yande belbeltigo julbe je dumdum wada jedidi de hitande yalti. Julde gebe didi, wodi julde manga be julde fetel. Kanjim‚Äôon julde fetel bedon sikul, bawo tinmingo sumai, haa lewrusumai denbo bulbe don hirsa gertode be bedon yilla bandirabe.
Julde manga bedon sikulinidum bawo balde caffan enayi dag‚Äôen tinmingo sumai je le uru sumay Ramadan handiman fottibe lewru saffoi didi je lewu lailaji.
Tariha/Taariihawol.
Kanjim‚Äôon dulde fete bedon wada bawo tin mingo sumayhaa lewru sumai Ramadan, tube lari lewru haa jamma nogas ejenai ko caffan etati pina fajiri be jullar sumai kanjim dulde laihaji bede saffo. Wato saffo lewru, baala, beebe, dammiri, nagge, be geloba.
Yande julde sumai wato julde sumay.
Be fajri bawo tolgo ko‚Äôe komai yiwan borna limes kesum, yahajulurde gam julugo salli kere. Sebo dadirabe robe bede pan je juldar. Jebe yaamata haa sare sendana derdirabe be wurabe. Yande julde komoi don heba konyamata yaaloma‚Äôon je fere julbe allafu.
Julde Mannga.
Yande julde manga/julde lailaji.
Yande julde be fajri komoi don borba boddum, donburi digo lumse dane jum mu Allah hokki amma bo awawan a borna lumse ko‚Äôayide na‚Äôayibe‚Äôon amma towodi hirsata beyedi gaddo nanga hondikoma setagwaddo warti haa sallakere bawo liman manga hirsi jaudiri mako todum warti dum warti julurde mumanri jaudiri sai hirsa. Haa liddi haasa‚Äôen yande bebilal jaudiri sai pina fajiri behawa kanko‚Äôon tekki man bebon‚Äôene dum habesa‚Äôadum komai metta.
Piina fajiri be jiffinan jaudiri man jebiti haa beta‚Äôe dindira be hokka bukkwai be sendara keddu‚Äôen be derdirabe.
Lottano kuselman be depan habeas‚Äôal haa besendana Yim…ìe saare komo hosa jemun. Hore be koste jaudiri beporna haa beresa bawo balde sedde bedeffa bin yaama.
Fere don jug‚Äôena sai yake takuta haa kanjim‚Äôon al‚Äôadaji Hawsare‚Äôen.

Yande Arfa:
Yande arfa shutare‚Äôon je julbe je jiffi yande jenai haa lewru zulhijjah je calander julbe je lewru. Yande haa kalada julbe (the night of power) yaloma didi be hajji. Be yande haa arande daga hader maude julbe shutare je Eid al-Adua be fewul fajri yande man, jijjobe julbe be yahani yadu daga mina beyan hook koseje fere be balbal bedon yaunadum haire arfat be je balbal arfat daga fellel man annabijo MUHAMMAD (S.W.A.) o wa‚Äôazi je ragare haa hitande ragare je jutal balde mako. Feere julbe be don joggi be bigo wakkere ayore alkur‚Äôan, debeyeni bigo dina islama dum timmi dum bange haa naage dum.
Babal.
Haire arfat haa hairetondire wodi dared bana kilomita 20 (12 ml) punbina waladupuna kakka haa babal arfat. Haire arfat yaari kombi 70 metres (230 ft) haa dared be bee andimo ‚Äúhaire rahama‚Äù (jabal ar-rahma). Hawtigobe al‚Äôadaji‚Äôen dina islama, todire konko‚Äôon fellel be annajo dina islama MUHAMMAD (S.W.S) odari oyattini be wa‚Äôazibe bejabbotire ga julbe be bedo timo kugal hijju haa yahugo ragare mako.
Al‚Äôadaji/Biiruki.
Haa yande lewru al‚Äôhjja bakko jura hijjobe beyotti arfat wodi babal bodai jemari 20 kilometres (12 ml) puna makka, habedari be anniya; bedon wada du‚Äôaji tubugo be hakkeji kusali, be dabbitigo rahma domirawo, bedon wa‚Äôaza konbi haire arfat. Beden wada daga caaka nage haa mutigo naage, kanjin‚Äôon be andibe dargo haa yesu jumirawo (wuque), gotel derkude jijju. Haa namrah julurde hijjobe don jula jura (Dhohr) julugo daabe caaka naage bedon laara hijjun man naafaye tobbe yam naayi be arfat be naage.
Du'a Arafat.
Yaake be husayn bn Ali wajangata du‚Äôa yake kude hijju haa haire Arafat haa yande 9 je lewru zul-hijja, julbe hyake ku hijju bedon janga du‚Äôa‚ÄôI Arafat daga juli jura yahago mutuga naage. Bedon ‚Äòyauna naage dum, haa naage d‚Äôa‚ÄôI jefere Yim…ìe bedon daari haa haire arfat. Haa naage arfat Yim…ìe belwawata yahugo makka beyahaw fellel labdum ba julurde gam hangir go julugo arfat.
Sumoy Yande Arafat.
Sumugo yande arfat Yim…ìe behai hijju sumungo yande arfat Yim…ìe behai hijju sunna‚Äôen jebe dauri maari barjari duddum Allah don yaafa hake dubi didi. Bijoboyi daga Abu Qatadah be emi annabi jo MUHAAMAD (S.W.A) hawtande be su mai yande arfat sai onotibe biyogo: ‚Äú wodon fadda aje dubi kosali be be wari‚Äù. Imam An-nawawi obiyi der dettere mako al-mamajmu‚ÄôI hawtande be bolde kowadi dou mako, iman As-shafi‚ÄôI be sahabo mako bebiyi mustahabbi‚Äôen be sumugo naaga arfat. Muwala der arfat. Amma hijjowo muwani haa arfat, imam Ashafi‚ÄôI der deftere mako Al-mukhtasar be tokkobe mo be yacci bigo (mustahabetabe sumai). Hadigo jijjobe sumai der balde dum tahma manga haa ma…ì…ìe, su mai hajjiwo bone. Gam Annabijo MUHAMMAD (S.W.A) WA SUMAI YAKE WODARI HAA YESUJU MIRAWO WADON WADOn wada du‚Äôaji arfat. Haa wakkere fere Yim…ìe behijjata bewawan sumugo ga hebugo barka woni der naage man.

Yim…ìe Nanumba:
Yim…ìe nanumba lenyol man be liddi ma…ì…ìe je al‚Äôadaji je wani haa punbina waladu puna wakkere waila liddi Ghana. Bedon naana, nanugli (var.nanuni), dingal gur.
Haabaru Liddi.
Yahugo dubi je 200, be pondi dudugo Yim…ìe nanunba haa liddi haa 78,812. Kodejin woni nanumaba kawtal gote je al‚Äôadaji be dingal gotel, bewodi gondal be dagamba haa waila be puna be mamprusi hawaila, be koburi be mossi je Burkina faso haa al‚Äôadaji‚Äôen mama‚Äôen je aronde maude-maude man laabi naayebe derdir abe tati, be maude mossi bewurtoyi daga lawul mamerusi. Kujeji jebe taffi hawtibe lekki be man jebe bangini jebolwa be be mamerus: ti nmampurisi, yooba, naanumma ni mossi piiligu nye la kyama maa ‚Äúasilimen mamprusi dagomba, be nanumba depu hader chama‚Äù.
Ti zaa nye la yimmu‚Äù enfat men gotel. (mamprusi, dagomba, namumba) be bedon daurindira (passim).
Wuro mango je nanumba kanjim bimbilla, wuro fetel muhuwata haa dared bernuwul mango gunduma‚Äôen nanumba je waila haa waila Ghana. Haa jotta bo, bernuwul manga nukkuure nanumba‚Äôen fellel jojigo lamdo nanumba, bimbilla naa.
Annaji.
Darnde jeburi maunugo haa deryadu lamu je gargajiya jebe bolwata daman hader English hader ‚Äúparamount chief‚Äù koogo yakee fere ‚Äúlambdo‚Äù kanjim‚Äôon kotuman beddigo kiita je ragare man gam fitnaji wala lawal feere be jeselihabbre. Hala maubbe hakimaijo saawi lwnyol. Hader doo dared bimbilla naa be korawal ma ko haa bimbilla konko‚Äôon maudo hakimi‚Äôen lenyol namumba. Haa al‚Äôadaji hakimi maudo mampurugu (Na yiri) bewoni maube hakima‚Äôen haa mampurugu hader (younger brother and grand dauther‚Äô amma dubi duddube be panni mo be nayiri gam be kujeji kese be nodon pottini bo binya hidayi gam potting man. Nanumba je gondal badidum haa hakkunde ma…ì…ìe be dagomba, amma be maudo kawtan be mai sayibe be gotel.
Haa Ghana jezaman wodi majalisa be lambe haa sungulla gargajiya woni be babl be daurata haa dared liddi.
Diina.
Diina islama kanjim‚Äôon diina nanumba be dagambo be jebeburi andigo be tagali wato‚Äôon nunumba je yottayi je dagomba be biiga Yim…ìe be boi bedon e‚Äôyamta larobe kanbena julbe bedon hoka sadaka ke mama‚Äôyan be lottide fellel judigo.
Woni kirita‚Äôen sedda koburin Yim…ìe katolika je roman katolika.
Bangal.
Bawo banlle je islama jebe didi eid al-fitr be eid al-adha, nanumba je bamgal bugum chugu, damba be naa jigli.

∆äenmgal Ijaw:
∆äenmgal Ijaw deefu bedon burtina bolde ijo, bolle be Yim…ìe ijaw bedon naapira be man haa punbina Naajeeriya.
Dumsendindiri.
Haa al‚Äôadaji man bedon hoosa bolliijaw lisal feere‚Äôon haa linyol niger congo (betammi oburti haa linyol feere kawtal jebe yaunata ijoid). Be andibe hawtande be didi bolle ma…ì…ìe je bigo-honde-kude kanjim‚Äôon sinanon wala fasali kesum haa niger-congo, sendigo tan be irniman lishe haa dared mande be dogon. Bana mande be dogon, ijoid wala nadigo be fuddigo inde jebe lurata gikko je irinje niger-congo. Kanjim‚Äôon waadi joseph Greenberg haader ko‚Äôo didi je arande je niger-congo obangini be bigo bedendiri lou daga‚Äôen linyol ma. Nodum wooni, gam sonde kujejido, ammari andal dingal gerrit dimmen daal, wodon sekka watugobe haader niger congo, gbo wodon hoosa bolle ijoid, haa dared linyol jonde hoore mako.
Bedo sendindirgo je der otiina be jene wari (1989) be Williamson & blench (2000).
Innde Bee Fellel.
Hales woodi tokkindirde inde dingal ijaw, dudugo Yim…ìe be fella daga don blench (2019).
Berbice creole dutch, wolde boima be bedon hutindira haa Guyana owodi kamus je otihaa be woldee ijo teema owodi hawtal bekalabari (kouwenberg 1994)andal bee burde haabaruji haa lewru yuni 2013, be tongi be deffere ikkitigo jangogu izonfie be bedu CD hafere bangal debe yehi jam‚Äôa gwamnati nukkute bayelsa. Jami‚Äôa niger-delta je hafdigo yajingo tokkindirde defte be kobe nebata haa woldee ijo. Famtigo giimal be iyaunigo mayo nunbe Gabriel okora nodum ilata.

Yim…ìe Gwandara:
Yim…ìe Gwandara']' je gotel der lenyol Naajeeriya. Bedon der feere nukkuure je Abuja, nasarawa, kano, niger bee kaduna.
Asliji.
Lenyol gwandara behebi asilima daga kano, kanbe‚Äôon iyaaluuji barbushe be je Yim…ìe lari asali ma…ì…ìe bana Yim…ìe kano, bakko bagauda. Haa hitaande 1476 be‚Äôeggi dagadon kano, hales jagwardo yarima karshi (gwandara) gam doggugo zambugo diina je wartigo juldo. Yarima gwandara minyi rawo lamdo mulamata mu yardi bee nastingo diina islama haa kita haa kano, ohabbi anniya sottingo kala dabi‚Äôa maguzawa ma…ì…ìe‚Äôen. Fuube non, derdiko wadi anniya wotakko diina le mama‚Äôen mako kanjim‚Äôon biligo hakkilo, imani je diina mohakkata mangogam dabbaji haa derde marbe daude je belu.
Be de‚Äôe hushitini hulnego ko owartijuldo kobou haa beljegganabe, kanko be tokkobe mo be eggi yahugo yeso be satingo daga lamdo lomowo oyaribe jukun haa zaman saffoi jedidi be soffoi jetati haa ragere man habesankiti yahugo wakkereji man be dudbe je Najeeriya.
Yim…ìe Gwandara Je Karshi.
Yim…ìe gwandara je karshi kanbe‚Äôon be buri wawugo be buri komoi andigo lenyol gwandara haa Naajeeriya. Kanko‚Äôon wuro onje arande be hawtigo Naajeeriya oyarda ni mo. Wuro‚Äôon je arande be hebi lamdo gwandara, Alhaji sani Mohammed-bako.
Der Yim…ìe andabe gwandara woodi sara una je gwandara umaru tanko al-makura, senator mo hakkilta man nasarawa je ponbina kadibo gwamna nukkuure nasarawa mu‚Äôindemako sardauna gwandara deepu haa yande 27 haa lewru maris, 2021 woodi andado gwandara konko‚Äôon Muhammad danladi yakubu, kiddum ballitiwo gwamna je nukkuure filato.
Fiilu.
Ummatore gwandara beburi remugo be pidigo be fiilu be fiiluji amma wargo andal hirna dunya, Yim…ìe be dudbe be acci fiilu man gam kugal hipinere danijum.
Demngal.
Yim…ìe gwandara bedon bolwa dingal Hawsare gwandara. Dingal donbadi be dingal Hawsarere amma wala nobe yirgindirita be dingal ara bre je bewo-bewo dum.
Durbar.
Ba‚Äôugo durbar koo bandal durbar feere bangal kiddum je al‚Äôadaji jebe wadata haa hitaande-hitaande na feere der nukkuje Naajeeriya. Bangal do je hollingo seyo yahugo radere lauru Ramadan be limmingo bangal julde man be julde manga. Bedon pudda balga durbar be julde salli kere hafajri yande mon deenbo sailambo burta be bag‚Äôobe fucci be bambe be doffobe beburti bedon tokkindiri beden sammna fucci. Deenbo sai waziri‚Äôen be be luttibe Yim…ìe fadaman be burti bedon homna lamdo bedon bedon lina dande haa lamurtde ma…ì…ìe.
Asiili bangal durbur ofuddi haa zaman soffoi nayi 14, haa kano wuro mango waila Naajeeriya.
Beburi andigo bangal hagure maude jetta usa‚Äôen bana kano, sakkwato, zariya, katsina be bida deenba don dasa hokkilo wancobe. Mabbitabe gite.
Taarihawol Durbar.
Nasarawa lami moral debe waddi bangal durbur haa Naajeeriya. Asili durbur wari‚Äôon daga dingal farisa dagadon banle seyobe bawogo bawa ma…ì…ìe gam queen victoria hadarde queen india je indiya bawo nastigo nasara‚Äôen je birtaniya liddi je india haa hitaande 1877.
Be fuddi bangal durbar je arande haa Naajeeriyande hitaande 1911, bawo bangat man oyehi yeso haa dubi 1924, 1925,1948,1960, be 1972.
Bangal man yehi yeso liddi har wargo ben jotta deenbu donder koburi jamming bamle haa wailw Naajeeriya.
Bawo Hebigo Hoore.
Betimmini bangal durbur haa kawtal 2nd world block and African festival of arts and culture jebeburi andigo be bangal FESTAC 77. Haa hakkilo nasara‚Äôen be nasti nibe yidigo bangal man je durbur gam be beddani soja‚Äôen ba‚Äôugo fucci be faunigo julde.

Okon Efreti Abang:
Okon Efreti Abang (duggu 10 Janaayo, 1961) O woni o Oron e o jeyaa…óo to Fedde Fedde ∆Åurnde Fedde e Abuja.
Firo.
O jibinaa e 10 lewru lewru lewru jeenuru 1961 e Oduo-Ebughu Mbo LGA. O yahi Central School Ebughu Mbo L.G.A.(Diiwal Akwa Ibom),(January 1968 - June 1973) nden, St.Vincents Secondary School Oti Oron, Oron L.G.A (Diiwal Akwa Ibom)

∆äemngal Abanyom:
Abanyom, ko Bakor, ko …óemngal Ekoid nder Niger - Congo. Yim…ìe Abanyom e nder leydi Cross River nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Yim…ìe Abanyom nder bantoid…ìe worgo, Abanyom e …óem…óe Bantu. ∆äemngal ngal ina woodi tonal e woodi …óemngal Niger - Congo.
Abanyom woni kadi clan/Ward nder Ikom. ∆äum hawti e ummaatooje …óe …óo: Edor, Abangork, Akumabal, Abinti, Nkim, Nkum, Nkarassi 11, Nkarassi 1, Abankang, Etikpe, e Nkonfap. Abankang noddiraa bana inna Abanyom.

Abayi Okoroato:
Abayi Okoroato …óon joo…óori nder Obingwa, Abia diiwal, lesdi lesdi Naajeeriya.

Adeyemi Abayomi:
Adeyemi Abayomi Isaac (21 Epril 1947 - 2021) ko boxer Naajeeriya. O hawri e nder ja≈ãde …ìeydaare wor…ìe e juulde 1972 Summer Olympics.

Emmanuel Abayomi:
Emmanuel Abayomi ko jannginoowo Naajeeriya mo anndini nder suudu fedde, haematology, Biosecurity e biobanking. Abayomi …óo …óo …óo …óo …óo o gollaama dow laamorde Lagos ngam hakkilantaaku. O …óon joo…óii e fedde Naajeeriya ngam ku…óol bolle nder Lagos nde o laamaama laamorde ngam laamorde Babajide Sanwo-Olu e hitaande 2019.
Hooreejo-leydi Muhammadu Buhari hokki Prof. Akin Abayomi jaajol National Productivity Order of Merit (NPOM) ngam anndugo kuugal maako e …ìeydaaku, musamman nder ha…ìugo bee COVID-19 nder Diiwal Lagos. 

Muhammad Mustapha Abdallah:
Muhammad Mustapha Abdallah (dugumi 13 Noofambar 1954) ko Kolonel lesdi Naajeeriya mo o mari hayru, o jeyaa…óo hooreejo National Drug Law Enforcement Agency, mo hooreejo lesdi Muhammadu Buhari su…ìii dow 11 lewru Janaayo 2016.

Abdulkadir Abdulsalam:
Abdulkadir Abdulsalam ko politikal lesdi Naajeeriya, mo laati hooreejo lesdi Naajeeriya.
Abdulsalam maayi nder Abuja ha 29 Desemba 2020

Ahmed Aboki Abdullahi:
Ahmed Aboki Abdullahi ko Brigadier General mo o yahri to leydi Naajeeriya. Ko o lafti Kolonel, o woni Ministaar haalde Naajeeriya, nokku o he…ìii no o lafti gardii…óo nder gardii…óo signalji. O wonii haa wakkati gooto gardii…óo gardii…óo. O wonii o jeyaa e gollaade gollaade wuro wuro Jeneraal Sani Abacha e hitaande 1993.

Aliyu Sabi Abdullahi:
Aliyu Sabi Abdullahi CON (anndiraa 10 lewru janngo 1967) woni siyaasajo lesdi Naajeeriya, e senatoowo wakiilo senatoore Niger North Senatorial District of Niger State to 8th National Assembly of Nigeria e 9th National Assembly. O woni maw…óo maw…óo whip to 9th National Assembly of Naajeeriya.
Siyasajju.
Aliyu Sabi Abdullahi CON eriminmo 10 Janairu mongou 1967 eii lysidi siyasa,en lysidi Naajeeriya Sabi eii Sannatajjo nder Niger woila toe Dan Majalisajjo gada 2017 toe 2019 jornii eii ministajjo Agriculture.

Nana Aisha Abdullahi:
Nana Aisha Abdullahi (c. 1960 ‚Åá 5 mars 2014) ko laam…óo leydi Naajeeriya e jaajotoo…óo. E hitaande 2010, Abdullahi laatii laam…óo debbo arandeejo suudu mawndu leydi Jigawa. (Jigawa ko leydi to woyla Naajeeriya.)
Abdullahi wa…ói hooreejo laam…óo leydi, laam…óo leydi e laam…óo leydi haa hitaande 2000 haa hitaande 2005.O laam…óo to suudu kiita mawngo e hitaande 2010, o laam…óo debbo arande to suudu kiita mawngo e nder Jigawa.[1 O wa…ói golle haa o maayi e hitaande 2014.
Laamii…óo Nana Abdullahi maayi ngam nyau nder suudu ndun haa Dutse, Jigawa, Naajeeriya, ha 5 Maars 2014, ha duu…ìi 54. O maayi e gorko maako, Abubakar, mo jokkondiri e Dutse campus National Open University of Nigeria.

Saminu Abdullahi:
Saminu Kwari Abdullahi (dimaa 3 lewru janngo 2001) ko jokkitoowo leydi Naajeeriya mo o jogii e nder wuro russi FC Veles Moscow.
Kuugal gollal.
O wa…ói gollal makko fu…ó…óam nder Russian Football National League for FC Veles Moscow on 31 July 2021 nder fijirde e FC Tom Tomsk

Aisha Abubakar Abdulwahab:
Dr. Aisha Abubakar Abdulwahab (dodude c.1971) o polis…óo Nigeria mo he…ìii haykaliiru UNESCO ngam janngude tuberculosis.
∆Åi…ó…óo e janngirde.
Aisha Abubakar Abdulwahab jibinaa nder c.1971 o hawti e polisol Nigeria nder 1995. O mari digirii nder ilmu dabbaaji e doktoor.

Khairat Gwadabe:
Khairat Abdulrazaq-Gwadabe (d. 1957) ko laamorinkeejum lesdi Naajeeriya. O su…ìi senatoore ngam senatoore Abuja Federal Capital Territory, Najeeriya e fu…ó…óam leydi Najeeriya, o …óon ja…ì…ìa dow fannu yim…ìe (PDP). O wa…ói laamu diga lewru Duujal 1999 haa lewru Duujal 2003.
Abdulrazaq-Gwadabe woni debbo gomnaajo AbdulRahman AbdulRazaq e debbo Kolonel Lawan Gwadabe, gomnaaru konu Niger. O jibini e Ilorin e lewru Awril 1957. O janngini jaango e jaangirde Buckingham. Caggal nde o jokki joo…óorde mum to Senate o su…ìii nder ku…ìaaji dow kootoonde, ja≈ãde, rew…ìe (jo hooreejo), laamorde fedde, turturis & aada e laamorde fedde fedde.

Polytechnic Diiwal Abia:
Polytechnic Diiwal Abia ko Polytechnic dowla dowla mo laatii nder hitaande 1992 e nder Aba, Diiwal Abia, Naajeeriya. Polytechnic ina hawta e janngooji feere feere, bana School of Science & Engineering e School of Business Administration.
Lannde ndee ko le…ó…óe jaale e le…ó…óe ndun. Rector arande onukaogu Abalogun A.

Janngirde Diiwal Abia:
Janngirde Diiwal Abia Uturu (ABSU) ko janngirde lesdi Naajeeriya. ∆äum wondi go'o janngirde lesdi nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Abubakar Tafawa Balewa Stadium:
Abubarkar Tafawa Balewa Stadium ko nokkuure feere feere nder wuro Bauchi, lesdi Naajeeriya. Ha jooni …óum naftiraama e nder juulde football e …óum woni nokkuure nde Wikki Tourists.
Abubarkar Tafawa Balewa Stadium wondi go'o nder nokkuuje 8 huutoreede ngam FIFA World Cup 2009 U-17 ha nder lesdi Naajeeriya, e huutoreeje 3. Firo maako arande nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder hakkunde lesdi Naajeeriya e Argentina nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder yim…ìe 11,467.

Belel:
Belel ko wuro nder lesdi Naajeeriya, …óon haa hirnaange lesdi Naajeeriya e Kameruun. O fu…ó…óii e laamu Belel diga lesdi Kismayo nder lesdi Somaliya. nden o laamani diga laamu …ói…óo. Cross Kawwa:
Cross Kawwa (ndooji feere e wi'etee ko Kawwa) wondi wuro nder lesdi Naajeeriya.
Duule …óo …óon haade laawol diga Baga haa fuunaa≈ãge (ko …óon haa fuunaa≈ãge maayo Caad) haa Kukawa haa hirnaange. Lodo feere …óon yahda haa worgo haa Monguno.

Dalori:
Dalori woni gariiri gariiri …ìadi Maiduguri, Borno, hirnaange fuunaa≈ãge Nigeria. Gila lewru mars 2015, …óum woni wuro go'oto nder suudu …ìur…óo …ìamtaare IDP je tiggi wakkati huccitaaku Boko Haram.
Kampa Dalori …óon ha laawol diga Maiduguri haa Konduga, Bama e nder hirsirde hakkunde Nigeria e Kameruun, km 15 worgo fuunaa≈ãge Maiduguri.

Kogu:
Kogu ko wuro mawn…óe nder hukuma pamarun Biu, nder worgo hirnaange Borno, nder hirnaange hirnaange lesdi Naajeeriya. Kogu …óon haade dow kooki maayo Yangari haa yaasi kiloomita 34 (21 miil) haa sa≈ãge hirnaange gariiri Biu.
Mari Watirwa, amiri Biu, wa…ói laamorgo maako ko Kogu ha nder hitaande 1795, caggal nde o riiwi Fulani'en diga Biu. Ha 1838, …ìiyum, amiri Mari Biya, o dilli laamorgo maako haa gariiri Biu.

Konduga:

Ngazargamu:
Ngazargamu, wonnoo laamorgo laamu Bornu diga 1460 haa 1809. ∆äo woni 150 km (93 mi) hirnaange maayo Chad nder Yobe leydi Nigeria hannde, …ìaawo laamorgo nden …óon haa jooni. Laamorgo …óo …óo …óon …ìadita ko e duu…ìi 6.6 km (4.1 mi) e nder go…ó…ói haa jooni haa 5 m (16 ft) haa mawndi.
Laamorgo man nyi…ìi nder hitaande 1488, wakkati laamu Mai Ali Gazi (1476 - 1503).
Duule nden laati nokkuure mawnde nder Bornu ngam jannginki diina Islaam nder laamu Idris Alooma.: 504
E hitaande 1808, Gazargamo jeyi Fulani Jihad.

Ha wayla …óon haan…óe e hukuma pamarun Bursari, hukuma pamarun Jakusko ige wayla hirnaange e hukuma pamarun Damaturu to laamorgo lesdi. Ha worgo hukuma pamare Potiskum e Nangere to wayla hirnaange.
Jajere imraati wonnoo ko hitaande 1992 e laamu Gomnaajo Bukar Abba Ibrahim (FNIQS). Daartol mum wonnoo e Wuro Jajere kono caggal …óum ja…ì…ìornoo e laamu militeer Compol Dabo Aliyu e hitaande 1993. Zing:

'Zing' noddinaa (nganndi) e nder Lion, wonde "Zingang" ngam haala laa…ìtu…óum e laa…ìtu…óum, haa jooni heew…ìe …óon, ammaa …óum waawi wonde 'Zina' ko barka to laamu Mumuye e aada mum diga arande. Luki Zing wonnoo nokkuure nde Lions base haa yeeso Mumuye wari e labbini njagaawu e labbini lesdi, Ngam maajum a waawi yi'ugo darnde njagaawu nder wuro Kpanti. Koyunvoba 2007, Background of Lion In Zing Local Government.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 661.

Abduljabbar Nasiru Kabara:
Abduljabbar Nasuru Kabara (anndiraa 7 Colite 1970) Abduljabbar ko diina Lislaamu lesdi Naajeeriya, e jannginoowo Qadiriyya, e nder Kano, lesdi Naajeeriya, mo …óon wi'a ko o …óon moofta Annabijo Muhammadu. O …ìi…ó…óo Nasuru Kabara, ardii…óo qadiriyya Afrik hirnaange, e …ìikkoy Karibullah Nasir Kabara, mo o jeyaa baaba mum.
∆Åi…ó…óo.
Abduljabbar jibinaa e nder wuro Kabara nder wuro Kano, lesdi Naijeriya, to saare ardii…óo Qadiriyya maw…óo Afrik hirnaange Sheikh Nasir Kabara. Innde mum woni Hajiya Hafsah Adussamad. O woni oniraawo ardii…óo Qadiriyya hannde Afrik hirnaange anndiraa…óo e innde Qaribullahi Nasuru Kabara, on on on ardii…óo Kadiriyya Movement nder Naajeeriya gila maayde baaba ma…ì…ìe e hitaande 1996.
Ja≈ãde.
Bana yim…ìe saare Kabara fuu, Abduljabbar yahdi ja≈ãde Ma'ahad. O he…ìii janngirde haa Aliya e ATC Gwale, nden o yahdi to Iraak ngam …ìeyda janngirde maako, ammaa kanko hoore maako wi'i o he…ìii …ìur…óo janngirde maako diga baaba maako nder duu…ìi 25 nder yonki maako.
wuro ∆òadiriyya, …óo Abduljabbar jibini e janngude, ko baaba maako Nasuru Kabara wa…ói ngam …ìamtude ∆òadiriyya nder Afrika.
Goon…óinki Islaam.
Abduljabbar nder yonki mum fuu anndini bana ja…ìoowo Qadiriyya e jannginoowo e ummaatooje Muslim'en nder Nigeria, o tokki laawol baaba mum, …ìaawo nde e hitaande 2020 haa 2021, o holli hoolaare mum bana ja…ìoowo Shi'a nder haalde bee BBC Hausa, o wi'i " caggal nde mi wa…óii …óa…ì…ìitaare wakkati fu, mi anndini Shi'a'en woodi daliilaji defte dow Sunni Islam nder haala ngol " [1 O wi'i " Mi …óon hawta hoore am to on noddaami Shi'a, ammaa mi …óon hawta e noddugo am sunni".
Nolde hoore.
O …ìi…ó…óo Nasuru Kabara e Hajiya Hafsah Adussamad, O waree e …ìi…ì…ìe. O yi…ói yahugo to lardi bana Sa'udi Arabiya, Iraak, Russia, Siriya e United Arab Emirates.

Kamal Aboki:
Kamal Aboki (dugumi 1 Janaayo 1997) ko jokkondir…óo lesdi Naajeeriya e jokkondir…óo jokkondir…óe. O jokkondiri e nder jokkondir…óe Hawsa keew…óe.
∆Åi…ó…óo e janngirde.
Aboki jibinaa e Kawo nder hukuma pamarun Nassarawa, Kano. Wakkati mayde maako, o woodi ja…ìoo…ìe 96.3K e Instagram e o wa…ói ja…ì…ìorgo 665 wakkati.
O woodi boo channel maako YouTube bee ko hoo'i 139K suronkoo…ìe.
Maayi.
Aboki maayi nder nyau oto dow 16 Januuwar 2023.

Abdulsalami Abubakar:
Abdulsalami Abubakar GCFR (/Àå…ëÀêbd…ôls…ôÀàl√¶mi Àå…ëÀêbuÀàb…ëÀêk…ëÀêr/ (njoo) (njoo); jibinaa 13 lewru Juun 1942) ko ne…ó…óo leydi Naajeeriya e hooreejo ardii…ìe lesdi Naajeriya haa hitaande 1998 haa hitaande 1999. O laati hooreejo lesdi Naajeeriya haa hitaande 1997 haa hitaande 1998.
∆Åi…ó…óo.
Abubakar diga lenyol Hawsa jibini ko √±alnde 13 Juun 1942 to baaba maako Abubakar Jibrin e inna maako Fatikande Mohammed, nder Minna, Diiwal Nayja, Naajeeriya.
Daga 1950 haa 1956 o yahdi nder Minna Native Authority Primary school. Daga 1957 haa 1962, o yahdi nder ja≈ãde ja≈ãde sekondare e Government College, Bida, Diiwal Nayja. Daga lewru janngo haa oktoobar 1963 o janngii e Kaduna Technical College.
Kuugal soja.
Kuugal nder konu lesdi.
Abubakar wondi goomu nder pelle …óe …ìe njaaraama nder kawral lesdi Naajeeriya e 3 oktoobar 1963.

Abubakar Alhaji:
Abubakar Alhaji ko laam…óo lesdi Naajeeriya, o woni Ministaar Fedde ∆Åamtaare e Fedde ∆Åamtaare. O …óon jogii ko Sardauna Sokoto. Alhaji ko Ministaar Daartol haa …ìaawo duu…ìi, o huuwani e laam…óoya≈ãkooje lesdi Naajeeriya feere feere.
∆Åi…ó…óo e janngirde.
Alhaji jibini nder saare Muhammed Sani mo anndiraa kadi Alhaji Alhaji ngam o jibini nder nyalaande Sallah nden o yahi haa haa haa Makka, o noddi kadi Dogon Daji, Sarkin Shanu. Alhaji yahi ja≈ãde sekondare e Kano haa o yahdi to Ja≈ãde laamu Katsina. O yahi Bournemouth College of Commerce e University of Reading, Berkshire o he…ìii ja≈ãde nder ja≈ãde politik. Alhaji wa…ói janngirde e Haag Institute of Social Services e IMF Institute, Washington.
Kuugal.
O hawti e golle laamu Naajeeriya nder 1964 o laati ardii…óo jaaynde nder jaaynde federeereeji nder …ìaawo 1960. Caggal nde o yahi ja≈ãde ha Den Haag, o jeyaa ha nder minisiriilu ja≈ãde, to o jeyaa…óo hooreejo ja≈ãde. E hitaande 1971, o fu…ó…óii golle makko to Ministeer Fedde ∆Åamtaare. Nder hitaande 1979, o wa…ói nder jaay…óe jaay…óe ngam o laatii jaay…óo jaay…óeAlhaji wa…ói sardauna nder 1990, maw…óo laamorde nden, Ahmadu Bello maayi nder hitaande 1966. O woni …ìiyum maw…óo Aliyu Dasukimo Ibrahim Dasuki mawnini. O woodi …ìiyum Ibraheem Dasuki Aminu-Alhaji. Nder kuugal maako nder Ministri Finance, o hawti e ja…ì…ìugo haade Naajeeriya bee ja…ì…ìoo…ìe ja…ì…ìoo…ìe. Kadi, o …óon nder nder nder nder nder lesdi Naajeeriya ngam ja…ìugo nder Lome II. Alhaji …ìaawo …óun o wa…ói nder jaay…óe jaay…óe …ìaawo Babangida …ìeydiima o wa…óiri hooreejo jaay…óe jaay…óe, jaay…óe e jaay…óe nder hitaande 1988. Alhaji wa…ói sardauna nder 1990, maw…óo laamorde nden, Ahmadu Bello maayi nder hitaande 1966. O woni …ìiyum maw…óo Aliyu Dasuki[4 mo Ibrahim Dasuki mawnini. O woodi …ìiyum Ibraheem Dasuki Aminu-Alhaji.

Amina diga Zazzaw:
Amina (ko…óo ina wiyee Aminatu; maayi 1610; hewtinaade) ko Hawsalaamii…óo taariika e nder wuro Zazzaw (ko jooni woni wuro Zaria e nder Diiwal Kaduna), to ko jooni woni to woyla hirnaange Naajeeriya.[4 O waawi wonde o laamii e nder feccere teemerre joweego na'i.
∆Åi…ó…óo.
Amina jibinaa ha caka karnijum sappo e joweetati AD to laamii…óo Nikatau, laamii…óo Zazzaw, 22 e laamii…óo Bakwa Turunku (r. 1536 ‚Åá c. 1566). O woodi debbo mo debbo biyetee…óo Zaria, ngam maajum laamorde jamanuure nden Zaria (Diiwal Kaduna) …ìe ceerno …óum e Ingelesiya'en fu…ó…óam karnijum sappo e njoweetati.
To duu…ìi sappo e jowi, Amina noddinaa Magajiya (ko'e ma…ì…ìe, …ìe ta∆¥i mo), …ìe hokki mo rew…ìe rew…ìe cappan…óe nayi (kuyanga). Gila e duu…ìi sappo e jeego, Amina wa…ói su…ìoo…ìe …óuu…ó…ói ngam …ìe mba…óa mo. "Naaje sappo" diga Makama e "sabo'en jawdi wor…ìe e jawdi rew…ìe cappan…óe njowo e limce e limce ceede cukalel e cukalel" diga Sarkin Kano.
Caggal maayde baaba mum e baaba mum e nder ko e hitaande 1566, baaba Amina laatii laamii…óo Zazzau. Ha wakkati oon, Amina laatii hoore mum "jooftaako konu nder kabalje baaba mum" e o he…ìii anndal ngam kuu…óe maako boo…ó…óe nder konu. O …óon mawnina haa hannde nder yimbe hausaji habaru bana "Amina …ìiy Nikatau, debbo mo mari baaw…óe bana gorko mo mari baaw…óe ja…ìugo yim…ìe haa konu".
Laamu e …ìesngu Zazzaw.
Caggal maayde sakiraa…ìe mum Karami e 1576, Amina …ìeydiima to laamu laamii…óo. Zazzaw wonnoo gooto e leydi Hawsa jee…ói…ói (Hawsa Bakwai), go…ó…ói ngoni Dawra, Kano, Gobir, Katsina, Rano, e Garun Gabas. [2 Ka≈ãko Amina ja…ìi laamu, Zazzaw wonnoo go'o nder leydi …ìur…ói mawnude.
Ko lebbi tati tan caggal nde o laato laamii…óo, Amina wa…ói konu duu…ìi 34 dow …ìooyi mum, ngam …ìeydude laamuuji Zazzaw.
Legendaji …ói Sidney John Hogben wi'i o hooti mo go'o e nder wuro go'o o yahdi, gooto e ma…ì…ìe o wi'i o hawti e mayre nden: "ko gorko gorko mo o mari …ìernde fu…ó…óii, ngam walaa mo waawi wuurugo ngam wi'ugo haala". Ha laamu Amina, Zazzaw laami leydi …ìur…ói ko naati. ngam anndude e hakkilantaago lesdi mum keso, Amina wa…ói gure mum'en nder laamorgo bee laamorgo. ∆äee laamorgo laati bana ko …ìuri haa lesdi fuu haa nde Britaniya'en laamorgo Zazzaw nder hitaande 1904, e …óuu…ó…ìe ma…ì…ìe …óonno haa hannde, anndiraa ganuwar Amina (laamorgo Amina).
Maayi.
"Amina maayi haa Atagara, …ìadi Idah hannde, ngam wakkati maajum Amina …ìaditi dammugal Zazzau haa worgo maayo Niger-Benue. Ammaa woodi ko …óuu…ói dow maayde maako; maw…ìe maw…ìe nder defte ma…ì…ìe mbiyi o maayi haa Vom Jos, ammaa taariikh…óo feere wi'i o maayi haa Atagara, Idah hannde".

∆Åi…ó…óo e janngirde.

Fedde e jaaynde.

Adam Babah-Alargi:
Hajj Adam Babah-Alargi (25 Desemba 1927¬†-¬†4 Noobambar 2019) o wonnoo mo ganaajo mo o ja…ì…ìiino e nder ku…ìaaji keew…ói e nder lesdi Gana.[3O woni ganaajo arandeejo mo o nastini ganaajo arandeejo ganaajo. O wonnoo gooto e arandeejo ganaajo accra West nder Rotary Club.[5
∆Åi…ó…óo e janngirde.

Maayi.
O maayi nder lewru Noofambar 2019 e duu…ìi 91. Haaru maako ha…ì…ìiri e hooreejo leydi Imaam Sheikh Osmanu Nuhu Sharubutu. O woni mo …ìur…óo wonde rotariyanke nder Gana haa o maayi.

Maryam Babangida:
Maryam Babangida (1 jolal 1948¬†- ¬†27 Bowte 2009) woni debbo Jeneraal Ibrahim Badamasi Babangida, mo woni hooreejo leydi Naajeeriya gila 1985 haa 1993.Burmu mum woni ko haani ngam …ìeydaade …ìeydaade e laamu makko.[2 O wa…ói darnde debbo arande leydi Naajeeriya ngam wa…óde …óum hoore mum.
Nde o wonnoo debbo arande, o wa…ói kuugal feere ngam …ìeydaade nguurndam rew…ìe. "Fenomenoo Meriyam" laati anndal e "goodi mawnde, moddi e no o wa…óata", ko o jogii caggal nde gorko maako yaasi laamu.
∆Åi…ó…óo e janngirde.
Owoowoo o jibinaa √±alnde 1 lewru Noofambar 1948 e Asaba (ko jooni woni Delta State), to o janngini janngirde mum. Baaba makko ngoni Hajiya Asabe Halima Mohammed, ko jooni woni Niger State, ko Hawsa, e Leonard Nwanonye Okogowu, ko Asaba, ko Igbo. O jeyaa caggal …óuum to Kaduna to o janngini ko woni Koleje Kaduna to o janngini ko woni ko woni ko …ìuri heewde. O jeyaa…óo e karallaagal e Fedde Fedde Fedde Fedde, Kaduna.
E 6 lewru Setteemburu 1969, …ìaawo duu…ìi 21 mum, o waree Major Ibrahim Badamasi Babangida. ∆Åe marii …ìi…ì…ìe nayi, sukaa…ìe Mohammed e Aminu, e sukaa…ìe …ói…óo, Aisha e Halima.

Abdullahi Bala Lau, anndiraa…óo e innde Sheikh Balalau, ko jannginoowo Islaam, maw…óo diina, mufassir, e waajotoo…óo. O woni hooreejo leydiJama'atu Izalatul Bidi'ah wa Ikamatus Sunnah,[2 ko woni …ìur…óo gollaade Salafi nder lesdi Naajeeriya gila lewru Desemba 2011.

Ahmed Nuhu Bamalli:
Ahmed Nuhu Bamalli CFR (be danyeemou 8 lewru korse 1966) ko laam…óo lesdi Naajeeriya, bankoo…óo e diplomate. O woni ardii…óo lesdi Naajeeriya to Tailand e jaajotoo…óo nder lesdi Naajeeriya e nder lesdi Myanmar, e o woni amiri Ful…ìe 19th to Zazzaw, leydi Naajeeriya e laamorde Zaria, Kaduna, lesdi Naajeeriya. O woni amiri ardii…óo diga wuro laamu Mallawa to laamu nder duu…ìi 100 caggal nde amiri mum, Laamii…óo Alu Dan Sidi, ummii to laamu e hitaande 1920.
∆Åi…ó…óo e janngirde.
Bamalli jibinaa e nder Kwarbai Zaria, Diiwal Kaduna, Naajeeriya. O woni …ìi…ó…óo Nuhu Bamalli (mo wa…óii…óo golle dowla lesdi Naajeeriya). O he…ìii (LLB) nder ja≈ãde 1989 to Ahmadu Bello University, e ja≈ãde maako nder ja≈ãde e diplomasi nder ja≈ãde nde'e e 2002. O he…ìii diploma ja≈ãde e nder ja≈ãde Enugu State University of Science and Technology e hitaande 1998. O ja≈ãdi kadi e ja≈ãde dow ja≈ãde dow ha…ìde e ja≈ãde York e hitaande 2009 o timmini diploma nder ja≈ãde ja≈ãde Oxford e hitaande 2015.
Kuugal.
Bamalli wa…ói golle ngam Metropolitan Management Agency haa o warti hooreejo kuugal yim…ìe to Mtel, ko …óum woni kuugal haalde mobile to Nigerian Telecommunications Limited. 
O huuwani kadi nder bannge e hooreejo jaaynde e …ìaawo o jeyaa…óo hooreejo jaaynde nder Nigeria Security Printing and Minting Company Limited. 
O laati ardii…óo ngam ja…ìugo hooreejo leydi Kaduna nder hitaande 2015.Bana nde o la…ì…ìini hooreejo leydi Zazzaw, Bamalli wa…ói ko Magajin Garin Zazzaw, o wa…ói ko koroowo lesdi Naajeeriya nder Tailand, e nder lesdi Myanmar.[1
Laamii…óo Zazzaw.
O laatii Emir keso Zazzaw e Nasir el-Rufai, garbaa…óo leydi Kaduna e 7 oktoobar 2020. O woni …ìi…ó…óo …ói…óa…ìo Nuhu Bamalli (Magajin Garin Zazzau).

Ja…ì…ìorgo Ganndal.

Mahmud Kanti Bello:

Firo.

Alhassan ∆äantata:
Alhassan ∆äantata ((Listen; 1877¬† ‚Åá¬† 17 Juko 1955) ko…óo Naajeeriya woyla, jaayndiyanke koola e koolaa…óe, o wondi jaayndiyanke e jawdi Europe. O hokki jaayndiyanke maw…óe British e jawdi e kadi o jogii ko…óeeji jaayndiyanke e Gold Coast. Wakkati mayde maako o woni ne…ó…óo …ìur…óo jawdi e Afrik hirnaange.
∆Åi…ó…óo.
Maw…ìe.
∆äantata jibini e hitaande 1877 e Bebeji, Kano Emirate e nder Sokoto Caliphate, gooto e …ìi…ì…ìe Abdullahi e debbo mum, Amarya. Abdullahi wonnoo …ìii Baba Talatin, won Baba Talatin mo wurtini saare e Katsina to Madobi e Kano caggal maayde baaba mum biyetee…óo Ali, Abdullahi tokki gollude gila Madobi haa hitaande 1877, nde o fu…ó…ói yahude to Gonja to Gonja to kolla njaltinaama e Ghana, debbo mum danyani Alhassan to nokkuure camping (Zango) Bebeji, nde o wurtini o wurtini Madobi ngam Hausaji.
∆Åi…ì…ìe Abdullahi …ìe sukaa…ìe masin ngam …ìe mbaawa ja…ìugo jawdi maako. ∆Åe fuu …ìe ke…ìii jawdi ma…ì…ìe bana tawde sari'a Islaamiyanke nde o maayi. Amarya, bana baaba-mo, o laati ja…ìoowo jawdi nder hoore maako. ∆Åaawo maayde gorko maako, o wa…ói anniya o acca Bebeji haa Gana, to o mari jawdi. O acci …ìikkoy maako nder Bebeji, haa o laato debbo maw…óo maccu…óo biyetee…óo Tata.

Dawrama:
Dawrama ko Magajiya Dawrama (sawol 9th) woni laam…óo Hawsa'en, ko kanko woni Kabara Joopii…óo Daura, o ardii ko o wa…ói laamu e laamu laamu e laamu e laamu e laamu. Haalooji …óemngal ina haani mo "maami laamii…óo" laamu Hausa fu…ó…óii e nokku …óo hannde anndiraa ko laamuji woyla Niiser e Naajeeriya.
Magajiya Daurama laamani dowla anndiraa…óo Daura, caggal wuro biyetee…óo nden, hannde kadi emirate nder Diiwal Katsina, Naajeeriya. Laamorde fu…ó…óii…óe leydi ndi noddiraa Tsohon Birni ("Town Old"); e nder laamu maako Dawrama soodi laamorde to wuro Daura, …óum noddiraa e makko.

Ru∆ôayya Dawayya:

Bilkisu Funtuwa:
Hajiya Bilkisu Salisu Ahmed Funtuwa ko winndiyanke Naajeeriya. O winndi ko e …óemngal Hawsa ko e dow rew…ìe mumen …ìeen ko e nder …óemngal Muslim.O wondi gooto e winndiyankeeji …ìur…ói anndude ko anndiraa "kaabawol kasu Kano" walla Littattafan Soyayya¬† ‚Åá¬† "ko defte yi…óde".[2
Funtuwa e nder defte mum, o …óon yewta dow no o ha…ìata e haalaaji …ói'i. Funtuwa e nder defte mum …óon ha…ói dow rew…ìe rew…ìe e dow ko'e ma…ì…ìe e dow ko'e ma…ì…ìe …óe hawti e yim…ìe Hausa e Islaam, e nder kuu…óe mum …óe o wa…ói dow ma…ì…ìe. Funtuwa e nder defte mum'en o …óon ha…ói dow ko'e ma…ì…ìe …ói'e rew…ìe e nder defte ma…ì…ìe …ói'e e nder defte ma…ì…ìe …óe …ìe njogii e nder diina ma…ì…ìe ngam …ìe …ìeyda hoore ma…ì…ìe haa …ìe …ìeyda. ∆äe'e'e'e'e'e'e'en …óon nja…ì…ìa kuu…óe laamii…ìe, doktoor'en e maw…ìe laamu haa …ìe …óon njoo…óina nguurndam mar…ìe. ∆äe'e'e'e'e'e nder kuu…óe mum'en …ìuri haani dow yi…óde. Nder defte mum'en, dewte e nder juul…ìe e nder juul…ìe e nder diina Muslim'en, e nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder kuu…óe mum'en, e'e'e'e'e'e
Funtuwa …óon joo…ói bee saare maako nder Funtuwa, Diiwal Katsina, Naajeeriya.

Saratu Gi…óa…óo:
Saratu Gi…óa…óo, anndiraa…óo dow Daso (dimaa 17 lewru 1 1968), ko actress…óo fimji Naajeeriya, …ìurna-…ìurna nder kinndal Kannywood. O anndiraa ngam kuugal o …óon wa…óa dow o …óon jeyaa…óo e mo …óon jeyaa…óo e mo …óon jeyaa e fuu ko o yi…ói ngam o he…ìugo anndal. O wa…ói film makko fu…ó…óam nder hitaande 2000 nder Linzami Da Wuta, …óum wa…ói e Sarauniya Movies. ∆äe feere feere bana Nagari, Gidauniya, Mashi, e Sansani tokki. O holli o yi…ói wa…óugo ko debbo kallu…óo.
Fedde fu…ó…óor…óe e golle.
Saratu Gidado jibinaa nder Gombe State woyla lesdi Nigeria, o yahi janngirde maako nder Kano state, o woni debbo arande nder nder nder Kannywood.
haa ta'a dow kuu…óe,Gidado wa…ói darnde hooreejo protokol (Jakadiya) ngam amir…óo Kano Muhammad Sanusi II nder hitaande 2016 Premium News
Fimji.
Saratu Gidado hawti e nder nder film Kannywood nder hitaande 2000 nden o wa…óii nder fimji 100

Osama Hawsawi:
Osama Hawsawi (Arabic: ÿ£ÿ≥ÿßŸÖÿ© ŸáŸàÿ≥ÿßŸàŸä, jibinaa 31 Maars 1984) ko…óo Sawudi Arabiya, jogii…óo fotballe e nder leydi Sawudi.
Caggal nde o fu…ó…óii e Al-Wehda, o wa…ói …ìurna golle mum e Al-Hilal e Al-Ahli. O he…ìi ko…ó…óe ko …ìuri heewde e kulbe …ói…ói, hawti e koode Pro League jowi, koode Crown Prince jowi e koode King jowi.
Hawsawi he…ìii caps 138 ngam gollal leydi Sawudi Arabiya hakkunde 2006 e 2018, o jogii e AFC Asian Cup tati, o jeyaa e dow ko'e ma…ì…ìe e nder ko'e duniyaaru 2018 e o jeyaa e dow ko'e ma…ì…ìe e nder ko'e AFC Asian Cup 2007

Kabiru Gombe:
Kabir Muhammad Haruna ko anndiraa ko Kabiru Gombe ko jannginoowo e moofti diina Islaam leydi Naajeeriya. O woni hooreejo leydi leydi ndii e jam'atu Izalatil Bid'ah wa Iqamatus Sunnah, ko woni …ìur…óo gollaade Salafiyyah nder Naajeeriya, gila lewru Desemba 2011. 
Kuugal.
Muhammad Kabir Haruna fu…ó…óii nde o wondi ardii…óo nder kawtal limce diina JIBWIS …ìe noddi "∆≥an Agaji" nder Hausa; o …ìaawo o yahi to Sa'udi Arabiya ngam …ìeydude anndal diina maako e janngude anndal Qur'aan. Muhammad Kabir Haruna …óon jeyaa…óo hawrugo hooreejo lesdi Naajeeriya Israila diga Desemba 2011. O wa…óata Tafsir Ramadan hitaande e hitaande e o wa…óata Da'wah feere feere nder lesdi Nigeria e nder ley…óe go…ó…óe hawti e Niiser, Kameruun, Caad, Gana, United Kingdom ekn. Muhammad Kabir Haruna …óon hokkata habaruji …ìur…ói dow kuu…óe rew…ìe.

Abubakar Gumi:
Abubakar Mahmud Gumi (7 Jolal 1924¬† -¬† 11 Septemba 1992) o wonnoo jannginoowo Lislaamu Naajeeriya e Grand Khadi leydi Naajeeriya fuunaare (1962 - 1967), darnde wa…ói mo laamorde mawnde nder faamiila sharia e nder leydi ndi.
Gumi fu…ó…óii ardeede e hooree…ìe Sufi'en, go…ó…ói …ói o …óon njogii dow teleeji e nder duu…ìi 1970 e 1980. Ha wakkati oon, o he…ìii hakkilantaaku makko ngam wa…óugo jamirooje haalde e nder juulde Kaduna Central Mosque (Sultan Bello Mosque). O huutori jamirooje ngam ummitinde kalfinaaji mum dow laamuuji …ói o jogii dow miijooji mum dow wayloode to laawol fu…ó…óam walla ngam ja…ìugo kuu…óe laa…ìnde Islaam. O boo o nganndini masin hawtaade mistik e huutoreeji Sufi'en.
O woodi …óuu…óal …ìi…ì…ìe, amma …ìur…óo …ìiyugo …ìiyum …óum Dr Ahmad Abubakar Gumi mo o jeyaa baaba maako bana jannginoowo juulde kaduna (Sultan Bello), Dr Ahmad Gumi woni doktoor mo ja…ì…ìi…óo doktoor e ja≈ãde Ahmadu Bello Zaria e o laati ardii…óo konu, o acci konu konu konu e o yahdi janngugo fiqh (ji'aakuji Islaami) e umm Al-Qura University e Makka, Sa'udi Arabiya to o he…ìii PhD maako.
Abubakar Gumi hollii wonde o walaa ko hawti e …ìaawo Boko Haram nder lesdi Naajeeriya ngam o …óon ja…ì…ìa demokaraasi, sariyaaji …ói yim…ìe …ìeen e jaangoji hirnaange diga duu…ìi maako fu…ó…ói bana jannginoowo, o …óon wi'a diga o wi'i, " nder su…ìaaji, ja…ìugo ko …ìuri haani haa do'a".
Gumi woni ja…ìoowo jannde Maliki, …óum wa…ói e nder defte mum hawti e tafsir Qur'ani (Raddul azhaan ila ma'anil Qur'an) e defte go…ó…óe bana (hullu nizam ala nuzuul isa)
∆Åi…ó…óo e janngirde.
Gumi jibinaa nder wuro Gummi jooni wonde nokku dowla Diiwal Zamfara nder jemmaare je'e Ramazan nder hitaande Lislaami 1344, nder saare Mahmud, mo anndude Lislaami e Alkali (ta∆¥a) Gummi. O fu…ó…óii janngude nder nder galle saare maako nde o jeyaa e ekkitinol Islaam baaba maako. ∆Åaawo maajum o neldi nder suudu janngirde nder lesdi Ambursa, nder lesdi Sokoto. Nder …óon o anndini Fiqh o janngi defte e ko'e ma'a dow annabi. Jaango maako arande nder duniyaaru o jeyaa ko Dogondaji Primary School, nder jaango maako, o hawti e Sultana 18th Sokoto, Ibrahim Dasuki o jeyaa nder kuu…óe diina. O wa…ói Hakimin Salla (joofta do'a) nden o hokki mo hakkiilo ngam hokkude jannginoo…ìe kuugal diina. Ha nder hitaande, o hooti haa Sokoto Middle School, to Ahmadu Bello …óon ekkitina. Nder …óon o anndini Shehu Shagari, Waziri Muhammadu Junaidu, e Yahaya Gusau; o woni mo hawri e jama'atu Nasril Islam, wonande darnde Musulmana Naajeeriya.
Caggal nde o timmini janngude mum nder ja≈ãde hakkundeere, o yahi Kano ngam janngude sariya e o jannginaama bana Qadi. O fu…ó…ói gollaade bana maw…óo ja≈ãde to Qadi Attahiru kono o …ìeydi o …ìeydi e ko o wa…óata. O hokki darnde fawde e islaam e tafsir ngam hisnugo e …ìeydaare maako. O maayi baaba maako nder hitaande 1937 nde o …óon haa ja≈ãde hakkundeere. O waree Maryam duu…ìi 3 …ìaawo maajum nder hitaande 1941 nde o woodi duu…ìi 19 tan.
Fu…ó…óam golle.
E hitaande 1947, Abubakar Gumi dilli golle mum nde o laam…óo to Qadi Attahiru o yahi o janngina e Kano Law School, nde o yahdi. Nde o wondi e Kano, o hawri e Sheik Sa'id Hayatu, gorko mo …ìe ndaaraani gooto e …ìur…ìe yi…óde laamu nguurndam. Hayatu o woni ardii…óo maw…óo Mahdiyya e o …ìooyi gila o joo…óii e leydi Kameruun. Abubakar he…ìi yi…óde e ekkitinol maw…óo Mahdiyya o warti ja…ìoowo; o fu…ó…óii o ware …ìi…ó…óo debbo Hayatu, Maryam.
E hitaande 1949, Gumi wa…ói gollal jannginoowo e nder janngirde e Maru, Sokoto. Ja≈ãde nden woodi jannginoowo mo anndiraa…óo, Aminu Kano, mo woni mo fu…ó…óii…óo ja≈ãde jannginoo…ìe woyla e ja≈ãde jannginoo…ìe fewre juul…ìe. Aminu e Gumi hawti e miijooji dow semmbe ummatoore aada e diina Islaam, e kadi e dow yidde walla ja…ìugol …óum hokki to haala Bida walla syncretism e nder sufi'en.
O dilli Maru ngam o ja≈ãde e janngirde Arabji e Kano. Nde o timmini janngirde maako, o laati jannginoowo duu…ìi …ói…ói e janngirde. O ja≈ãdi boo janngirde janngirde e Sudan.
Nder hitaande 1957, o laati mo fassara ngam laamu Nigeria fuunaa≈ãgo dow dow dowla Sa'udiya.

Ahmad Abubakar Gumi:
Ahmad Abubakar Gumi ko diina Islaam, jannginoowo e ardii…óo ardii…óo konu e darnde kapiteen nder Nigeria Defence Academy (NDA). O woni mufti e mufassir hannde e juulde Kaduna Central Sultan Bello.
∆Åi…ó…óo.
Ahmad Gumi woni …ìii gorko to Shaykh Abubakar Gumi. O jibinaa e nder Diiwal Kano. O ∆¥etti e nder genealogie ardii…ìe Islaam, baaba maako woni Grand Khadi ardii…óo lesdi Naajeeriya. Baaba maako wa…ói gollal nder ummugo diina Islaam nder lesdi Naajeeriya.
Ja≈ãde.
Ahmad Gumi yahi Sardauna Memorial College (SMC) ngam janngude maako nder ja≈ãde sekondare. ∆Åaawo ja≈ãde sekondare o hooti nder Ahmadu Bello University e …ìaawo ja≈ãde maako o hooti nder Nigeria Defence Academy. Gumi o jeyaa diga golle militeer haa daraaji hooreejo hooreejo leydi e o yahdi to Sa'udi Arabiya ngam …ìeydude janngude maako nder Umm al-Qura University to o janngii juraji Islaamiyanke e tafsir. Ko…ì…ìe maako nder ja≈ãde hawti e Abdur-Rahman As-Sudais, Saud Al-Shuraim. O hokkata kadi sarka Ramadan Tafseer hitaande e nder Masjid Sultan Bello Unguwan Kaduna.
Kuugal konu.
O huuwani nder Nigeria Army Medical Corp (NAMC) bana sardaaku suudu ndun e o jeyi nder suudu ndun bana kapiteen.

Mahamadou Issoufou:
Mahamadou Issoufou (dimaa 1 janmaare 1952) woni politikkeejo leydi Niiseriyankoore mo o golli hooreejo leydi Niiseriyankoore gila 7 abriil 2011 haa 2 abriil 2021. Issoufou woni hooreejo leydi Niiseriyankoore gila 1993 haa 1994, hooreejo leydi ndii haa 1995 haa 1996, o wonnoo mo…óo e nder kala su…ìaaji hooreejo leydi gila 1993 haa 2016. O ardii partiiji demokaraasi e sosialismu (PNDS-Tarayya), partiiji sosialis demokaraasi, gila nde o fu…ó…óii e hitaande 1990 haa nde o su…ìaa hooreejo leydi ndii e hitaande 2011.
Nde o wurtini laamu ngam rokki hakkillaaji laamu ngam rokki mo ha nder laamu …ói…ói, ngam maajum o wa…ói ha nder laamu fu…ónaare demokaraasi nder lesdi, nder lewru mars 2021 o he…ìii sari Ibrahim ngam laamorde boo…ó…óe, su…ìaaji demokaraasi e rokki hakkillaaji laamu.

Balaraba Ramat Yakubu:
Balaraba Ramat Yakubu (dodu…óo 1959) ko winndiyanke Naajeeriya mo winndi e Hawsare. O woni ardii…óo nder winndannde littattafan soyayya walla "habbere yi…óde", e gooto e winndiyankeew…ìe …óemngal Hausa …ìe golle mum'en tuubani to Farayse. O huutornoo kadi no winndiyankeew…óo, jannginoowo, e darinoowo filmiiji Kannywood. Kuulaaji maako …óon …óon haani dow kuuje bana sa…óugo e jannguki rew…ìe.[2
∆Åi…ó…óo.
Balaraba Ramat Yakubu woni …ìikkoy debbo hooreejo leydi Murtala Ramat Muhammed,mo o golli hooreejo lesdi Naajeeriya diga hitaande 1975 haa o maayi nder hitaande 1976.
To duu…ìi 13, o dilli haa janngirde e o haani o wa…óde dewgal fu…ó…óam.

TY Shaba:
Tamim Yahuza Shaban (tamaaji:TY Shaban) anndiraa…óo e TY Shaban ko Shaba woni…óo…óo ina…óo, dansa e jaaynde film e Kannywood, nder Diiwal Kano.
∆Åi…ó…óo e janngirde.
Shaban jibini e 4 feebari 1980 nder nokku hukuma pamarun Nasarawa nder Diiwal Kano, Naajeeriya. O janngini Brigade Primary School, Junior Secondary School e Kano Teachers College e Senior Secondary School e Government Secondary School Stadium Duka e Kano. O janngini Farayse e Federal College of Education (Technical) Bichi. O janngini kadi Public Administration e Kano Polytechnic. O janngini kadi Diploma in Film Production e Yuusuf Maitama Sule University, Kano, …ói …ói…óo e Kano State. TY Shaban woni maw…óo e maw…óo e film e maw…óo to Northern Nigeria Cinema Kannywood. TY Shaban woni baaba Sani TY Shaban (Freiiboi) maw…óo Hausa HIP-HOP duu…ìi 16 e lesdi Naajeeriya.

Ali Eisami:
Ali Eisami Gazirmabe Bornu (d. 1786 - 1787), anndiraa …ìaawo …óun no William Harding, o wondi Kanuri ne…ó…óo mo British Royal Navy yaltini e maccu…ìe. ∆Åaawo …óun o joo…óii e Siera Leone o golli e Misiyonare Jarman Sigismund Koelle nder wa…óugol …óemngal Kanuri.
Eisami hooti bana boowol diga saare maako nder konu nder Bornu, o wa…ói boowol. ∆Åaawo o feere duu…ìi …ìaawo e nder du…óal maccu…ìe nder maayo, o e maccu…ìe feere …ìe rim…óini nder maayo nder hitaande 1817 ngam …ìe ndilli bee kuu…ìal maccu…ìe nder Atalantika. ∆Åe hooti …ìe haa laamorgo Sierra Leone nder hirnaange Afrika ngam …ìe njoo…óoto, to o wa…ói wuro keso.

Hassan Isse Jama:
Ballitowo maw…óo ar…óuujo laamu lesdi somali
Hassan Isse Jama (somali; Xasan Ciise Jaamaa) un gim…óo cu…ìal lesdi somali e ann…óann…óo lamre dabbaji. O lattake artuu…óo ballitowo ar…óuujo di lesdi somali de e gootoojo banngin…óo tiggu…óo membaawal …ói …ìe lusingo lesdi no…ó…óira (Somali National Movement).
Kuugal.
Hassan Huuwi …óer …ói taskarawal dokkowal habaruji bial BBC kuuwowal somali e…óow sarkitoowo halaaji amma o sem…ìi …óini ha go…ó…óe …óemle e‚Äôo huwaana …ìe BBC yaake e…óe o wonndi e NSM kuu…óe hawti e ballitowo chiamanjo.

Babura:

Masjidji Bagwai
Dooseeje.

Bakori:
Bakori ko nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) nder Diiwal Katsina, lesdi Naajeeriya. ∆äum ummorii nder 15 mee 1989 ngam ngomnaaru konu diiwal Katsina Major General Lawrence Onoja

Joogaraafiwol.
Fedde laamu leydi Bakori …óon hawta bee babal lesdi maare 679 km2 bee saffugo yahu 4 km/h. Fedde nden …óon mari temperatuure maare 36 ¬∞C, nden bow humidity nder nokku …óon …óon huwta bee 14%.

Bakura:
Bakura ko nokkuure laamu Diiwal Zamfara, Naajeeriya. Hoofde wuro ngo'o woni nder wuro Bakura haa 12¬∞42‚Ä≤37‚Ä≤‚Ä≤N 5¬∞52‚Ä≤23‚Ä≤‚Ä≤E haa woyla fuunaa≈ãgo nokkuure laamu leydi.

Balle:
Balle woni wuro nder Diiwal Sokoto, Naajeeriya.
Balle …óon haadi ha km 36 diga gariiri Tangaza, e ha km 97 diga Sokoto.
Balle …óon ha fuunaa≈ãge Gudu, haa yaasi 40 km haa fuunaa≈ãge worgo fuunaa≈ãge wuro Kurdula e 30 km haa sa≈ãge hirnaa≈ãge gariiri Karfen-Sarki. …óon haadi 70 km hirnaange gariiri Bachaka.

Bari:
Bari woni gariiri yim…ìe …óuu…óugo nder hukuma pamarun Rogo nder Diiwal Kano, Naajeeriya1] diga duu…ìi …óuu…ó…ói, diga Kano hukuma pamarun Karaye.
Koode pos…óe nokku on woni 704. Ha nder kuu…óe jawdi e jaaynde je …óon mari yim…ìe e Bari, …óum haani ha nder Dutsen Bari Hill, diga nde o he…ìi innde maako.

Joogaraafiwol.

Dowla federe …ìaawo oon mari banditaare ngam darnugo diga dumma bagaudi boo anndiraa dow laabi mum'en.[1 Beeji woni nokkuure juulde Habe nden no wiyi …óum ko sejjitunde nde 1964.wuro ngoo anndi woodi ilmenite …óuu…óal ngal tawaa…óo magnetik je ngoodi titanium oxide.[4 Alhajii Alhassan ∆äantata wonnoo jaayndaaku mawndu fu…ó…óii duu…ìi 1990s be baaba mar…ìe kuugal …ìe he…ìaa…ói to gariiri seniije kadi hawti ndi Alajaaji Sanusi dantaari wanni Aminu diintatu jibini babege doode laddube ka hitaande 1877.

Laamorde Bichi:
"Italic text"
Laamorde Bichi ko Hawsa'en laamorde haasooje nder Diiwal Kano e woyla Naajeeriya. Laamu makko woni to wuro bici, nokkuure laamu nguurndameji bee…óiyankeeji beediyaani haa hitaande 2019, nde goomu diiwal Kano wa…ói laamorde nayi diga karallaagal …ìurii Kano.
Laamii…óo Bichi hannde o woni Nasiru Ado Bayero.Aminu Ado Bayero ko ardii…óo Bichhi gila nde …óum tiggi nder hitaande 2019.[4 Ha 12 mars 2020, laamu Kano …ìesdi mo e sakiraa…ìe maako Nasiru Ado Bayero dow amiri oBilji caggal darnde Laamii…óo Kanko Muhammadu Sanusi II ∆¥etti daga laamorde Kanooje ngam ha…ì…ìugo mum bee Amimu Ado.

Birnin Kudu:
Birnin Kudu ko wuro e nokku …óo laamorde (hukuma pamarun) diiwal ndii woni nder worgo Jigawa, lesdi Naajeeriya. Ko haani 120 km haa sahaa fuunaa≈ãge Kano.
Birnin Kudu ko wuro taariika diga arandeeji, …óum anndiraa ngam kaa∆¥e e ge…óe …óe he…ìaama nder go…ó…óe ma…ì…ìe haa duu…ìi teemeddeji …ìaawo koloniya lesdi Naajeeriya woyla bee nastirde laamu leydi (NA).
Birnin Kudu woni laamu leydi …ìur…óo yim…ìe nder lesdi Jigawa e ja≈ãde 2006, ko adii …óo wuro ngoo ina wa…óa yeeso laa…ì…óum.
∆äum woni wuro go'oto nder janngoo…ìe …ìur…óe mawnude e woyla lesdi Naijeriya, Jaangoore Birnin Kudu , diga …óo ardiije be maralji feere fu…ó…óiima hawti bee Alhazi Aliko dangote (mo mari jawdi haa Afirka).
Nder siyasa …ìaawo, Birnin Kudu wa…ói gomnatiji …ói…óo nder lesdi Jigawa (Alh Ali Sa'adu , Gomnaatu arandeejo leydi ndi) e Alh Sule lamido mo je …óon laamii Gobernaaku jigawa diga 29 Maay 2007 haa 30 Maaye 2015.
Birnin Kudu woodi go…ó…óe 11 jeyaa…óe siyasa, ko Kantoga , Kangire, Kwangwara, Kiyako, Sundumina, Surko, Lafiya, Unguwar ∆¥a, Yalwan damai, birdin kudu e Wurno.
Siraj Muhammad Kantoga …óon wondi ardii…óo darnde Birnin Kudu nder wuro leydi Jigawa, 2015 haa jooni.

Illo:
Illo woni wuro nder Diiwal Kebbi, Naajeeriya.
Taariiha fu…ó…óii…ìe koloniya.
Illo wonnoo gooto e laamorde Borgu woyla, ko heewi ge…óe go…ó…óe amma jawdi. O ha…ì…ìi konuji feere bee …ìooyi mum'en nder karnijum sappo njoweeteemburu hawti…ìe ha warngo Samba be ka…ìir…ói dow Gwandu haa Sokoto Caliphate.
Wakkati koloniya.
E hitaande 1896 Farayse'en njoo…ói Illo ngam jaabuki wurooje go…ó…óe nder Borgu e sooji…ìe British West African Frontier Force. Les…óe …ói…ói fuu …óon ha…ìana dow hakkille jawdi Niger, ammaa haa arti noon illow warti to lesdi Britaniya …ìaawo kawtal ngal Anglo-French Delineation Agreement.
∆Åaawo …óun laamu Britiiki feccitii lesdi Naijeriya haa woyla e worgo, nden Illo wa…ói nder ko woni dow leydi Naajeeri.

Isa:

Dala:
Dala ko nokkuure laamorde nde yim…ìe njoo…ói nder Diiwal Kano, Naajeeriya e wuro Kano …óum tagi ha May 1989, diga laamu karallaaji senii…ìe. ∆äum …óon ha fombina fuunaa≈ãgal hirnaange Kano. Maandu maako …óon nder Gwammaja.

Fuuro Dala:
Fuuro Dala (ngoo kadi hollata Dala) ko tiilde nder Kano, leydi Naajeeriya. Ko e mawngu 534 mita (1.753 ft), ina woodi daandeere nde …óon jogii 101 laabi haa to hoosee yaaki ha juu…óe.
Nder karnuwol jee…ói…óawre, dow ladde nden …óon woodi yim…ìe …ìe kuuwaay nder laam…ìe njamndi. ∆äo …óum nodditaama ko "Tumburbura" diga hitaande 700 CE haa nde diina ndu'e maayi bana sakkitol …ìaawo karnijum 13. Kano anndiraa arandeeji maako no Dala.[1
Taariiha.
Ko e nder leydi Kano, ko to bannge wuro Kanon woni huunde mawnde. E hino haani wonande Barbushe ne…ó…óo maw…óo teddu≈ãgal nden mo baw…ói he…ìaaki ley…óeeji bee ndunngu makko o wurtini …óe dow …ìaawo maako haa ladda on …óon joo…óii ton duu…ìi teemeddeeje yeesoo'e . ∆äoon wiyi …óum …óo barbisho wa…ói hayre ngam teddingo allah biyetee…ìe Tsumburbura je maanaa yim…ìe Hausa …ìen saabe naati diina Islaam …óin ka…ì…ìiima ndeen.Yimmo tan …ìe njaawaama yahugo nokkuure ndee ina tawii kanko kadi ni waawnoo; koo moye ga…óaako hara no hootiri non maayay faajiida.[4
∆äuum kadi ina woodi jokkondiral e binndol Bayajidda nder haasa folklore, …óun ko haala go…ó…óo mo …ìe nja…ìaani wonde diga Baghdad o warii haa Hausaland yeeso ndeen omo waree to saare laamii…óo …óon jooni nden wa…ói baaba maw…ìe gariiri-laamuji jowee…ói…óun …ói laati konfeederasiyon …ìeydaande amma heewndu anndiraa bana Hausa Bakwai. Koo si tawii hayre woni alama diina feccere bee mawnude jaajotoo…óe …óen no feewi non boo …óum hokkaama ma'anaaku makko caggal warugo Islaam. Nguurdi dow laddu cenii…óum ngol ngal yaawnoo ka fu…ó…óii …óoon ley aada hawaas so wakkati 1819, ardiiwo Fulane Muslim biyetee on hooditaade nduunaaji ruuhu nduu …óo himo hawra dooje maako jeye tatiyanke jee sappo go…ó…ói …óin bo wa…óata …óe caka leggal leydi ndin ngam he…ìuki hakkillowol yaltinde konu ton.* "Pagan" seniinkooruuji …ìen naati Allah saabe darnde ma…ì…ìe fuu daadaaki Dallaaje wooturu ndiyaaru

∆äambatta:
∆äambatta (ko ∆äanbatta ko e ∆äambaarta) woni nokku dowla (hukuma pamarun) Diiwal Kano, lesdi Naajeeriya. ∆äum tawaa naange 49 mil haa woyla wuro kano to sahaa fuunaare nder laanaango maayo Kanwa bee jugo JigawƒÅ .
∆äum ina woodi nokkuure 732 km2, e yim…ìe 207,968 ha nder limti 2006. Ha woyla bee fuunaa≈ãge ko Kazaore be Babura dowla leydi Jigawa, nden haa worgo boo hirnaange Minjibir.
Duule …óo Audu Bako College of Agriculture (ABCOa) e Kano State School Of Basic Midwifery. Kanjum woni wuro Zone 3 nder laamorde jaay…óe jeewte ka kano, Zonal Office to Ministry for Education dowla kanjo ,Zone Medical Store ha Ministeer ngam hakkillo leydi kannje .
Koode postaal nokku on woni 702.

Dutsin-Ma:
Dutsin-Ma ko nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) nder Diiwal Katsina, lesdi Naajeeriya.

Taariiha.
Innde Dutsin-ma …óon ∆¥iwo diga innde manjum maw…óo maaroowo joo…óotoo…ìe dow kaa∆¥e mawndi …óe …óo nder …ìernde gariiri duu…ìi sappoje je'ii, in…óe maako laati MA e ko ina wiyi "dutsi" ha …óemngal Hawsa. Ngam maajum yim…ìe fu…ó…ói noddaago ka≈ã≈ãere nden bana Dutsin-Ma , sakkiti boo ummaatooje pu…ó…óiti yahugo haa …ìe njoo…ói caka bee wooreeje ngam he…ìugo ndiyam
Dutsin-ma laati laamu leydi e hitaande 1976. Hooreejo woni ardii…óo lesdi. Yim…ìe wuro ngoon …ìuri haani Hausa'en be Fulaneji diga lenyol ma…ì…ìe, kuu…óe maw…óe …óe ko lamnduki (la…ì…ìingo ndiyam , labbugo le…ó…óe nder nguurndu fuu), haaje dabbaajo boo.
∆Åeydi noon, dow karallaaji careluuji …ói Dutsin-Ma ina jeyaa e DTM.
Jaango jaangirde Dutsin-Ma …óon haandi …óo.

Talata Mafara ko nokkuure laamu nder Diiwal Zamfara, lesdi Naajeeriya. Hotaande mum woni nder wuro Talata Mafara, ko e 15 km diga tayta Bakolori dow Maayo Sakkwato…ìe 12¬∞34‚Ä≤00‚Ä≤‚Ä≤N 6¬∞04‚Ä≤ 00‚Ä≤‚Ä≤E. Duule …óon haadi dow fombina toe woila fuunaare nder nder kuugal yiilaaji mawbi …ói damma …óon hokkata.Dudule …óo Yahaya Abdulkarim, ngomnaaru Sakkwato…ìe diga lewru Janaayo 1992 haa lewuru Nowambar 1993.[2
∆äum woodi nokkuure 1,430 km2 (550 sq mi) e yim…ìe 215,178 ha nder limti yim…ìe 2006.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 892.

Tangaza:
Tangaza ko nokkuure laamorde (hukuma pamarun) nder Diiwal Sakkwato…ìe, Naajeeriya. Maandu maako …óon nder gariiri Gidan Madi.
Tangaza fecciri e leydi Niger haa woyla. Ina woodi nokkuure 2,477 km2 e yim…ìe 113,853 e nder limte 2006.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 841.

Taaraawni:
Taaraawni ko nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) nder Diiwal Kano, Naajeeriya. Sakaryaali mum woni nder nokku Unguwajjo Uku nder wuro Kano.
∆äum ina woodi nokkuure 28 wodiii km2 e yim…ìe 221,367 e nder limti yim…ìe/duubi 2006.
Koode postaal nokku oo ko 700.
Pattule.
Goomu leydi ina woodi dowe sappo (10) pattule bana …óo:

Federal College of Education (Technical), Asaba:
Federal College of Education (Technical), Asaba woni fedde laamu ja≈ãde mawnde nder berniiwol Asaba, Diiwal Delta, Naajeeriyia. O hawti e Fede ∆Åannde Benin (Naajeeriya) ngam kubaruuji jaangirde maako. Fannde fu…ó…óii e hitaande 1987 e Asaba Technical College, (ATC) to nokkuure mum ceerno. Asabu woni nokku …óo …ìamtaari …ìur…óo …ìeydaade e wuro wuro ngoo e hooreejo leydi Delta. Ha jooni, Asabo woni hooree…óo F Faddala Fattaare ∆Åa…óde Famtaade (Teknikal), Josephine Anene-Okakwa.
Taariiha.
Fedde Fuuta (Fedde) Asaba fu…ó…óii e hitaande duubi 1987.

Abdiqani Mohamoud Jidhe:
Gim…óo cu…ìal somali. 
Abdiqani Mohamoud Jidhe (somali: A…ìdiqani Maxamuud Jiidhe) un gim…óo cu…ìal lesdi somali, latti…óo jonta gomnaajo …ói lardu Gebiley …óun somali tun…óe jolal 2021. O haa…óeri boo un gomnaajo lardu sool kii…óo …ói somali nastu…óo ofiswal …óer silo 2019 haa sai jolal 2021. Inaare …óe o latti gomnaajo …ói lardu Ge…ìiley …óun somali haa jooni un hannko woni gomnaajo tun…óe 2021.

Dafour:
Dafour taa wa…óe‚Äô wemmbeede yuwude Darfur

Damakawa:
Damakawa n…óe jawleeru lasngol dun kamani 500-1,000 yim…ìe nder woyla-hirna Naajeeriya. Mbe joo…ói n…óer chi‚Äôon, saareeji tati haade maganda nder hukuma pamarun Sakaba lardu, Diiwal Kebbi. Mbe kuutira haa woldebe bolle Damakawa amma woodi ummibe satti haa c‚Äôlela.
Makkude jokkude.
Nde rammude limgal dunbe wolde dama kawa nasru (pdf) 2008-11-19 haa…óee …ìe datal ga…óa macinee. Nde‚Äôe winndannde kamani jewlere lasgol naajeetiya un stub an baaway balwo…óon wikipedia heebe…óe gam besdukingol.

Dawada:
Dawada (Duwwud, dawwada) un lasngol jawleeru Afro-Arab dega nde lardu fezzan dun fombinaare libiy. Ebe joo…óii ladude fiilaade nde gabraoun oasis ndeta gallure dun murzuk, innae nde yirbotoo brine shrimpee nder nde weeduuji lamdam. Ebe nyorinaa kawwaaji e soora mabbe haa caravansre innde dawada maa‚Äôanaa giiye- paraade nde Arabe yaaki haa du‚Äôun gollital. Wanngirde dun be dawada un daande wayloore karfeeje dizlin e woodi jokkal haa duudirka adadu. Ko duu…óii ma…ì…ìe. Ebe mbolda wolde lennol Arabe.

Yim…ìe Dawro:
Dawro nde yimbe dun fombinaare Ethiopy, kadi anndira haano n…óe omete…ìe mbolda bolle wolde dawragna.
Yaake nde ∆ôarniiji sappo e jenayi be dawro joo…ói nde heptude hare diiwal anndiraa haano nde dawlaawal …óun dawro. Nder 2000, be gebbal feccal dawro un henndi dow dega nde Artuunde finannde gebbal semien omo nder fombinaare lasdi, be lesde. E lardu yimbe. Dum woodinndiri ndun be woredes dun Isara Tocha, lamabosa, e Mareka Gena.

Lenyol Jawleeru:
Dibo nde Lenyol Jawleeru jottoriidun n…óer cakaare naajeeriya mbe nde jottori haade nde gelle bida e nden haa dubbe un julbe (islaama). Bolle ma…ì…ìe un ko nannd…ó haa nupe. Dun lisal. Nupold. E nde iyaalu wolde hawti nupe. Ebe kebee ko …ìurdi nder lapai, diiwal neeja e FCT Abuja hautirde lasdi naajeeriya, e kwaara hawti eko nanndi haai
Mbe joodi nder 60/ …óun laydi lapai e…óe lardu …óum mbe arannde joo…óorde.
Makkude
Gollal joshua, dow nde dibo.

Garko:
Garko eii hukuma pamara nder Diiwal kano eii woodi don tarihi,en don on, ewodi jama,are.

Rafi:
Rafi e hukuma pamaru haa diiwal Neja, Naajeeriya. Hedkwata ma…ìbe dow fattude Kagara haa A125 Highway.

Tudun Wada:
Tudun Wada e hukuma pamaru dow diiwal/wuro Kano, Naajeeriya. Lamba Lenguru postal code hanju on 710104. In wuro indingo e deme/remugo e lumo marori.

Sunusi Lamido Sunusi:
Sanusi Lamido Sanus sunusi lamido sunusi o(O da√±√±aama 31nder lewru yuuni alif teemeeje jowee nayi e cappan…óe e go'o (1961. ∆Åingel wuro laamu kani Kadi kii…óo maw…óo gomn√†ajo bankiwal maongal Naajeeriya (CBN). Maria Howard Weeden:
Maria Howard Weeden (6 morso 1846 - 12 seedto 1905), mo sayni golle mum nden wurtini no Howard Weden, o wonnoo…óo…óo tawon…óo e maw…óo Amerik mo wondi e Huntsville, Alabama. Caggal konu lesdi Aameerika, o fu…ó…ói feere kuu…óe …óe o wa…ói, …óe hawti e fotooji yim…ìe afriknaa…ìe e rew…ìe …ìe …ìe ngalaa hakke. O holliti kuu…óe maako nder Berlin e Paris nder hitaande 1895, to …óum ja…ìaama. O holliti defte nayi nder nder deftere maako diga 1898 haa 1904, o holli e def…óe maako. O wa…óii ko o wa…óata nder Alabama Women's Hall of Fame e hitaande 1998.
∆Åi…ó…óo.
Weeden jibini 6 lewru Duujal 1846, haa Huntsville, Alabama, lebbi jeetati caggal mawbe baaba maako, Dr. William Weedan, mo o wonnoo boo mo…óo moofta. Maama maako woni debbo maako …ói…óaw…óo, debbo maw…óo, Jane (woowo Urquhart) Watkins. Weeden e …ìikkoy maako njowee…ói…óo …ìeen maw…ìe …ìe maama ma…ì…ìe mawnini nder wuruo Weedan nder Huntsville.
Nder konu lesdi, gardii…ìe lesdi fuu nja…ìii suudu ma…ì…ìe ngam …ìe naftoroo e juu…óe ma…ì…ìe nde …ìe njoo…óini gariiri nder 1862. Ko arande, saare ma…ì…ìe …óon njahi nder suudu maccu…ìe. Nde Jane, go'oto nder …ìi…ì…ìe Weeden maw…ìe, …óon jaango dowle haa Tuskegee, Alabama, maama maako …óon njaara yim…ìe saare maako. Maria Weeden boo yahdi nder suudu janngirde, Tuskegee Female College nder duu…ìi konu. (Jamma …ìaawo …óun annditi …óum Huntingdon College.O winndi ko'e ma'a e maaki diga o …ìiydi, nden nder ja≈ãde o janngini bee maakin William Frye.
Caggal nde Weeden wari Huntsville, o fu…ó…ói wallugo kardi, kardiije, kuuwol, e dokke …óe o jaayndi ngam wallude saare maako. Wo…ì…ìe nder …ói'e …ìe …óon su…ì…ìa bee bee njamndi e ge…óe. O …óon ekkitina boo kuugal seni.
Kuugal.
Nder hitaande 1893 Weeden yahi nder World's Columbian Exposition nder Chicago, to o …ìeydi …ìernde maako ngam maw…ìe maw…óo …ìe kuu…óe ma…ì…ìe …óe feewti…ìe e rew…ìe …ìe …óon feerootiri …óon holli …ìe nder …óemngal cartoon nder hollaaki minstrel. O wartii Huntsville ngam o holli yim…ìe e teddungal yim…ìe. Firooji maako …óon hawta bee fotooji afriknaa…ìe …ìe …ìe njeyaa…ìe …óon kuugal bana maccu…ìe ngam maako e saare bandiraa…ìe maako. Nde o wa…ói, o nanngi haala ma…ì…ìe dow nguurndam ma…ì…ìe e dow haala yim…ìe, nden o …ìeydi wa…óugo feere nder …ói bana poemji, …ói o winndi nder …óemngal …ìaleejo. O wa…ói boo foto Saint Bartley Harris, mo …ìur…óo anndude e nder lesdi Afrik e ley…óeele Amerik nder Huntsville, Alabama.
Nder duu…ìi 1890s, Joseph Edwin Washington e debbo maako Mary Bolling Kemp Washington, mo jogii…óo Wessyngton Plantation e Robertson County, Tennessee, wa…ói Weeden wa…óugo fotooji feere nder maccu…ìe ma…ì…ìe afriknaa…ìe Amerik, …ìe njoo…óii ngam huuwugo ngam ma…ì…ìe bana yim…ìe …ìe ke…ìti hakke caggal nde …ìe ngaddani. ∆äi kuu…óe …óe ko 5" x7" e mawnude, e wo…ì…ìe …ìe timmini nder pastel. Weeden'en …óon wi'a ko'e maako …óon yi'i bana "go'o". ∆äum …óon miijo boo o waawi huuwugo diga fotooji yim…ìe.
Nder hitaande 1895, Weeden holliti fotooji feere-feere nder Afrik-Amerikiyanko'en e rew…ìe …ìe'e nder Berlin e Paris, to …ìe nja…ìaama. Firooji maako …óon teddina diga maw…ìe Joel Chandler Harris e Thomas Nelson Page, Harris boo …óon winnda ko haani nder deftere maako "Bandanna Ballads" (1899).
Weeden winndi boo gimol, o hawti e gimi e fannu nder defte mum nayi …ói o wurtini hakkunde 1898 e 1904. ∆äe go…ó…óe nder poems maako winndii e …óemngal …ìaleejo, anndiraa jooni bana Farayse-Ameriknaajo Ingelese, ngam o …ìeydi e heew…ìe e faalaaji yim…ìe …ìe o wi'i mo nde …ìe njoo…ói ngam fotooji.
Hakkunde 1866 e 1896, Weeden wa…ói e defte …óuu…ó…óe e dow dow ko'e go…ó…óe to "Presbyterian Christian Observer", nder nder "Flake White". ∆äe …ìe moo…ìti e …ìe bo…óiti nder hitaande 2005.
Nguurdam e maayde.
Weeden mee…óaay dewte. O e …ìiyum debbo maako Kate …ìe njoo…ói nder wuro Weeden nder duu…ìi maw…ói. Weeden maayi bee nyau nyau nduu e duu…ìi 59 nder 12 abriil 1905, nder Huntsville. E hitaande 1998 Weeden wondi e nder Alabama Women's Hall of Fame.

Muhammad Abdullahi Bulangu:
Muhammad Abdullahi Bulangu eii eriminmo naylde 5 lewru yolllal duubi 1955 eii lysdi Bulangu unguwarii Kofar Fada hukuma pamaru Kafin Hausa Diiwal Jigawa Leydi Naajeeriya.

Bulangu:
Bulangu eii yalde Doon onn bididoo hukuma pamaru kafin Hausa Diiwal Jigawa ewodi jama, are ei din tokoucil lamurade.

Gembu:
Gembu dum nokkore on e woni deu mambilla plateau haa Diiwal Taraba nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Dum latake headquarter nder hukuma pamara je sardauna andinama mambilla LGA ha nder Taraba.

Katherine Arthur Behenna:
Katherine Arthur Behenna (duubi daygo 1860 - 21 Silto 1926), anndiraa kadi e Kathleen Arthur Beenna, wonnoo…óo Scottish bammbaa…óo, gim…óo, ruuhuwal, e sufragiist. O …óon winndi kuuje dow huutoree…ìe …ìer…óe John Prendergast e John Pendregeist.
∆Åi…ó…óo.
Katherine Arthur jibini nder hitaande 1860 nder Helensburgh, Scotland. O e bandiraawo maako William …ìe …óon …ìe …ìii-…ìii. Baaba ma…ì…ìe Alexander Arthur diga Montreal, Kanada. O janngini nder Montreal, Boston, bana nder Art Students League of New York e Acad√©mie Julian nder Paris. Nder New York, o janngini bee George de Forest Brush, Carroll Beckwith, e John Henry Twachtman. O waree Henry Behenna nder hitaande 1885.
Kuugal.
Firo e ja…ì…ìorgo.
Behenna wa…ói fotooji nder nder …ìaleeji dow …ìalli, ko …ìuri sahaaji dow yim…ìe Amerik nder wakkati golde ngam ja…ìugo seni Peter Mari√©, hawti e Antoinette Polk, Baroness de Charette Anna Hall Roosevelt, e Am√©lie Rives Troubetzkoy. O wa…ói boo foto Louise, Princess Royal. Kuugal maako …óon holla nder Royal Academy of Arts e Modern Gallery nder London. O wa…ói boo kuuje njoweego nder kuugal …ìernde, "Njiwal …ìer…óe …ìandu", nder Tiffany Glass Building nder New York nder hitaande 1906. ∆Åaawo o jeyaa √âtaples, Farayse, to o wondi goomu nder koloniya senii…ìe Etaple.
Nder hitaande 1915, Behenna …óon ha…ì…ìita hooreejo laamu laamu nder ardii…ìe laamu, e …óon wa…ói kuuje nder New York e Baltimore, ngam hawrugo e hawtoree…ìe kuugal habbugo rew…ìe nder konu duuniyaaru. Behena …óon jeyaa.
Nolde e jawdi.
Katherine Arthur waree Henry Carstairs Behenna nder hitaande 1885, nden …ìe wo…ó…óiti. ∆Åe mari …ìi…ó…óo debbo, Vivian Margaret Behena. Katherine Beh√©na maayi ngam ∆¥ii∆¥am …ìernde nder 1926 caggal nde …ìe tawi o …óon maaya nder studio maako nder Chelsea, bana non caggala nde o watti lesdi Cayna, o huutori ngam huutoraade kuuje jeyaa…óe ngam …ìamtude …ìalli maako.
∆äe fotooji Behenna diga Peter Mari√© collection …óon hawrita nder New York Historical Society.

Lingua Franca Nova:
Lingua Franca Nova ( "Elefen" ) ko …óemngal ngal footiima wonde e laa…ìal, e fotaani anndude ngam haalde e nder ley…óe go…ó…óe.

Sumaila:
Sumaila eii hukuma pamarun nder Diiwal Kano nder lysdi Naajeeriya ewodi tarihi,en sossai e fumbina toe Garko toe Woila Gaya.

Gaya:
Gaya eii hukuma pamarun nder Diiwal Kano nder lysdi Naajeeriya ndum littugal wudil.

Gwaram:
Gwaram eii hukuma pamarun Diiwal Jigawa lysidi Naajeeriya e wodi Janbide e yempre Gwaram, nder ewodi bididdo 1,912km (sq ml) e wodi Jama,are e junbe duubi 2006

Mustapha sule lamido:
Mustapha sule lamido dum Nyalde lewru 5 dujjal duubi 1983 eii lysdi siyasa,en Naajeeriya eii lomou eii woni nokkuure g
Gomnaajo Diiwal Jigawa, bandirawo Sule lamido.mustapha sule lamido woilotoojji gwamnajo Doon on PDP duubi 2023 zabejou.

Muhammad Umar Bago:
Muhammad Umar Baogo dum nylde 22 lewru fabarilu eii lysdi siyasa,en Naajeeriya eriminmo dum Minna Diiwal Niger eiii nokkuure Nupe nder membajjo hukuma pamarun Chanchanga Muhammad Bogo jorni eii gwamajjo Diiwal Niger Naajeeriya.

Boss Gidahylda Mustapha:
Boss Gidahyelda Mustapha CFR Eriminmo duubi 1956 eii lysdi lawrajju toe lysdi siyasa,en Naajeeriya jorni ei SGF gada 2017 toe 2023 nder Ardii…óo Covid 19 PTF.

Teresa Okure:
Teresa Okure (jo duu…ìi 80) woni mo'o katolikiyankeejo Naajeeriya. O woni Afriknaajo arandeejo mo laato nder Ummaatoore ∆Åi…ó…óo Yeesu. O'o o'a mo'ol jannginoowo nder jaango teologiya Bibel, nder suudu Catholic Institute of West Africa, Port Harcourt, Naajeeriya. Okure …óon ekkitina Linnjiila e fassaruuye jinsu, e …óon anndina nder janngirde diga 1999.
O he…ìii jaango maako nder jaangirde Fordham. Nder 2013, o anndini o wondi mo waawata darnde ngam daranaade o bana kardinaal debbo diga Pope Francis.

Sabira Ibekwe Abdullah:
Patience Ibekwe Abdullah (duubi daygo 1963) ko laamii…óo konu dansannda'en (poliis) nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ka …ìaawo mo …ìeydaama to darnde daraniwol polis, o jeyaa e daranaaku darniwol polisiwol to suudu daranii…óo jamirooje jamiri lesdi, hooreejo leydi, Abuja, to o darndi ngam darnaago jamir…ói lesdi. O wa…ói boo hooreejo polis nder Diiwal Ebonyi Naajeeriya nder 2015. Bana Komisaarol Polise, o halki nokkuuji polise dow laawol leydi …ìaawo haajir…óe yim…ìe dow polisa'en nder nokkuji kolli. o wa…ói kadi kuugal feere ngam halkugo hakkeeji hawti e kugal ""Nji'a' fu'de' e kuuwal ""Walk down crime". o jeyi diga kuwal poliseeji lesdi Naajeeriya e 28 lewru Jaanaayru 2019
Nolde hoore.
Abdullah jibini ha 7 abriil 1963 nder wuro Odoje, Onitsha, Diiwal Aanambaara, Naajeeriya. Baaba maako Mike Ibekwe, mo mo'o je'i diga o jeyaama bo komisaaru polis je …óon jeyaa dow lesdi Naajeeriya fuunaa≈ãge caakare wakkati …ìaawo konu lesdi Naajeeriya timmi nder 1970.
Kuugal.
O hawti nder polis lesdi Naajeeriya nder 1989 bana ASP. O la…ì…ìinaama Komisaar Polisiya nder Diiwal Ebonyi nder 2015. Nder wakkati o …óon wondi Komisaarol Polise nder Diiwal Ebonyi, o wa…ói kuugal feere-feere ngam halki halkugo hawti bee ""Show of force" e ""Walk down crime". O halki boo polisji nder nder laawolji lesdi ngam yim…ìe …óuu…ó…ìe …óon …óon boowi polisje nder polis …óon mari …ìocce. O hokki innde "NNE Oma (maama mo∆¥∆¥o) " nder Diiwal Ebonyi ngam jaayndiyaa…ìe mootaa…ìe ngam hujja e nder nder e E Bonyi state nde o huuwani ton bana Komisaar'en polis. ∆Åaawo …óon o jeyaama to polis Abuja ha nder komisaarol polis ha dow Force Intelligence Bureau. Commission Service Police …ìaawo …óon ha…ì…ìii ha…ìuki maako ha pottal 27th plenary of Police Service Commission, je ha…ói ha Abuja ha Jum…ìaare, 20 Epril 2018. Hono e nder pottal plenary of the Police Service Commission ha Abuja ha 9 haa 11 Oktooba 2018, Commission'en ha…ì…ìii …ìeydaaki dii'o pamaro laamii…óo konu dansannda'en tati to jobal laamii…óo konu dansannda'en e Patience Abdallah woni debbo tan nder jami'a'e. ∆Åo'o …ìeydiima fu…ó…óugo ha nder arande, 1 lewru Noofambar 2018. o jeyaa diga kuugal polis lesdi Naajeeriya …ìaawo darnde Muhammed Adamu bana ardii…óo polis keso ha 15 lewuru 2019. Woni maako nder nder jaay…óe to kawtal ngal holli jaaynde maw…ìe maw…óo polis nde …ìe laarani gardii…óo ma…ì…ìe nder kuugal malla nder daraja …óo …óowtana ngam arda kuol polis. Woniji maw…ìe maw…óo maw…ói e maw…óe mawje maw…óum mawji ma'aje maaki mawni maami …ìe …óon …ìe hawti bee polis …ìaawo Adamu, …ìe mari …ìe jeyaago nde Adamu jeyaa be mawjo mawgo mawdo mawja maw…óa. O jeyi diga polis Nigeria e 28 lewru Jaanaayru 2019.

Endurance Abinuwa:
¬†
Endurance Abinuwa (danyeeki 31 Yuuli, 1987) ko ja≈ãde ja…ìnde ja…ì…ìorgo lesdi Naajeeriya. O jokki e juulde 2012 Summer Olympics.

Folashade Abugan:
Folashade Abigeal Abugan (dugumi 17 Desemba 1990) ko danndu…óo lesdi Naajeeriya mo anndini dow 400 mita. O wonnoo koode 400 m koondeeje nder juulde 2007 All-Africa Games e o …ìeydi haa kooreeji nder jeewte Afrik 2008 , nde o wa…ói sahaa …ìur…óo …ìooyde e 50.89 sekonde. O he…ìii medalji ja≈ãde e nder juulde juuliyaaru nder hitaande 2008 e juulade afriknaa…ìe nder 2009.
O wari nder 2010 Commonwealth Games nder Delhi o he…ìii koode silver …ói…ói ngam Naajeeriya nder 400 m e nder 4x400 m relay. Ammaa, Abugan o jeyaa e …óum ha…ì…ìii ngam o majjinaaki dow huutoraade lekki e he…ìugo test test for testosterone prohormone nder 'A' dow maako. O jeyi hakkki ngam he…ìuki B dow muu…óum.

Bukola Abogunloko:
Bukola Dammy Abogunloko (danyeeki 18 Agusta 1994) ko ja≈ãde Naajeeriya. O wondi nder nder lesdi Naajeeriya 4 √ó 400 mita relay team to 2012 Olympics, …ìe wa…ói …óum to final. Ammaa …ìe nja…ìaayi nder sakitaade (finaal).

Rose Aboaje:

Joo…óa.

Aminat Adeniyi:
Aminat Oluwafunmilayo Adeniyi (be danyee mou haa nder nyalawmaare 21 Seedto 1993) ko worgoowo nder lesdi Naajeeriya. O hawri e nder fijirde freestyle rew…ìe 58 kg nder juulal Commonwealth 2014 to o he…ìi medal gold.
O …óon wondi laam…óo lesdi nder ha…ìre nder lesdi Naajeeriya diga hitaande 2009 haa jooni, ko …óum wa…ói go…ó…óo nder leydi Naajeeriya. O hawti e nder juulde Afrik maw…óo nder Tunisia, 2014, to o laatii laam…óo Afrik nder kuugal maako. Ko o wa…ói nder lesdi lesdi Afrik woni nder dowle Commonwealth nder Glasgow, Scotland, nder hitaande 2014, to o he…ìii ja≈ãde.
O, bana mo jogii…óo, o jokki nder juulde Afrik maw…óo nder Misra, 2015, to o timmini juumre nden bana labbor…óo koode cardi. Nder 2015, nder juulde Afrik fuuje sappo e go'o nder Congo Brazzaville, o wakki lesdi Naijeriya nder nder darnde maako bana worgoowo, nden o he…ìii ja≈ãde. ∆Åaawo hitaande, nder hitaande 2016, o wa…ói gasa nder ja≈ãde Afrik maw…óo nder nder lesdi Misra, to o he…ìii medalje ja…ìnde. Nder hitaande nden, 2016, o he…ìii medal silver nder ko'e Olimpiadi ha Aljeeriya, ko wa…ói o laato hooreejo fijirde e nder Rio 2016. O jokki nder Grand Prix of Spain nder hitaande 2016, to o he…ìii medal bronze.
Nder hitaande 2017, o wondi laam…óo Afrik nder ja≈ãde maw…óo nder laamorde worgo nder Marok. Nder hitaande 2017, o wa…óii nder Fedde Fuuta Fuu…ónaango Furu Fure e Farayse, to o wa…ói Numeroy 8 nder duuniyaaru. 
E hitaande 2018, o jokkondiri e nder juulde Afrik maw…óo nder luural, wa…óetee…óo e Port-Harcourt, Diiwal Rivers, Naajeeriya, o he…ìi medal gold.
O he…ìii teddungal lesdi, Goomu Ordo Niger, MON diga hooreejo lesdi Goodluck Jonathan nder 2014 ngam anndugo kuu…óe maako maw…óe nder nder hawtaade.
O wonnoo feccere nder lesdi Naajeeriya, bana worgoowo freestyle, to juulde Afrik 2019 ha Rabat, Morocco, nde o he…ìi Etane Ngollo B. diga Kameruuna, nder dow dow, o he…ìii ko o yi'i, haa o warti ko'e nder konu …ìaawoore, ngam o wari laam…óo ja≈ãde e nder kilo 62 ngam …óum wa…ói o laatii laamii…óo.
O yahi Adekunle Ajasin University, Akungba Akoko, Diiwal Ondo, Naaeeriya to o he…ìii daraaji aranndeeji e nder Political Science, 2012. Nde o …óon haa ja≈ãde, o laati arandeejo jaangirde science politik hakkunde 2010 e 2011. O jeyaa kadi e hooreejo jaango nder jaangirde Adekunle Ajasin nder nder safaara e ja≈ãde e nder jannde 2011-2012, je o wa…ói haa o timmini jaangal maako fu nder hitaande 2012.
E hitaande 2020, o he…ìi koode silver nder nder jeewte …ìooyma debbo e kilo 62 e nder juur…óe Afrik e juurale juulde 2020. O he…ìii ko o jogori e nder 2021 African & Oceania Wrestling Olympic Qualification Tournament ngam darnugo lesdi Naajeeriya nder Olympics Summer 2020 to Tokyo, Japan. O hawri e nder nder jaaynde rew…ìe e kilo 62 .
