Ekezie mawnini nder Douala, Kameruun, to o wa…ói …ìiyum e o timmini janngirde maako. O dilli Nigeria nder hitaande 2001, nde o marunoo duu…ìi 10.
O he…ìii digirii nder habaru yim…ìe diga Nnamdi Azikiwe University.
Kuugal.
Ekezie huuwani nder radio duu…ìi tati e go'o. O mari feere feere nder internet, je …óon …óon maaki diga hitaande 2020.
O hawti TikTok nder 2020 ngam …ìeydaare je COVID-19 wa…ói. Video maako arande je …óon …ìooydi haandi …ìornugo limce aada diga lesdi Afrika feere feere. Nde o fu…ó…ói he…ìugo bolle …óe o anndi dow vidio'en, o wa…ói anniya o jaaboto …óe bee ko'e. Gila nden wakkati, Ekezie'en …óon ha…ì…ìo nder habaruji …ói …óon …óon halki haalude ha nder Afrik. E nder bidio go'o Ekezie …óon wi'a yim…ìe …ìe …óon yi'i afriknaa…ìe …óon njara ndiyam ngam …ìe walaa ndiyam, ngam …óon …óon mari ndiyam nder …ìooya; nder feere …óon holla …ìe …ìe Afrik woni lesdi go…ó…ói je Wakanda woni laamorde ma. Ekezie boo …óon haaki TikTok ngam …ìeydataako program ma…ì…ìe tawonnaaki foondoowo to yim…ìe Afrik, ko wayi no TikTokers Afrik'en mbaawataa he…ìugo ceede diga fiidiyooji ma…ì…ìe.
Ha nder lewru lewuru 2023, 60% e…ì…ìe Ekezie …óon nder lesdi Aameerika. Ha lewro Yuli 2022 Eekezie woodi yim…ìe miliyon 1.2; ha nder feebari 2023 …ìe …ìeydi haa …ìe …ìuri miliyaaruuji 2.
Ekezie wi'i o yi…ói warugo nder kubaruuji bana kuugal nder yeeso.
Ja…ì…ìorgo Kewuuji e ja…ì…ìorde.
Ha Desemba 2022, NPR haani Ekezie ha nder limgal TikTok duniyaaru.
Nder lewru janvier 2023, Ekezie ha…ì…ìiri ha nder maral tiktok's Top Creator 2022 Sub-Saharan Africa award.
Nolde hoore.
Ekezie …óon anndira Inngilisjo e Faraysay. O woodi bandiraa…ìe …ói…óo. O …óon torra bee …ìernde nder yonki maako fuu, e …óum wa…ói o …óon …ìeyda …ìer…óe ngam …ìaawo maajum.
Ha nder hitaande 2022, o joo…óii e Abuja, Naajeeriya.

Itohan Ebireguesele:
Itohan Ebireguesele (danyeeki 31 Yuuli, 1990) ko jogor…óo darnde darnuki darnaange nder lesdi Naajeeriya. O jeyaa e nder kilo 69 o he…ìi medaluuji e dow 2010 e 2014 Commonwealth Games.

Gwarzo:
Gwarzo dum latake hukuma pamarun nder Diiwal Kano nder Naajeeriya eill latake Gwarzo Eii wodi Janbide 393 km2 toe jama,are 183,987 dum 2006 .

Fawziya Abdoulkarim:
¬†
Fawziya Abdoulkarim (danyeeki 1 Maayu 1989) ko jokkondir…óo kammuunaa…ìe. O wondi goomu nder gardii…óo lesdi Kamerun e nder gollal …ìalli …ìaleere e Bafia Evolution e hitaande 2014. O wondi nder timmude lesdi Kamerun nder Firoore Fedde Fuuta Fuu…óal Foo…óol Fee…óir…óe Falaa…óe 2014 nder Italiya e nder juulal Olympics 2016 nder Rio de Janeiro.

Camila Brait:
Camila de Paula Brait (danyeeki 28 Oktooba, 1988) ko jokkondir…óo …ìalli …ìoli daga Frutal, Barazil, mo jogori…óo no freeball. O …óon walli Osasco Volleybol Club nden o …óon wari nder lesdi Barazil.
O he…ìii medalje silver nde o daranii Brazil e nder Olympics Summer 2020.
Kuugal.
O fu…ó…ói golle mum nder defte URS/Sacramento. Caggal …óum; o wa…ói nder go…ó…óe kawtal, …óe SESI/Uberl√¢ndia, Praia Clube-MG, S√£o Caetano/MonBijou e Osasco, innde Finasa/Osasco wakkati o hawti e kuugal.
Wano o jokki e Osasco, Brait he…ìii koode e …ìur…óo he…ìugo koore nder FIVB Club World Championship 2012 nder Doha, Qatar.
Brait he…ìii koode silver nder FIVB 2014 Club World Championship caggal nde club mum maayi 0 ‚Åá 3 to Dinamo Kazan nder match ko'e dow.
Kuugal hakkunde ley…óe.
Camila Brait wa…ói ciya maako arande nder lesdi lesdi man e lesdi Venezuela. Camila Brait hawti e FIVB 2010 Volleyball Women's World Championship, wa…óii nder Japan, walli leydi mum haa o timmini nder darnde …ói…óa…ìo.
Brait he…ìii ko'e …ìur…óo ja…ìaade, …ìurnde ja…ì…ìaare, e …ìurna …ìurdu…óo …ìure …ìurde …ìernde nde timmude maako he…ìti koode silver e 2015 Pan American Games nde …ìe mballa e nder match ja…ì…ìorgal 0-3 to Aameerika.
O su…ìi nder nder gollal lesdi ngam hawtaade nder juulde …ìalli …ìale …ìalle …ìalee…ìe nder Juul…óe Olimpiyeeje 2020, o he…ìi koode …ìele …ìole …ìaawo Brazil …ìadi 0-3 to Aameerik nder njuuldu koore …ìalndu …ìallere …ìool…óe medalji gold nder juulal volleyball rew…ìe.

Hadi Abubakar Sirika:
Hadi Abubakar Sirika nder nylde 2 lewru mayu mongou 1964 hukuma pamarun Dutsi Diiwal Katsina. Jorni ewodi ministajjo Lysidi Naajeeriya dun on Ardii…óo majalisajju Katsina woila

Chris Nwabueze Ngige:
Chris Nwabueze Ngige dum nylde 8 lewru Augusta 1952. Eii dun ministajjo Lysidi Naajeeriya Joe go,on bididdo gwamnatajjo Muhammadu Buhari eii gada Diiwal Anambra latake Jambiya,en PDP.

Zainab Lawal Gummi:
Zainab Lawal Gummi woni komisaaru elto nder Diiwal Zamfara, Naajeeriya. O laamaama ngam ngomnaaru Bello Matawalle.
Kuugal.
Gummi wi'i o …óon wallina he…ìugo jaango e haandi hakkiilo. O holli kadi dowla ma…ì…ìe …óon haani halki feere fu fu nder huutore …ìiy bana …ìiijo, bana hawtore e huwtora …ìikkoy. ∆äum he…ìay laawol laamii…ìe aada e hawtuki jannginoo…ìe Islaam ngam wallude jahrugo sari'aaji.

Safiya Hussaini:
Safiya Hussaini Tungar Tudu (danyeeki 1967) ko debbo Naajeeriya mo …ìe wa…ói kiita ngam wa…óugo njeenu nder hitaande 2002. O danydi …ìi…ó…óo debbo go'o nder Sakkwato…ìe, lesdi Naajeeriya nder sari'a. O jeyaa e nder kiita, ammaa o jeyaama e dow dow daliila fuu nder lewru Duujal 2002 caggal nde …ìe ceedi.
∆Åaawoore.
Hussaini wa…ói kiita ha mayde ha Oktooba 2001 ngam wi'a o woodi …ìi…ó…óo bee …ìurna debbo. O he…ìii …ìi…ó…óo …ìaawo wo…ó…óugo maako. Hussaini wi'i o …óon warugo haani ha nder fu…óugo e gorko, mo mahkam Sharia tawani mo walaa hakke ngam walaa daliila. Nder nder kiita, Hussaini walaa wakkilol habaru e haalude hakkilooji maako. Kot Sokoto ta∆¥i haala maako boo o hokki mo hakke dow 12 Oktooba 2001.
Hakkiilo …óon …óon ma…ì…ìa bana …óu…ó…óum, nden ha…ì…ìuki habaruji duniyaaru e petitisiji ngam rimugo maako …óon hawtake. Halima Abdullahi, maw…óo walligo wallitugo go'o e yidde (HELP), hawruki laamateeri, boo …óon moftake hakkiilu. Ha nder bolle o wi'i hakkoilu …óon "…óum ha…ói …ìurna Muslim'en lesdi Naajeriya. Yim…ìe …óon mbi'a kiita …óon …óon ko naa' ngam Hussaini …óon ceede ngam wa…óuki njeenu, ammaa ngam o …óon woodi nde o wooda. Kadi, seedaa…ìe nayi …ìe tawreeta Islaam wa…ói …ìe …óon walaa nder kiita. Halima wi'i kiita …óum wa…ói ngam Hussaini wari diga yim…ìe …ìe …ìe …ìeydaani. Nde …ìe mbi'i kiita'en bana "teddungal hakkiilo e hakkeere hakko e haandi", …ìe noddi gomnaaru Attahiru Bafarawa ngam o hawta ngam hisna Hussaini.
Hussaini …ìeydi, laamo'en maako …óon holla bana ko Husaini mari debbo haani woni baaba …ìi…ó…óo maako Adama mo duu…ìi go'o e debbo gariiri …óon wa…ói haala maako fu nder nder sembe. ∆Åe …óon holli bana non ko …ìe mbi'i wa…óugo ko'e ma'aare wa…ói ko o wa…ói diga …ìe huutoroo sari'ah nder leydi ndin. Sariya fulbe ha Sakkwato…ìe ha nder lewru Juun 2000, lewre caggal nde Adama …ìiyama. O …óon hawtina hooreejo lesdi Naajeeriya Hauwa Ibrahim.
Hussaini wi'i habaru…óo Okorie Uguru be …ìundu maako wa…ói ngam …ìe …ìa≈ãgti mo.
Hussaini he…ìii jaajol maako nder 25 Maars 2002 nden …ìe nja…ìaaki haala. Kotol Apelaatol Sokoto tawi kiita mayde, ko kotol Sharia Islam wa…ói ha Oktoobar, walaa daliila. Kotol ngal wa…ói kiita dow ko haani nder sari'a Sokooto haandi ha haadi haade Hussaini, ngam haasi haaki haaynii ha wodi haati haaduki sari', ha Sokoto haa haayi haalu haama haado ha…ói dow daliila.
Hussaini'en haandi …óum haani ha nder deftere "Safiya Husaini Tungar Tudu": I, Safia (2004).
∆Åaawo duu…ìi 18, Hussaini wi'i o yaafani tortoo…ìe maako.

Kiyawa:
Kiyawa latake hukuma pamarun nder Diiwal Jigawa lysdi Naajeeriya dum wooduke woru Kiyawa nder Naajeeriya

Bali:
BALI
Bali lataake hukuma pamara ei wonake nder Diiwaal Taraba Naajeeriya. Dum woodake headquarter nder wuro Bali. Dum woodake yareeji bananta Tiv jukun fulani/jibau chamba e ko laati woodake.Yareeji bananta Igbo Mumuye e himbe Niger/Delta habama hedi nokkore majum.

Gashaka:
GASHAKA
Gashaka wonake hedi fuuna nder Diiwal Taraba be Adamawa. Laatake dew kerol be kamarun. Dum woodake yajaki pellel kimani 6,402 km2.

Karim Lamido:
KARIM LAMIDO
Karim Lamido latake hukuma pamara eii Diiwal Taraba Naajeeriya. Dum woodake headquarter e nder wuro wuro Karim Lamido eei 9¬∞18‚Ä≤00‚Ä≥N 11¬∞12‚Ä≤00‚Ä≥E.. Dum woodake maunugo pellel ko laataki 6,620 km¬≤ be dudugo himbe wakkati census 2006.

Kurmi:
KURMI
Kurmi latake hukuma pamara ei Diiwal Taraba Naajeeriya.noe dum latirki hukuma pamara dum woodake maube ardinabe bananta chairman,en e luttube. Hukuma Kurmi dum sendirki ei nokkore sedda sedda.Dum woodake headquarter nder wuro Ba'Issa.

Lau:
LAU
Lau latake hukuma pamara ei Diiwal Taraba Naajeeriya. Dum woodake headquarter nder wuro Lau. Dum latake ardinama e himbe Hausare/Fulfulde.Lau wonake dew kerol be Ardo Kola Jalingo Yorro e Zing latake hukuma pamara ei diwaali Taraba.Dum hauti dew kerol e Numan be Diiwal Adamawa.

Kazaure:
Kazaure latake lamourade toe hukuma pamarun nder Diiwal Jigawalysdi Naajeeriya ndum headquarter nder nukkore kazaure.

Yankwashi:
Yankwashi Latake hukuma pamara nder Diiwal Jigawa lysdi Naajeeriya ewodi headquarter nder karkana.

Kiri kasama:
Kiri Kasama latake hukuma pamara nder Diiwal Jigawa lysdi Naajeeriya, ewodi headquarter nder kiri Kasama toe bididdo 797km2 toe jama,are 191,523 duubi 2006 census. Lamba,en 731. Naajeeriya jirgi,en Koree 9805 nder Kiri kasama.

Abdul Rahman Al-Sudais:
Abdul Rahman Ibn Abdul Aziz al-Sudais (Arabic: ÿπŸéÿ®ŸíÿØŸè Ÿ±ŸÑÿ±ŸéŸëÿ≠ŸíŸÖŸéŸ∞ŸÜŸê ÿ®ŸíŸÜŸè ÿπŸéÿ®ŸíÿØŸê Ÿ±ŸÑŸíÿπŸéÿ≤ŸêŸäÿ≤Ÿê Ÿ±ŸÑÿ≥ŸèŸëÿØŸéŸäŸíÿ≥Ÿê, be andirimou be A-Sudais), o neddo gooto nder imams joweenay jei Juulurde, Masjid al-Haram nder Makkah, Saudi Arabia; Ardidou jei Kuubdum Ardabe fiijiji di nde dum didi asaminkeejum Juulurde; innora Qari'( o hadditijo qur'anaa); Kanko on Dubai international asaminkeejum qur'anaa Award's "Lislaamu wela -ii'amjo haa hiitande 2005.

Dikko Umar Radda:
Dikko Umar Radda (Da√±√±ama 10 September 1969) un gim…óo lesdi Naajeeriya, mo ann…óal jawdi, Siyaasaaji e nden latti…óo ngomnaajo Diiwal Katsina cubtaa…óo √±al…óe 29th marcie 2023.O Daarectaajo fuu mo …óum m…ìe pamaral, cakaawal e gollal huunde faago Yeeso caggal Naajeeriya (SMEDAN).O subtaama Hooreejo ngomnaajo diiwal Katsina nder nde …óumngu 2023.[2

Isah Yuguda:
Isah Yuguda.
∆äuun danyiimo lewru 15 june dungu 1956 e gelle Yuguda, …óun …ìii ful…ìe jowl…ìe bo. O mee…ói wadgo gomnaajo diiwal Bauchi, lesdii Naajeeriya diiga dungu 2007 yaarii 2011 ardaaki ndee …ói…ói. O wa…ói ministaajo jahaale lesdii Naajeeriya les ardoogal Olusegun Obasanjo hiitaade 2000. 
O nasty jam'iyyaji siyaasa Naajeeriya …óu…ó…ói, o wa…ói ANPP, PDP be APC.
Njangde Maako (Education).
O njangi e njangirde Fowna ta wayla Naajeeriya nde innde Arts and science e gelle Maiduguri dungu (1974-1976), e dungu 1976 yaarii 1979 o yahii njangirde jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga gelle Zaria nga Innde Ahmadu Bello University …óon o njangi ilmu ndongidirkii leddi (Economics). O hawti degree maako …ói…óarjum e jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga gelle Jos diiwal Plateau nga Innde University Of Jos e dungu 1998. 
Kuungal Artuugal.
O wa…ói kakkilono wo banki ji …óu…ó…ói hanko woni Manajaajo bankii ji …óin nangi diiga Banki Mortage bank dungu(1981-1984), Savannah bank e dungu(1986-1987), Inland bank e dungu(1991-1992) yaarii NAL merchant bank e dungu(1999-2000). 
Ministaajo e lesdii Naajeeriya.
Jagordo shubtaa…óo ardii…óo Lesdii Naajeeriya koden Olusegun Obasanjo innimo bo lattinii mo hanko woni ministaajo jahaale lesdii Naajeeriya e hiitaade 2000. ∆Åawo …óob …ìe wattanii mo kujeerawal o wuiti ministaajo jahaale piirooji/jirgiwal dungu 2003. 
Gomnaajo Diiwal Bauchi.
O lattake jagordo shubtaa…óo ardotoo…óo diiwal Bauchi e lewru aprilu, dungu 2007 les jam'iyya ANPP ka siyaasa Naajeeriya. O he…ìi nasaraaku dow hebgo adadow yim…ìe cu…ìu…ìe mo yaarii 771,503 …óon o do'ii tefoo…ìe ardoogal gal …ìe jam'iyya ji CPC be ACN. 
Iyaaluji maako (Family).
O wodi rew…ìe nnayo (4 wifes), hajiya Aisha Isah Yuguda, Hajiya Hauwa Abiodun Isah Yuguda, Hajiya Mariya Isah Yuguda be Hajiya Nafisa Isah Yuguda. Hajiya Nafisa hanko woni …ìii ardii…óo Lesdii Naajeeriya Umaru Musa Yar'Adua. Hajiya Mariya bo …ìii Senatajoo Ahmadu Danyami.
Jam'iyya maako ka Siyaasa.
O wa…ói ANPP, …ìawo …óon o warti PDP nden boh e dungu 2016 o wanginii anniya maako dow o wartai jam'iyya APC ka siyaasa Naajeeriya les ardoogal Muhammadu Buhari kooden. 

Diana Eneje:
Diana Chioma Eneje (duubi daygo 19 juko 2002), anndiraa…óo e nder golle Diana Eneji, ko moodu…óo, vlogger e social media, jibinaa…óo nder Lagos, o ∆¥iwoyi nder Enugu, diiwal nder leydi Naajeeriya. O anndiraa ngam o golli nder Rema music video Dumebi
Diana Chioma Eneje jibini ha 19 juko 2002 ha Lagos to Kingsley Eneji, e Linda Eneja. Firo maako fu…ó…óam nder fashion, wari diga …ìur…ìe …ìiyum Jennifer Eneje, e Doris Enege, …ìe mardi mo njam…óinaandi fashion.
Kuugal.
E hitaande 2016, o fu…ó…ói golle mum nder modeling bana model mo …ìeydi duu…ìi 14, e duu…ìi 14. Nder 19 Aguusta 2017, o fu…ó…ói ha…ì…ìugo daande maako, ngam wallugo …ìikkoy …ìe …ìe …óon …ìeya. Eneje fu…ó…óii vlog fashion dow YouTube nder Aguusta 2019. O …óon holla …ìalndu, …ìalli, nyaamdu, e ko o wa…ói nder nder yaadu. Nder 19 Aguusta 2019, o wa…ói ko o ha…ì…ìii ngam ja…ìugo gelle mum ngam …ìalli …ìoli e hawtaade e The Shine Cartel. O wurtini nder Rema music video Dumebi, …óum wartirtee e Jonzing World, e Mavin Records e 21 May 2019, hono maw…óo nder video.
Eneje wa…ói semmbe ngam HP, Cadbury, PayPorte, Mango, Stanbic IBTC, Krispy Kreme, Kellogg Tolaram, Infinix, Bolt, Coca Cola, Octafx e ko …ìuri heewde. Ha 18 lewru Yune 2020, o holli dow golle mum, bana semmbibaajo to Guardian TV, bee Emmanuella jaajotoo…óo Popsicles.
Ha 19 August 2021, Swarovski, jaaynde jaay…óe e jaaj…óe nder Nigeria, holli Diana, bana gooto nder yim…ìe …ìe …óon mari semmbe dow marki maako.

Oluyemi Fagbamila:
Oluyemi Fagbamila (dugumi 23 feebari 1983) ko jogii…óo …ìooyma lesdi Naajeeriya, o joginoo…óo ko 400m.
E nder nder karallaagal 4 √ó 400 mita Nigeria o he…ìi koode silver e nder 2002 Afirikanaa…ìe Campiyoonji e o su…ìii ngam 2003 Campiyoonji Duuniyaru, amma timma ngal fu…ó…óii fu…ónaaki.
Fuu e nder ma…ì…ìe o wa…ói ko e…ì…ìiima e dow ko'e jowitii…óe e juulde 2002 World Junior Championships. O wa…óii ko o wa…óata e nder ja≈ãde …ìalli …ìalndu e …ìooyma e hitaande 1999 (100 e 200 m) to o he…ìii nde.
Sahaaji maako …ìur…ói …ìooyugo …ìooyi wakkati 23.46 nder mita 200, he…ìii nder lewru Mee 2002 nder El Paso; e 52.19 nder meta 400, wa…óii e lewuru Mee 2002 nder Houston. O …óon ha…ì…ìa ngam ja≈ãde Texas nder El Paso.

Bala Mohammed Kauran Bauchi:
Bala Mohammed Abdulkadir (Kauran Bauchi).
Innde maako Bala Abdulkadir Mohammed, (…óuun nda∆¥iimo ∆¥andeere 5 e lewru October dungu 1958) gim…óo siyaasajo Naajeeriya o me…ói wadgo ministaajo Abuja diiga dungu 2010 yaarii 2015, o wa…ói senatajoo Diiwal Bauchi ta fombina diiga dungu 2007 yaarii 2010, hanko woni boh Gomnaajo jagordo shubtaa…óo ardii…óo diiwal Bauchi diiga 2019 yaarii 2023. ∆äuun …ìeddi su…ìugomo hanko'on woni ardotoo…óo diiwal Bauchi e duu…ìi jotta (present years).
Kuungal Artuungal.
O mee…ói huwuki e ministiriji …óu…ó…ói nanngii diiga ministiri Nder wuro Naajeeriya, ministiri hiite, Ministiri riskow kaa∆¥e lesdii, o mee…ói wadgo ballitoowo ministaajo jahaale lesdii enta jahaale dow fiirooji nden boh o wa…ói directaajo mau…óo e fellere yim…ìe …ìe ilmu ndongidirkii leddi …ìe hande mee…óen (meteorological). O …óacci howky (retired) edow Mangu maako go darectaajo o nasti siyaasa Naajeeriya. 
Njangde Maako.
O fu…ó…ói njande maako e njangirde Duguri hiitaade 1965, o wa…ói njangirde Gomnaati shaakare nde Secondary e Bauchi …óon o hawti WAEC. O njangi e njangirde jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga gelle Maiduguri …óon o hawti degree maako.
Siyaasaji Maako.
O Nasti siyaasa Naajeeriya les baaba sowdow maako Isah Yuguda hiitaade o warti jam'iyya ma…ì…ìe ka PDP wakkacire o …ìaggi …ìi ardotoo…óo Naajeeriya Umaru Musa Yar'Adua. ∆Åawo mayde maako …óon o wuiti ga…óaa ballitoowo Yar'Adua on mo indee Goodluck Ebele Jonathan o latti hanko woni gim…óo maako masin.
Senatajoo E Diiwal Bauchi.
O wa…ói senatajoo Diiwal Bauchi ta fombina hiitaade 2007 les jam'iyya ANPP ka siyaasa Naajeeriya. O ardake ∆¥im…ìe fombina Diiwal Bauchi diiga dungu 2007 yaarii 2010. O jogake kujeeraaje mau…óe e majaalisa senata'en ardotoo…ìe lesdii Naajeeriya, doow luu…ìe, felle, shede, boldatee…óe, kuu…óe lesdii, e ko nanndi fuu. ∆Åawo mayde Ardotoo…óo Naajeeriya e wakkaci mo innde Umaru Musa Yar'Adua …óuun lattini ballitoowo mo ardoogal hanko ardotoo lesdii Naajeeriya e dungu 2010 hanko woni ∆¥i'e Goodluck Ebele Jonathan. O inni howky be maako o hokkimo kujeerawal maugal koden. 
Ministaajo Abuja.
E lewru Aprilu dungu 2010 ardotoo…óo Naajeeriya Goodluck Ebele Jonathan ronoow…óo Umaru Musa Yar'Adua …ìawo mayde maako lattini mo hanko woni ministaajo Abuja hanko hollata kila no gelle Abuja …óen woo…óirta fuu. O walliti hoje ardaaki wadgo laa…ìi bo…ó…ói e maheele bo…ó…ói nder Abuja gamma woo…óuki gelle …óen. 
==Gomnaajo Diiwal Bauchi==.
O lattake jagordo shubtaa…óo ardotoo…óo diiwal Bauchi dungu 2019 yaarii 2023 o do'ii gomnajo Abubakar Muhammad e kuri'aajii 515,313. ∆≥im…ìe diiwal Bauchi …ìesdi shubtowki mo dow …ói…óawre ardoogal e lewru tatawru ndu Maris, dungu mee…óen jotta 2023.
O he…ìi nasaraaji …óu…ó…ói e ardoogal maako Gomnaajo Diiwal Bauchi.
Yim…ìe diiwal Bauchi …ìesdi cu…ìuki mo ardoogal diiwal Bauchi dow …ói…óawre ardoogal e lewru Maris, dungu men dow 2023. 
Hiimo…ìe

Aisha Falode:
Aisha Falode woni marjoowo fijirde nder lesdi Naajeeriya. O woni boo hooreejo Nigeria Women Football League (NWFL).
∆Åaawo nde Raymond Dokpesi …óon …óon wa…óa anniya ha…ì…ìuki teleeji mum, anndiraa jooni bana teleji Afrik maw…ói (AIT), o hawti. ∆äu'um wa…ói o he…ìii ja≈ãde nder …óemngal mass communication. Ga…óa …óum o huuwi kadi wakkati se…ó…óa bee NITEL (Nigerian Telecommunication Limited) nden boo bee Graduate Telephone Operators Scheme of the then Nitel.
Ko o he…ìii ko o wa…ói nder nder golle …óe o wa…óata nder kuugal e nder radio.
Nder lewru Janaare 2017, o ha…ì…ìii hooreejo Nigeria Women Football League, hooree…óo Aiteo Cup e Nigeria Premier League.

Isa Yuguda Bauchi:
Isa Yuguda.
∆äuun danyiimo lewru 15 june dungu 1956 e gelle Yuguda, …óun …ìii ful…ìe jowl…ìe bo. O mee…ói wadgo gomnaajo diiwal Bauchi, lesdii Naajeeriya diiga dungu 2007 yaarii 2011 ardaaki ndee …ói…ói. O wa…ói ministaajo jahaale lesdii Naajeeriya les ardoogal Olusegun Obasanjo hiitaade 2000. O nasty jam'iyyaji siyaasa Naajeeriya …óu…ó…ói, o wa…ói ANPP, PDP be APC.
Njande Maako (Education).
O njangi e njangirde Fowna ta wayla Naajeeriya nde innde Arts and science e gelle Maiduguri dungu (1974-1976), e dungu 1976 yaarii 1979 o yahii njangirde jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga gelle Zaria nga Innde Ahmadu Bello University …óon o njangi ilmu ndongidirkii leddi (Economics). O hawti degree maako …ói…óarjum e jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga gelle Jos diiwal Plateau nga Innde University Of Jos e dungu 1998.
Kuugal Artuugal.
O wa…ói kakkilono wo banki ji …óu…ó…ói hanko woni Manajaajo bankii ji …óin nangi diiga Banki Mortage bank dungu(1981-1984), Savannah bank e dungu(1986-1987), Inland bank e dungu(1991-1992) yaarii NAL merchant bank e dungu(1999-2000).
Ministaajo e lesdii Naajeeriya.
Jagordo shubtaa…óo ardii…óo Lesdii Naajeeriya koden Olusegun Obasanjo innimo bo lattinii mo hanko woni ministaajo jahaale lesdii Naajeeriya e hiitaade 2000. ∆Åawo …óob …ìe wattanii mo kujeerawal o wuiti ministaajo jahaale piirooji/jirgiwal dungu 2003. 
Gomnaajo Diiwal Bauchi.
O lattake jagordo shubtaa…óo ardotoo…óo diiwal Bauchi e lewru aprilu, dungu 2007 les jam'iyya ANPP ka siyaasa Naajeeriya. O he…ìi nasaraaku dow hebgo adadow yim…ìe cu…ìu…ìe mo yaarii 771,503 …óon o do'ii tefoo…ìe ardoogal gal …ìe jam'iyya ji CPC be ACN. 
Iyaaluji maako (Family).
O wodi rew…ìe nnayo (4 wifes), hajiya Aisha Isah Yuguda, Hajiya Hauwa Abiodun Isah Yuguda, Hajiya Mariya Isah Yuguda be Hajiya Nafisa Isah Yuguda. Hajiya Nafisa hanko woni …ìii ardii…óo Lesdii Naajeeriya Umaru Musa Yar'Adua. Hajiya Mariya bo …ìii Senatajoo Ahmadu Danyami.
Jam'iyya maako ka Siyaasa.
O wa…ói ANPP, …ìawo …óon o warti PDP nden boh e dungu 2016 o wanginii anniya maako dow o wartai jam'iyya APC ka siyaasa Naajeeriya les ardoogal Muhammadu Buhari kooden.

Habibah Ruth Garba:
Habibah Ruth Garba woni komodore haaju nder lesdi Naajeeriya. O debbo arandeeji mo …ìe …ìe …ìeydi haa darnde komodore haa lesdi Naajeeriya. O he…ìii karis award nder 2013 e women achievers award of the Women in Management, Business and Public Service (WIMBIZ) 2018 conference in Nigeria.
Kuugal.
Habibah Ruth Garba ko Habib Ruth, ko habib habiba ha haibba haaji ha bi'i ha'ibbe ha nder lesdi Naijeriya. O woni debbo arande mo haabibi haabbe haa habibi ha hibbe Haabibah Rut Garpa.
∆äo …óum jaabawol ngal ngal Household of God Church nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Jaabawal ngal woni nder kuugal GRACE ngal juulirde ngal fu…ó…óorii e hitaande 1990. O ja…ìi ja…ìaaku Female Achievers Award nder jaaynde Women in Management, Business and Public Service (WIMBIZ) 2018. Jaayndi ndu wa…óii ngam wa…óugo ku…óol ngam …ìamtirde, hokkude baaw…óe e …ìeydaago darnde rew…ìe nder nder goomu ummaatoore e goodu…ìe.

Christie George:
Christie George (dayngol; 10 Maayu, 1984) ko jokkondir…óo …ìaleere leydi Naajeeriya.
O wonnoo nder …ìalli fu…ónugo lesdi lesdi Naajeeriya nder juulde juulal 2008 Summer Olympics.

Rahma Haruna:
Rahma Haruna (c. 1996 - 1997; 25 Bowte 2016) ko …ìi…ó…óo duu…ìi 19 n…óer lesdi Naajeeriya, mo laatii ann…óu…óe ngam fotooji …ói fotoowo Sani Maikatanga wa…ói.
Laamu.
Haruna jibinaa wakkati feere hakkunde 1996 e 1997, nder lesdi Naajeeriya. To Haruna wa…ói lebbi joweego, jungo maako e juu…óe maako …óon maaki, sey juude maako go'oto. O …óon wondi nyau nyau…óo mo anndaa…óum wa…ói o …óon mbaawaa wa…óugo kuu…óe manjum bana yahugo, jahugol, koo boo huuwugo kuuje …óuu…ó…óe. Ngam …ìernde maako …óon …ìeyda, o haani joo…óugo nder boondi plastik. ∆Åaawo foto'en …ìeydi …ìurugo haandi, go…ó…óo mo …ìe anndaa mo hokki mo carel …ìoggi ngam …ìe …ìesda mo. Maw…ìe Haruna …ìe hokki …ìe …ìe mari Nayra go'o miliiyonji n…óer njamu (US$2,737.89); amma o warataa. O maayi ngam daliila anndaa…óum dow 25 Diiseemba 2016, to duu…ìi 19 nder Kano, Naajeeriya. Haruna …óon maaya e …ìikkoy maako.

Amina Lawal:
Amina Lawal Kurami (duubi daygo 4 Siilo 1973) woni debbo Naajeeriya mo …ìe njetti e mayde ngam …ìe nja…ì…ìi ko'e ma…ì…ìe e ngam …ói marii …ìi…ó…óo nder suudu. Lawal wa…ói kiita e suudu sharia islaamiyankoore nder Funtua, nder diiwal Katsina, Naajeeriya, ha 22 Duujal 2002. Yim…ìe …ìe o anndini bana baaba …ìi…ó…óo, Yahayya Muhammad Kurami, …ìe nja…ì…ìi hakke ngam kawtal anndal. Ko …óum wa…ói ko Kurami yaafani sabu o wa…óii alkawal e Quraan, …óum wonaa laawol Lawal ngam …ìiyum, ko …óum holli dow janngirde MƒÅlikƒ´.
Lawal'en …óon nja…ì…ìa …óum wa…ói feere feere nder lesdi. O jeyi …óum to suudu sharia, …ìe ta∆¥i …óum haaloo…ìe sari'aani, nden o rewi.
∆Åaawoore.
Lawal woni debbo …ói…óa…ìo nder lesdi Naijeriya mo …ìe njokki ngam wa…óugo jonde yeeso kawtal. Debbo arande, Safiya Hussaini, wa…ói kiita maako bo…ó…óina nder lewru mars 2002 nder dabare maako aranndeere. Sharia law ha…ì…ìiti nder lesdi Zamfara nder woyla Nigeria nder hitaande 2000 nden diga saa'i maajum haajiri haa lesdi feere sappo e …ói…ói.
Fedde jaabaade e ja…ì…ìaade.
Fuude wootere wa…ói e 25 Septemba 2003 Lawal'en kiita mayde ngam yiitaaki e mari kaa∆¥e …óum jeyaa e juutaaji njowo nder Kotol Sharia lesdi Katsina. Fedde nayi nder laamii…ìe jowi wa…ói kiita dow kiiteji Islaam dow daliila feere, hawti e: hakkki ummotoore to ja…ìugo kiitaaji hakkiilo, dalillaaji dow …óaamugo maako naa' …ìe haani, kiitol ummotoo…óo naa≈ã …óum ha…ói, nden gooto tan haa wakkati kiitoji tati je haajirta …óon …óon ha haadi wakkati kiitta.
Baobab for Women's Human Rights, NGO ha Nigeria, ha…ì…ìii haala maako, nde laatii ha hawtoreede e laamii…ìe Nigeria …ìe …óon janngina nder dille jaajol e sharia. Lakilaa…ìe Lawal hawti e Hauwa Ibrahim, laakiyaajo hakkiilo yim…ìe mo anndiraa ngam kuugal maako ngam yim…ìe …ìe …ìe ta∆¥ii ley sari'a. Nder defte ma…ì…ìe maral Amina Lawal, laamoo…ìe naftiri e "laamu …ìeydi" (laama …ìuydi), …ìe mbi'i e nder sari'a sariya, duu…ìi jowi ina waawi hakkunde …ìiydi ne…ó…óo e danygol; duu…ìi …ói…ói yeeso danygal …ìi…ó…óo maako debbo, o …óon haani e gorko maako.
Ja…ì…ìorgo Kewuuji.
Kuugal ngal hollitii …ìeydaaki nder ummaatooje e diina hakkunde diiwaanuuji kiristaanaaji e Muslim'en nder lesdi Nigeria.
Fedde nden wa…ói …ìeydaaki nder lesdi Yammaaru, nden …ìe wa…ói kuugal ngam …ìe kolli laamu Nijeria ngam o wurtina fedde ndee.
Wurooji feere nder nder jarida mawninki Miss World, je …óon wa…óa nder Nigeria nder 2002, …ìe ∆¥etti nder sarda ngam …ìe …óon ha…ì…ìa ngam no Amina Lawal wa…óata. Miss Norway …óon kiita kiite nden o noddi …óum ""ko …ìur…óo …ìeydaago"" o wi'i o …óon yaha haa Lawan yaafana.
Miss Ivory Coast wi'i,¬† ‚Åá na yahugo to Nigeria, e mi tammi gootol am na walli ngam hisna Amina Lawal." ¬†Miss Togo …ìeydi, "Kafugo debbo on naa' ko haani. Fuuta ummaatoore fu ha…ói wurta ngam timmugo kuu…óe …óe."Rabaaji mawninki feere feere fu …óon wakiilo lesdi feere boo …óon numi kiita nden …ìe …óon tokka. Oprah Winfrey "Show" wa…ói haala feere dow Amina Lawal e …ìawti yi'oo…ìe ngam …ìe neldi e-mailji protest to Ambasadaaru Naajeeriya to Amerik: …ìur…óe e'e-meila miliyon 1.2 …ìaawo.
Amnesty International wa…ói jaabuki be sembe to kiita ngam Naajeeriya woni jaabago to Convention internationale de droits humains ha dow tortion e feere ha nder haandi, ha haani ko ha…ói ko huwtata ko'e je …óon haaki. Goomu boo …óon toro lesdi Naajeeriya ngam …ìe wurtina sari'a law nder nder lesdi lesdi ndi'e nder hitaande 1999. Ammaa Amnesty anndaa wonde haala nde …óon woodi nder lesdi Naajeeriya, nder leydi …ói diina yaawni.
Ardii…óo lesdi Amerika Bill Clinton noddi ardiijo lesdi NaajeeriyaOlusegun Obasanjo, "Mi tammi e …óon toro ngam sistemol kiita he…ìan laawol ngam yaafugo debbo mo …ìe maayi ngam o haani danyugo …ìi…ó…óo nder dewgal". Ngam maajum, Clinton …óon toro yim…ìe …ìe …óon nja…ì…ìa ngam hooreejo Obasanjo woni Kiristaano diga worgo lesdi Naajeeriya, nden boo o …óon ha…ìana …óum. ∆Åeydi, Musulman'en tan …óon je …óon …óowtana sari'a law, ngam maajum hooreejo Obasanjo walaa ko wi'i nder haala nden, walaa baaw…óe dow ko'e.
"save Amina" nder hitaande 2002 hawriti e…ì…ìoore nde he…ìi heew…ìe e junngo e'e e…ìoori e nder 2003 e …óemngal " ‚Åá Please Stop the International Amine Lawal Protest Letter Campaigns" nde Ayesha Iman e Sindi Medar-Gould je wakili dow yim…ìe lesdi Naajeeriya …ói…óo ha…ì…ìoo…ìe hakkeeji Aadama wi'i "amina amina", hajjitol "Save Amuna" …óon woodi feere feere fu, hawti e wi…óugo feere-feere dow ko wa…óata ngam wa…óugo kiita …óon …ìadake. ∆Åe …ìeydi …ìe'e wi'i "∆äum …óon wondi ko haani ha nder tammunde ngam go…ó…óe jamirooje hakkiilo yim…ìe duniyaaru malla feere …óon anndira ko …ìuri yim…ìe hawta…ìe dow maajum, ngam maajum …ìe waawi wa…óugo kuu…óe …óe …óon hawti bee ko …ìe yi…ói".
Nder lewru Maayi 2003, jaabuki rasmiji Embassy of Nigeria to Netherlands to kiita sharia dow lesdi Katsina nder Nigeria, ha nder lesdi lesdi Naajeeriya, woni dow walaa suudu kiitaaji hokki kiite dow Lawal. ∆Åe mbi'i bolle …óe "ko'e daliila e kallu…óum" nden "ndolol ko ngam "ngol ha…ói nder nder lesdi Nigeria e nder leydi ndi yeeso ummaatoore duniyaaru". ∆Åe mbi'i …ìe anndaa haala nde'e.
Ambassador A.A. Agada daga Embassy of Nigeria to Washington D.C., US, …ìeydi …ìurugo anndugo haala Lawal e wi'i e 29 August 2003: "Ambassad yi…ói anndino'on Malama Amina Lawan woodi dowji tati dow kiita'en hawtoree…ìe yeeso kiitaaji maako. Embassy bee …óo …óon tabbitin yim…ìe fuu hakkilo Malama Lawal ha nanki haadi ha nder Sariya lesdi Naajeeriya …óon haaki. Ngam maajum, wa…óaaji ja…ì…ìaade …ìe …óon tokka ngam tabbitinki laamu do lawol".
Nder aada yim…ìe.
Bana no …óum annditi nder Wuroowo Firo e Jaabawol haa fu…ó…óam binndi "419" …ói Will Ferguson wa…ói, Amina, debbo debbo mo …óon …ìeyda e …ìernde mo o …óon …óon mbaadi diga lesdi Sharia nder lesdi lesdi Nigeria fuunaa≈ãge, …óon haandi dow Amine Lawal.
Alison M. Jaggar, mo anndal filsuf Amerik, winndi wonde nder hitaande 2005 dow haala ngal, "Saving Amina".

Kacha:
Katcha latake hukuma pamara nder Diiwal Niger lysdi Naajeeriya dum headquarter nder wuro Kacha. Woru Badeggi biddi on.

Ahmed Tijjani Mu'azu:
Ahmed Tijjani Mu'azu.
∆äuun danyiimo nder lewru september dungu 1957 nder gelle Gombe, diiwal Gombe. O me…ói wadgo ardotoo…óo hukuumare wadgo shubtal ngal lesdii Naajeeriya (INEC).
Njangde Maako.
O njangi e njangirde gelle Gombe, e diiwal Kaduna be diiwal Borno hankowdee 1964 yaarii 1975. E dungu 1976 o saalii njangirde sooja'en nga NDA(Nigerian Defence Academy). E dungu 2005 o hawti degree maako …ói…óarjum e jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga Ibaadan (University Of Ibadan) ∆Åawo …óon …óuun shubti moo o warti hanko woni mau…óo ardotoo…óo hukuumaje go…ó…óe nder lesdii Naajeeriya …óe sooja'en. O lattake membaajo mau…óo e njangirde sooja'en, o jogake joodorde mau…óe …óe ndongidirkii harka sooja'en. ∆äuub lattini mo hanko woni mau…óo comishinajo e Hukuumare ndongidirkii shubtal ardoogal siyaasa lesdii Naajeeriya e dungu 2016. E dungu 2020 boh …ìe lattini mo hanko woni jagordo hukuumare nden o warti hanko woni ronoowo Mahmud Yakubu. 
Hiimo…ìe

Bosso:
Bosso latake hukuma pamara nder Diiwal Niger lysdi Naajeeriya dum headquarter nder maikunkele .

George Akume:
George Akume be ndayimo 27 Bowte 1952 be leddi Naajeeriya on bo bi siyasa, en on mo jotta kanko on Secretary to the Government of the Federation ji Ardido leddi Bola Tinubu supti, wo wodi minister of Special Duties and inter - governmental affairs ha gwamnati Muhammadu Buhari Daga 2019-2023, o wadi senator je benue her wakkere waila - hirnada Daga 2007-2019 bo o jodi korowal minority leader je senate Daga 2011 - 2015 bo o waddi gwamna wuro Diiwal Benue Daga May 1999 - May 2007.

Willeke Alberti:
Willeke Alberti (dugumi 3 feebari 1945) (ndun naamnde goonga: Willy Albertina Verbrugge) ko ina…óo heewnoo…óo e gollal holandi, …ìi…ó…óo maw…óo jaaynde e maw…ìe weltaare Willy Alberdi (1926 - 1985) e Hendrika Geertruida Kuiper (1921 - 2011).
Biogaraafiwol.
Willeke Alberti fu…ó…óii golle mum e duu…ìi sappo e go'o nder muusikal Duel om Barbara e o wa…ói faade mum arande nder 1958 e baaba mum. Nder duu…ìi 1960, o wondi maw…óo maw…ìe maw…óe e Holandi e wonde ko …ìuri tee≈ãti e "De winter was lang" ("Jamdu wa…ói ko heewi"), si tawii hay hay huunde wootere holandiinde hay wakkati oon. Wileke e baaba mum jogii hollitii…ói teleediyooji hakkunde 1965 e 1969. Ko o wa…ói nder yimbe diga hitaande 1970 haa fu…ó…óam, o …óon …ìeyda, ammaa Alberti …óon wurtina yim…ìe e albumji nder wakkati feere e o wa…óa kuu…óe man…óe nder teleeji e filimji.
Daga 1964 haa 1974 o waree e maw…óo muusik Joop Oonk e …ìe mari …ìi…ó…óo debbo. O ware John de Mol nder 1976, …ìe mari …ìi…ó…óo, Johnny de mol. ∆Åe ta∆¥ii e hitaande 1980, Alberti feccitii e debbo mo o jokki e nder leydi S√∏ren Lerby. ∆Åi…ó…óo go…ó…óo jibini nder teegal ngal. S√∏ren Lerby e Willeke Alberti ta∆¥ii nder hitaande 1996.
E hitaande 1994 o daranii Holandi e nder Eurovision Song Contest e nde "Waar is de zon?" ("To naange woni?"), ko wa…ói poondi nayi daga nder ardii…ìe ardi, fuu diga Austria, ko …óon jeyaa 23e.
Nder duu…ìi Alberti wa…ói nder Netherlands bana go'o gay, ngam hawtaaki nder nder repertori'en yimbe maako, durugo maako e kuu…óe maako ngam wallugo daliila gay …óuu…ó…óe.

Ingeborg (woowo):
Ingeborg (dayngol Ingegorg Th√©r√®se Marguerite Sergeant, 15 Oktooba 1966, Menen) ko maw…óo maw…ìe Belji e jaaynde tele, anndiraa…óo …ìur…óe faayiida e …ìaawo Beljik ngam naatgol mum nder Eurovision Song Contest 1989.
Fu…ó…óam golle.

Firo gimol Eurovision.
Nder 1989, yimbe Ingeborg "Door de wind" ("Through the Wind") laato nder yimbi Beljiyam nder nder jaaynde Eurovision 34th Song Contest, je wa…ói nder 6 May nder Lausanne, Switzerland. ∆Åaawo golle.

Gila 1999 Ingeborg …óon huuwa bana jannginoowo yoga e maarooji. Nder hitaande 2007 o fu…ó…ói huuwugo bana darani…óo e hawrugo ngam haalde dijital Vitaliteit .
Nolde hoore.
Ingeborg …óon te'a mar…óo maako, Roland Keyaert. ∆Åe mari …ìi…ó…óo go'o, jibinaa…óo nder 1994, …ìe njoo…ói Bruges.

Gimol …ìeen wa…ói ko e nder sahaa …ói…óa…ìu nder seminaal arande e 12 lewru Mee e Moscow, to …ìe nja…ìi nokkuuje joweego e 67 poondi. O yahdi to Grand Final nder 16 May. Nder …óon o wa…ói yimbe 22 nder jemma nden Gheorghe hokki hollude dow laral le…ó…óe bi'etee…óo "Iele" nder Romania. O wari 19th nder jemma nden o he…ìii poondi 40, hawti e poonzi 12 diga Moldova, jee…ói…ói diga Spain, e jowi diga Turkey e Macedonia, ekn.
2010 - 2012: anndal Europe e "Disco Romancing".
Caggal Eurovision o …ìeydi anndude nder Orop fuu o wurtini "Disco Romancing" ko o wa…ói hit nder Rumunya, e nder top 10 nder Hungary e he…ìuki fota nder Czech Republic, Netherlands, Poland e Slovakia. "Midnight Sun" woni ko …ìaawo "Hallo" nder top 10 nder Top 40 nder Netherlands e Top 100 nder Romania. E hitaande 2011 o golli e Dony o wa…ói "Hot Girls" ko o fu…ó…óii wa…óde nder nder Orop. Nder hitaande nden o wa…ói jaaynde maako arande nder Orop, o yaha nder Jarmal, Espaa√± e Girka. "Disco Romancing" georghe's album wa…ói nder hitaande 2012, nder Spain e Japan. Album ngal wa…ói 3 …ìeydi yimbe "Your Captain Tonight", "Amar Tu Vida" e "Hypnotic".
2013 - present.
Nder hitaande 2016, Disney Enterprises e Walt Disney Romania su…ìi artist to be part of an animated TV Series produced by Disney, e o …óon seeda haala maw…óo to Elena of Avalor.
Nder 2019, ngam mawnugo Aromanian National Day (…óun mawnina ko 23 May), Gheorghe wa…ói kuugal aromaniya.
Nder lewru mars 2022, o wurtini yimbe keso biyetee…óo "Bra»õele".

Grace Alele-Williams:
Grace Alele-Williams OON, FMAN, FNAE (16 Bowte 1932 - 25 Duujal 2022) o wonnoo jannginoowo Naajeeriya mo jannginoo…ìe limngal hiisa, o wa…ói taariika nde o woni debbo lesdi Naajeeriya arande he…ìugo jaango dowla, e debbo lesdi Naajeeri arandeejo lesdi Naajeeriya arandeejo nder Janngirde Benin.
∆Åi…ó…óo e janngirde.
Grace Awani Alele jibini to baaba'en Itsekiri e Warri, Western Region (ko jooni Delta State), Nigeria e 16 Desemba 1932. O yahi Ja≈ãde laamu, Warri, Queen's College, Lagos e University College of Ibadan (ko jooni woni University of Ibadan). O he…ìii digirii maggal nder limte nder nder nder jannde Queen's School, Ede nder Osun State nder hitaande 1957 e digirii PhD nder limte limte nder limte e nder University of Chicago (U.S.) nder hitaande 1963, ngam maajum o laatii debbo lesdi Nayjeriya arano e he…ìde doktoor. Grace Alele waree nder hitaande nden, nden o annditi bee innde Grace Alele-Williams. O wartii Nigeria ngam duu…ìi …ói…ói nder golle postdoctoral to University of Ibadan, ko o artii to University of Lagos e 1965.
Kuugal.
Alele-Williams fu…ó…óii jannginki jannginki e Queen's School, Ede, Diiwal Osun, to o jeyaa e jannginki limte diga 1954 haa 1957. O dilli to University of Vermont ngam o warde jannginoowo jaagorgal e …ìaawo …óon o wardi jannginoo…óo jannginoo…ìe. Daga 1963 haa 1965, Alele-Williams laati mo wi…ótoowo wi…ótoo…ìe dow janngooji, jaango (e jaango) nder janngooje, jaango Ibadan, diga to o laatii janngoowo janngoo…ìe dow jannge to jaango Lagos e hitaande 1976.
O mari …ìernde feere nder janngirde rew…ìe. Nde o wa…ói duu…ìi sappo o …óon jaango jaango jaangirde, o wa…ói programji jaangirde …ói walaa jaangirde ngam haani rew…ìe maw…ìe je …óon huwdi bana jannginoo…ìe jaangirde fu…ónde he…ìugo jaangirde.
Alele-Williams …óon holla hulugo ngam he…ìugo jannginoo…ìe afrik…ìe rew…ìe to anndal e anndal.
∆Åernde maako nder janngirde limtal fu…ó…óii …ìamtude e joo…óorde maako nder US, ko …óon ha…ìa bee …ìurna Sputnik. Hono o huwtori e nder program African Mathematics to Newton, Massachusetts, e jaango MIT professor Ted Martins, o hawti e kuugal janngooji dow …óemngal dowla nder nder nder nder gure Afrik feere feere diga 1963 haa 1975. ∆äuum ko haalde binndi e ko haalde e …óem…óe ko haalde ko haalde no'o haalde e dow dow …óem…óe lim…óe e golle e lim…ìe lim…óe e jannginoo…ìe. O janngini ha Jaangoore Lagos diga 1965 haa 1985, o wa…ói duu…ìi sappo o jaango jaango jaangirde, je …óon ha…ì…ìiiji jaangooji …ói …ói …ói walaa jaango, be …óuu…óal jaangooji je …óon jaango rew…ìe maw…ìe …ìe …óon kuuwa bana jannginoo…ìe jaango. Ngam o huuwani nder komiteeji e boards feere-feere, Alele-Williams wa…ói daranaaki naftaaki nder …ìamtaare jaango nder lesdi Naajeeriya. O laati hooreejo ja…ìde-ja…ìde jannde, ja…ìde Bendel State 1973-1979. Daga 1979 haa 1985, o wa…ói hooreejo jaaynde Diiwal Ikko komiteeji ja…ìde-ja…ìde jannde e Diiwal Ikko exam boards.
Alele-Williams laatii laam…óo mo'o dow dow dow dow nder ja≈ãde Benin nder hitaande 1985, o laati laam…óo moolde debbo arande nder ja≈ãnde Nigeria, o …óon nu…ó…óina laam…óo mo, ko timmi nder hitaande 1992, "o laati "laamuji ngam holla ko debbo mari baaw…óe ja…ìugo".
Alele-Williams wondi semmbe ngam waylude nder wakkati …ìernde nder ja≈ãde …ìur…óe janngude nder lesdi Naajeeriya nder duu…ìi 1980. Nden, kuugal kulte sirde, jamma e jammaji fu…ó…ói ha nder ja≈ãdeji lesdi Naajeeriya, …ìurna e ja≈ãde Benin. Ko golle …óe wor…ìe …óuu…ó…ìe …ìe footi, o waawi wa…óugo ko haani.
Caggal nde o wa…ói hooreejo ja≈ãde Benin, o wari nder ardii…ìe ja≈ãde Chevron-Texaco Nigeria. O …óon jeya nder ja…ìugo darnde HIP asset management company limited, marnde darnde darnde nder Lagos, Nigeria.
Alele-Williams wondi goomu ja…ìoore, UNESCO Institute of Education. O …óon jeyaa e ja…ì…ìaago UNESCO e Institute of International Education Planning. Nder duu…ìi sappo (1963-73), o wondi goomu nder program Afrik Mathematics, …óo nder Newton, Massachusetts, Amerik. O laati hooreejo jaaynde duuniyaaru ngam janngirde …ìikkoy …ìikkoy fu…ónaaku e …ìaawo …óon hooreejo jaay…óe lesdi Naajeeriya, e hooreejo arandeejo jaayndi Afrik dow Fedde Fede Fuuta dow Fedde Haal Fuuta e Fedde Fuu…ónaaku. 
O wa…ói duu…ìi sappo (1993-2004) bana hooreejo lesdi lesdi lesdi lesdi Afrika nder Duniyaa Tatto ngam rew…ìe nder anndal.
Fedde e maayde.
Alele-Williams waree Babatunde Abraham Williams (1932-2010) nder lewru Desemba 1963, …ìaawo o wurtini lesdi Naajeeriya diga Aameerik.Williams wonnoo mo anndal politik, e wakkati fu…óugo ma…ì…ìe, o jeyaa…óo e jannginoowo maw…óo e ja≈ãde Ife, Osun State.
Alele-Williams woodi …ìi…ì…ìe njowo, e, diga 2017, …ìikkoy sappo. O maayi e 25 mars 2022 e duu…ìi 89. Nyalnde fu…ónde, University of Benin wa…ói bandira suudu ndu haa e nder …ìandu ngam …ìe …óon wuuro mayde maako.
Ja…ì…ìorgo Kewuuji.
Alele-Williams he…ìii keew…óe keew…óe e teddungal. O he…ìii Ordo Niger nder hitaande 1987, o su…ìii wonde Fellows of the Mathematical Association of Nigeria e Fellows to Nigerian Academy of Education.
E 28 feebari 2014, o wonnoo gooto e yim…ìe 100 he…ìi Centenary Award, "temmuki feere-feere ngam darnde tagdi …ói yim…ìe Nigeria wa…ói ngam …ìamtaare ummatoore e aada, jawdi e siyasa leydi ndii nder duu…ìi 100 …ìaawo".
O hawti e dow dow dow dow karuuji …ói rew…ìe maw…ìe anndal limngal ngal Association of Women in Mathematics wurtini.

Ameyo Adadevoh:
¬†Ameyo Stella Adadevoh (27 Yarkooma 1956 - 19 Juko 2014) ko doktoor lesdi Naajeeriya.
O …óon haani ngam o halki ha…ì…ìuki nyau nyau Ebola nder duungal Afrika hirnaange nder Naajeeriya ngam ha…ìuki ha…ìaaki nyau…óo, Patrick Sawyer, nder quarantine, bana no laamu Liberia hawtori. Nde maw…ìe Liberia …ìe yi…ói nyau…óo mo yahugo ngam o yahda to jamma, o ha…ì…ìi e "ji ngam …ìeydaare ummaatoore", o wi'ataa o yahi. O anndiraa ngam ha…óugo nyau…óo Naajeeriya fu…ó…óugo yahugo haa suudu ndun wakkati nyau ndu, ngam maajum o huwti darnde maw…óo nder halki haajirol nyau nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ha 4 Juko 2014, …óum ha…ì…ìiti wonde o he…ìii nyau Ebola e o …óon yaajina. Adadevoh maayi nder jayngol 19 Juko 2014. 
O …ìeydi gorko maako Afolabi e …ìi…ó…óo maako Bankole hawti e yim…ìe feere.
∆Åeynguure e saare.
Ameyo Adadevoh jibinaa e Lagos, Nigeria nder lewru Oktooba 1956. O wa…ói …ìurna fu nder nguurndam maako nder Lagos. Baaba maako e baaba maako, Babatunde Kwaku Adadevoh e Herbert Samuel Macaulay, …ói…óo fuu …ìeen …ìe anndal annd anndirngal. Herbert Macaulay wondi go'oto nder ardii…ìe Naajeeriya hannde. Maama maako wari diga saare Adadevoh nder leydi Volta nder lesdi Gana, to maako o hawti masin, ammaa o joo…óii nder Lagos. Baaba maako Babatunde Kwaku Adadevoh o doktoor e maw…óo ja≈ãde Lagos. O …óon boo o jeyaa e hooreejo lesdi lesdi Naajeeriya arande Nnamdi Azikiwe, bana boo jeya e jeye Sara Forbes Bonetta e jeeya bee Ajayi Crowther. Adadevoh huuwani haa suudu ndun arandeejo, to …óo hayre baaba mum.
Ja≈ãde.
Adadevoh yahi nder suudu ja≈ãde nder Mainland Preparatory Primary School nder Yaba, Lagos (1961-1962). O wa…ói duu…ìi …ói…ói nder Boston, Massachusetts, ngam o dilli bee saare maako to Lagos. O yahi ja≈ãde fu…ó…óor…óe e Corona School, Yaba e Lagos, Nigeria (1964-1968), nden o yahi Queen's School e Ibadan (1969-1974) Nigeria ngam jaangde jangde mum.
Ja≈ãde e golle jawdi.
Adadevoh ja…ìi jaangirde medicine University of Lagos e jaangirde Medicine / Bachelor of Surgery. O wa…ói duu…ìi go'o nder suudu jaangirde Lagos nder hitaande 1981. O wa…ói joo…óorde maako nder Lagos University Teaching Hospital e o he…ìii ko'e maako nder West African College of Physicians and Surgeons nder 1983. Nden o yahi London ngam timmini mo nder endocrinology haa Lopital Hammersmith. O wa…ói duu…ìi 21 haa First Consultants Medical Center nder Lagos, Nigeria. Nder …óon, o wa…ói ko o ardii…óo doktoor e endocrinologist (Endokrinoloog).
Kuugal bee nyau Ebola.
Adadevoh he…ìii nyau Ebola fu…ó…óam nder lesdi Naijeriya e nder suudu ndun ardii…óo nder Lagos, Naajeriya nder lewru Yuli 2014. Adadvoch wa…ói Sawyer nder haaju bana no o wi'i o …óon mari nyau nyau nduu. Sawyer yi…ói yahugo kawtal jaay…óe nder Calabar, Naajeeriya.
Adadevoh haani ta∆¥uki nyau…ìe Liberia'en Patrick Sawyer bana nyau Ebola fu…ónaare nder lesdi Nigeria nder suudu ndun arande nder Lagos, Nigeria, nder lewru Yuli 2014. Adadevoh wa…ói Sawyer nder suudu ndun, ko o wi'i o …óon nyaama nyau nyau nduu. Sawyer yi…ói yahugo ha jaaynde nder Calabar, Nigeria. Adadevoh woni ardii…óo gollu…óo saawir'en. Adadevoh boo o wa…ói mo nder suudu ndun, haaje o he…ìii ko ardii…óo lesdi Liberia yi…ói mo. O footi wa…óugo nokkuure mo …ìe njokki, haaje …óon woodi …ìanduji, ngam o …ìa≈ãgi barikade tagdi yeeso dammugal Sawyer. Kuugal maako wa…ói lesdi Nigeria warti nyau man. Nder wakkatiji …ói'e, dokto'en Nigeria …óon haani hujja, ko waawata wa…ói nyau nyau masin. O hokki yim…ìe kuugal habaru ha dow nyau, o soodi kuujeji njogor…óe e o hawti bee mangu ha nder ardii…ìe. Ngam haala maako, laamu Nigeria anndini nyau nyau man ngam nyau ummaatoore lesdi e jaangowo ngam ngam nyawdi ngam Ebola. WHO anndini Nigeria be Ebola ha 20 Oktoobar 2014.
Ameyo Adadevoh waree Afolabi Emmanuel Cardoso e 26 abriil 1986. ∆Åe mari …ìi…ó…óo gooto, Bankole Cardoso.
Maayi e jawdi.
Adadevoh maayi diga nyau Ebola nder quarantine ha 19 August 2014 nder Lagos, Nigeria. ∆Åandu maako …óon …óon laato nder leydi ndii. Famee mum he…ìii limce maako e wa…ói sarru buri hooreejo nder nder ngam ngam hakkiilo ha…ì…ìugo nder mayre boo nder 12 Septemba 2014, nder Lagos. Dr. Ameyo Adadevoh Health Trust (DRASA), goong…óinki hakkillo hakillo, ha…ói ha nder teddungal maako. Fim "93" Days …óon haani Adadevoh e …óon wi'a dow saawir be Adarevohi be yim…ìe feere nder suudu ndun. Film ngal wa…ói Steve Gukas. Ha 27 Oktoobar 2018, o he…ìii Google Doodle …ìaawo maayde maako ha anniyaare maako 62.
Nder lewru feebariiru 2020, laawol feere haani Adadevoh nder Abuja, laamorgo lesdi Naijeriya. "Njiila Ameyo Adadevo" …óon hawta bee laawol Ahmadu Bello, go'o nder nder laawol Abuja …ìur…óum mawnugo. ∆äo woni go'o nder kuugal arandeeji …ói laamu Nigeria wa…ói ngam teddina darana maako ma'ana nder lesdi nder sappoji je'e nder nguurndam maako.
Ja≈ãde ja≈ãgol jaangirde Babcock e nder suudu jaangoowo jaangal ngal e innde maako.
Ja≈ãde ja≈ãgowo jaangirde jaangoowo jaangal ngal Babcock University boo ina inniraa e makko.

Aboh-mbaise:
Aboh-mbaise Latake hukuma pamarun Diiwal imo lysidi Naajeeriya

Hauwa Ibraahiima:
Hauwa Ibrahim (duubi daygo 20 siilo 1968) ko laam…óo lesdi Naajeeriya mo hakkilani yim…ìe, o he…ìii sariya Sakharov nder Ja≈ãde Orop.
Joo…óa.
Ibrahim jibinaa nder Gombe nder hitaande 1968. O …óon ja…ì…ìa ngam o laamii…óo, o …óon haalanki o debbo Musulmana arande nder lesdi Naajeeriya o he…ìan nder nder nder nderji.
Ibrahim anndini ngam kuugal pro bono ngam ha…ìugo yim…ìe je …óon jeyaa e jaay…óe Sharia Islam je …óon hawtore nder lesdi lesdi Nigeria. O …óon ha…ì…ìa Amina Lawal, Safiya Hussaini e Hafsatu Abub√°kar. Nder hitaande 2005 o he…ìii sariya Sakharov ngam kuugal ngal.
Hauwa …óon haani haakoowo nder Saint Louis University School of Law e Stonehill College, haakoowo duniyaaru haa Yale University, haakowo Radcliffe, e haakoowo haa man haakoowo hakkiilo yim…ìe e haakowo haakoowo haakoowo Islaam haa Harvard University. Hauwa …óon …óon …óon …óon wa'ajugo e …óon wa'a bolle nder Harvard University. O wondi boo gooto e 25 ardii…ìe nder jaaynde jaaynde e demokaraasi je wurtini ha nder jaayndi ndi Reporters Without Borders ha…ì…ìiri.
Nde o wonnoo Radcliffe fellow, Ibrahim wa…ói laawol ha…ì…ìuki doosgal ngam ja…ì…ìude nder ka…ìir…óe teoretikol Shariah law e …óa…ì…ìita no …ìe mbaltini huutore doosgal ngal, ko wa…ói, hawti e hakkeeji yim…ìe rew…ìe nder Afrik hirnaange. Ku…óol maako wa…ói e deftere Practicing Shariah Law: Seven Strategies for Achieving Justice in Shariah Courts, wonande nder lewru Janaayro 2013."

Hafsat Idris:
Hafsat Ahmad Idris (dayngo 14 Morse 1987) ko puroodusajo filmji leydi Naajeeriya mo o wa…ói fijirde film e nder Kannywood. O hawti e film maako arande biyetee…óo "Barawniya" (2016). O he…ìii jaaynde debbo 2019.
Fedde fu…ó…óor…óe e golle.
Hafsat woni ko'e yim…ìe Diiwal Kano, nder lesdi Naajeeriya. O jibinaa e mawnina nder Shagamu, Diiwal Ogun. O wa…ói ko o arani e Kannywood nder film biyetee…óo "Barauniya", o wa…ói e Ali Nuhu, e Jamila Nagudu.
Nder hitaande 2018, Hafsat wa…ói jaaynde jaaynde film anndiraa Ramlat Investment. O wa…ói filimiji …óuu…ó…ói nder hitaande 2019, hawti e Kawaye nder …ói o wa…ói filimii…ìe bana Ali Nuhu, Sani Musa Danja e hoore maako. O holli haala o walaa e …ìi…ó…óo Janaarjo Sani Abacha.

Kuugal.

Jamila Nagudu:
Jamila Umar Nagudu (dayngo; 10 juko 1985) ko Fijo yenmitki Naajeeriya gollaama e Kannywood.
∆Åi…ó…óo e janngirde.
Nagudu jibini haa 10 Aguusta 1985 ha Magana Gumau nder hukuma pamarun Toro, Diiwal Bawci, Naajeeriya. O yahi ja≈ãde fu…ó…óam e ja≈ãde …ói…óa…ìam nder diiwal Bawci. 
Kuugal.
Jamila Umar, anndiraa…óo no Jamila Umar Nagudu, wa…ói filmde maako nder nder nder nder Kannywood nder hitaande 2002, arande no tawonnde e …ìaawo no tawonde. O wa…óii nder filimji romantik e fimji komedi. Jaayndiyankeejo Aminu Sayra woni arandeejo mo wa…óani mo nder fijirde "Jamila da Jamilu" nder fijirnde O wondi mo ha…ì…ìaa…óo nder Bollywood nder Abeokuta.
Koroowo.

Yagba West:
Yagba West ko nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) nder Diiwal Kogi, Naajeeriya, haa hirnaange Diiwal Kwara. Wurooji ma'a …óon nder gariiri Odo Ere. ∆ä
∆äum woodi nokkuure 1,276 km2 e yim…ìe 149,023 ha nder limti yim…ìe 2006. Ha 2016, yim…ìe …ìe …ìeydi haa 188,900.
Egbe woni gariiri feere maw…óo nder laamu leydi ndii je je je je haandi e kuu…óe missionerji kiristaanaa…ìe nder fu…ó…óam 1900s.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 262.

Badiyya Hassan Mashi:
Badiya Hassan Mashi ko jannginoowo, sakitir…óo jootii…óo e komisaaru foroy ha nder hawtaade rew…ìe e …ìamtaare ummatoore nder Diiwal Katsina, Naajeeriya.
∆Åi…ó…óo e janngirde.
Badiyya Hassan jibinaa e mawnina nder nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) Mashi nder Katsina. O yahi Gidado Elementary School nder berniiwol Katsina, Government Girls Secondary School (GGSS) nder Malumfashi e Bayero University Kano, to o ja…ìi jaango bee BSc microbiology e MSc e PhD nder microbiology haandi.
Kuugal.
O laati mo mo mo jaajotoo…óo mo ha Hassan Usman Katsina Polytechnic nder jaajorgal science Basic e Applied, diga 1992 haa 2016, e mo jaajinoowo mo jaajorgo ha Umaru Musa Yar'adua University. Bana komisaarjo ha haalu…ìe ha haalude e haalude ummatoore, o haaldini haalude dow no haalude huutore huutore. O wi'i "Fuu…ìe e maama'en …óon ma'ana …ìe …óon wa…óa ko haani, …ìurna nder …óowtanaago wardji ma…ì…ìe ngam …ìe andira bee moye …ìe …óon hawta e ko …ìe …óon wa…óa nder wakkati ma…ì…ìe. Min …óon njaha saare bee saare ngam ekkitina deer'en".
O wa…ói nairaji miliyonji 196 ngam ha…ì…ìugo …ìikkoy, …ìikkoy e rew…ìe nder nokkuuje laamu nguleeki 34 nder lesdi Katsina.

Ca…ì…ìal Mammbila:
Ca…ì…ìal Mammbila …óum gootal nder ca…ì…ìe tiimtu…óe lesdi, toowki maggal foti meeta ujineere e teeme…ó…óe jowi e noogas e nayi (1524m). Ngal laatike ca…ì…ìal …ìurdungal toowde e nokkuure …ìurdunde …ìuu…ìde e leydi Nigeria, kadi ko nokkuure …ìurdunde haande …ìi…ì…ìe leydi e janan…ìe fuu ngilloo.

Ummaatoore …ìurannde ujine noogas (20.000) ina ho…ói dow mayre, …ìe le∆¥∆¥i feere-feere yeru: Mammbila, Ful…ìe, Hawsanke, Kaka, Panso, kambu, e le∆¥∆¥i go…ó…ói …ói lollaani, nder galluuje feere-feereeje bano Gembu, Ngurooje, Maayo-ndaaga, Maisamaari, Kakara, Mbamga, Warwar, Yerimaaru, Dorofi ekn. Ali Ahmed Mullah:
Ali Ahmed Mullah(be danyee mou haa nder nyalawmaare 5 Morse 1945), o laawaandu muazzin ( setiinowo ketaadi) haa juulurde al-Haram ha Mecca, Saudi Arabia Wakkatii badiidum tattabol ko sali.Ali Ahmed Mullah Kanko on lirinde nebiidou muazzin je juulurde al-Haram o tokkinou Lenyol mako geccewol haa nder cimtiraali baawo 1975.

Moshood Abiola Polytechnic:
¬†
Moshood Abiola Polytechnic anndiraa kadi MAPOLY ko ja≈ãde polyteknik nder Abeokuta, Diiwal Ogun, Naajeeriya.
Ojere campus …óon ha nder fombina fuunaa≈ãge Abeokuta, …óon hawta bee haare haare 960 ha nder lesdi maare haare maayo Ogun.
∆äum noddiraa e nder Moshood Kashimawo Olawale Abiola, mo laatoore hooreejo lesdi Naajeeriya nder hitaande 1993, ammaa o hawtiima ngam o he…ìugo laamu. Caggal maayde Chief MKO Abiola, mo …ìur…óo ja…ì…ìaade Polytechnic'en nder 1998, Institution'en …ìe mburtini mo Moshood Abiola Polytechnic, Abeokuta.
Polytechnic ha…ì…ìii nder hitaande 1980 bana Ogun State Polytechnic nder wakkati laamu Harris Eghagha. 
Ko wonii miijo Polytechnic fu…ó…óii haani diga Brigadier Harris Eghagha, laamu Chief Olabisi Onabanjo wa…ói …óum.
Hannde, polytechnic ina woodi janngooji jowi, kala e hooreejo, e jaayndi 21, kala e dow hooreejo jaayndi. Ja≈ãdeeji, e ja≈ãdeeji ma…ì…ìe, ngoni:

Polytechnic, Ibadan:
Polytechnic, Ibadan (ngam anndiraa "Poly Ibadan") ko jaango jaango nder Ibadan nder lesdi Oyo, Naajeeriya. Hunde Poly Ibadan ha…ì…ìii nder 1970, nandi bee polytechnics feere ha Nigeria. Jaangoore nden fu…ó…óii ha…ì…ìugo janngirde mawnde feere to jaangirde, …ìurna nder jaangoore anndal. Lindiyaaku ja…ì…ìugo kuu…óe e anndal anndal haani tabbituki ngam jannginoo…ìe …ìe mari anndal yeeso …ìe …óon wurta suudu seniiyaaku nden …ìe …óon hokkata anndal anndol anndal to ummaatoore ja…ì…ìugo. Poly Ibadan anndiraa kadi ngam tagdi mum taway…ói …ói windi nder …óemngal Yarobanko'en bana "Ise loogun ise" ko wayi no "Work is the medicine for poverty", tagdi Yarobankeejo kalfinaa…óo nder holla kuu…óe kalfinaa…óe woni laawol yahugo.
Fedde e kuugal ma…ì…ìe.

Aadun:
Aadun woni ko'e nder laawol nder yim…ìe Yarobanko'en nder lesdi Naajeriya. Innde "Aadun" ina maanaa …ìernde nden kadi ina huutoroo nder dewte e nder kuugal darnde.
Fedde nde.
∆äi …ói…óaw…óum …ói naftiraama nder wa…óugo aadun hawti e fe'uki marsu, chili pepper, le…ó…óe palmu e njamu. ∆äe woodi feere …ói…ói nder ko'e nyaamdu: ko'e ma'aare laa…ì…óe e ko'e mo∆¥∆¥e …óe …ìeydi e le…ó…óe palmi. Yim…ìe okun diga Diiwal Kogi …óon …ìeydana be'e be'e nder kuuje ma…ì…ìe ngam …ìe …ìesda bee le…ó…óe banaan ngam …ìe hokkugo …óum nanki.

∆äemngal Afade:
¬†
Afade (Afa…ó…ô) ko …óemngal Afro-Asiatic ngal wolwi e fuunaange lesdi Naajeeriya e woyla hirnaange lesdi Kamerun.
Fedde nde.
Afade woni goomu nder geec Biu-Mandara nder lenyol …óem…óe Afro-Asiyaaji. 
∆äum hawti e …óem…óe Kameruunaaje Mpade, Maslam, Malgbe, Mser, e Lagwan.
Fonooloji.
Afade ina woodi ko …óuu…óal konsonanteeji, hawti e ejectives, implosives, e labial-velar stops. ∆äuum ko ko e /i u e …§ o …õ …î a …ë/. /a/ ko yeeso, naa ko e nder.

Yim…ìe Akassa:
Yim…ìe Akassa (Akasa, Akaha) Yim…ìe Ijaw …óon njoo…ói bee Maayo Nun e Maayo Atalantika nder Diiwal Bayelsa, lesdi Naajeeriya. Akassa hawti e: Opu-Akassa, Sangana, e Kamatoru.

∆äemngal Bacama:
¬†
Bachama (Bachama) ko …óemngal Afro-Asiatic haalanki nder lesdi Naajeeriya nder Diiwal Aadaamawa, ko …ìuri heewde e nder Numan, Demsa e nokkuure laamorde (hukuma pamarun) Lamurde eYim…ìe Bwatiye. ∆äe …óem…óe …óe Mulyen, Opalo, e Wa-Duku. Bachama-Yimburu ina wondi …óemngal ngal hawti e ma…ì…ìe, amma ngal hawti. Bachama huutoroo bana …óemngal jaaynde. ∆äemngal ngal ina foti anndude e Bata.
Lim…óe.
Bachama ina woodi sistem limngal decimal/kinary, bee 5 e 10 bana base:
8 woni 4-4, 6 e 7 …óon jeyaa dow …ìeydude 5, nden 9 …óon ma'ana " (10) minus 1".

∆äemngal Barkul:
¬†
Barkul (Bo-Rukul) ko …óemngal Plateau nder wuro Barkul, Bokkos LGA, Diiwal Plateau, Naajeeriya. ∆äi …óem…óe …ói…ói, Bo e Rukul, kala e 500-1,000 wolwotoo…ìe, …ói feere feere. Fedde Barkul …óon laa…ì…ìa, ammaa …óon …ìadii Fyam e Horom.
"Ethnologue" (22nd ed.) …óon ta∆¥i nder barkul, Mabo, Mwa, e Richa nder nokkuure laamorde (hukuma pamarun) Bokkos.

∆äemngal Batu:
Batu ko …óemngal Tivoid nder lesdi Naajeeriya. ∆äuum ko ko'e mum'en ko'e ma…ì…ìe, kamino. Angwe …óon haani haani, amma …óon haani …óum haani haandi nder ∆äemngal Buru.

∆äemngal ∆Åeele:
¬†
∆Åeele (ngoo anndiraa kadi e Bele, √Äb√©√©l√©, Bellawa) ko …óemngal Afro-Asiatic je …óon haani he…óugo nder gure go…ó…óe nder Diiwal Bawci, Naajeeriya.

Yim…ìe Bete:
Yim…ìe Bete …óon ∆¥iwo nder wuro Bete, Takum, Naajeeriya. ∆Åe …óon mbi'a …óemngal Bete …ìooyaani. 

∆äemngal Bile:
Bile (Bille) woni go'oto nder …óem…óe Bantu go…ó…óe nder lesdi Naajeeriya. ∆Åe …óon wona nder Aadaamawa dow maayo Benuwe yeeso Mbula-Bwazza, …ìe …óon mbi'a …óemngal Bantu ngal …ìe …óonno haandi (A60+40b).

∆äemngal Boga:
Boga (nganndi boo booka) ko …óemngal Afro-Asiatic haalanki nder Aadaamawa lesdi Naajeeriya.

∆äemngal Boghom:
Boghom (ngam anndiraa bo Bogghom, Bohom, Burom, Burum, Burrum; yim…ìe Hawsare nodda …óum Burmawa, Boghorom, Bokiyim) ko …óemngal Afro-Asiatic ngal yim…ìe heew…ìe e Kanam e Wase nder Diiwal Plateau, Naajeeriya.
Yim…ìe Boghom …ìuri …óuu…óugo …ìe remoo…ìe, koo nde wo…ì…ìe ma…ì…ìe …óon mari kuugal nyamndu. Taariha, du…óal maa ko yim…ìe …ìurndi.
Boghom woni go'o e …óem…óe joweego …óe nder Barawa "Lexicon" Ronald Cosper: Jimi, Zul, Geji, Polci, Dott, Sayanci, Buli e Boghom. Joshua Project …óon wi'a yim…ìe …óon …óon …óon mbi'a Bogghom …óon 162,000.

Yim…ìe Boki:
Yim…ìe Boki (Bokyi) (ngol anndiraa kadi Nki) ngoni lenyol wonande nder Diiwal Cross River, Naajeeriya. Yim…ìe Boki …ìuri fuu …ìe ngalaa …ìe …óon mari bee daande. ∆Åe …óon mbi'a bolle Bokyi, go'oto nder bolle Bendi. Nder hitaande 1979, yim…ìe Bokyi …ìurii 190,000. 

∆äemngal Bole:
Bole (b√≤o pikk√†, anndiraa kadi bana Bolanchi, Ampika, Borpika, Bolewa, Bolawa) ko …óemngal iyaalu Caad hirnaange, …óum haalani nder lesdi Naajeeriya. ∆äe …óem…óe …óe hawti e Bara e Fika, …óe …ìe mbi'ata nder Laamorde Fika.

∆äemngal Bure:
Bure, anndiraa kadi e Bubbure, ko …óemngal Afro-Asiatic jeyaa…óo to goomu Bole-Tangale nder galle West to wuro Caad. ∆äum …óon wolwi nder lesdi Naajeeriya woyla nder wuro Bure (10¬∞31"06.16"N, 10¬∞20"03.00"E, hukuma pamarun Kirfi, Diiwal Bawci, Najeeriya) e nder nder nder nder nokkuuje man…óe …ìadii…óe. ∆äemngal ngal huutoroo ko heew…ìe heew…ìe, ko e …ìooya mum en. To haasa, ko woni lingua franca nder nokkuure, Bure …óon hawta e …óem…óe feere …óe …óem…óe Caad bana Gera, Giiwo e Deno (golle Bol√©).
Ha tawii e …óem…óe go…ó…óe nder kawtal go'o (e.g. Bole ko Karekare), halkugol Bure woni ko …ìuri haalude.

Yim…ìe Buseni:
Yim…ìe Biseni (Biseni) …óon joo…ói nder Bayelsa caka, Naajeeriya.

∆äemngal Cakfem-Mushere:
Cakfem-Mushere ko …óemngal Afro-Asiatic ngal wolwi e nder nokkuure laamorde (hukuma pamarun) Bokkos, Diiwal Plateau, Naajeeriya. ∆äe …óem…óe …óe Kadim-Kaban e Jajura. Fuuji …ói …ói …ói …óon fahin bee Mwaghavul …óon mawndi.
Mushere …óon …ìadii Mwaghavul.
Cakfem woodi feere …ói…ói, ko'e Cakfem fu…ó…óam e Cakfem …ìaawo. Cakfem fu…ó…óam nandi bee Mwaghavul, amma Cakfem …ìaawo …óon …óon …ìeyda, ngam haalaa…ìe Mwagha vul …óon mari ca…óeele ngam faamugo Cakfem nder. E wiyde Blench nder 2019, yim…ìe Cakfem ina woodi gure sappo e tati, e Tim bana wuro maw…óo. Hausa …óon naftira e …ìiy…ìe …ìiy…ìe.

Ahmadu Ahiijo:
Ahmadu Ahiijo o laatake kanko woni aranndeejo hooreejo-lesdi Kamarun. Kanko hoo‚Äòani Kamarun ndimu lesdi ndiin. Bano noon o hokki ngeendam (nguurndam) maako fuu ngam …ìamtugo daraja lesdi Kamarun ngam yi…óugo …ìi…ì…ìe lesdi Kamarun ngam yaarugo lesdi Kamarun yeeso. Ahmadu Ahiijo maaynaa √±annde 30 lewru jolal (nofambar) hitaande 1989 to Dakar lesdi Senegal, tawi omo yahra duu…ìi 65.
Ahmadu Ahiijo janngi janngirde makko famarde to berniwol Garwa o naati golle to ba≈ã≈ãe Poste et T√©l√©communication, e fulfulde posta e kumpondiral to wakeere fommbinaare lesdi Kamarun, …ìaawo …óum o warti woylaare lesdi Kamarun. Non non kadi o yahi o huuwi kuu…óe …óuu…ó…óe haa o laatii wakiiliijo majalisa lesdi o naftootiri e Nasaara‚Äòen Faransa haa o laamii lesdi Kamarun. Ahmadu Ahiijo …ìaawo o naasti siyaasa (…óowoodi, polotik) to berniwol Yawunde o naasti Assembl√©e Nationale o warti depitee refti …ìe to…ó…óii mo premier ministre e maanaa aranndeejo jaagor…ìe. Ko e nden …óon darnde o sosi fedde makko …óowoodi Union Camerounaise (UC), Dental ∆Åi…ì…ìe Kamarun. Oon saanga on etii gollidude e fedde …óimmere …ìurnde semmbe nder lesdi ndii, Union des Peuples du Cameroun, Dental Renndooji Kamarun (UPC) ngam haa …ìeen ngoppa ha…ìre ndimaagu lesdi tuugiinde e fitinaaji e war-hoore kono o ronki fahmondirde e ma…ì…ìe haa …óum wa…ói Faransi addi konu mum Kamarun ngam ha…ìde UPC. Ko noon …ìe mbardi hooree…ìe UPC fuf gooto gooto, tawi …ìeen ina cuu…ói e nder laddeeji lesdi ndii ina njokki e ha…ìde laamu nguu. Kamarun he…ìti jeytal-hoore mum e mee 1960, Ahiijo laatii hooreejo-lesdi. Feewndo laamu makko faggude Kamaru nduu …ìamtino sanne kono e ba≈ã≈ãe …óowoodi, o jogorno lesdi ndii doole e njaggu, o wulnani luundii…ìe laamu makko nguu. O jokki kadi e kuuwondiral maa gollidal ki…ì…ìungal hakkunde lesdi makko ndii e Faransi. E hitaande 1982, Ahiijo anndini ko juhi yim…ìe fuf, wonnde o woppii laamu e sabu ≈ãakkere aafiya. O totti laamu nguu cukko makko Pol Biya (Paul Biya). Kanko e Pol Biya …ìe pu…ó…óii luurude law sabu Oon no tuumunoo mo yi…óde wartude e laamu. Caggal …óum Ahiijo tawi feere alaa ko maa o yalta lesdi ndii, o yahri Dakar, Senegal, o ruttaaki lesdi makko haa o faatii 1989.
Ahmadu Ahiijo ina …ìa≈ãunoo (resunoo) cuddii…óo arano maaketee…óo Adda Garwa, kanko e oon …ìe nda√±idi …ìi…ó…óo gorko gooto, o seedi e makko e …ìa≈ãi Germaine (Jermeen e mbinndiin pulaar-fulfulde cellu…óo) Ahiijo, o wondi e oon haa maayde makko. ∆Åe nda√±idi …ìi…ì…ìe rew…ìe tato.

Aminu Ado Bayero:

∆äemngal Geji:
Geji (Gezawa) ko …óemngal …óemngal Caadiyankeewal nder diiwal Bawcii, ko …óem…óe …óemngal lesdi Caadiyankaewal nder diiwal Bawci, lesdi Naijeriya. Yim…ìe tati …óon woni Buu, Gyaazi e M”ôgang. …ói …ói…óo …ói …ói …ói …óon hawti bana non.

∆äemngal Polci:
Polci (P…ôlci, Pos…ô) ko …óemngal Afro-Asiatic nder diiwal Bawci, Naajeeriya. ∆äum je nder Barawa cluster, je haani je be nder hirnannge …óemngal iyaalu Caadiyanke'en.
∆äe …óem…óe.
∆äemngal Polci ko go'o nder …óem…óe jeewte jeewte jee…ói…óo jeewte …óe Zaar jeewte Barawa jeewte …óem…óe Cadi. ∆äem…óe Polci ngoni Zul, Baram (Mbaram), Dir, Buli, Nyamzak/Langas, e Polci hoore mum.

∆äemngal Saya:
Saya (Sayanci, Zaar) ko …óemngal iyaalu Caadiyankeewal nder lesdi Naajeriya.
∆äe …óem…óe.

Blench (2019) hokki innde "Guus",

∆äemngal Zari:
Zari (Zariwa) ko …óemngal iyaalu Caadiyankewol nder lesdi Naajeriya. Blench (2019) ta∆¥ii ko Zari, Zakshi, e Boto.
Koo nde woodi yim…ìe lenyol 20,000, maw…óo habaru …ìaawo …óon maayi haa hitaande 2000 (Campbell e Belew 2018).

∆äem…óe Ron:
∆äem…óe Ron, Ronic ko Ron-Fyer, goomu A.4 nder goomu West Caadiyankeewal nder wuro …óem…óe Afro-Asiatic, …ìe …óon bolle nder diiwal Plateau, fombina lesdi Naajeeriya.

∆äemngal Gera:
Gera (ngoo anndiraa kadi Gerawa walla Fyandigeri) ko …óemngal Afro-Asiatic haalanki nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Wanoowo'en …óon kolli haa Hawsare. Wanoowo'en nodda hoore ma…ì…ìe bana Fyandigeri (Fyandigeri).
Won ko …ìuri 30 wuro. Garaaji …óuu…ó…ói …óon mbi'a …óemngal ngal. Fuu nder jaaynde 2018 holli wonde ko nder gure 4 tan …óemngal ngal …óon jeyaa to sukaa…ìe.

∆äemngal Geruma:
Geruma (nganndi Gerema, Germa) ko …óemngal Afro-Asiatic haalanki nder lesdi Naajeeriya. ∆äe …óem…óe hawti e Duurum e Sum. Wanoowo'en …óon kolli haa Hawsare.

∆äemngal Deno:
Deno (nganndi bana Denawa, Denwa, Be) ko …óemngal Afro-Asiatic haalanki nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Wanoowo'en …óon kolliti haa Hawsare e Fulfulde.

∆äemngal Galambu:
Galambu (nganndi kadi Galambi, Galambe, Galembi) ko …óemngal Afro-Asiatic haalanki nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Yim…ìe …ìur…ìe fuu …ìe …óon mbi'a Galambu.

∆äemngal Giiwo:
Giiwo (nganndi kadi Bu Giiwo, Kirfi, Kirifi, Kirifawa) ko …óemngal Afro-Asiatikol haalanngal nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

∆äemngal Kubi:
Kubi (nganndi kadi Kuba, Kubawa) ko …óemngal Afro-Asiatic je …óon faalaa e nder diiwal Bawci, Naajeeriya. Yim…ìe yim…ìe …ìe'e …óon mbi'a Hawsare.
Kubi woni wuro mo anndiraa be yim…ìe za'ar nden boo …óon wolwugo …óemngal go'o. 

∆äemngal Maaka:
Maaka (nganndi maa Maha, Maka, Maga, Magha) ko …óemngal Afro-Asiatic haalanki nder diiwal Yobe, lesdi Naajeeriya. Nder hitaande 1993, yim…ìe 10,000 …óon mbi'a …óum.

∆äemngal Dazawa:
Daza (koo e Hawsare Dazawa) ko haalanki e Blench (2006) bana …óemngal Caadi nder kawral Bole, ∆äum hollitii wonde e nder 2021.

∆äemngal Karai-Karai:
Karai-Karai (koo Karekare, Kerrikerri, Ajami: ŸÉÿßÿ±ÿßŸä-ŸÉÿßÿ±ÿßŸä) ko …óemngal ngal wolwi e Afrik hirnaange, ko …ìuri heewde e woyla fuunaange Naajeeriya. Limgal yim…ìe …óon mbi'a Karai-Karai …óon haani hakkunde 1,500,000 haa 1,800,000 miliyaanji, …ìurna fuu yim…ìe Karai-Karai …óon mbi'i. ∆äemngal Afrik-Asiatik ngal wolwani ko …ìuri heewde nder lesdi Naajeeriya e ummatooje nder diiwal Bawci, diiwal Yobe, diiwal Gombe e nder lesdi Naajeneriya. ∆äeele …óe Karai-Karai …óuu…óal e …óem…óe Semitic ngal ngal ngalle-galle woyla e hebbere e Aaraa…ìe. ∆äemngal Karai-Karai ina …ìurdi wondude e …óem…óe Ngamo e Bole (…óem…óe e ngallewal fuunaa≈ãge Nigeria) …ói …ói …ói …ói…óem …ói…óem ina nji…ói ko …ói…óemngal Karai -Karai.
Kooree Karai-Karai.
Winndannde Karai-Karai …óon mari fu…ó…óam nder duu…ìi 1950, nde Nordic Region Literary Agency (NORLA) huuwi e deftere Ndar Ma Karatu je …óum …ìur…óo habaru nder …óemngal Karai-Karai Gaskiya Corporation ha…ì…ìiri.

∆äemngal Kwaami:
∆äemngal Kwaami, anndiraa kadi bana Komawa, Kwam, Kwamanchi, Kwami, ko "Kwom", ko …óemngal hirnannge Caadiyankeewal bo …ìe …óon wi'a nder diiwal Bawci, Naajeeriya, …ìadi gariiri Gombe.

∆äemngal Pero:
Pero, anndiraa kadi Filiya, ko …óemngal Caadi ngal hirnaange nder lesdi Naajeeriya.
∆äem…óe Caadi
∆äemngal Caad ko go'oto nder …óem…óe …óe …ìe …óon wi'a nder fannu Afrik feere. ∆äem…óe Caad …óon ∆¥iwo diga …óemngal Afro-Asiyaatiwol bo inniraa Afro-Chadic. ∆äe …óem…óe …óe anndiraa e nder feccere Afrik hawti e; Nigeria woyla (Hawsare e Ful…ìe), Kameruun woyla, Niiser woyla, Caad woyla, Afrik feccere, e ley…óe Afrik wo…ó…ìe.

∆äemngal Piya:
Piya-Kwonci (Piya, Pia, Wurkum) ko …óemngal Naajeeriya ngal…óam e ko wayi no Piya e Kwonci. Ko yim…ìe …ìeen mbi'aama "Ambandi".

∆äemngal Kulung:
Kulung (Wurkum) ko …óemngal lesdi hirnannge iyaalu Caadi ngal hukuma pamarun Karim Lamido, Diiwal Taraba, Naajeeriya, …óum he…ìii …ìaawo Roger Blench. ∆äemngal ngal walaa haala nder Ethnologue malla Glottolog. Blench (2019) hokki limgal …ìesngu dow yim…ìe 2,000 …óon wolwata.
Yim…ìe …óon wolwata Kulung …óon …óa…ì…ìa hoore ma…ì…ìe be lenyol ma…ì…ìe nder yim…ìe …óon wolwata ko …ìuri bo…ó…óum nder yim…ìe …óon …óon wolwata bana bana bana bana Banabu, ko ngam maajum …ìe …óon wolwata e ko …ìe mbi'a, bana bana bana ana mbi'a: ∆äemngal ngal …óon mari semmbe bana Jarawan, ammaa …óon mari ko …ìe mbii: "∆äemngal ngal woni bana lesdi".

Ahmed Muhammad Ketso:
¬†

∆Åi…ó…óo e janngirde.
Ketso jibini ha 27 July 1969 ha wuro Ketso nder Mokwa nder diiwal Neeja. O timmini janngirde maako nder hitaande 1976 nden o maayi nder hitaande 1981, nden o timmini janngi maako nder nder nder hitaande 1991. O he…ìii diploma maako nder jaayndeeji ceede nder Federal Polytechnic, Bida diga 1995 haa 1998.
Kuugal.
Nder hitaande 2007 e 2011, o …óon ha…ì…ìa ngam suudu diiwal Neeja, o …óon ha…ì…ìi ngam suudu wakiilo nder suudu yim…ìe nder partiya All Nigeria Peoples Party (ANPP) …óon …óon …óon …óon …ìaawo.
E hitaande 2015, o su…ìi hooreejo laam…óo leydi e nder ja…ì…ìi…ìol laamu e nder hitaande 2019.
Nder 2023, o maayi tikkere partiya ngam ha…ìugo ngam darnde gomnati to Mohammed Umar Bago.

Ja≈ãde e golle.

Kabiru Muhammad Inuwa:
Kabiru Muhammad Inuwa (dayngol; 1965) woni laamii…óo Rano II caggal maayde Alhaji Tafida Abubakar Ila Auta Bawo. Ka nde o la…ì…ìinaama laamii…óo Rano, o huuwani nder Nigerian Immigration Service (NIS) e o ardii hakkilooje aada nde o huuwani bana Kaigaman Rano e hooreejo diiwaan Kibiya.

Katagum:
Katagum woni gariiri, nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) e laamorde nder Diiwal Bawci nder woyla lesdi Naajeeriya. Duule …óon haadi dow Maayo Jama'are, ko woni ko'e ndiyam Hadejia. Yim…ìe …ìur…ìe …óuu…óugo …ìe yim…ìe Fulani, Kanuri, Karai-Karai e Hawsare. Ko'e kuuje manndal maw…óe hawti e mbiriiwu, cibal, gawri, maaroori (ko …ìuri ha nder fadamaaje ha maayo, ko "fulooji ndiyam"), cowpeas, liÍûåeere, cacaari, e gum arabic. Yimm…ìe …ìe'e hawti e ko'e, be'e, go'o, baali, …ìale, e le…ó…óe …óuu…ó…óe.
Hukuma pamarun.
Birniiwol Katagum woni laamorde hukuma pamarun Zaki. Hukuma pamarun Katagum woni feere feere fuu haa woyla hukuma pamarun Zaki, diga …óo …óum yaasi hukuma pamarun Itas/Gadau; Katagum hawti bana non bee gariiri biyetee…óo; o woodi babal (1,436 km¬≤) e yim…ìe 295,970 ha nder limtal yim…ìe 2006, wuro maako je Azare bee yim…ìe …ìuri 50% nder yim…ìe Katagum fuu. Koode pos…óe woni 752.

Hamman Yaji:
Muhammad Hamman Yaji (1863-1929) ko Laamii…óo Madagali, Naajeeriya, je tawii nder Laamorde Aadamaawa. O anndiraa ngam deftere maako nder deftere maako dow nguurndam maako e kuu…óe maako diga 1912 haa 1927, o laati camnoowo Fulbe e jaaynde maccu…ìe …ìadi hirsirde Aadamaawa, lesdi Naajeeriya, e Mayo-Tsanaga, lesdi wo…ó…óungo so…ì…ìiire, lesdi Kamarun. Ko …óum winndi nder …óemngal Arab, deftere maako …óon hokkata hollaago nokku dow nguurndam sub-Saharan dow laamu koloniyaal fu…ó…óam karnijum 20.
==Ngendam=
Muhammad Hamman Yaji tokki nder dungu(1863-1929). Hanko woni Lamido Madagali lesdi gondi nder Adamawa nder Nigeria. Muhammad Hamman e mo anda dou winduki ko fari fuu de fini fu ko nangi rayuwaji maakodiga 1912-1927. 
Hanko o Pullo nyewo puccu e soruki jiyabe dou kerol Adamawa e Mayo Tsagana ko heddi ko woddi weyla kamaru.
Hibaruji di ko arti nder larabcire dum windira. Bindi Maako nyalla wallirngo dou di dubi karni sappande Didi.

Rahima Gambo:
Rahima Gambo (dayngol; 1986) ko artist multimediya Naajeeriyarjo, o joo…óii…óo Abuja, Naajeeriya.
Fedde fu…ó…óor…óe e golle.
Gambo ja…ìi Jaangirde Manchester nder hitaande 2007 e digiiriwol nder jannde …ìamtaare. Nder hitaande 2008 o he…ìii maggal nder Gender e Social Policy diga London School of Economics. E hitaande 2014 o he…ìii maggal feere nder journalism diga Columbia Graduate School of Journalism. ∆Åaawo e hitaande 2014 o fu…ó…óii wonde mo'o wondi e Magnum Foundation

Chef Dammy Pas:
Damilola Adeparusi (duubi daygo 24 korse 1999), anndiraa…óo e ko'e mum ko Chef Dammy Pas, Ko chef Nigeria, blogger nyaamdu, e YouTuber. O he…ìii anndal ngam anndal maako e anndal maako nder nyaamugo, o …ìa≈ãgi yim…ìe bee …ìernde maako e kuutor…óe maako.
∆Åeydi e Ja≈ãde.
Kooffe Dammy Pas jibini e mawnini nder lesdi Nigeria. Gila e duu…ìi mum, o holli yi…óde nyaamugo e nyaamugo. Yi…óugo maako dow cukalel ngal wa…ói o yi…ói wa…óugo kuu…óe nder nokku, to o …ìeydi anndal maako.
Kuugal.
Chef Dammy Pas fu…ó…óii yahude mum e cu…óol ngam ha…ì…ìugo yi…óde mum ngam cu…óol nder blog nyaamdu mum e YouTube channel. O he…ìii …ìeydi …ìeydi …óon, o …ìeydi yim…ìe bee kuuje maako, e kuuje maako …óe o nyaama, e …ìernde maako.
Nder …óa…ì…ìol maako ngam …ìernde, Chef Dammy Pas wa…ói anniya ngam hawta hoore mum bee hawtaago nder Guinness World Record Cook-a-Thon. Wonduki ko'e ma…ì…ìe, …ìe …óa…ì…ìiti foondoore coofugo saa'i 100 nde cooftaako Hilda Baci wa…ói. Ngam sembe maako e sembe maako ngam …ìeyda ko'e culeeki, o he…ìii hakkilantaaku e yi…óde.
Nder huwugo maako e huwugo ko'e cuwugo, Chef Dammy Pas …óon marki cuw…ìe e cuw…ìe wuro. ∆Åiido maako boo…óugo, e baaw…óe maako ngam halki kuuje …óe …óe …ìur…óe foonda, wa…ói mo ne…ó…óo mo …ìe ngi…ói nder duuniyaaru cucinol.
Ginnessa footi footi footaade.
Chef Dammy, mo …óon …ìeyda anndal cule, marki duniyaaru bee anndal maako masin nder "test run" diga lewru 11 haa lewru 15 lewru. Nder bal…óe nayi, o …óon cu…ìina masin nyaamdu nyaamdu …ìur…óum 100, ngam o …ìeyda yim…ìe …óon njanngina nyaamdu.
Yim…ìe …óuu…ó…ìe mbiyi ko cuffal cuffal ngal cuffal Dammy wa…ói ngam …ìeyda record ngal Hilda Baci wa…ói, bana Guinness Book of World Records. Ammaa, Chef Dammy hollii nder yidde nde o yi…ói naa' ngam o ha…ìa ko'e dow, ammaa ngam o …ìeyda annduki maako nder nyaamugo nyaamdu.
Nder haalaaji haalu…ói e maral…ìe nder Ado-Ekiti, Ekiti State, Chef Dammy, mo jannginoowo haalde yim…ìe ha nder ja≈ãde fedde, Oye-Ekiti (FUOYE), holli "test run" maako …óon haalude tan dow …ìeydaago hoore e anndal. O …ìaditi cooking-a-thon saa'i 120 bana fursatugo …ìeydude kuutorgal maako e holla yi…óugo cooking, …ìaduki …óa…ì…ìugo anndal Guinness World Records.
Ko coofir…óo Dammy wa…ói ngam o …óon huuwugo e cuffugo e mo yi…ói cuffugo wa…ói yim…ìe nder ummaatoore cuffugo …ìe mawnina mo. Fuu talanta maako e …ìernde maako ngam …ìeydaago ko'e cule bana ko'e ma…ì…ìe wa…ói mo go'o nder duniyaaru cule.
Nolde hoore.
Chef Dammy Pas …óon wa…óa ngeendam maako go…ó…óum, ammaa kuugal maako e kuugal maako boo …óon holla nder kuugal maako. O …óon tokki anndugo ko'e kulinaare keso, o …óon …óa…ì…ìita e laa…óe, laa…óe, e …ìurnaaji aada ngam wa…óugo nyaamduji keso e …ìurugo ha…ì…ìugo.

Abdullahi (sultan):
Abdullahi ko Sultan Kano mo laamani diga 1499-1509.

Abdullahi (laamii…óo):
Abdullahi …ìii Dabo (ngam innde: Abdullahi Maje Karofi dan Dabo) ko laam…óo Kano mo laamii…óo gila e hitaande 1855 haa e hitaande 1883.

Fati Abubakar:
Fati Abubakar woni fotowoowo Nigeria e fotowoowo dowla.
Joomi e golle.
Abubakar jibinaa e mawnina nder Maiduguri, Naajeeriya.
Kuugal maako wurtini nder The "New York Times", CNN Africa, BBC e Voice of America. O …óon huuwa ngam huutoreeji …ìaawoji Diiwal Borno, hawti bee …ìaawoji Boko Haram. O woodi kuugal wi'etee…óo Bits of Borno.

Muhammad Kwassau:
Muhammad Kwassau woni laamii…óo hooreejo laamordeZazzau …ìaawo warugo nder laamu Britinkeejum. Caggal nde o he…ìii laamu e hitaande 1897 ngam o su…ìii, ko e nder nder ha…óde warugo e nder konu, o welliti yim…ìe Britiyankoo…ìe e hitaande 1900, o noddi …ìe …ìeydi …ìeydi e hitaande 1901 ngam ha…ìugo e Kontagora, Ammaa …ìe mburtini mo nder 1902, ngam …óum wa…ói Zazzau he…ìii hoore mum.

Danjuma Laah:
Danjuma Tella Laah (dugumi 16 Fabayru 1960) woni politikkoore Naajeeriya e senatoore mo daranii…óo fombinare Diiwal Kaduna gila 2015 haa 2023.

Kehinde Oluwatoyin Ladipo:
Kehinde Oluwatoyin Ladipo woni Joologire Naajeeriua. O wondi ardii…óo Academy of Science Nigeria, o su…ìii nder Academy's Fellowship ha jaaynde mum ngal wa…óii e lewru Janayru 2015.
Biography.
Ladipo wa…ói duu…ìi sappo e jowi nder Shell Nigeria. Caggal nde Ladipo wari nder Shell, o walliima ha…ì…ìugo jande jaango jaangirde geoscience haa Janngirde Benin.

Adama Lamikanra:
Adama Iye Iyayi Lamikanra woni hooreejo laamii…ìe leydi Diiwal Rivers. O wa…óii alkawal dow hooreejo hooreejo leydi e 15 lewru Janayru 2016 ngam o jeyaa Daisy W. Okocha mo o jeyaa e nder nyalaande nden. O wa…ói alkawal dow hooreejo laamii…ìe dow 8 Maayu 2016.

Hassan Lemu:
Alhaji Hassan Lemu OON wonnoo sakataarjo hooreejo woyla Naajeeriya, Ahmadu Bello 
∆Åi…ó…óo e janngirde.
O jibinaa 1920-21 ha Lemu of Gbako, O fu…ó…ói ha Lemu Elementary School 1939-41, nden Niger Middle School, Bida 1942-44, jooni ko College Government, Bida, o yahi Kaduna College 1945-48.

Aminu Maigari:
Aminu Maigari ko laam…óo leydi Naajeeriya mo o jeyaa…óo hooreejo Fedde Bolji Naajeeriya 38 diga 2010 haa 2014 caggal nde o jeyaa e dow "laawdi jawdi, huutoreeji e huutoreeje".

Gerald Mbamalu:
Gerald Mbamalu woni laamii…óo Ojoto nder hukuma pamarun Idemili-South nder Diiwal Anambra, nder lesdi Naajeeriya.
∆Åi…ó…óo.
O …ìi…ó…óo joweetati e Aloysius e Philomina Mbamalu. Mbamalu laatoyi dow 1 abriil 2018, be Eze Ojoto III be Ezeoranyelu I be ummaatoore be Igwe-in-Council maako. O jeyaa e Igwe Augustine Obidiwe (Eze Ojoto II).

Ishaku Abbo:
Ishaku Elisha Abbo (duggi e Woyla Mubi, Naajeeriya) woni politikkoore Leysdi Naajeeriya. O woni senatoowo daranii…óo Woyla Adamawa nder Diiwal Aadaamaawa haa Naajeeriya 9th National Assembly. O wondi wonde ardii…óo All Progressives Congress (APC).
Kuugal politik.
Ha 23 Fabayru 2019, Abbo la…ì…ìini senatoore ngam daranii…ìe Woyla Adamawa, ngam o wa…ói kuri'ajo 79,337 dow senatoore, Binta Masi Garba.
Ja…ì…ìorgo Kewuuji.
Abbo wondi ja…ì…óo 'Beacon of Hope' Award je Adamawa Celebrities & Achievers Awards ha hitaande 2019.

Abd al-Qadir (Sakkwato…ìe):
Abd al-Qadir anndiraa kadi e Abdulkadir, o woni Maw…óo Sakkwato…ìe (1842-1859). O ardii e baaba maako Gidago …ìii Laima (1817-1842) e Ibraahiima Khalilu (1859-c. 1874). Ka≈ãko o ta∆¥ii o ta∆¥i wizir, Abdulkadir hawti e ha…ì…ìooji 25 e laamu Sultan Muhammed Bello e ha…ì…ìooji nayi e kawtal mum, Abu Bakr Atiku. O …óon moofta e Sultan Ali e …ìi…ó…óo Nana Asma'u …ìii Foodiye
Vizier.
Laamu maako bana vizier wa…ói hujja, ammaa o woodi ko haani. Abdulkadir hawti e ∆¥ettinki Umar Nagwamatse bana laamii…óo Katuru, Umar wa…ói anndal dow laamii…óo mo o mari baaw…óe, mo hoore mum e mo he…ìii he…ìuki amma o holli o walaa hakkiilo dow laamii…ìe. Umar …ìaawo …óon o yahdi haa worgo o wa…ói laamu Fulani nder Kontagora. Ammaa, woodi ko waawi wa…óugo. Nde Bukhari, Emir Hadejia he…ìii laamu bee sembe, Abdulkadir wa…ói darnde ngam ja…ìugo haala. O yahdi to Katagum o noddi Bukhari, ammaa o haani mo bee askar…óe maako, Bukhari o anndini o jeyaa…óo e maako, Ahmad o la…ì…ìinaama Emir. Bukhari …óa…ì…ìiti wallude to Bornu. Ammaa kuugal …ói…óo, go'o dow hoore Ahmad, on woni on …ìiy Abdulkadir e …ói…óma dow hoore Abdulkadir, …ìe mbaawaa fooli, nder wakkatiiji, Bukhari …ìaawo …óon o maayi on …ìiy Hadejia.
Abdulkadir hawti e darndan laamaana laamii…ìe Sultan.
Nder wakkati maajum, dokke …óe …ìe hokki vizier e Sultan …ìe …óon jeyaa bana lekki.

Abdukadir Abdulsalam:
Abdulkadir Abdulsalam ko politikal lesdi Naajeeriya, o jeyaa…óo shubtago Labour Party nder Naajeeriya.
