Goulbi de Maradi maayo:
Fuule woyla lesdi Naijeriya …óon hawta bee maayo Rima. Fuule Goulbi de Maradi hawti e maako nder fombina maako. Nde …óon yahda haa sa≈ãge hirnaange, …óon hawta bee maayo Sokoto …ìadi Sokoto ngam yaaki haa sa≈ãgo haa maayo Niger. Ko nder sahaa le…ó…óe tan ko maayo Rima …ìaawo …óon …óon …ìuwa. Proyektol ndiyam mawnde biyetee…óo Zauro polder project …óon nder kuu…óe diga duu…ìi …óuu…ó…ói. Nder leelooji Rima hakkunde Argungu e Birnin Kebbi, …óum ta∆¥an haakiere 10,572 (26,120 ektaare) leydi lam…ìe.

Fuude For√ßados:
Lammbe.
Lumi For√ßados …óon wa…ói hallude nder nokkuure nde …óon, …óon wa…óa yim…ìe …óon nja…ì…ìa nder lesdi, ngam ndiyam …óon …óon hallude kayyaaji ma…ì…ìe e jawdi ma…ì…ìe, …óon wa…ói boo …ìe …óon …ìeyda nder fannuuji ceede, to man'en …ìe …óon marra ngam …ìe …óon ha…ì…ìugo …ói.

Lodo Escravos:
Lollol ndiyam.
To ndiyamji ndiyam …óon laato masin, ndiyamji …óon laatoto ngam njaru, nyaamugo, limugo, hoolaago, e kuu…óe go…ó…óe. Chemicals, waste, microorganisms, e parasites …óon misaaluji halkere. Fuu ko'e ko'e hallu…ìe fuu …óon …ìaawo …óon …óon wurtina nder ndiyam. Nder ladde e nder maayo, hawra je …óon …ìeyda. Fuu ndiyam nder lesdi, ndiyam, e nder sahaaji fuu, ndiyam fuu waawaa wonde nder leydi. Ngam maajum, bo…ó…ói …ói …ìe ta∆¥i nder nokkuure majji …ói mbaawata ha…ì…ìugo ndiyam.

Bosun Tijani:
Bosun Tijani eriminmo lewru 20 July eii lysidi Naajeeriya-London dukkal lomou jornii eiii ministajjo pauro Naajeeriya bo e bididdo nder gwamnati Bola Tinubu diga August 16 duubi 2023.

Cross River (Nigeria):
Cross River (ndun su…ìaa…óo: Oyono) ko maayo maw…óo nder worgo fuunaa≈ãgo lesdi Nigeria, nden …óon hokkata ko woni innde maako to lesdi Cross River. O fu…ó…óii nder Kameruun, to o ja…ìi innde maayo Manyu. Ko …óum …ìeydi …ìaawo e nder nder Afrik, ko …óum wa…ói ko ndiyam …ìeydi …óuu…óugo e …óum …ìeyda …óuu…óugo. Nder km 80 …ìaawo mum (50 mi) to maayo o …óon ∆¥iwo nder ladde ladde ladda bee kooki …óuu…ó…ói e …óon …ìamta delta nder lesdi …ìadi naange maako bee maayo Calabar, ko uddugo km 20 (12 mi) e nder duu…ìi 50 km (31 mi) hakkunde berniwol Oron haa hirnaange hirnaange e Calabar haa hirnaango hirnaange, ko …ìuri km 30 (19 mi) diga maayo. Delta …óon …ìuwa nder ndiyam …ìur…óum …ìooyugo nder ndiyam, nder ndiyam …ìooy…óum nder ndiyam. Nder daande mum nder Atlantik, daande nde …óon haaje 24 km. Fu…ónaange fu…ónaange nder fu…ónaande nder leydi Kamerun.

Chanomi Creek:
Kuje nder e …ìadi Chanomi Creek.
Ha 12 Julaay 2006, worgo doolaa…ìe, …ìe gardii…ìe e gardii…ìe lesdi Naijeriya, …ìe …óon ha…ìa …ìe …óon nder doolaaje …ói…óo. Sooji'en ndiyamji nayjeeriya nayi maayi, e golloo…ìe Chevron …óuu…ó…ìe boo …ìe na≈ãgi; …ìe rimini …ìe nder lewru 14 lewru 7..

Bogomer Archipelago:
Ngam ndiyamji nder ladde …óon …ìuwa, ardii…óo Bogomerom archipelago …óon …ìuwa nder lesdi

Bodo River, Gokana:
Bodo River …óon nder nder nder nder maayo nder Gokana Kingdom. ∆äum laati laawol foroyugo yim…ìe Gokana. Ruw…ìe e rew…ìe njahi …ìe njaha haa ndiyam Bodo ngam …ìe njoo…óoto..

Fuu…óol Benin:
Cee…óal/Jol.
Fuule Benin ina woodi sahaaji …ói…ói haa tati nder sahaaji je'e e je'e, diga lewru janare haa lewru abriil …óum …óon je'e masin e je'ee, nden nder lewru Maayi haa lewru Yuli e lewru Septemba …óon …óon wara sahaaji. Fuu fuunaa≈ãge maayo …óon mari temperatuure mawnde, …óon mari masin masin e …óon mari yotti diga fuunaa≈ãgi maayo.

Asia:
Azia ko wuro nder diiwaan Ihiala nder lesdi Naajeeriya. ∆äum nodditii e nder Azia Alamatugiugele mo o fu…ó…óii nokkuure nden nder hitaande 500 AD.

Fuu…óol Anambra:
Anambra River Region e Culture.
Omambala woni innde allaaje jamanuure nde maayo mum …óon ∆¥iwo diga Uzo-uwa-ani to Aguleri, Anam, Nsugbe e Onicha, to o hawta bee Nguleeki Nkisi e Niger-kwora/Mgbakili nder yahugo ma…ì…ìe to Ocean Atlantik, bana yim…ìe lesdi ndi.

Amaryawa:
Amaryawa ko wuro nder leydi Jigawa nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Amaryawa …óon ha nder Roni gariiri laamorde..

Alkalawa:
Tariha.
Alkalawa fu…ó…óam ko ko e nder ko'e je'e alkali (ko'e laamii…óo e hausa) nder laamu Zamafara, diga maajum innde Alkalawa. Ha fu…ó…óoode karni 19th, Fulani jihadist Usman dan Fodio ha…ì…ìii Yunfa (laamu laamu Gobir) ha Alkalawa. Duule man …ìooyi nder lewru Oktoobar 1808, …óum wa…ói ko …óum timmini ha…ìre Fulani nder leydi ndi..

Alau Dam:
Fedde.
Alau dam …óon mawngu mita 9 bee babal babal babal babal ndiyam ngal limngal 50 km. ∆Åur…óo ja…ì…ìorgo haandi ko 112 million cubic meter. Alau dam he…ìii ndiyam diga maayo Yedzram e maayo Gombole je …óon hawta e ko'e Sambisa e …óon …ìadake bana maayo Ngadda nder Alau dam. Alau Dam he…ìii feere feere feere daga leydi lam…ìe. Laku ndu naftiraama boo ngam ha…ì…ìugo ndiyam ngam ha…ì…ìuki. Alau Dam ja…ìa feere feere feere nder kuu…óe lam…ìe nder nokkuure nde. Alau be yim…ìe 6895 be 1174 saare be yim…ìe (Konduga LGA Secretariat). 

Akure Ofosu Forest Reserve:
Tariha.
Hokkaama nder hitaande 1936 e hawtaaki e ko …ìuri 400 km2 (154 km2), Akure-Ofosu Forest Reserve …óon haani e Ala, Owo, e Ohosu ngam …óum haani haandi e go'o nder nokkuuje je …ìuri …óuu…óugo nder lesdi Naijeriya. Duniyaaji nder nder nder, …óon woodi feere feere feere, hawti bee duumiyaji nder nder …ìoggi. Mangabeys be red-capped (Cercocebus torquatus), nigerian white-throated guenons (Cercopithecus erythrogaster pococki), putty-noseed monkeys (Cerkopithecus nictitans), mona monkeys, e wo…ì…ìe fuu ina waawi wonde nder ko haani nder lekki Akure-Ofosu..

Akpotoro:
Fedde.
Akpotoro ina hawta e sub-communities …ói…ói

Akata fu…ó…óorde:
Akata Formation je je je je partiji nder tertiary Niger Delta (Akata-Agbada) naftoraade je je je …óon ha nder Niger Delta Province, Nigeria ha Bayre Guinea, Atlantik.

Afi Mountain Wildlife Sanctuary:
Ngam hakkilanaaki nyawudi dabbaaji dow hooseere, …ìe …óon wa…óugo jammaji ngam hakkilanaago yim…ìe, …ìe …óon sembi…óina huutoree…ìe to nokku ngam …ìe …óon …ìeyda huutoreego e ha…ì…ìugo dabbaaji. Kadi, ja≈ãde e ja≈ãde nder gure 16 haandije dow hooseere nden, wa…ói haade yim…ìe ummatooje nder wakkati arande nder ummaatooje. Nder wakkati man je …óon haani hawtuki nder ummaatooje je …óon haandi ngam haani, Afi Mountain Wildlife Sanctuary …óon haani bandugo bee yim…ìe ngam hokkugo hakkilantaaku ngam hakkilantaaki je …óon haaki e je …óon haako.

Abuloma, lesdi Rivers:
Abuloma wondi nokku nder nokkuure laamu Port Harcourt nder lesdi Rivers nder lesdi Nigeria, o laati nokkuure nder hitaande 1956, nden boo o laati nokkuuje go…ó…óe diga 1983 haa 1986. Laamii…óo Abuloma diga arande haa Port Harcourt woni Bright Ateke Fiboinumama, Obeomomu-Odu, nden o laamii…óo daraja …ói…ómere. Yim…ìe Abuloma …óon mbi'a …óemngal ngal …ìe nodda ObulomÔøºÔøº.

Hissare 10th maube Majalisajjo Naajeeriya:
Hisaare jerrogal 10th Sinatajjo nder Naajeeriya.

Hajiya Fatima Lolo:
Hajiya Fatima Lolo(MON) eriminmo Worou Fatima Muhammad Kolo nder Pategi, lewru Colte 1891 eii lysidi Naajeeriya Sheree.

Aliyu Makama:
Aliyu makama o janja (Aliyu makama Bida) nder naija I dubi 1905 baffajo mako okasancike maudo malamijo qur'ana modaraja I kotu daukaka kara natuki ki owadi jargirde firamare ijungo baffajo mako.
Ngendam.
Yawanci I waje fonbina, Aliyu ofuddi jande mako de arande I jangirde qur'ana de bida, kafin owada rigista I jargirde furamare de hebe,en bididdo de gariri bida. Kadan, oshe yita jande mako I du'un mataki dunba. Oyafdike kwalejin Katsina, tonto ohauti di mafi duduki be hirna. dun kama tike bedungo ho iki nauyi dawainiya hebuki yamuki yeso siyasa, tattali risku ijonde kunbina ikadi jagoranci waje gin yamuki gasa hore maube.

Abubakar Imam:
Abubakar Imam (1911-1981) on doon nylde lysidi jaridajju gada hukuma pamara Kagara Diiwal Niger eii woodi worou Gaskiya cooperation, eii hebe nasaraku tokocil woyla Naajeeriya. O dubbi 1952 o janja Jam,iyya Nothern people Congress (NPC) go,on modibo umaru Agaie toe Nuhu Bamalli.
Ngendam.
Eii dubbi 1939 toe Robert East toe bididdo worou jaridajjo Gaskiya corporation, o janja nasaraku kanko Ardiido woyla Naajeeriya.

Muhammad Ali Ndume:
Muhammad Ali Ndume (o danyama 20 e leuru nuwamba 1959). O latake goddo siyasajju leysdi Naajeriya. Hanko on woni maudo manga ha majalisa ndotti'en je sappo. O lataake sanata hakkilowo nukkore Borno gada dubije 2011. O laatake bi majalisa je lesdi Naajeeriya daga dubije 2003 yahugo 2011. Joni o do wakkere All Progressive Congress (APC).
Ngendam.
Muhammad Ali Ndume dayanma a wuro Gwoza je nukkore Borno. O wadi jangirde Firamare ha Gadamayo je woni ha Gwoza. O timmini ha dubije 1972. O nasti jangirde Sakandare je Mubi wakkati Gongola. Jonta Diiwal Adamawa daga 1973 yahugo 1978. O hebi saidaku timmingo Sakandare be WASC. Be ta'ini mo mangu daga odo pamarel ha be hokki mo mangu jogugo bikkoi je sudu mabbe. Be beddin mo mangu wakkati dubije karshe je Sakandare.Danyaki mako lati odo buri luttube ha sudu jangirde ha Comprehension Secondary School Mubi. Nde o timmini Sakandare o dilli Kaduna Polytechnic ha o jangi Marketing ha dubije 1978. O timmini Diploma je leysdi fuu ha (OND) ha 1980 be (HND) ha Marketing be Upper Credit Level. O dilli Federal Polytechnic Ilaro ha nukkore Ogun hakkunde 1982 be 1983 ngam o rewa leesdi je dole (NYSC). O nasty makaranta Ramat Polytechnic Maiduguri be matsayi mallumjo ha dubi 1983 ha o warty mallumjo manga. Ha dubi 1988 be hokkimo lambar yabo je beddugo ko lati kare risku je lesdi Duniya fuu. Bawo o timmini jangirde digiri je didabre ngam o janga ko lati filu be andal kwamfuta na jami'a Toledo, Ohio, Amurka. Kuma o timmini jangirde B.ED be M.ED ha dubi 1990.Be hokki mo Magna Cum Laude sahu je andal. Be nastinmo kungiya Phi Kappa Phi ngam kude boddum je o wadi. Bawo o timmini jangirde mako o warty Naajeriya o jokki jangungo ha Ramat Polytechnic Maiduguri nukkore Borno yahugo dubi 2003. Daga Bawo o nasti nder siyasajju.

Godswill Obot Akpabio:
Godswill Obot Akpabio CON (danyama 9 Bowte 1962) o lawyaajjo Naajeeriya den o goddo siyasa modo lami je 15th maudo Naajeriya hedi wakkere.
MANGU E NASARAKU MAKO.
Godswill Akpabio latake Bingel chief Obot Akpabio be madam Lucy Obot Akpabio (ne√® inyangetor) je ukana, ikot Ntuen ha Essien hukuma pamara je Udim. O danyama 9 Bowte 1962.Baba mako mayi wakkati odo pamarel. Dada mako maunin mo.
JANNGIRDE.
Akpabio jangnama ha Methodist primary school ukana Essien Udim LGA Akwa Ibom. The federal government college Port Harcourt Diiwal Rivers be university je calabar cross river ha o hebi degree mako hedi wakkere law
IYALU E NGENDAM MAKU.
Kaka Akpabio, okuku udo Akpabio o warrant chief ha nukkore ikot ekpene.. Kawu mako Dr I U Akpabio dum minister je jangirde hedi wakkere Naajeriya. Justice Nsima Akpabio njadu mako lati senator didabre ha republic je Naajeriya. 
Akpabio o kado je catholic faith. Akpabio bangi ekaette unoma Akpabio mo wangini family life enhancement initiative (FLEI)

Zanna Bukar Dipcharima:
Zanna Bukar Suloma Dipchirma (1917-1969) eiii lysidi siyasajju nder Naajeeriya Sheree dibi,en lokaci bididdo Naajeeriya diga Majalisajjo gwamnati Abubakar Tafawa Balewa. Eii Boutee lomou toh Shede.
Ngendam.
Eriminmo Dipchirma mongou 1917 luso Dipchirma Diiwal Borno. E saude Janngirde midil Maiduguri e boube mallami kwaleji nder Katsina.

Jaangirde Gobarau:
¬†
Gobarau University (var. Gobirau, Goborau) ko minaret mita 15 (50 nder nder wuro Katsina, woyla lesdi Nigeria. ∆äum haaki caka karnijum 15. …óum …óon huwti bana juulde bana Ja≈ãde. Wo…ì…ìe nder …ìe njanngini nder suudu senioru ndu laatake …ìe laati jannginoo…ìe, anndal e diina …ìe laatii…ìe nder lesdi. ∆äe jannginoo…ìe …ìeen hawti e jannginoowo limte e karnijum 17, Muhammad Ibn Muhammad Al-Fulani Al-Kishwani, winndiyanke, Wali Danmasani, e Muhammad Al-Sabbagh (Wali Danmarina) [https://search.emarefa.net/en/detail/BIM-526048-the-gobarau-mosque-and-its-role-as-a-center-of-islamic-learn] . Dental ja≈ãde ngal nandi e ja≈ãde je'etee…óo ja≈ãde jee'etee…óo nder duniyaaru, Sankore Madrasah nder Timbuktu. Sabo Sankor e Gobarau …ói…óo fuu …ói…óo …ói…óo …ói …ói…óo …ói…óeeji …ói…óeeje e …ói…óee…óe …ói…óee…ói …ói…óeejo …ói…óee. laati nokkuure mawnde ngam janngugo, …óo …óo yaajotoo…ìe e janngoo…ìe diga naange e naange, …ìaawo maajum o laati bana janngirde.
Bana misaalu aranndeeji mummi'en nder wuro anndiraa…óo nder suudu diina, tower ngal laati maral wuro.
Taariiha.
Gobarau minaret (e Hausa, Hasumiyya) ko suudu fotde 50 nder nder wuro Katsina, laamorgo lesdi Katsina.Minaret ngal ko gootel juulde nde mahama nder karnijum jowi e jowi nder laamu Sarkin (Kabara) Katsina, Muhammadu Korau (1348 - 1398 AD) mo woni laamii…óo Muslim arandeejo leydi Katsina. Fu…ó…óam juulde nden …óon haani ngam kuugal jannginoowo diina Islaam goodu…óo semmbe Sheikh Muhammad Abdulkarim Almaghili. Almaghili, mo jibinaa e Tlemcen nder Aljeeriya hannde, o janngini wakkatiire nder Katsina nde o wattii wuro nder wakkati laamu Muhammadu Korau. Masjid Gobarau haani haaki ngam huutoree nder kuu…óe ruuhu e hakkillo. ∆äum wa…ói e juuldeeji …ói wonnoo nder wuro Timbuktu saa'i …óon.
Masjid ngal …ìaawo …óon naftiraama boo bana janngirde. Ha fu…ó…óoode karnijum 16, Katsina laatiima nokkuure mawnde nder jaaynde e jaaynde haa Hausaland, nden juulde Gobarau …ìeydiima nokkuure jaayndeeji Islaam. Gobarau fu…ó…óii wonde juulde Katsina fu…ó…óam karni 19 AD nde Sarkin Katsina Ummarun Dallaje (1805-1835) maaki juulde keso, nde …ìaawo …óun Muhammadu Dikko (1906-1944), mo maaki Masallacin Dutsi (Jamde mawnde Katina/Masallacin Juma'a na Kofar Soro), ko …óon naftira haa hande.
Masjid e tower makko …ìe …ìe ha…ì…ìii Sarkin Katsina Muhammadu Kabir Usman (1981-2008).
Fedde anndal.
Fuu ko yim…ìe he…ìa dow fu…ó…óam Gobarau wi'i nde Muhammadu Korau wa…ói Jibda-Yaki Sanau, laamii…óo paganol keso Katsina, o yi…ói nyi…ìugo juulde. Caggal nde nokkuure nden su…ìii, hawti haala dow laawol kibila to juulde nden fota. Muhammadu Korau hawti e jannginoo…ìe Muslim'en wakkati oon, …ìe fuu …ìe nja…ìii laawol go'o, sey Mallam Jodoma, ne…ó…óo Fulani mo o anndi. Woni ko haani, e jannginoo…ìe go…ó…ói …ìe …óon …óon haani Jodoma ngam o woni mo …ìe anndaa mo o yi…ói wurtina mo. Mallam Jodoma …óon …óon …ìeyda, o holli maral maako to laawol feere, nden …óon …óon Ka'aba …óon wa≈ãgina. Tower'en naftiraama boo ngam yi'ugo konu'en …óon …óon ha…ì…ìa.
Muhammadu Korau hay…óini, o wa…ói Mallam Jodoma Imam maw…óo mum, ngam …ìeydaago anndal…ìe go…ó…ói, …ìe wa…ói Muhammadu Koraw hoolaaki Jodoma, o …ìeydi anndude, o yi…ói joo…óorde maako. Jodoma …óon wurtina diga Katsina, o …óon joo…ói Guga, gariiri nder laamu Bakori ha nder lesdi Katsina, to o maayi.
Ja…ì…ìorgo Kewuuji.
Muhammad Ibn Muhammad Al-Fulani Al-Kishwani, Fedde Fedde Fuuta, Astroloog, Mystik
Wali Danmasani
Wali Danmarina
Firoore.
Hannde Gobarau woni nokku …óo yim…ìe …ìe nji…óata tooro, e koode Kusugu nder Daura.
Firooji.

Diina Lislamu nder Haiti:
Diina Lislamu ha Haiti hawti e yim…ìe musulmaa…ìe …ìe …ìe …ìur…ói 1% nder yim…ìe fuu, …ìe hawti e …ìe njaara. Musul…ìe Haiti Limgal juul…ìe e pelle Islaam'en …óon …óon ha nder lesdi.
Diina Lislamu ∆¥etti diga Afrik wakkati jaaynde maccu…ìe (maaki karnijum 16), amma goon…óinki diina Otodoks …ìeydi ha Haiti nder duu…ìi …ìaawo …óon. fu…ó…óam karni 16 Nden …ìe ummanii …óum nder hitaande 1992 diga yim…ìe Marokko …ìe njaaraama, diga saa'i maajum haa jooni. 1992 Musulmanaa…ìe waawi wa…óugo diina ma…ì…ìe nder laa…ìal e ja≈ãde Islaam …óon haani.
Demmografi.
Yim…ìe Musul…ìe haiti …óuu…óal …ìe'e sunni'en.

Ibrahim Dasuki:
Ibrahim Dasuki (1923-2016) en tuflejo Naajeeriya wakkatu arandejun jamhuriya dun Najeriya o wadii Sheree, o jogiike joodorgal waliiku, bawonon o lamni wajiiri wakkatu laamu Tafawa Balewa. Kadin o kiido wajiirijo Shoggu e sanaa'aaji e adiiraku.
ndayee deer hitaade 1917 deer gurel deer lesdi Borno. O jangii e jangiirde Midil de Maiduguri, o jingii modibbaaku e maude jangirde eekkutuki modibbe de Katsina.
Ngendam.
Dipcharima fuuddi kuugal moodibbaaku, o huwii e jangiirde duudde deer hitaade 1938 koyaari 1946 wakkatu dun o fuddii tufleku. O artirii nastuki eggol National Council of Nigeria and the Cameroon (NCNC). eggol gol Dr. Nnamdi Azikwe ardii, yo mo deer ardii be eggol gol yaki Birtaniya deer hitaade 1947. Dipcharima dali NCNC o lattike ardiido mo John Holt. O bedii naastugo tufle deer hitaade 1954 O nastii eggol woyla gol woyla (NPC), dow dandamol maako en subimo o laasti ngomna lesdi Borno. Yidde yimbee foodii latti ardiido eggol NPC lisal lesdi Borno kadiin ardiido lesdi yerwa deer hitaade 1956, O hebii innde geccawol "Zanna". O hebii joodorgal waliiku ngal leidi e Legas deer hitaade 1954 ndeen kadiin o lastikee bindowoo e sudu huwiirde adiraaku. O lastikee wajiirijo lesdi walaa fayil deer hitaade 1957 o lattikee wajiirijo shoggu e Sanaa'aji mo lesdi, o diilli Amurka ndeer "yaamde hitaade 1963 gan tefukii yidde Amurka ndeer gaagustaare sanaa'aji e Najeriya, to duun tabbitii duun uustay sembe huwiirde sanaa'aji Birtaniya ndeer tattali njawdi. Wakkatu duun o wooni e bigeyel geel o tindinii huwirde sanaa'aji kooccube alkawal bee kollataa shiya yidde ngan senndirigu larall e kadin shiya hokkuki hakke lesdi. Ndee hitaade 1964, jabi joodorgal wajiirijo adiraaku, emo jogii gal soja jabii lesdi nyeendere 5 lewru Janairu 1966. Baawo soja jabi lesdi nhanko ardii wajiri'en tambinbe lamu to soja'en kooshube fiddiirle wala firaminista Abubakar Tafawa Balewa mo.

Abibatu Mogaji:
Cheif Abibatu Mogaji OON MFR (16 Colte - 15 June duubi 2013) eii lysidi lomou toh Iya'oja nder Lagos, eii Inna shugabajjo Bola Tinubu.
Ngendam.
Abibatu Mogaji eriminmo lewru 16 Colte Diiwal Lagos Naajeeriya.
Zuri,a maku.
Chief Mogaji Inna Bola Tinubu hebe jornii eii Shugabajjo lysidi Naajeeriya, Tinubu oon doon Folashde bore,en Iyal'oja Diiwal Lagos.

Abdulmaliki CBE:
Abdul Malik CBE (1914-1969) Jami'ijo diflomasiya Naajeeriya kadin tuflejo kadin hanko woni maudoo kwaamishinajo Najeriya mo arandee e Birtaniya.
Maliki fuuddi jande e jangirde Elementary Okene ndeer hitaade 1923 kafin o dilla jangirde firamary de Bida ndeer hitaade 1927, o nasti jangirde ekkutuki modibbaku nde Katsina ndeer hitaade 1929. Ndeer hitaade 1950 o dilli Ingila gan eltugo famarde laamorde.
Sanaa'aji.
Malik fuddi kuugal modibbaku e jangirde Middle Okene ndeer hitaade 1935. Gadanon e deer hitaade 1936 en taadimo sulonowo kuude e Okene, O jogike gal har 1939. O lattike magatakarda mo lesdi Katsina ndeer hitaade 1939 ko yari 1940, baawonon o jogikee lamu famaarde lamorde Igbira/Okene bawo o dilla England deer hitaade 1950. Bawo o wattoyi daga Ingila, O nasti eggol NPC gol woyla, kadin ndeer hitaade 1952 O hebii joodorgal waliiku baarol woyla. Kadin danma e joodorgal waliiku gal lesdi ngal woyla, O jogikede har koyari 1958. Ndeer hitaade 1960 en hokkimo joodorgal maudo kwamishinajo mo arande e Birtaniya kofin en hooramo Paris dow joodorgal koroowo Naajeeriya e Faransa.
Gada yoonki e waade.
Maliki maayi e hitaade 1969 wakkatudun o hocci suutere e Okene, leysdi Kogi.
Hokkuki mango.
Nhokkimo lamba useki dun kwamanda siryeki lamu Birtaniya (CBE) e deer hitaade 1960. Footooji Maliki kanji didii di Rex Coleman dun Baron Studios e dun wangina dii e deer hebe jootiide dun National Portrait Gallery, London.

Muhammed Bello:
Muhammad Bello woni Sultan mo Sokoto didabo . O jogage lamu diga 1817 yarinki 1837. 
O bindowo habaruji, gime e ilmu diina.
O biddo Usumanu bin Fodiyo artudo wadduki Kalifare Sokoto bo arti jogaki lamu Kalifare den. Muhammad Bello mo bolweten dou maako, hanko woni burdo badaki baffa maako ngam raruki njamu Maako.
Usumanu Bi Fodiyo hanko arti daraki dou Dina islama, o famtini lenyol dou Dina e ilmu jamaan dum Rewbe e worbe ko nangi wojjeji funa ko heddi waila.
Haa Joni hanko arti waddugo haala shari'a dina islama o tabbitini dun hebi kotiji di shari'a islama. 
Muhammad Bello mayi nder lewru sappo e balde sappande Didi e jowi nder dungu 1837. Minyiko Abubakar Atiku bo biko a Aliyu babba Roni mo mawo o mayi.
Dubi Arendeji.
Muhammad Bello danyaama nyalbe alarba nder dungu 1817 sa'i dum baffa maako Usumanu bi Fodiyo e wodi dubi sappande Didi e jowe tati.
E mo noddire "Bello" ko dum hollata yo ballowo nder Fulfulde. No e holla basdaki Maako e baffa maako ngam diga e mo suka to baffa maako fuu woni emo don, diga bawo o wartani baffa maako on wazirijo Maako.
Ngendam.
Muhammad Bello yo wurti diga Fulbe bi'e'tebe Torodbe kautube i'am e larabankwen. Sakirawo Maako Abdullahi bi Fodiyo hanko wi sumpo maabbe e hauti e Fulbe e larabankwen. Ko o wi'ata sumpo maabbe yo fuddu diga larabankwen diga betedo Uqba. To haalaka Muhammad Bello besdi e wi'iki o Wala tabbas dou haala moi nder Uqba on. O Ando ko Uqba ibn Nafi ko Uqba ibn Yasir ko bo Uqba Ibn Amir? To tariha Kan Uqba on te'i Debbie Pullo noddetedo e inde Bajjumangbu burtido diga usulol Usumanu bi Fodiyo hanko biyetebe Torodbe.
Kalifa Muhammad Bello nder deriyol Maako Infaq Al-Mansur o bedi winduki dou hambe diga zurriya annabijo men Muhammad ta dadol kaka mabbe biyetedo Hawwa (madujoUsumanu bi Fodiyo) Alhaji Muhammad Junaidu wazirijo Sokoto njangowo ilmu tariha Fulbe bedi tabbinki haala Shaykh Abdullahi bi Fodiyo dou haala usulol Iyalu Bi Fodiyoyo fuddir diga larabankwen e Fulbe.
Ahmadu Bello nder bindi Maako dou tariha Maako bayodum hebi enci ko'e kadin bawo o Roni Muhammad Bello hanko ma o wi ebe kauti e larabankwen ben diga madujo Usumanu bi Fodiyo. Usulol Usumanu bi Fodiyo on e hauti hakkude jinsiji Fulbe e larabankwen.
Tariha ni holli Fulbe Ben diga bawo e hauti e hausen hanjum Wadi ebe noddeHausa-Fulani Arabs.
Ko fuddi nder dungu 1804 sa'i dum jihadi fuddaka Fulbe andiraka e Torankawa (Torodbe) Amman bindi mabbe Holli tariha no be hauti e larabankwen ben. Be bolwi Fulfulde bo e be kutira e maire ko de dum Andi be burtake diga jinsi ferefere.
Lesdi Torankwen Ben e hauti e lenyol Sudani musanmatan be gala jaudi. Bindainobe sa'i dum hauti e Fula, Wolof,Mande, Hausa and Berber. Bawo non e be wolwa Fula bo be te'i te'i ni nder Fulbe Ben bo be garti Iyalu Fulbe be ilmu.
Muhammad Bello hanko woni biddo Debbo nayabo mo Usumanu bi Fodiyo biyetedo Hauwa ko bo Inna Garka. Sakirabe Maako hambe maa fuu e be nder harkaji njangirde baffa mabbe to lesdi Degel bo diga bawo be sankiti nder dungu 1804.
Nder dungu 1809 Bello hanko warti neddo Dari do hebuki daulare Sokoto dou dalila non dum walli baffa maako dou hebki nasaraku dou nyamuki lesdi Hausa'en to konu Fulbe Joni be nder dungu (1804-1810)
Sakirabe Maako wattiti hakkillo mabbe dou njangirde non walli be anda. Nder burbe andaki ben hambe woni Nana Asama'u, bindowo gimi e modibbaku. Abubakar Atiku kam Roni mo.

Sambo Dasuki:
Sambo Dasuki danyama nyalande (2 Bowte 1954 bo o mayi 14 November 2016) haanko woni Sultan mo Sokoto mo dum jippini nder dungu 1996 sa'i lamu Goodluck Jonathan. Ko o wartata Sultan on o jogake lamu Baraden Sakkwato…ìe. Hanko woni Sultan arandejo nder wuro Bi Fodiyo badido Ahmadu Bello Sardauna mo Sokoto ginyiro Abubakar Guumi kadin haanko mabbiti Jama'tu Nasril Islam

Mohammed Tukur:
Mohammed Tukur eii Lamido Kano woyla Naajeeriya Tukur hebe,en laamorde Kano nder Bassasa hanko civil war.

Rabi'atu Dahiru Nyako:

Nde jonnta emoo huuwa haa jonn…óe kuutoro kuugal hawti jeya Hakkilanngo kuugal hijjoyki n…óum Naajeeriya.

Lisi Janngirde maw…ìe haa Diiwal Jigawa:
Diiwal Jigawa (Hausa: Jihar Jigawa; Fula: Leydi Jigawa) ko go'o e dowla 36 nder lesdi Naajeeriya, …óo woni nder lesdi Naajeriya. Diiwal Jigawa Hausa Jihar Jigawa Fula Leydi Jigawa 36 diiwe nder lesdi Nigeria lesdi man woyla Hino tagi ha 27 Anngusta 1991, ha jaaynde Ibrahim Babangida mo hollitii ha…ì…ìugo dowlaaji go…ó…ói jowee…ói…ói e nder leydi ndi, hokki limgal dowlaaji haa tati. Ja…ì…ìorgo Kewuuji pinal ngal holli ko e nder sariya leydi ndii, ko e nder laamu leydi ndii e nder laamu nguu, ko e dow laamu leydi ndiin. Diiwal Jigawa je nder Kano State je je ha woyla fuunaa≈ãgo Kano State, be je je je ha nder lesdi Nigeria be Niger. Diiwal Kano, Niiser Laamorgo leydi nden nden nden woni wuro mawnde Dutse. Dutse Jigawa woodi laamorde hawrie 27.

Femi Adesina:
Femi Adesina OON eii lysidi Naajeeriya jaridajjo toe bididdo worou Shugabajjo Muhammadu Buhari nder gwamnati Muhammadu Buhari.

Ahmed Umar Bolori:
Ahmed Umar Bolori eii lysidi jakadanci jomou diga Borno jornii mangul shawarajii nder gwamnati Diiwal Kogi to bididdo worou Kogi State investment promotion Agency (KSIPA).
Ilmu.
Ahmed Bolori oon doon Degree eii fani biwal bil Adama daga Janngirde Benin toe moube Janngirde bill Adama toh hakko diga Janngirde Ahmadu Bello Zariya.

Adamu Suleiman:
Adamu Suleiman eriminmo lewru 14 Duujal mongou 1929 bore walla eii lysidi Naajeeriya dan Sanda oon doon Ardiido eii hebe,en Muhammadu Dikko Yusufu toe hebenayee Sunday Adewusi dubbi 1986
Ilmu.
Suleiman bidil Janngirde Jimeta diga 1940 yahri 1944 toe Janngirde Yola dubbi 1950 eii bidi Janngirde Barewa nder Zariya diga 1947 yahri 1950 haulu,en dai Janngirde Technology nder Zariya diga 1954 yahri 1956. Banddirawo Suleiman shere Janngirde mawbe Ibadan you kanko bidi,ondubbi1960

Ambrose Folorunsho Alli:

Astana:
Astana anndiraa…óo e Akmolinsk, Tselinograd, Akmola, e …ìaawo nde Nur-Sultan, woni laamorgo leydi Kazakhstan. Astana Akmolinsk Tselinograd Akmola Nur-Sultan laamorgo Kazakhstan
Duule …óon haadi dow maayo Ishim nder fombinaare lesdi Kazakhstan, nder lesdi Akmola, koo nde …óum laamoto bana gariiri bee daraja feere feere feere bee lesdi fu. Luttugal Akmola Fuu ta∆¥re laamu 2022 holli yim…ìe 1,350,228 nder nder nder nderji, wa…ói …óum gariiri …ói…ómere …ìur…óum mawnugo nder leydi, caggal Almaty, je laati laamorgo haa hitaande 1997. gariiri …ói…óawru nder lesdi Almaty Duule nden laati laamorgo Kazakhstan nder hitaande 1997; diga saa'i …óon o …ìeydi e …ìeydi ha nder jawdi haa o wardi nder nder nder nder dowle Asiya cakaaji. Asia Mawbe Nder 2021, laamu Allah su…ìi Astana bana go'o nder nokkuuje 10 …ìur…óe …ìamtaare boo…óeeji.

Adegoke Olubummo:
Adegoke Olubummo eii lysidi Naajeeriya mallami toe Ifaki. Eii fauree Naajeeriya Sheree maube Janngirde.
Ngendam.
Adegoke yahi nder janngirde Methodist to Ifaki, o timmini nder 1937. Nder hitaande 1938, o tokki ja≈ãde Wesley College nder Ibadan. Koleji Wesley O he…ìii jaaynde maako nder Fourah Bay College nder Sierra Leone. Fourah Bay College Sierra Leone.Nder hitaande 1938, o tokki ja≈ãde Wesley koleji nder Ibadan.O laati Ardiido Science of Ondo State University caggal nde o jeyi to Jami,are nder Ibadan e hitaande 1985. Jaangoore Leysdi Ondo.
Nolde hoore.
Adegoke woodi …ìi…ì…ìe tati …ìe …ìe …ìe …ìe limto. O baaba limtaako Yewande Olubummo.

Arigidi Akoko:
Arigidi woni wuro nder Akoko North West, Diiwal Ondo, Naajeeriya. Arigidi Akoko North-West Ondo State Naajeeriya
Juulde.
Won juulde nder teddungal Okota, Allah maw…óo maayo diga diina Yoruba. Diine Yoruba ∆äum …óon jeyaa e Oodua People's Congress ha jaango Otunba Gani Adams mo ∆¥iwoyi nder gariiri. Congreere Yim…ìe Oodua Okota boo ko juulde aada Yoruba. Yoruba aada Yim…ìe feere …óon …óon wa…óa ko Areso.
Fedde politik.
Arigidi woodi …ói…óo nder jejejiji siyasa sappo nder hukuma pamarun Akoko North West, ko …óum; Arigidi Iye ward 1 e Agbaluku Imo ward 2.¬† Ward 1 ina woodi go…ó…óe 24 go…ó…óe siyasa e ward 2 ina woodi go…ó…ói 11, ko wa…ói go…ó…ói 34 fuu.

Solomon Babalola:
Professor Solomon Adeboye Oladele Babalola jibini nder 17 Bowte 1926, nder saare Babalola nder Ile-Ajo. Baaba maako, Joseph Olawuni Omowunmi Babalola (Ajala) laati maw…óo mar…óo, mo anndiraa ngam ma…ì…ìugo cuu…ói nder Ipetumodu …ìaawo …ìeydaaki …ìurna nder nguleeki …ìurna nder fu…ó…óam karnijum 20th; diga maajum su…ìugo saare "Alatunse of Ipetumudu saare …óon …ìeyda hawtaade ma…ì…ìe. Baaffah maako boo o kiristankeejo mo …óon mawnina.
Ngendam.
Babalola wa…ói batisma nder Church O woodi renndol kiristaanaaku maw…óo e o yahdi C.M.S. Christ Janngirde firamare, Wasimi, Ipetumodu. Ja≈ãde ja≈ãde O …óon wondi goodu…óo nder jamirooje haa suudu diina nden, nden o …óon werra nder suudu ducha nder yonki maako fuu. Babalola ja…ì…ìi Almasiihu bana Jawmiraawo maako e Kisnoowo maako nder wakkati o …óon nder Igbobi College, nden o ha…ì…ìiti ngam Bishop Lagos, Rt. Rev. Gordon Vining nder 24 Noofambar 1943. Bisopu Lagos.
Ja≈ãde.
Nder hitaande 1936, to Babalola woodi duu…ìi 10, o su…ìi mo mo jannginoowo maako, Mr. S.T. Fakoya, ngam o joo…óoto ngam ja…ìugo ja…ìugo nder ja≈ãde dowla nder lesdi Naajeeriya. ∆äuum jaayndeere wa…óii nder Ibadan, nden nder wakkati mo o …óon jeyaa e …ìiy…ìe maw…ìe nder jeyaaji jeyaaji joweego e joweego. ∆äum wa…ói ko …óum wa…ói; nder 1937 o wa…ói ja…ì…ìaade ja…ì…ìaare to Igbobi College, Lagos, o ja…ìaama nder Form One nder lewru Janaare 1938. ∆äo'o fu…ó…óii ko o mari anndal.
Kuugal.
Solomon Adeboye Babalola yahi Achimota College nder Ghana. Achimota College Ghana Caggal nde o he…ìii ja≈ãde bachelor e hitaande 1946, o janngini e Igbobi College. Koleji Igbobi Nder hitaande 1948, o he…ìi ja≈ãde …ói…ómere ngam ja≈ãde maako nder ja≈ãde Queens' College, Cambridge, o he…ìii ja≈ãde nder hitaande 1952. Koleji Queens, Cambridge O wartii to Igbobi koleje ngam tokkude jannginki e o jeyaa haa o warti ardii…óo ardii…óo Afrik nder janngirde, haaje o woni ardii…óo darnde. O he…ìii doktoor nder defte Yoruba. 1e 1962, o laamaama mo darinoowo nder Obafemi Awolowo University. Obafemi Awolowo University ¬†O he…ìii kadi jaango doktoor to Yunivarsitii London. [ ko haani] University of London E hitaande 1963, o jeyaa e jannginoowo …óem…óe Afrik e ja≈ãde Lagos.
O yotti Cambridge nder lewru Oktoobar 1948 o hawti o wa…ói kadi hooreejo The Afrik. Nder Cambridge o jaabini dow dow dow dow ko BBC West Africa Service wa…ói ngam hokkude baylitol …óemngal Farayse nder …óemngal yim…ìe ma…ì…ìe.

Nyagak maayo:
Nyagak woni maayo West Nile,woyla Uganda.
Luttugol.
Nyagak maayo …óon ∆¥iwo nder diiwaan Zombo e diiwaan Arua.∆äum woni ko'e ndiyam nder maayo Ora,nde o hawti fuunaa≈ãge wuro Okollo.
∆Åuuruji ndiyam.
∆Åurna …ìesnguji ndiyamji …óon haandi dow maayo Nyagak: 

Nzi maayo:
Nzi ko maayo nder Ivory Coast.∆äum woni ko'e ndiyam ndiyam ndiyam Bandama.
Ha 6 Septemba 2016,laamorde laawol dow maayo ndu …ìadi Dimbokro …ìadake.

Koolol Karanga:
Karanga River ko maayo …óo yaasi nder Karanga Ward nder leydi Kilimanjaro nder lesdi Tanzania.Fuu…óol ngol …óon haa hooseere Kilimanjaro,diga …óon …óon …óon …óon …ìuwa haa worgo haa Nyumba ya Mungu.

Kool Kafufu:
Kafufu ko Kavu woni maayo nder worgo hirnaange Tanzania O …óon ∆¥iwo nder Rukwa Valley,…óon ∆¥iwi caka maayo Chada e …óon …ìuwa nder maayo Rukwa.Nguurndam …óon …ìesda,…óon …ìeyda bee maare.Kafufu valley …óon woodi ko'e njamndi e …ìanndu.

Kool Kalambo:
Fuule Kalambo je je je je ta∆¥ii nder sahaa hakkunde Zambia e Songwe Region,Tanzania.∆äum woni ko ndiyam …ìii-…ìii-…ìooyma je …óon ∆¥eewa dow Ufipa Plateau haa woyla fuuna fuuna fuun Mbala haa dabare 1800 m e …óon …ìuwa nder Albertine Rift,…óon naati nder fombina fuuna fuunna fuuna fuungol Tanganyika haa dabare 770 m, nder dabare dabare daare 50 km. ∆äuum wa…ói ko …ìuri heewde anndude,ko ndiyamji,Kalambo Falls,woni ndiyamji …ói…óa…ìo …ìur…ói mawnude nder Afrik (…óaawo Tugela Falls nder lesdi Afrika Fuu…óun).["citation needed"]Ha dow ndiyamji, maayo …óon …óon maaro nder …ìolde. ¬†¬†
Luttugol maayo …óon hawta bee nokkuuje archaeological maw…óe.

Koolol Kalungwishi:
Fuule Kalungwishi …óon …ìuwa hirnaange nder lesdi Zambia haa nder maayo Mweru. ∆äum anndiraa ngam ndiyamji mum,hawti e Lumangwe Falls,Kabweluma Falls,Kundabwika Falls e Mumbuluma Falls. ["citation needed"]
Won laabi ha…ì…ìugo dabareji ndiyam …ói…óo ha dow Kundabwika e kabwelume.∆äuum naa' man…óinii yim…ìe fuu ngam wo…ì…ìe …óon numi laamorde ndiyamji …óon …ìeyda.["citation needed"]
Kalungwishi pontoon dow laawol Kawambwa-Mporokoso dow Lumangwe Falls ha…ì…ìii bee laami kesum nder hitaande 2004.["citation needed"]

Koololol Kangen:
Nguurndam Kangen woni nguurndam nder Sudan worgo,to hirnaange lesdi Boma.O hawti e maayo Pibor …ìadi Pibor.

Carolyne Adalla:
Carolyne Adalla ko winndii…óo Kenya, o winndi defte Confessions of an AIDS (1993).
Carolyne Adalla jibinaa n…óer Kenya. Goomu mo SIDA wallitu…óo on o wi'i …óum ko haala gootol. Catherine Njeri, mo laatii…óo n…óer lesdi ndin, he…ìii nyau ndu AIDS, o waawi …ìeydaa…óe janngude nder lesdi Amurkaa.

Lateef Kayode Jakande:
Lateef Kayode Jakande 23 July 1929 - 11 morso 2021) ko won…óo nder lesdi Naajeeriya mo woni laam…óo leydi Lagos diga 1979 haa 1983, nden boo o laatii Minista kuugal nder laamu laamu Sani Abacha.
Firo.
Lateef Kayode Jakande jibini nder nokkuure Epetedo nder Lagos Island, Lagos State nder lewru 29 Layewol 1929. Maw…ìe …ói…óo fuu …ìe …óon dari Omu-Aran, Diiwal Kwara .O janngini nder janngirde Lagos nder Enu-Owa, Lagos Island, nden e Bunham Memorial Methodist School, Port Harcourt (1934-43). O janngini e King's koleji, Lagos e hitaande 1943, nden o jokka e Ilesha Grammar School e hitaande 1945, to o wurtini defte …óem…óe …óe wi'etee The Quarterly Mirorr.
Nder hitaande 1949, Jakande fu…ó…óiima golle nder jarnama fu…ó…óam e Daily Service nden nden nder 1953 o hawti e Nigerian Tribune. Nder hitaande 1956 o laatii hooreejo jaaynde Tribune e hooreejo hooreejo Obafemi Awolowo.
Caggal nde o wurtini Tribune nder hitaande 1975, Jakande wa…ói John West Publications o fu…ó…ói wurtinki.O wa…ói hooreejo arandeejo kawtal joornaa…ìe leydi Nigeria (NPAN).
Goobnore leydi Lagos.
…ìesdi limce e limce leydi nder nokkuuje je …óon mari jawdi nder Victoria Island e Lekki Peninsula e limce ngam ja…ìugo limce, poolji e lisensji je je je …óon jeya. O timmini mahol suudu ndun ha Gbagada e Ikorodu e haaki haaki ha nder leydi on haaki ha haaki ha…ói 20 suudu ndun. Nde o jeyaa e hooreejo leydi, o wa…ói jaay…óe laamu 23 …óe konu leydi ndii ha…ì…ìii.O fu…ó…óii boo kuugal metrool ngam huwtoree laawol yim…ìe. Luttugol ngal fu…ó…óii, e laamu maako nde gomnati timmi nde konu nja…ì…ìi laamu e 31 Bowte 1983.
∆Åaawo golle.
Caggal nde konu ja…ì…ìi laamu nder 1983, Jakande …óon jeyaa, …óon jeyaa e …óon jeyaa ngam …ìeydaago, ammaa …ìaawo …óon o jeyaa.Caggal nde o rim…óinaama, o ja…ìi darnde Ministaal Fuu…óugo nder laamu laamu Sani Abacha, …óum wa…ói o haani. O holli o ja…ìiima kuugal ngol nder sa…óugo M. K. O. Abiola e ardii…ìe feere fu…ó…óoo…ìe.Nder haalde nde o wa…ói, o wi'i o …óon njettina ngam o wa…ói anniya ngam huuwugo. Ammaa, hawtuki maako bee Abacha wa…ói mo mar…óo kuu…óe maako nder siyasa …ìaawo nastirde demokaraasi nder hitaande 1999.
Alhaji Lateef Kayode Jakande laati ardii…óo nder All Nigeria Peoples Party (ANPP) nde UNPP e All People's Party (APP) hawti. Nder lewru Juun 2002, o "waawiri" diga ha nder partijo ANPP je …óon jeyaa e hooreejo Lanre Razaq.Jakande woni hooreejo arandeejo jamiroore jamiroore Naajeeriya (APN) nde …óum ha…ì…ìii nder lewru Noofambar 2006. Nder lewru Mee 2009, o haani wonde o hawti e ha…ìre ngam hakkilo dow partiya bee mo'o wari wari haaki, Dr.Adegbola Dominic.Yim…ìe maw…ìe …óuu…ó…ìe …óon …óon haa juulde juulde maako duu…ìi 75. Nder haala ngol, Goobnoreejo lesdi Lagos, Bola Tinubu wi'i Jakande yaaki mo mo mo mo marani ngam nguurndam maako nder kuugal ummaatoore. Goobninoowo lesdi Imo, Achike Udenwa wi'i nguurndam Jakande e wakkatiji maako …óon holla "ji'am, be sembe, be sembe e be'am, e be'ol ngam …ìernde".
∆Åaawo …óon nguurndam e maayde.
Jakande maayi nder Lagos nder 11 feebari 2021. ∆Åandu maako …óon haandi nder Vaults and Gardens Cemetery, Ikoyi, Lagos State ha Friday 12 morso duubi 2021 ha ja…ìugo dokkal COVID-19.

Zoe Leonard:
Zoe Leonard (duggi 1961) ko artist Ameriknaajo, o golliima e fotde e ja≈ãde. O hollitii diga …ìaawo 1980s e golle maako hawti e dow dow dow dow Dokumenta IX e Dokumenta XII, e dow dow dokumenteeji …ói…ói …ói Whitney ha hitaande 1993, 1997 e 2014. O he…ìii Guggenheim Fellowship nder hitaande 2020.
∆Åi…ó…óo.
Leonard jibinaa nder 1961 nder Liberty, New York. Maama Leonard …óon woni mo'o Polanko'en …ìe jibini nder Warsaw, …ìe njahi Amerik haa …ìe mar…ìe duu…ìi 9 wakkati konu duuniyaaru …ói…óawru. Maama maako …óon haandi yim…ìe mar…ìe aristocracy Polish …ìe …óon hawta nder jamma ngam he…ìugo hoore Polish e Polish Resistance. Yim…ìe …óuu…ó…ìe nder dammugal Leonard maayi nder konu. Koo nde …ìe naa' Yahuudiyankoo…ìe, yim…ìe saare maako …ìe Nazi'en …óon torra ngam …ìe …óon ha…ìana Nazism e lesdi Polonje. Leonard wi'i maama maako "o …óon yi…ói anndugo en …óon …ìeen", koo nde saare maako …óon njoo…óda nder risku nder Harlem. To o duu…ìi 16, o fiyi janngirde o fu…ó…ói fotoo…ìe. O wa…ói …ìurna fu nder nguurndam maako nder New York, nokkuuje …óe o wa…ói nder nder nder nder suudu maako (e.g. nder nder suudu, nder suudu, e nder suudu suudu, e dow suudu, e ley suudu, e haa nder suudu maako). Leonard wa…ói anndal dow lesdi fuu …ìaawo o wa…ói …óum nder Dokumenta IX nder hitaande 1992.
Kuugal.
Daga fotooji maako …ìur…ói yahugo haa dow fotooji maako dow dow dow dow nder suudu museum, dow dow dow laabi …ìalli, e dow dow dow kuu…óe …ìalli, kuu…óe Leonard …óuu…ó…óe …óon holla dow no …óum wa…ói, e dow no …óum wa…óirta, e dow ko …óum wa…ói ngam …ìe ndaara bana boo…ó…óum. O holliti nder habaru: "Haa dow dow dow dow huunde go'o koo genre (laawol, foto, maayde, ekn), mi …óon yi…ói, e …óon yi…ói, hawtaade bee dow dow dow haala e faayiida, hakkilantaaku hakkunde ummatoowo e duniyaaru - nder nder fu…ó…óam, subjectivity e no …óum hokkata anndal men nder duniyaaru".
Leonard …óon …óon …óon …óon haaki ha haaki SIDA e siyasa gays nder New York nder 1980s e 1990s. Nder hitaande 1992 o winndi "Mi yi…ói hooreejo leydi", ko poemol ngol hawti e dow Eileen Myles's run for president.
Nder hitaande 1995 o wa…ói hollude nder studio maako nder Lower East Side of Manhattan, nder maajum o holli kuu…óe …óe Strange Fruit, …óum …óum ha…ì…ìii e …ìalli …ói …ói …ói …ói mballitiri (oranges, bananas, grapefruits, limone) …ói Leonard soornii e …ìe …ìooydi e juu…óe e wiru e …ìu…ì…ìu. ∆äu'um …óon haani bana ko'e ma…ì…ìe, ko'e …ìe …óon haani …ìe …óon haaki. ∆äum …ìeydi diga jaabuki hoore mum to nyau AIDS nden bana …óon …óon …óon …óon haani haanu, o laati kuu…óe …ìur…óe …ìeydaago nder duu…ìi 1990. ∆äu'um …ìanndu …óon mari …ìanndu nder nder suudu senii…ìe nder Filadelfia nder hitaande 1998, …óo …óon …óon …óon joo…ói.

Lela Lee:
Lela Lee ko laam…óo Aameerik e jaayndiyanke, jaayndiyaa…óo tele, e jaaynde jaayndiyeeje Angry Little Asian Girl e jaayndiije jokkondir…óe Angry Little Girls.
Kuugal.
Ja…ì…ìorgo Ganndal.
O wondi film e telebiis, o wa…ói fijirde nder 1998 film Yellow e 2002 film Better Luck Tomorrow. O …óon wondi nder seriji Sci Fi Channel …ói …óon …óon …óon …óon …ìuwaa wakkati fu Tremors, nden o …óon jogii nder nder NBC's Scrubs. Lee wa…ói limgal nder nder episode arandeeji nayi nder HBO's Curb Your Enthusiasm, o wa…ói debbo Asiyankeejo mo …óon haani, mo …óon ha…ì…ìita habbuki …ìandu e haala dow Larry David, …ìaawo o wi'i Tang ko innde Caynaare. Lee …óon boo nder "Animal Pragmatism" nder charmed bana Tessa, mo jannginoowo ja≈ãde.

Erna Lendvai-Dircksen:
Erna Lendvai-Dircksen (woowo Erna Katherina Wilhelmine Dircksen, 31 meeji 1883 - 8 meeji 1962) wondi fotoowo Jarmal mo anndiraa ngam kubaruuji fotooji yim…ìe nder lesdi Germany. Nder Reich Tatto, o fotti kadi ngam kubaruuji eugenicist nden o wa…ói darnde ngam huutore laawol masin e gollu…ìe …ìe nga…óiri ngol.
Kuugal.
∆Åoodi nder Wetterburg, jooni je je je Bad Arolsen, Erna Dircksen janngini ta∆¥re e Kunsthochschule Kassel diga 1903 haa 1905, e ja≈ãde foto e Lette-Verein diga 1910 haa 1911. O waawata o ha…ì…ìii studio fotooji nder Hellerau, …ìadi Dresden, nder 1913. Daga 1916 haa 1943, o mari studio foto nder Berlin. Nder 1918 o woodi anndal …ìeydi …ìeydi, musamman ngam fotooji maako …ìeydi e …ìeydi huutoree…óum. Nder hitaande 1911, o fu…ó…óii yi…óugo holla yim…ìe lesdi lesdi lesdi lesdi Germany, …ìaawo o fotti tawii o …óon yi'a e' manjo nder wakkati mum nder yahugo. Nder binndi maako o holli miijo maako dow nguurndam nder lesdi e nder nder gariiri. Fu…ó…óugo nder 1917, o wa…ói foto-portrettiji Jarmaa…ìe nder nokkuuje feere feere, feere nder ma…ì…ìe o he…ìii jaajorgal arande nder holli Frankfurt nder 1926. Ngam daliila maajum o he…ìii laawol wurtina wo…ì…ìe ma…ì…ìe nder jardi "Berliner Illustrirte Zeitung" nder 1930.
"Das deutsche Volksgesicht".
Lendvai-Dircksen wa…ói fotooji maako dow yim…ìe lesdi lesdi lesdi lesdi Germany nder hitaande 1932 nder deftere "Das deutsche Volk" (Jamma lesdi lesdi lesdi German). ∆äum fu…ó…óii nder …óem…óe …óuu…ó…óe …óe holli nokkuuje feere feere nder laamu Reich fu…ó…óugo nder 1942, …ói …ói fuu nder nder inde nden e nder "Das germanische Volksgesicht" (Jam…óe Germanic Volk), jooni hawti e …óem…óe dow, misaalu, Flanders e Norway.
"Daande maw…óe".
Ha laamu Reich tata…ìo o he…ìi dowla, …ìurna fuu Fritz Todt ngam fotooji maw…ìe maw…ìe maw…óo maw…óo maw…ìe, …óum fu…ó…óam wa…óii ngam holla Schaffendes Volk nder hitaande 1937 nder kuugal Todt ngam wa…óugo su…ìaa…ìe su…ìaaji maw…ìe maw…ói nder laamu maw…óo …ìe nga…óata laawol maw…óo. Todt yi…ói mo "ngam fotoo…ìe kuugal dow laawol maw…óo nder lesdi maako diga nder lesdi maako". Deftere nden wurtini nder 1937 e nder nder nder nder hitaande 1942. Toot su…ìii mo dow kuu…óe maako nder Das deutsche Volksgesicht, nden deftere autobahn …óon tokki laawol nanondiral, …óon tokki laawol nyi…ìugo diga lesdi lesdi lesdi lesdi Germany haa worgo haa Alps, e nder nder nder nder lesdi fuu …óon tokki misaaluji lesdi e autobahn, …ìurna fuu ko cembal, bee misaalu yim…ìe gariiri …óon huuwugo nder nder kuugal. Firooji maako dow cukalel kesal …óon holla kuu…óe kaa∆¥e e …ìernde cukalel, nder feere feere …óon naftira e laabi …ói …óon haani New Objectivity, nder feere …óon holla cukalel maw…ói nder tabiya e nder aada, …óon holla wonki ma…ì…ìe …ìaawo wakkati fu. Yim…ìe gollu…ìe, …ìe …óon mari laamu nder deftere, …ìe …óon faami …ìe ngam …ìe …óon holla …ìe feere feere, nder …ìernde …ìernde e nder …ìaawo; o …óon naftora "la…ìal …ìandu boo…óugo" bana nder Olympia Leni Riefenstahl. So tawii tan o holli …ìe …óon ndaara kamera, o holli masin masinji ma…ì…ìe, nden tan o holla bana hollaago semmbe malla daliila nder sammu; o holli kadi kuugal juu…óe, o hokki tammunde autobahn nden haani e masinji maw…ói …óuu…ó…ói. "Bey duu…ìi …ìaawo kuu…óe, mi …óon he…ìugo nyaamdu goodu…óum ngam …ìi…ì…ìe maw…ìe njowee…ói…óo e suka debbo", …ói …óon holla nafuki otobahn bana laawol ngam halki kuu…óe, e …ìe …óon yi'a goonga kuu…óe kolla e haalaji kallu…ói nder cuu…ói kuu…óe …ói seedaa…ìe ngam hujjaaji ngam habaru propaganda.

Violette Lecoq:
Violette Lecoq (1912 - 2003) wonnoo moolinoowo, moolinoo…óo e nder leydi Farayse, e moolinoo…ìe nder konu duuniyaaru …ói…óa…ìo. O anndiraa ngam kuuje maako diga suudu ha…ì…ìugo Ravensbr√ºck, …óe naftiraama bana dowla nder Ravensbr√ºcken Trials arandeeji nder hitaande 1946.

Kate Lechmere:
Kate Elizabeth Lechmere (13 Oktoobar 1887 - Feebari 1976) wonnoo…óo…óo…óo…óo e leydi Britaniya, o wonnoo…óo e Wyndham Lewis, o woni…óo ardii…óo renndo renndo renndoo…ìe nder hitaande 1914. To …óum anndiraa, walaa go'o nder kuuje Lechmere …óon maaki. O wa…ói gollude nder lesdi England nder konu duuniyaaru arande nden o mari haade duu…ìi tati bee maw…óo e moftotoo…óo T.E. Hulme ga…óa o maayi. Caggal konu o laati mo'o mo'o footi.
∆Åi…ó…óo.
Lechmere jibini nder Fownhope, Herefordshire. Baaba maako Arthur Lechmere, mo remoowo, nden inna maako Alice Lechmere. Kate woodi deeriraa…ìe …ói…óo, Arthur e Herbert. Maamiila ndu joo…óii e Bowens, Highland Place, Fownhope, wakkati limgal yim…ìe nder leydi Britaniya nder hitaande 1891 nden …ìe mari jawdi ngam …ìe huutoraako moolinoowo e cuw…óo …ìe njoo…óata nder wuro. Kate Lechmere ja…ìi ja≈ãde e ja≈ãde Clifton. O janngini e Atelier La Palette, Paris, nden …ìaawo …óon e Walter Sickert e Westminster School of Art. O …ìadii Lawrence Atkinson mo o janngini piano nder Normandy.

Blanche Lazzell:
Blanche Lazzell (October 10, 1878 - June 1, 1956) wonnoo…óo ta∆¥oowo, ta∆¥owo e ta∆¥o…óo. O anndiraa ko …ìuri heewde ngam kuutor…óe mum …óe laatii e laabi laa…ì…ói, o wonnoo…óo…óo…óo…óo maw…óo Aameerika …ìaawo jamanu, o waddani yim…ìe ko'e Cubism e abstraction nder kuu…óe mum.
Lazzell jibinaa nder gariiri manndooji nder West Virginia, o yahi Orop …ói…ói, o janngini nder Paris bee artistji Farayse Albert Gleizes, Fernand L√©ger, e Andr√© Lhote. Nder hitaande 1915, o fu…ó…ói wa…óugo summer maako nder nokkuure Cape Cod nder Provincetown, Massachusetts, nden o joo…ói ton haa foroy. O wondi go'oto nder ardii…ìe Provincetown Printers, bandol maw…ìe …ìe huwti e laabi woodcut ha laabi laabi laabu …ói …ìe wa…ói dow takkereeji ukiyo-e ha Japon.

Adelaide Lawson:
Adelaide Lawson (9 juune 1889 - 28 oktoobar 1986) wonnoo…óo…óo…óo…óo Amerik, anndiraa…óo e …óem…óe mum …óe o wa…ói dow laam…ìe e ge…óe. ¬† O wi'i o mari baaw…óe wa…óugo habaru dow duniyaaru bee huutoreeji laa…ì…ói, …ói walaa …óow…óe e laa…ì…óum e huutoreeki e laa…ìndi ngam hokkude ummotoo…ìe hakkillo e nder …ìernde.
Fedde anndal.
Nder duu…ìi sappo …ói…óa…ìo nder karnijum noogas Lawson janngini e Art Students League of New York e Kenneth Hayes Miller. Ha darnde e janngoo…ìe Miller feere …ìe janngii e Hamilton Easter Field e Ogunquit School of Painting and Sculpture e Ogunqit, Maine.

Fuu…óol Oua:

Talabi Braithwaite:
Talabi Adebayo Braithwaite (2 morso 1928 - 2 Colte 2011) ko jaayndiyanke jamfaare lesdi Naajeeriya, e gooto e ardii…ìe jaayndiyaaku jamfaare nder Leysdi Naajeeriya. O laati hooreejo arandeejo arandeeji arandeeji nder lesdi Naajeeriya (IIN), jooni arandeeji amaruji nder lesdi Naajeeriya.
Laamu.
Talabi Braithwaite jibinaa ko √±alnde 2 lewru Yuli 1928 to Lagos. O yahi CMS Grammar School, Lagos e nder hitaande 1946 o he…ìii darnde arandeere Cambridge Certificate e ∆¥ettude London Matriculation.Nder hitaande 1949 o yahi London to o he…ìii anndal nder nder jaaynde nder Royal Exchange, London.O laati Afrik arandeejo mo he…ìii ja…ì…ìaade nder ja…ì…ìaande nder suudu darnde darnde daranaaku, London nder hitaande 1951.
Kuugal.
Braithwaite warti Naajeeriya nder lewru Oktoobar 1952 ngam fu…ó…óugo jaaynde maw…óo (Law Union & Rock Insurance Company).Nder duu…ìi 1950 o wa…ói suudu dow Hawley Street bee Sonny Odogwu, mo warata boo ardii…óo nder Leysdi Naajeeriya, e Michael Kubenje.Nder 1958 o fu…ó…óii T.A. Braithwaite Insurance Brokers & Co. Kammu maako …óon haani nder fannuuji kesi, ngam Nigeria, nder (Marine Insurance e Life Assurance)l .Nder 1959 Braithwaite wa…ói hooreejo kawtal Kawtal Fedde Fedde Fadduki Darnde Naajeeriya, …ìe wa…ói anniya ngam tiggi Darnde Darnde Darnuki Darnde lesdi Nigeria, e o wondi nder kawtal darnde darnde darnuki darnde darndaangal darnde darnduki darnde.Nder 1960 Braithwaite e feere-feere Naajeeriya tawtori Life Underwriting Company of African Alliance Insurance Company nder jokkondiral bee Munich Reinsurance Company.
Braithwaite hokki gomnati lesdi lesdi Leysdi Naajeeriya fuunaa≈ãge nder hitaande 1960 bana mar…óo habaru risku nde o wa…ói Great Nigeria Insurance Company.O wallitii ha ha…ì…ìugo jaayndeeji feere ha nder jaayndeji jaayndeje ha nder Afrik hirnaange e jaaynde je ha…ì…ìugo je ha…ì…ìu…ìe.Hakkunde 1963 e 1966 Braithwaite laati ardii…óo lesdi lesdi lesdi lesdi ardii…óo nder Insurance Institute of Nigeria (IIN), bandol jaayndiyanko'en nder jaayndiya.O laati hooreejo arandeejo lesdi Naijeriya ngam ja…ìugo ja…ìugo jamma nder duu…ìi sappo e jeego, fu…ó…óugo nder hitaande 1963.E hitaande 1969 o laati ardii…óo Lloyd's of London, nden daga 1 lewru 1 hitaande 1970 o fu…ó…ói ardii…óo nder Merrett Syndicate.Nder 16 lewru Noofambar 2000, hooreejo leydi Olusegun Obasanjo wa…ói mo hooreejo dowla Niger (CON).
∆Åi…ó…óo …ìa≈ãgel Braithwaite e …ìi…ó…óo debbo, Derin Braithwait Disu, laati hooreejo Gomnaango Fedde Lagos, mar…óo jaaynde Lagos, Babatunde Fashola, e mo anndiraa…óo.Talabi Braithwaite maayi ha 2 May 2011 nder suudu suudu ndun London, e duu…ìi 82.O acci jawdi …óuu…ó≈ãgal.

Mustapha Adamu Animashaun:
Mustapha Adamu Animashaun (1885-1968) wonnoo ardii…óo Islaam Lagos maw…óo nder fu…ó…óiiji teemerre noogas. O laati boo maw…óo, moofta, moofti e hooreejo siyasa. O hawti e …ìaawoji feere-feere …ìamtaare e dowji feere- feere nder ummaatoore Islaam nder Lagos nder fu…ó…óiiji fu…ó…óii…ói nder karnijum 20, nde Musul…ìe …óon wa…ói fu…ó…óiije fu…ó…óii…óe yim…ìe Lagos. ∆Åur…óo semmbe maako boo woni maw…óo maako, Musulmana Lagos maw…óo, Idris Animashaun.Bana ardii…óo diina, o …ìamtii jaajol jaajol hirnaange nder muslimi'en e …óa…ì…ìiti wa…óugo leydi ngam juulde Lagos Central e ummaatoore muslimi'e Lagos. Ammaa, …ìeydaaki ngam …ói…óma wa…ói ha…ìaaki bee yim…ìe ma…ì…ìe nder Lagos.
∆Åi…ó…óo.
Animashaun jibinaa be laamii…óo nder gariiri Kano. Baaba maako noddiraa Usman, nden baaba maako o debbo Imam Maw…óo Kano, Mallam Ibrahim. Nder duu…ìi joweego, o maayi darnde maako bana mo wolwan…óo nde o jeyi nder maccu…óo, nder wakkati kallu…óum nder Kano. Nden o jaayndi haa suudu Lamorade Zazzau nden o jannginaama diga …ìi…ó…óo amiri. Bana moofta nder suudu amir, o he…ìii laawol yahugo nder berniwolji woyla Naajeeriya, o joo…óii nder Cairo duu…ìi jowi. Ammaa, …óa…ì…ìol maako ngam he…ìugo hakke …óon …ìaawo …óon …ìadake; wakkati o wurtina Misra, o la…ì…ìinaama boo o feere ngam o laato maccu…óo to Waziri Sokoto. O dilli wuro Islamaaku Sokoto haa Ilorin bee go…ó…óo Sokoto, Mallam Madugu. Nder Ilorin, o jaayndi to Alfa (cleric) Bello nder wuro Agbaji, nokkuure Islamji nder anndal anndal. Nde o wonnoo nder Ilorin, o jeyaa e anndinaama nder laawol Islaam; o su…ìi innde Adamu, innde je …óon …ìurna wakkati oon e …óon …ìurna e nder yim…ìe maako. O jeyaa haa sakkinta to barkin…óo maako, Idris Animashaun, maw…óo ja≈ãde ja≈ãde Muslim nder Lagos. O jottini nder ja≈ãde Muslim nder hitaande 1896, to o waawi wa…óugo anndal Arab e anndal astrology o janngunoo nder Misra e Ilorin. Kinnaaji maako nder jaangool ngol laati footi, o wa…ói duu…ìi …ói…ói tan nder jaangowol ngol ngam o …óon o ne…ó…óo mo mari hakkillo e jaangowol e anndal Islaam ngal woni ko …ìuri anndal jaangool nder Jaangool Islaamu.
Maw…óo suudu.
Caggal nde o timmini janngude maako, o jeyaa e jannginoowo maako, Idris Animashaun bana walli…óo jaaynoowo. O laati maw…óo doofal ngal nder hitaande 1912. Nder hitaande go'o, o hokki maako ceedewol ngam o he…ìan hakke. O tokki ko o ja…ìaama e nder hitaande 1913, o udditiri feere nder nder nder nder feere defte Arabji nder nder nder gariiri Shitta, Lagos. Nder wakkati maajum, o fu…ó…ói hawtaago nder ummaatoore Muslimji maw…ìe Lagos, ngam daliila semmbe Idris Animashaun. O ware, …ìi…ó…óo Imam maw…óo Lagos, diina Ibrahim.
Wur…óo e winndannde.
Ngam …ìeydaade kuugal ngal o wa…ói nder suudu mum, o udditiri kuugal feere nder 1914. Jaaynde nden …óon hawta bee ta∆¥uki bo…óeeji e kubaruuji dow diina Islaam. O naftiri e kuugal ngam ta∆¥ugo ko o wa…ói nder deftere almanac Nigeria. O huwti maako ngam anndugo kuuje ngam yim…ìe feere feere …ìe ngari to suudu maako, nden o he…ìii anndal bana mo'o anndal dowru …óemngal Arab e astrology, …óum …óon mawnugo nder yim…ìe …óuu…ó…ìe nder Lagos. Ammaa, …óemngal maako annduki haala …ìurna fuu naftiraama e ∆¥ettude daga haalaaji duuniyaaru e nokkuuje e dow haalaaji ummaatooje.Nder 1918, o he…ìi Lagos Central Times diga Mr Davies. Time'en ha…ì…ìii duu…ìi tati e go'o …ìaawo. O soodi wardi ndin caggal ko habaru bonngal wa…ói sabu wardi nder juulde Lagos Central. Wuro warngo …ìaawo …óon ummaatoore Muslim'en mari ceede haa 1924. Ko ca…óeele Lagos wa…ói hakkunde Imam Maw…óo, mo o jeyaa e dow alkawal ngal o wa…ói ngam saini leydi ngam ummaatoore Muslim Lagos, wakkati yim…ìe juul…ìe juul…ìe, ardii…ìe Animashaun …ìe nga…óani faandaare ngam wa…óugo kuuje e kuuje ngam juulde juulde. Caggal nde'e wa…ói yim…ìe …ìe'e ummaatoore Muslim'en …ìe'e nder nder nder nder leydi ndi. Ngam huutugo ko o nani …óum haani ha habaruji …ói …ìurna nder Lagos dow ummaatoore Muslim. O soodi nden o laati wakkati se…ó…óa, mar…óo bolle. O he…ìii ko heewde, ngam kubaruuji …ói …ìeydi …ìeydi ko …ìeydi e duu…ìi ma…ì…ìe fu…ó…óii…ói. Bana publisher jarida, o fu…ó…ói naftoraade ha huutore ngam hollaago miijooji mum dow haalaji …óu…ó…ói, hawti e goomu Islam je …óon hawta dow ma…ì…ìe, ummaatoore Ahmadiyya. Firo maako nder ummaatoore fu…ó…ói …ìeydaade, bana non boo hawtaago maako, hawti bee hawtaago Ahmadi'en.
∆Åamtaare ja≈ãde.
Animashaun …óon janngina boo o yi…ói …ìeydaago jaangooji jaangooji haa yim…ìe Musulmaa…ìe nder Lagos. Daga dow daliila …óuu…óal o …óon mari defte, e mo …óon anndina nder ilmu ja≈ãde, siyaasa Leysdi Naajeeriya e ja≈ãde Islaam e o …óon ha…ì…ìii janngirde ja≈ãde Muslim nder Lagos. ja≈ãde ndee fu…ó…óii e janngude, ko …óemngal Arab e Farayse. ∆äuum laawol ha…ì…ìuki janngirde …ìaawo …óon ha…ì…ìii e nder ummaatoore Ahmadiyya e ummaatoore Ansaruddeen. Ko o yi…ói wa…ói ko o janngina sukaa…ìe Musulmana'en ngam …ìe mbaawa gollude nder koloniyaal.
∆Åaawo nduum.
Animashaun yaaki …ìernde Lagos haa Mushin, gariiri nder Leysdi Lagos …ìur…óum mawnugo nder duu…ìi 1930. O …ìaawo o laati Seriki Mushin, (ko ardii…óo Mushin Muslmaa…ìe) e o wondi ardii…óo jamiroore United Muslim Party nder hitaande 1953.

Akungba:

Andoni Island:

Kamuru (also Kamuru, Kamuru, Kamuru Ikulu) is a town in Zangon KatafLocal Government Area in southern Kaduna state in the Middle Beltregion of Nigeria. It is the headquarters of the Akulu chiefdom.The postal code of the area is 802.

National Museum of Benin City:
The Benin City National Museum is a national museum in Benin City, Naajeeriya. located in the city centre on King's Square. The museum has a significant number of artifacts related to the Laamlamateeri Benin such as terracotta, bronze figures and cast iron pieces. It also has ancient art related to the early times.
National Museum, Benin City ha…ì…ìii yim…ìe nder 1973. ∆äum …óon ja…ì…ìa ngam National Commission for Museums and Monuments (NCMM), goomu laamu federal Nigeria …óon ja…ì…ìi ngam hakkilantaago, …ìeydaago e …ìamtaago jawdi aadaaji lesdi Naajeeriya. 
Luttugol.
Benin City National Museum …óon ha nokkuure biyetee…óo Ring road, ko yim…ìe Benin noddaama King's Square, amma …óum wayliti to Oba Ovonramwen Square diga Comrade Adams Oshiomhole nder wakkati maako nder laamu maako bana gomnati lesdi.

Mary Nzimiro:
Mary Nzimiro innde …ìurnde Mary Nwametu Onumonu, MBE (1898-1993) wonnoo debbo jaaynoowo, politikkeejo e debbo mo'o.Nder 1948, o laatii wakiilu maw…óo United Africa Company (UAC) ngam Leysdi Naajeeriya fuunaa≈ãge, e nder wakkati o …óon ha…ì…ìii …óem…óe jaayndeeji e …ìam…óe e nder Port Harcourt, Aba e Owerri.

Barbara Adams (Misiyaajo):
Barbara Georgina Adams, FRSA (19 lewru Feebari 1945 - 26 lewru Juun 2002) wonnoo Egyptologist, archaeologist, e jannginoowo Britinkeejum, mo woni mo anndinoowo Egypt Prehistoric. O huuwani duu…ìi …óuu…ó…ói haa Hierakonpolis, to o …óon woni mo …óon ja…ì…ìa dow laawol. O huuwani e Petrie Museum of Egyptian Archaeology nder London, …ìaawo …óun o huuwani e hooreejo (1984-2001), nden o huuwani kadi e nder nder nder leydi Britaaniya.
Fu…ó…óam golle e musiyaaku Petrie.
Barbara Bishop jibini haa Hammersmith Hospital nder London to Charles e Ellaline Bishop. Baaba maako …óon mari kuugal mo …ìe mbaawaa anndugo, ammaa o he…ìii ja≈ãde to Godolphin e Latymer School amma jawdi maako …óon maaki haa o ja≈ãde …ìaawo sappo e jowi. Caggal nde o wurtini janngirde o tokki janngirde e janngirde jemma. To duu…ìi sappo e jee…ói…ói, o laati jannginoowo nder suudu taariiha tagdi. duu…ìi sappo e jowee…ói…ói, o laati jannginoowo nder suudu taariha tagdi.

Solange Ashby:
Solange Ashby ko afrikaniyanke e archaeologist mo anndal mum haani haalde e …óemngal, diina e darnde rew…ìe nder Misra e Nubia. O woni jannginoowo jannginoo…óo e nder jaango …óem…óe e aadaji fu…ónaange fu…ónaande e jaango California, Los Angeles.
Kuugal.
Ashby janngini ngam BA nder Intercultural Studies e Bard College e Simon's Rock. O he…ìii jaango e doctoral nder Egyptology diga jaango Chicago. Ku…óol maako dow doktoor wa…ói nder suudu haalude Philae nder Misra, bana boo haalude nder cembi…óol Kushite nder El-Kurru nder Sudan. Ku…óol maako …óon …óa…ì…ìita binndi, hawti e graffiti, …ói yim…ìe Kushite …ìe njahi to cuu…ói Misra nder Lower Nubia.
Nder lewru Janaare 2021 o wa…ói darnde nder Daartol Classics e Ancient Studies to Barnard College, New York, bana jannginoowo jannginoo…óo. hitaande 2023 o wa…ói o wartii jannginoowo jannginoo…óo e nder jaango …óem…óe e aadaji fu…ó…óorde fu…ónaange fu…ónaande e jaango California, Los Angeles. wa…ói bolle e nder ja≈ãde Catholic University's Institute of Christian Oriental Research e American Research Centre nder Misra e o janngini e American University nder Washington.
O wondi boo mo fu…ó…óii…óo jammu William Leo Hansberry, mo yi…ói anndingo yim…ìe Afrik dow jamanu Afrik.

Guillemette Andreu:
Guillemette Andreu-Lano√´ (dunngu 3 Ogosta 1948, Paris), ko Egyptologist e archaeologist Farayse. O wonnoo ardii…óo Furuuki Farayseeji Archaeology of Oriental of Cairo, o woni mo curatore e darinoowo Dental Ancient Egypt of the Luvre Museum gila May 2007.

Elise Jenny Baumgartel:
Elise Jenny Baumgartel (woowo Goldschmidt, 5 Oktoobar 1892 - 28 Oktoobar 1975) wonnoo Egyptologist e prehistorian Jarmal mo fu…ó…óii janngude archaeology Egypt predynastic.
Fu…ó…óam golle.
Elise Jenny Goldschmidt jibini haa Berlin haa Oktoobar 1892, baaba maako Rudolf Goldschmidt. O jaaraama e Ja≈ãde Berlin ngam o janngina …óum, ammaa o …ìeydi yi…ói anndal Misra, o janngini …óum e dow Adolf Erman e Kurt Heinrich Sethe. Baumgartel hawti e laawol jaaynde nder Egyptology wakkatiire nden, ngam o hawti bee jaaynde dow dow dow dow archaeology nder janngude dow dow dow janngude e dow dow dow jaaynde K√∂nigsberg. O holli wonde keyri faamugo wakkati Misra fu…ó…óii…óo yaajugo …óum ha…ì…ìugo nder haala leydi ndii. Ngam maajum, deftere maako …óon …óa…ì…ìita kuu…óe nder nder lesdi lesdi lesdi lesdi Afrika, ngam o wi'a dow …ìandu dolmen nder lesdi lesdi Afrika fu…ó…óiima diga mastabas Misra, e dow pyramidaji. ∆äu'um …óon ha…ì…ìa hakkilloji hyper-diffusionist je …óon je …óon jeye nder Grafton Elliot Smith, mo …óon wi'a …ìur…óe fuu …ìesngu aada ne…ó…óo fu…ó…óii nder Misra e haajiri bana fu.

Nathalie Beaux-Grimal:
Nathalie Beaux-Grimal (dugum 1960) woni Egyptologist Farayse, mo anndal dow Kolleje de France e Farayse Institute of Oriental Archaeology e Cairo (IFAO).
O janngini haa Ja≈ãde Yale o he…ìii PhD nder Egyptology e Jean-Claude Goyon nder Lumi√®re University Lyon 2 e deftere dow Botanical Garden of the Precinct of Amun-Re at Karnak (1989). Daga 1997 haa 2005, o jeyaa…óo mo'o mo'o ko mo'o hooreejo leydi Farayse nder Egyptology nder Faculty of Archaeology to Cairo University e Giza. Nder nde ha…ì…ìuki IFAO, o hawti e nder jaaynde to Deir el-Bahari, ha hawti e Janusz Karkowski daga Polish Centre of Mediterranean Archaeology of the University of Warsaw (PCMA UW). O …óon haalana mo anndugo dow Thutmose III.

Margaret Benson:
Margaret Benson (16 Jowre 1865 - 13 May 1916) wonnoo…óo…óo…óo…óo e goomu leydi Engelese e Egyptologist anndiraa…óo ngam he…ìugo nokkuure Mut.
∆Åeynguure e saare.
Margaret jibinaa nder hitaande 1865 to Reading, Ingiltere, nder …ìi…ì…ìe joweego Edward White Benson, jannginoowo Anglican e diina (sare arbishop Canterbury), e debbo maako Mary Sidgwick Benson, …ìiraawo anndal anndal anndirngal anndal anndungal anndal anndugal anndal anndaldal anndal Henry Sidgwick mo o wa…ói Newnham College. Margaret yahi nder Truro Girls High School, …óum woni nder suudu mo baaba maako wa…ói nder wakkati maako nder kuugal maako bana bishop arande nder Truro. Nder duu…ìi 18, Margaret laati go'oto nder rew…ìe arandeeji ngam ja…ìa nder Oxford University, to o yahdi nder Lady Margaret Hall, …óum ha…ói …ìaawo. ∆Åernde maako e kuu…óe maako …óe …ìur…óe faamugo, bana ko jannginoo…ìe maako anndini, John Ruskin boo teddini anndal maako nder limce e ndiyam, o noddi mo haa o janngina nder suudu maako. Margaret …óon haani ko …ìuri he…ìugo nder ja≈ãde nder ja≈ãnde nder ja≈ãgol …ìur…ìe anndude, nden nder hitaande 1886, o …óon haani nokku arande nder Ingiltere nder ja≈ãgal ja≈ãde rew…ìe.

Svetlana Berzina:
Svetlana Yakovlevna Berzina (Rusiya: –°–≤–µ—Ç–ª–∞–Ω–∞ –Ø–∫–æ–≤–ª–µ–≤–Ω–∞ –ë–µ—Ä–∑–∏–Ω–∞; 7 mars 1932, to Mosku - 24 abriil 2012, to Mosku) wonnoo…óo Misiyaajo maw…óo leydi Risi. Doktaru nauk dow taariika (1977), o wonnoo ardii…óo jaaynde SSSR-ARE Society (1987), o he…ìii medal "Haa no …óum siftortoo duu…ìi 850 Moscow" (1997), Worker honoo…óo leydi Russia (1999), ardii…óo wi…ótoowo dow jaaynde taariika aada e arti arti arti fuunaa≈ãge to Dowlaaku Muusaa Fuunaa≈ãge, Moscow.
Kuugal.
O janngini taariika nder jaango archaeology nder Taras Shevchenko National University of Kyiv (1949-1954). Gila 1954, o huuwani bana kuugal wi…ótoo…ìe e nder Kerch Archaeological Museum. Daga 1960 haa 1981 o huuwani e nder jaaynde Asiya e Afrik nder Central Library of the scholarly foundation AN USSR (–§–ë–û–ù-–ò–ù–ò–û–ù –ê–ù –°–°–°–†) e nder Moscow. Nder wakkati oon o janngini wakkati fuu e nder suudu jaangooje …óem…óe fu…ónaange nder jaangoore Moscow State University (nde jooni woni MSU Institute of Asian and African Studies) nder suudu jaangirde afrikani. Daga 1965 haa 1970, o huuwi nder suudu ndu. Nder 1970, o holli defte maako, ko wi'etee Pred—Å—ã–ª–∫–∏ –æ–±—Ä–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –î—Ä–µ–≤–Ω–µ–π –ì–∞–Ω—ã (Daaje nder janngirde nder Ghana jamanu). Nder hitaande 1977, o fu…ó…ói gollaade dow darnde doctora nauk e taariika nder jaaynde fu…ó…óorgal fu…ó…óor…óe fu…ó…óorngal fu…ónaange nder Institute of Oriental Studies of the USSR Academy of Sciences nden o he…ìii …óum e nder hitaande 1979 bee kuugal biyetee…óo –ú–µ—Ä–æ—ç –∏ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–∞—é—â–∏–π –º–∏—Ä. I - VIII c. (Meroe e Dunyaaji …óo'o. Karnuuji 1 - 8 AD). Gila 1981 o huutoraama nder State Museum of the East, Moscow.

Susanne Bickel:
Susanne Bickel (danyeeki 1960, Roma) woni Egyptologist Swiss. O janngini Egyptology nder Geneva nden o huuwi e Farayse Institute of Oriental Archaeology nder Cairo e Swiss Institute of Egyptian Antiquity. O huwti bana archaeologist dow nokkuuje …óuu…ó…óe nder Misra caka e dow. Gila hitaande 2000 o …óon jeyaa e jannginoowo e ja≈ãde Freiburg e gila hitaande 2006, o …óon jeya e janngoowo Egyptology e ja≈ãnde Basel to o …óon jeyan dow allahji Misra'en e jinnaaji. Susanne Bickel's kuudi …óon hawta dow diina e archaeology Misra, musamman dow hujjituki haaruuji Misra. Bickel woni darinoowo ja≈ãde Bayreeki Baasel Kings' Valley e o wondi nder gollu…óo mo ha…ì…ìii haandi KV64, nder nder nder nder hitaande 2011.

Danielle Bonneau:
Danielle Bonneau (dannyamo 1912 - 26 oktoobar 1992) woni papiroloog Farayse nder karnijum 20. Kuugal maako hawti e ndiyamji Maayo Niil e hakkillaaji maako diga jaay…óe Greec e Romanji nder Misra. Bana bee defte tati dow haala ngol, o wurtini defte anndal anndal …ìur…óe 70.

Charlotte Booth:
Charlotte Booth (dugumi 6 abriil 1975) woni archaeologist e winndiyanke dow Misra.
Booth he…ìii ko'e mum bachelor e master nder Egypt archaeology e University College London. Caggal nde Booth ja…ìi jaangirde, o fu…ó…ói janngugo nder Birkbeck, University of London. Ko o janngini dow janngirde woni wakkati Hyksos nder Misra. Nder hitaande 2018, o he…ìii darnde Doctor of Philosophy (PhD) diga ja≈ãde Birmingham: darnde makko nden no wi'etee "Haa…ìugo karallaaji: anndingo ko woni nafugo karallaagal karallaaji Misra jamanu…ói e fu…ó…óam karallaaji karallaaji 19 e 20", nder ku…ìir…óe ardii…ói …ói…óo nder ardiiji leydi UK.
O …óon hokkata darja ha onlinet dow kuuje feere feere dow taariha Misra, bana hieroglyphics, nyalnde nder Misra, ekn., ha site ja≈ãde maako ha onlinete, CharlotteEgypt. O winndi defte feere feere dow kuu…óe Misra.

Njoodi Chitake:
Fuule Chitake ina ∆¥ellita nder ladde Mana Pools nder lesdi Zimbabwe, ina jogii le…ó…óe mum en nder Zambezi Escarpment.Ko ndiyam …óam woni ko ndiyam …ìeydaama hitaande kala nder koosejo ko ina wa…ói kiloomita dado nder maayo.Waadiwol ngol ina …ìilla nder maayo Rukomechi.
Haaa maayo Chitake, woodi nokkure …ìur…óe …ìaleede, to …óum he…ìii …ìaleede Syntarsus rhodesiensis.

K√§the Bosse-Griffiths:
K√§the Bosse-Griffiths (16 lewru Julaay 1910 - 4 lewru Awril 1998) wonnoo mo Egyptologist maw…óo. O jibinaa nder lesdi Jarmal, o yahdi to lesdi Britaaniya bana …óowoowo siyasa, o ware go…ó…óo lesdi Wales. O laati maw…óo nder ∆äemngal Welsh, o wa…ói darnde feere-feere to …óemngal Wales.
Fedde fu…ó…óam.
K√§the Bosse jibini ha Wittenberg nder lesdi Germany nder 1910, …ìii …ói…óa…ìo nder …ìi…ì…ìe nayi. Baaba maako, Paul Bosse (1881-1947), o wonnoo goomu goomu goodu…óo goomu e hooreejo suudu ndun wuro Wittenberg. Maama maako K√§the Bosse (woowo Levin, 1886-1944) o haani Yahuudiyankee…ìe, ammaa Bosse …ìeydi nder diina Luteran. Caggal nde o timmini janngirde nder wuro maako, o ja…ìaama nder Ja≈ãde Munich, to o he…ìii doktoor nder Classics e Egyptology nder 1935. Fedde maako …óon ha…ì…ìii dow …ìandu ne…ó…óo nder ta∆¥re Misra. …óon, o fu…ó…ói gollaago nder jaango Egyptology e Archaeology nder Berlin State Museums, amma o e baaba maako …ìe nja…ì…ìi diga kuugal ma…ì…ìe nde …óum anndini maama maako Yahuudiyanke. 
Bosse …óon maayi daga torra Nazi'en, o …óon moofana lesdi Germany haa Britaniya nder hitaande 1936. O huwtunoo bana wallitoowo to zoologu e jannginoowo D'Arcy Wentworth Thompson. O he…ìii kuugal wi…ótooji e Petrie Museum to University College London nden …ìaawo …óon to Ashmolean Museum to Oxford. Nder hitaande 1938, wakkati o …óon Oxford be o …óon wondi ardii…óo Somerville College, o hawti bee Egyptologist be janngoowo wi…óto, J. Gwyn Griffiths. Griffiths, mo welsh e Classics mo anndini nder Rhondda o jaati e University College Cardiff (ko jooni Cardiff University) to maako nder Misra jamanu Kathleen Freeman wa…ói.

Edda Bresciani:
Edda Bresciani (23 Septemba 1930 - 29 Noofambar 2020) wonnoo Egyptologist Italiyanko'en.
Laamu.
Bresciani jibinaa e Lucca, o ja…ìi ja≈ãde e nder hitaande 1955 e Ja≈ãde Pisa. O wa…ói ja…ì…ìorgo nder nokkuuje …óuu…ó…óe nder Misra, o anndiraa ngam kuu…óe maako dow nokkuuje …óuu…ó…ói nder Faiyum, …ìurna fuu suudu maadi Medinet. he…ìii e he…ìaade ko nder laamorgo laamorgo Laamu Fuuta to Khelua.
Nder 1974 University of Pisa su…ìi Bresciani ha hooreejo jaaynde jaayndeere to Saqqara; …óo o janngini haandi lesdi lesdi lesdi 26th dynasty to vizier Bakenrenef. Nder hitaande 1978 o wa…ói "Egitto e Vicino Oriente", nder nder nder nder ja≈ãde Egyptological. O wa…ói boo yi…óde nder "Tembere Miliyonji" to Thutmose IV to Thebes.
Bresciani, mo …óon anndina yim…ìe, wurtini defte …óuu…ó…óe dow kuu…óe maako. O he…ìii medal for meritory science and culture e lewru Mee 1996, o wondi doofol do Academia dei Lincei. Caggal nde o jeyi, Bresciani laati ardii…óo ardii…óo e ja≈ãde Pisa.

Sara Christian:
Sara Williams Christian (joku 25, 1918 - silto 7, 1980) woni debbo arandeejo nder taariika NASCAR.¬†
Carreere jaaynde.
Christian wa…ói gasa e Looper Speedway, nokkuure fu…ó…óii…óo nder nder nder nder ndiyam Lanier. O he…ìii ko …ìuri heewde nder nder nder nder nden carel nder gariiri maral maral Max Looper. Looper, …ìiy Max, e golloo…óo maako arande o wi'i dow jaalorgal Christian "wurtini wor…ìe fuu boo, o debbo bee fuu, o he…ìii ko o yi'i".
1949.
Christian wa…ói gasa nder NASCAR fu…ó…óam nder 19 lewru Juun 1949, nder Charlotte Speedway. O he…ìii 13th nder Ford #71 je mari gorko maako Frank Christian. Nder nder nder nder nder fu…ónaaki, Bob Flock ja…ì…ìi carel maako …ìaawo motor maako maaki nder nder nder …ìaawo 38. O …óon hoola masin haa o …ìeyda, o wa…ói ko 14th.
1950.
Christian hawti nder go'o nder hitaande 1950, o timmini 14th nder nder nder 12th race ha Hamburg Speedway ko o yahdi har o wurtini.

Arlene Hiss:

wa…ói gollal jannginoowo dansa Fullerton High School e Fullerson, California, e o waree e Mike Hiss, 1972 Indianapolis 500 Rookie of the Year, ko adii nde o jokki nder USC, …ìe njaaraake.
Carreere nder jaaynde.

Lella Lombardi:
Maria Grazia "Lella" Lombardi (26 mars 1941 - 3 mars 1992) wonnoo jaaynde Italiyankoore jokkondiri e nder jeewte 17 nder Formula One World Championship Grand Prix. Lombardi woni go'o nder rew…ìe …ói…óo …ìe …ìe …ìe …ìe nja…ìa …ìe …ìe …ìe njogii Formula 1 nden woni rew…ìe …ói…óa…ìo …ìe …ìe njogi poondi nder Formula 1. Lombardi mawni nder Itali, o …ìeydi yi…ói jaaynde ngam o jaayndi carel jaaynde foroy. Fuu fu…ó…óugo nder karting e yahde to Formula Monza e Formula tati, Lombardi …ìeydi yeeso nder jaaynde haa o he…ìii Formula 1. O debbo tan je he…ìii poondi nder Formula 1, o he…ìii poonde e nder Grand Prix Espaani. Lombardi wondi debbo arandeejo mo he…ìii ko'e mo'o e mo'o nder nder nder nder mar…ìe nder mar…ìe e nder nder nder car…óe …ìooy…óe. O he…ìii 6 Saa'i Pergusa e 6 Saa'ii Vallelunga. Haala Lombardi …óon hawta diga …ìaawo …ìaawo …ìooyi. Kinnaaji maako …óon haandi hawtuki rew…ìe nder nder nder nderje e no yim…ìe …óon …óa…ì…ìa rew…ìe nder suudu nderje.
Nolde hoore.
Lombardi jibini nder Frugarolo, gariiri matin nder Piedmont nder Itali. Baaba maako o maccu…óo, o hokki Lella golle maako arande nde o …óon ja…ì…ìa ngam jaaynde saare maako. Fu…ó…óoode, baaba Lombardi tawi ko o yi…ói jaaynde …óum …ìur…ói jaaynde, ammaa o jaayndi …óum nde o timmini nder jaaynde 1968. Lella Lombardi wondi boo gooto e rew…ìe arandeeji nder jokkondiral yim…ìe e ma…ì…ìe. Lombardi maayi ngam nyau nyau nyau nyau nder Milan nder 3 Maars 1992. O woodi duu…ìi 50 e nder nder Frugarolo. O …óon maaya bee maako, Fiorenza. Lombardi …óon haalde bee laamorde nder nokkuure maako, Frugarolo.
Kuugal.
Firoo…ìe.
Nder hitaande 1974, Lombardi laati debbo arandeejo fu…ónaaku ngam he…ìugo ko'e nder Race of Champions nder Brands Hatch. O …óon moofta nder Lola-Chevrolet o wa…ói ko 14th. Nder nder nder hitaande 1975, o he…ìii laawol ngam o he…ìta ko o yi…ói e Maars-Ford. O hootiima caggal 20 darnde.

Tamar Tumanyan:
¬†
Tamar Hovhannesi Tumanyan (1907-1989;Armenian: ‘π’°’¥’°÷Ä ‘π’∏÷Ç’¥’°’∂’µ’°’∂) ko arkitekto Arminiyankoore Soovite.O he…ìii koode,Worker of Culture of the Armenian SSR (1977). Baaba maako o maw…óo bo maw…óo bo Hovhannes Tumanyan.
Biography.
Tamar Tumanyan jibini nder 1907 nder hey]="./Tbilisi" id="mwFQ" rel="mw:WikiLink" title="Tbilisi">Tbilisi, Laamu Russiya,to baaba'en Olga Tumanyan e maw…óo maw…óo maw…ìe Hovhannes Tumanyan. woni …ìur…óo sukaa…ìe 10 nder saare maako. maako hawti e Musegh (1889-1938),Ashkhen (1891-1968),Nvard (1892-1957),Artavazd (1894-1918), Hamlik (1896-1937),Anush (1898-1927),Arpik (1899-1981),Areg (1900-1939), e Seda (1905-1988). Tamar he…ìii janngirde maako nder suudu jannginoo…ìe …ìikkoy Gaane nder Tbilisi.
O yahi Yerevan Polytechnic Institute (ko jooni National Polytechnic University of Armenia); …ìaawo …óun o janngini e National University of Architecture and Construction of Armenia.
Gila 1933,o huuwani bana mar…óo mar…óo nder studio Alexander Tamanian nder Yerevan. ∆äum wonnoo e studio Tamanian nde o jokki nder ta∆¥uki suudu Opera Yerevan (1939),e wuro laamu,Yerevan (1941). huuwani …ìaawo …óun o golli hooreejo Mark Grigorian.
Daga 1945 haa 1949 o woni hooreejo ardii…ìe ardii…ìe Arminiya. Daga 1947 haa 1951 o woni hooreejo jaay…óe arminiyankoore arkitektural.Daga 1966 haa 1989,o huuwani hooreejo Hovhannes Tumanyan Museum nder Yerevan.

Jokkidira ummatooje kawtal yimm…ìe mbe naa∆ôasu:
M…ìe jokkidira ummatooje kawtal yimm…ìe mbe naa∆ôasu haa englisiire noddiraa (JONAPWD) ∆äum laymaaru konngol (oganaasioon) tiggaa…óim nde 1992 gam hawtaa fof mbe mbaawata jannde nder Naajeeriya. Hawtir…óe nde jottori nder Abuja e jonnta hoorejo maajum woni Abdullahi Aliyu Usman.duuniyaaku boo jawleeru ndun un memmbaajun kongol les…óe less laamu England noddiraa Commonwealth yimm…ìe rakku…ìee nden haa Afrik mobgal.

Yimm…ìe mbe naa∆ôasu
kuu…óe gattee…óe nde hoosay yaasi haa nastinaa holluki e waytinaa yimm…ìe mbe naa∆ôasu n…óer fuu lesdi ndin,wallitoo…ìe …ìesdana…ìe yennci ma…ì…ìe hawti e maruki Shari'a e dookaaji edow ko mbe ngii…ói fuu gam semm…ìi…óinnki mbe nastuki adunaaru haa nder jonnde margo nder duuniyaaru nden boo Kadi wallitoo m…ìe l√†ruki kalaa ko daamotoo…ìe fuu e matsalaaji ndi mbe gonndi nder duuniyaaru,fuu …óu'un gamma inganntaaki margu yimm…ìe mbe naa∆ôasuuji.
ponndindira.
Eder mbe golleji keeditaa…ói mbe haa hoosay yaasi maw…óe kawtal nder Naajeeriya gan un wannginaa ko metti yimm…ìe mben fuu hawti e kala feerejum ki naawi …óun mbe mbaawata. Nigerian Americans:
Naajeeriya Americans eii lysidi doon Naajeeriya. O janja Jamou toe hebe lysidi America duubi 1980 ewodi jama,are 25,000 hittande American Community Survey (ACS) bilde 712,294 kohee 85% eriminmo lysidi Naajeeriya.
O janja Jamou jama,are Afrik, Naajeeriya lysidi Afrik Naajeeriya joumou toe America duubi 2013, eii Janngirde firamare DNA jama,are 50,281.

Kay A. Orr:
Kay Avonne Orr (woowoo Stark; 2 lewru Janaayo 1939) woni politikko Amerik mo golliima hooreejo leydi Nebraska 36 diga 1987 haa 1991. O wonnoo hooreejo leydi Republican, o woni hooreejo leydi arande e haa jooni debbo tan.
Orr jibinaa Kay Avonne Stark nder Burlington, Iowa. Maama maako Sadie …óon …óon …óon …óon mari kuugal siyasa nder nokkuure, ammaa baaba maako Ralph …óon …óon …óon wondi goomu wuro Burlington e jaayndi kuugal. O yahi to Yunivasiti Iowa diga 1956 haa 1957.
Nder hitaande 1963, …ìaawo o dilli Lincoln, Nebraska, Orr fu…ó…ói gollaade ngam jamiroore Republican. O wallitii yim…ìe politik bano ardii…óo lesdi Richard Nixon e senatoor…ìe Carl Curtis e Roman Hruska, o annditiino debbo mo'o mo'o jeyaa…óo nder leydi Nebraska nder hitaande 1969.
Orr wa…ói hooreejo laamorde Nebraska …ìaawo Frank Marsh yaasi laamu nder hitaande 1981. O jeyaa e nder ndeen golle e hitaande 1982, o jeyaa e debbo arande to nder leydi Nebraska. O wa…ói kuugal ngal haa hitaande 1987.
Goobernator Nebraska.
Nder su…ìaaji 1986 Orr he…ìii su…ìaaje Republican ngam gomnaare Nebraska caggal nde o he…ìii su…ìaare e nder su…ìaa…óe joweego, o wa…ói 81 nder su…ìeeji 93 Nebraska hawti e Douglas e Lancaster, Kermit Brashear wa…ói su…ìaa…ìe 9, e Nancy Hoch wa…ói su…ìeeje 2.
Nder nder nder nder nder hitaande 1986, o he…ìi he…ìi…óo hooreejo wuro Lincoln Helen Boosalis nder nder nder leydi US nder nder nder su…ìaaji gomnati …ói…óaw…ói …ói …ói …ói…óo maw…ìe partiyaaji …ói …ói …ói …ói rew…ìe, o he…ìi ngam 53% haa 47%. Orr woni debbo arandeejo leydi Republican …ìe cu…ìii hooreejo leydi Amerik, e debbo arandeeji Republican mo woni hooreejo leydi leydi Amerika caggal Vesta M. Roy, mo o golli hooreejo leydi New Hampshire gila e lewru Desemba 1982 haa e lewru Jenere 1983.
Nder su…ìaaji gomnati 1990 Orr …ìeydi …ìeydi hakkiilo dow Ben Nelson. ∆äe …ói…ói …ìur…óe Nelson ha…ì…ìugo dow dowla mum je je je je …óon ha…ì…ìii ko o ja…ìii dow dowla dowla mum e dowla mum ha…ì…ìii dowla mum, e …ìeydaaki lekki je …óon ha…ìa dowla maako.
Siyaasaji.
Bana gomnaaru, Orr …óon ha…ì…ìa bee …ìeydaago kiisa, bee ha…ìugo bee hakkiilo hakkiilo, e ha…ìugo bee …ìeydagol nder daliila fuu.
∆Åaawo golle.
Orr …óon hooreejo go'o dow dow dow koolaa…óo ngam ha…óugo dewgal gay nder leydi dow laawol Initiative 416. Caggal nde o wa…ói …óum, o wa…ói ko haani wa…óugo dewgal yim…ìe go…ó…ói e ma…ì…ìe nder hitaande 2000. Nder 2015, Obergefell vs. Hodges kiita kiita kiite mawnde wa…ói banni'en …ìe mbaawataa wa…óugo.
Orr wa…ói ko …ói…ói nder hooreejo leydi Nebraska, o wa…ói go'o nder su…ìaaji su…ìaa…ói njowo nder leydi ndi. Nder su…ìaaji hooreejo leydi 2004, o su…ìii George W. Bush, e nder su…ìaaje 2012, o su…ìaa Mitt Romney.
Nolde hoore.
O waree Bill Orr e 26 Septemba 1957, …ìe mari …ìi…ì…ìe …ói…óo, John William e Suzanne. Bill maayi ngam nyau COPD nder 5 Maay 2013.

Linda Lingle:
Linda Lingle (woowo Cutter; 4 Juun 1953) ko politikko Amerik, mo woni gomnaajo jowto Hawaii gila 2002 haa 2010. O woni gomnati leydi Hawaii arandeejo Republican gila 1962. Lingle boo o woni debbo arandeejo lesdi nden nden boo o woni gomnati Yahuudiyankeejo arandeejo. Ka≈ãko o wa…ói hooreejo leydi, Lingle wa…ói hooreejo Maui, ardii…óo kawral, e hooreejo jamiroore Republican Party Hawaii.
Nder kawtal lesdi Republican nder 2004 nder New York City, Lingle wa…ói hooreejo kawtal nder wakkati Dennis Hastert mo …óon joo…óoto dow kawtal. E hitaande 2012, o wonnoo mo gollotoo…ìe Republican'en ngam Senate Amerik, o ha…ì…ìiima ngam joo…óorde feere nde senator Amerika Daniel Akaka mo o yahri to leydi ndii. 
Nder lewru Janaare 2015, Lingle nodditi bo laamuwo maw…óo to gomnaaru Illinois Bruce Rauner, o dilli dow kuugal ngal nder lewru Yuli 2016. O …óon jeya nder Council of Governors of the Bipartisan Policy Center in Washington, DC Lingle …óon jeya haa Hawaii nder karndol …ói…óa…ìu 2017 o laati ardii…óo nder kalfinaaji Hawaii Pacific University nder lewru Juun 2017.
Lingle woni debbo go'o …ìur…óo wa…óugo hooreejo leydi Hawaii.
∆Åeydiima, janngirde, e fu…ó…óam golle.
Lingle jibinaa Linda Cutter to saare Yahuudiyankee…ìe to St. Louis, Missouri nder 1953, …ìi…ó…óo Mildred e Richard Cutter. Lingle yahdi bee baaba'en maako to Southern California nde o woodi duu…ìi 12. O he…ìii jaangirde Birmingham High School nder Lake Balboa, California (jo wakkati …óon, go'o Van Nuys), nden o he…ìii jaango maako nder jaangirde californiyanko'en, Northridge, nder hitaande 1975.
∆Åaawo maajum, o tokki baaba maako haa Hawaayi, o huuwi arande nder Honolulu bana darnde jaaynde ngam Teamsters e Hotel Worker Union. ∆Åaawo, o dilli haa Molokai, to o fu…ó…óii Molokai Free Press, ko wondi nder nder nder nder leydi. 
Nolde hoore.
Lingle …óon ware nden …óon wo…ó…óina nde …ói…ói. O ware gorko maako arande, Charles Lingle, wakkati o …óon ja≈ãde, nder 1972. Nde o dilli California haa Hawaii, o dilli bee maako nder hitaande 1975 amma o haani innde Lingle. Nder sahaa maako nde o laamii…óo Maui County, Lingle wo…ó…óii gorko maako …ói…óa…ìo, wakiliila Maui William Crockett, mo o dewti diga 1986 haa 1997. Lingle …óon …óon haalde e walaa …ìi…ì…ìe.
Maama maako wa…ói carol carol Cutter Ford nder Hawai ªi.
Lingle woni ja≈ãde California State University, Northridge 2004 mo ja≈ãde mum. 

Paul Biya:
Paul Biya (wundu Paul Barth√©lemy Biya'a bi Mvondo; 13 feebariyee 1933) ko politikko Kameruuna mo woni hooreejo leysdi Kamerun gila 6 Noofambar 1982, o jeyaa…óo ardii…óo leysdi Kamerun gila 1975 haa 1982.
O woni hooreejo …ói…óa…ìo …ìur…óo laamu nder Afrik, hooreejo leydi …ìur…óo joo…óorde e laamu nder duuniyaaru e hooreejo leydi maw…óo nder duuniyaaru.
Biya, mo wonnoo ko to ba≈ãnge Cameroon, …ìeydi …ìeydi ko …ìeydi no o …ìeydi hooreejo leydi Ahmadou Ahidjo nder duu…ìi 1960, o laati ardii…óo hooreejo leydi diga 1968 haa 1975 nden o laati ardi ardi he…ìii Ahidjo hooreejo leydi to o ja…ìii laamu nder hitaande 1982 e o …ìeydi laamu nder nder gollaade laamu 1983-1984, nde o halki maw…ìe mo.Biya wa…ói laabi siyasa nder nder nder …óemngal partiya go'o nder duu…ìi 1980s, …ìaawo …óun o ja…ìii ha…ì…ìugo siyasa …ìur…óe …ìurtiinde nder duu…ìi 1990s nder nder …ìernde mawnde.O he…ìii su…ìaaji hooreejo leydi 1992 e 40% nder su…ìaaje go…ó…óe, e su…ìaa…óe go…ó…óe, o jeyaa e su…ìeeji maw…ói e hitaande 1997, 2004, 2011, e 2018.
Ngendam.
Siyasatoo…ìe moolii…ìe e laamuji Yammaaru …óon wi'a ko …ìe …óon jeyaa e jeyaa e nder nder nder nder kuuje …óe.Fuuje …óuu…ó …óe …óe nganndi …óon hokki daliila dow o he…ìay yiila nder hitaande (1992) nden yiila …ìaawo …óon …óon …óon …ìaawo boo …óon …ìaawo.

Albert Roger Miller:

he…ìii anndal hakkunde ley…óe e duu…ìi 38, duu…ìi jeewte …ìur…óe …ìalee…ìe …ìeen njogii, ngam o wa…ói golleeji nayi e nder FIFA World Cup 1990 e …óum wa…ói o laati golloowo …ìur…óo duu…ìi e nder taariha FIFA.O walli Kameruun warugo timmude Afrik arande nde he…ìti kootoye nder kootoye kootoye duniyaaru.
