Nomad:
Nomad woni goodu…óo ummatoore nde walaa nokkuure joo…óorde nde …óon yahda e nokkuuje.Yim…ìe …ìeen haw…ìe e jaajotoo…ìe, …ìeen …ìeen …ìe …ìeen …ìe'e …ìeen …ìe nganndi (ko …ìeen …ìe jogii …ìeen …ìe nga…ói e ley…óe), …ìeen …ìe …óon nganndi e …ìeen …ìe nji…ói e nder …ìeen …ìe mba…ói e nder ma…ì…ìe.karnijum noogas, yim…ìe lenyol ladde ladde ladda …ìeydi …ìeydi, haa …ìe …ìeydi limti e 30-40 miliyaar nomad e nder duuniyaaru haa hitaande 1995.karnijum noogas, yim…ìe lenyol ladde ladde ladda …ìeydi …ìeydi, haa …ìe …ìeydi limti e 30-40 miliyaar nomad e nder duuniyaaru haa hitaande 1995.Wuroo …ìeen …ìeen …ìe …ìeen …ìe ngurtini …ìeen, …ìe njogii …ìeen ko …ìe njogori ngam …ìe mbaawaa …ìesdaade …ìeen.
Nomadism.
Nomadism boo wondi laawol nguurndam je …óon haani nder nokkuuje …óe …ìe mba…óata bana steppe, tundra, malla ice e sand, to mooliti woni laawol …ìurngal huutore ngam huutoreeji …ói …ìe mba…óataa.Misaal, yim…ìe …óuu…ó…ìe joo…óii…ìe nder tundra'en …ìe laamii…ìe reene e …ìe …óon …ìeen, …ìe …óon …ìeya e …ìe …óon …óa…ì…ìita nyamndu ngam dabbaaji ma…ì…ìe.
Wakkati feere boo …óum anndina "nomad" woni yim…ìe feere feere …ìe …óon yaasi nder nokkuuje je …óon …óuu…óugo yim…ìe ngam hokkata kuugal feere (ko'e kuu…óe maa kuugal) to yim…ìe ma…ì…ìe mar…ìe kuugal feere, misaalu.∆äi'e yim…ìe anndiraa "nodeeji peripatetic.

Fula Christians:
Fula'en ko Fulani'en, ko Fulani…ìe ko Fulani yim…ìe:, …ìe …óon anndina diina Kiristan'en nder diina ma…ì…ìe fuu. Ngam taariika Muslim habaru …óu'um, diina …óon …ìeyda. ∆äum haani wonde 1-2% nder yim…ìe Fulani fuu …ìe jeyaa e diina feccere to diina Islam walla to diina feere to diina diina Islaamu.
Fuu…óugo habaru ha Fulani.
Caggal ko fu…ó…óii e nder taariika, fu…ónaaki fu…ónaade yim…ìe Fula, ngam e nder ca…óeele keew…óe …ìe …óon hawta e ma…ì…ìe e diina Islaam. Nder wo…ì…ìe haala, fu…óugo bee ne…ó…óo 
kiristaanaaku mo wonaa nder lenyol Fula hokki laawol ja…ìugo diina Fula Muslim, naa' bana ko hawti e feere feere e ja…ìugo yim…ìe ma…ì…ìe.
Cantaaki Fula'en.
Fula'en …óon nyaama feere feere feere daga yim…ìe …ìooyi e …ìooyiji Islaami'en nder nokkuuje taariike nde yim…ìe Fula …óon njoo…ói. Haala …óon …ìeyda …ìurugo …ìeydaago to …ìe …óon anndina dow ha…ì…ìuki Fulanis Musulman'en (ko …ìuri fuu Fulani'en maw…ìe lam…ìe) dow Fulani e Kirista'en …ìe …óon …óaana …ìe bana …ìe …óon ha…ì…ìuki …ìe e wa…óugo ha…ì…ìuki ha…ì…ìuki haaje e ummaatooje fuu, …ói hawti e ha…ì…ìuki yim…ìe ha…ì…ìuki e nder yim…ìe ha…ì…ìugo e nder yim…ìe. ∆äe kaalis …óe'e wa…ói nder lesdi Nigeria fuunaa≈ãge nder karnijum 21.

Fulani bana:
Fulani bana (nganndi bana Fulani style,Fulani hairstyle) ko feere fu…ó…óam …ìalli …ìalli …ìoli nder rew…ìe Senegalees je waawi yi'e hannde nder ley…óe Afrik feere feere.
Ngendam.

Fulani bana gada Senegalese bana,on go,on e tati. O hana Bo Derek, Alicia e Tyson jabou Fulani bana.

Josiah Sowande:
Josiah sowande ( can 1858-1936) kadi anndiraa…óo haa sobo Arobiodu un yurubannkeejo binn…óoowo diga Abeokuta, diiwal Ogun,laatii…óo baawu…óo binndol …óun Awi, wolde yoruba lawnuuwal binn…óoo…ìe.

Margo e Jann…óe.

Alice Minchin:

Alice Prochaska:
Alice Prochaska FRHistS (dugumi 12 lewru Yulie 1947) ko ardii…óo ardiije e defte, o wa…ói ko o laam…óo-woofere to Jaangoore Oxford e hooreejo Somerville janngirde Oxford, diga 2010 haa 2017.
Kuugal.
Alice Prochaska janngini dow Somerville janngirde nder janngirde Oxford nden o he…ìii BA e DPhil nder taariika jamanu.
Prochaska fu…ó…óii…óo wonde mo'o maw…óo museum, nden o laati arkifugo nder Ofisa Deftere Yim…ìe, jooni e leydi Archives. Daga 1984 haa 1992 o jeyaa…óo e jaagor…óo dow janngirde taariki Research, janngirde London. Daga 1992 haa 2001 o woni Maw…óo ko'e go…ó…óe e British Library. O wa…ói hooreejo deftere e Ja≈ãde Yale, Amerik, diga 2001 haa 2010. Oyekan I:
Quick Facts¬†Oba Oyekan I, Oba of Lagos ...
Yariima oyekan vs. larude maw…óo Apena Ajasa.
Nder 1883, oba Dosunmu, Baaba Oyekan noddi jonn…óe haa monnere hakku…óe maw…óo Apena Ajasa you e maw…óo Taiwo Olowo nonkadi maw…óo Ajasa waddi keerol oba e wo…ì…ìe lam…ìe luttu…ìe. Hollude nasru wadduki keerol Yariima Oyekan woppi maw…óo Ajasa hello maw…óo Ajasa …ìeddi wi'uki o hu…óaayi m…ìe oba jeya Iga Idunganran Laamorde mbe oba
Liiriba nder nastal …óum mbe Oba yaake ardungal Oyekan.
mbe liiribaku maw…óe Obanko fuu ceede e nder kuugal n…óum nastal yaake ardungal Oyekan. Oyekan ja…ìii a jahiral nastidum jawdii he…ìeende lamu bodejo no ardii H
ukumaa diga‚Ç¨1,000 haa yahri‚Ç¨200 ( Yeeso haa ummorii ba ‚Ç¨400 nder 2898). Oyekan Kadi relli tokku…ìe ga…óa laamu muu…óum edow jonn…óe maw…óo Apena Ajasa laatii…óo kawru…óo hawti nder 1883. Keerol daay o relli yideeki dega mawngu kuugal laamu maw…óo kamani ba laamu halal gaddu…óum Ina Dosunmu nder ndi 1861 timmal ndi ceeson.
Mayde.

Ama Ata Aidoo:
Ama Ata Aidoo (23 mars 1942 - 31 Maay 2023) wonnoo…óo winndaako Gana, maw…óo, maw…óo …óemngal, politik, e jannginoowo. O laati ardii…óo ja≈ãde nder Gana diga 1982 haa 1983 nder laamu PNDC Jerry Rawlings. o wa…ói nder hitaande 1965, Aidoo woni debbo arandeejo nder Afrik. Bana maw…óo defte, o he…ìi ko Commonwealth Writers' Prize e hitaande 1992 e defte maako Changes. hitaande 2000, o wa…ói Mbaasem Foundation to Accra ngam ha…ìagol e wallitol golle rew…ìe rewnoo…ìe Afrik.
∆Åi…ó…óo.
Christina Ama Ata Aidoo jibinaa ko √±alnde 23 Mars 1942 e Abeadzi Kyiakor, …ìadi Saltpond, nder diiwaan Cakkare Gana. Fedde feere (haaki Megan Behrent, Brown University, e Africa Who's Who) holli wonde o jibinaa e 31 mars. O woodi …ìikkoy …ói…óo, Kwame Ata.
Aidoo ummorii nder wuro laamii…óo Fante, …ìi…ó…óo Nana Yaw Fama, hooreejo Abeadzi Kyiakor, e Maame Abasema. Maako maako …óon maayi diga yim…ìe neocolonialists, …óum wa…ói baaba maako …óon anndina bana ko nafata janngugo sukaa…ìe e saare saare nder gariiri dow taariika e haala wakkati. ∆äuum wa…ói udditii janngirde arande nder wuro ma…ì…ìe nden o walli Aidoo haa o yahdi janngirde Wesley Girls' High School, to o ardii o yi…ói o wardi…óo.
Ja≈ãde.
Gila 1957, Aidoo yahi Wesley Girls' Senior High School ha Cape Coast. Caggal nde ja≈ãgi, o ja≈ãgitii e nder 1961 to Yunivasiti Gana, Legon, to o he…ìii ja≈ãde Bachelor of Arts e nder ∆äemngal Farayse o winndiino golle makko arande, The Dilemma of a Ghost, e hitaande 1964. nder lesdi ndi Aidoo, …ìe …óonno …ìe …óonno.
Maayi.
Aidoo maayi ha 31 May 2023 ha Accra. "Naa…óo mo'o maw…óo maw…óo, mo'o wallitoo ngam rew…ìe, yim…ìe Afrik e yim…ìe …ìamtaare nder duuniyaaru", hooreejo lesdi Nana Akufo-Addo anndini wonde o he…ìay haandi lesdi, bee kuugal haandi diga 13 lewru Yuli haa 16 lewru Yuli, Ha 13 lewru Juli, haandi maako wa…ói nder suudu suudu lesdi, …ìaawo …óon o …óon maaro nder lesdi nder wuro maako Abeadze Kyiakor ha 15 lewru Yuli e haandi haandi nder misaalu e haandi nder diina haande, ha Nyalnde 16 lewru Juli.

Sophia Akuffo:
Sophia Abena Boafoa Akuffo JSC (dunde 20 Desemba 1949) woni hooreejo leydi Ghana gila 19 Juun 2017 haa 20 Desemba 2019. O laati laamii…óo nder suudu kiita maw…óo lesdi Gana diga 1995.
Ja≈ãde.
∆Åi…ó…óo debbo mo'o laamii…óo Presbyterian, o he…ìii janngirde maako nder suudu Ja≈ãde Parliament Hill, Hampstead, London e Wesley Girls' High School, Cape Coast, o he…ìi ja≈ãde maako nder ja≈ãde lesdi Ghana. O …ìeydi janngude maako nder Jaango Lawol Ghana to o he…ìii ko o laamii…óo. janngini bana laamii…óo nder Nana Akufo-Addo. O jogii ja≈ãde magistrature nder Law diga Harvard University nder USA.
Kuugal.
Sophia Akuffo …óon huuwa nder suudu suudu amada, e Jerry Rawlings noddi mo haa suudu mawndu nder lewru Noofambar 1995. O laati ardii…óo kawtal laamorde dowla dowla dowle Commonwealth Judicial Education Institute, e hooreejo darnde darnde darngal darnde daranaaki dowla ngam duu…ìi …óuu…ó…ói. Nder lewru Janaare 2006, o su…ìii haa o go'o nder ardii…ìe laamii…ìe suudu Afrika dow hakkeeji yim…ìe e yim…ìe: o su…ìaa ngam duu…ìi …ói…ói, nden o su…ìake haa hitaande 2014 o wa…ói hooreejo laamii…ìe e hooreejo suudu.
Akuffo winndi The Application of Information & Communication Technology in the Judicial Process - the Ghanaian Experience, hollaaki to Afrik Network Judicial Ghana (2002).

Alice Annum:
Alice Annum (dimaa 20 Oktoobar 1948 e Accra) ko jaayndiyanke Ghanaan mo jaayndi. Sahaa maako …ìur…óo …ìooyugo nder mita 200 wa…ói 22.89 sekonde, ko he…ìii e juulde Olimpiiki 1972 nder Munich. woni debbo arandeejo nder lesdi Ghana nder Olympics. ndeen, Alice jokki e juulde 1964 nder Tokyo, 1968 nder Mexico e juul…óe 1972 nder Munich.

O he…ìii ja…ìal dow ja…ìde ja…ìde ganaa…ìe diga Amerik e o jokki ngam ja≈ãde Tennessee. O hawri e juulde Olimpiiki 1964 amma o …ìeydii ko o …ìeydi e nder fu…ó…óam fu…ó…óam, o wa…ói 28th bee fu…ó…óam …ìur…óum fu…ó…óam mita 5.45.

Ayesha Harruna Attah:
Ayesha Harruna Attah (dimaa Desemba 1983) ko winndiyanke maw…óo nder lesdi Gana. joo…óii nder Senegal.
∆Åeynguure e janngirde.
Ayesha Harruna Attah jibinaa e Accra, Ghana, nder duu…ìi 1980, nder laamu konu, to inna mo wonnoo…óo habaru…óo e baaba mo wonnoo mo wonnoo ta∆¥owo. Attah wi'i: "Baaba'en am …ìe laati ardii…ìe am maw…ìe. ∆Åe …óon mari bolle …óemngal …óemngal ngal …ìe mbi'i 'Imagine', …óon mari haala dow Akra; artiiki dow art, science, film, defte; cartoons - …ói mi yi…ói masin. ∆Åe laati (e …ìe …óonno boo) …ìe'e am. Mi he…ìii Toni Morrison nde mi woodi duu…ìi sappo e tati, mi …óon maaro. Mi …óon maaro fuu ko o "Cenndi". Mi …óon moodi fuu ko o windani. Mi …óon seeda mi …óon nanki jannata, nden kam ma'ana ma'ana maajum …óon …ìeyda am, mi …óon moodi bana non bo defte …ìur…óe mawnugo …óum windaama, nden mi yi…ói winda duuniyaaru heewu…óo yim…ìe rew…ìe maw…ìe, bana no Misi Morrison wa…ói".
nde mawnini e Accra, o yahri Massachusetts o janngini biyokimiya e Mount Holyoke College, nden o he…ìii jaagorgal makko nder journalism nder Columbia University, o he…ìii MFA nder binndi jaagor…óe nder New York University.
Wonduki.
Attah wurtini defte jowi. Deftere maako fu…ónde Harmattan Rain (2008) winndi bana sakkitol ngam ja…ìugo ko Per Ankh Publishers - nder ja…ìugo gaanaaniyanko'en Ayi Kwei Armah - e TrustAfrica, nden o wondi nder nder nder nder limgal maw…ìe Commonwealth Writers' Prize (Africa Region) 2010. Fuu…óal maako …ói…óa…ìo "Saturday's Shadows", wurtinaama e World Editions nder 2015, o daranii…óo for Kwani? Manuscript Project, nden ha…ì…ìii nder holandinaajo (De Geus). "Wawre tati" maako woni "Waw…óe teemerre nder Salaga" (2019), …óon hawta "la…ì…ìitol, yi…óde e ha…ìre nder nguurndam rew…ìe nder Gana nder teemerre 19th nder wakkati …ìaawo Afrik". O winndi The Deep Blue Between, roman ngam maw…ìe maw…ìe. Fuu…óugo romanji maako jowitii…óo, romansi romansi Zainab Takes New York, wurtini nder lewru abriil 2022.
Bana ja…ì…óo AIR Award 2014 , Attah laati mar…óo nder suudu sacatar nder Bahia, Brazil. he…ìii kadi jaaynde nde Miles Morland Foundation Writing Scholarship nder hitaande 2016 ngam deftere non-fiction dow taariika kola nut.
Attah su…ìi e Bernardine Evaristo ngam o laato hooreejo, ngam Rolex Mentor and Prot√©g√© Arts Initiative nder 2023-2024.
"Harmattan Rain" (2008).
"Harmattan Rain", wurtinaama nder 2008, …óon tokki haala …ìaawo …ìaawo …ìiy…óe tati nder saare Ghana, hawti bee Lizzie-Achiaa, Akua Afriyie e Sugri.
Lizzie-Achiaa woni maw…óo wuro ma…ì…ìe, mo …óon …óa…ì…ìita mo o yi…ói, nden e …óon e …óon o …óon …óa…ì…ìito kuu…óe mo'o. ∆Åi…ó…óo maako 'o, maw…óo…óo, Akua Afriye, …óon maaro hoore maako nder lesdi mo'o …óon maaro ngam kolli…óe, …ìikko maako tan Sugri, o …ìiy…óo boo, o …ìeydi boo, o …óon maaro boo, o yaaki haa saare haa o yahda haa ja≈ãde nder New York, to o anndini boo…ó…óum.
Saturday's Shadows (2015).
"Saturday's Shadows" …óon wa…ói nder Afrik hirnaange nder duu…ìi 1990's, haalanki "goodu…óo ha…ói ngam ha…ì…ìugo ha…ì…ìuki ma…ì…ìe nder nder nokkuure politik …ìur…óe laa…ìde", haalanki dow maajum: "Attah holli haa jooni anndal maako bana maw…óo. O holli anndal maako bo maw…óo bee hakkilantaaku e laa…ì…óum …ìamtaare …ìernde maako".
Nolde hoore.

Santiago:
Santiago (/Àås√¶ntiÀà…ëÀê…°o ä/, US maa /Àås…ëÀên-/;[]Espaa√±ol:: ), anndiraa jawdi Santiago de Chile, woni laamorgo e wuro …ìur…óo mawnude nder lesdi Ciile e nder go'o nder gure …ìur…óe mawnude nder Americas …óon haandi nder lesdi lesdi lesdi ndin, nden woni …ìandu lesdi Santiago, …óo yim…ìe …óuu…óani 7 miliyaar, ko …óum wa…ói 40% yim…ìe Leysdi ndin.
∆Åur…óo nder wuro …óon haadi hakkunde 500-650 m (1,640-2,133 ft) dow maayo.
Duule gariiri …óon hawta bee gese inabooje, nden Santiago …óon yaasi diga kooseeje e maayo Fuuta.
Ngendam.
Santiago ko wonde laamorgo Leysdi Cile gila wakkati koloniyaal.Dow wuro woodi gariiri nder gariiri nder karnijum 19th neoclassical (architecture e winding side-streets featuring a mix of art deco, neo-gothic, e style feere).
Luttugol Santiago …óon haandi bee kooseeje feere feere e maayo Mapocho, je …óon …ìuwa bee parki bana Parque Forestal e Balmaceda Park.Andes Mountains waawi yi'ugo diga …ìurna fu…ó…ói gariiri nden e …óon walli ngam nyau smog, musamman nder wakkati winter, ngam walaa ndiyam.Santiago woni nokkuure politik e jawdi lesdi Chile e nder nokkuure nde laamorde lesdi …óuu…óal nder Leysdi.
Sheree.
Luttu…ìe laamu Chile e laamu nguu …óon ha…ói Santiago, nden Congres …ìurna fuu …óon hawta nder Valpara√≠so.

Finnannde Arannde e ilmu.
MustaphaAkanbi da√±ama hiitaande …óumngu1971 e Ile Magaji kemberi,Awodi,kotaswal Gambari, Ilorin Fuuna, diiwal kwara. Samuel Ajayi Crowther:
Samuel Crowther (c. 1809 - 31 lewru Desemba 1891), o wonnoo…óo Yoruba, limle, e ardii…óo bishop Anglican Afrik hirnaange.O jibinaa e Osogun (ko jooni Ado-Awaye, Diiwal Oyo, Naajeeriya), o e saare mum …ìe nja…ì…ìi …ìeen maccu…ìe nde o woodi duu…ìi sappo e …ói…ói.
∆äu'um wa…ói wakkati konu lesdi Yoruba, …ìurna fuu konu Owu nder 1821-1829, nde wuro maako Osogun …óon ma…ì…ìa.
Ngendam.
Ajayi …ìaawo …óon o feere to maw…ìe maccu…ìe Portugal, to …ìe mburtini mo dow ndiyam ngam …ìe nja…ì…ìa to Duniyaa kesum nder, Atalantik.Crowther he…ìii yaltinki nder maccu…ìe nder nder nder nder maayo maayo, ngam …ìe …óon ha…ì…ìii dow dow Leysdi Afrik, ngam …ìe …óowtana ko Britaniya wa…ói ngam …ìe mba…óata maccu…ìe haa Atalantika.
Diina.
Yim…ìe …ìe …ìe rim…óini …ìe …ìe …óon …ìe …óon …ìe …ìe …óon nder Sierra Leone.Nder Sierra Leone, Ajayi ja…ì…ìi innde Farayseere Samuel Crowther, o fu…ó…ói janngude e Farayse.O ja…ìii diina kiristaana nden kadi o anndini hoore maako bee yim…ìe Krio …ìe …óon …ìeyda nder Sierra Leone.
Janngirde.
O janngini …óem…óe e o wondi ministaar nder Ingiltere, to o he…ìii doktoor diga Oxford Janngirde.O ha…ì…ìii …óemngal Yoruba e baylitol defte (Anglican Book of Common Prayer to Yoruba), o golliima e defte Yoruba nder Bibel, e nder …óem…óe go…ó…óe.

Nasr ad-Din (Lamtuna):
Imam Nasr ad-Din ko Lamtuna Berber maw…óo diina e ardii…óo konu, mo gila 1644 haa 1674 ardii alkawal be lenyol Sanhadja Berber dow Maqil Arabaa…ìe nder hirnaange Sahara (ko …ìuri heewde Mauritania hannde, nder worgo Marok e hirnaange Sahra). Luttugol maako …ìeydi …ìeydi haa ko jooni Senegal, wa…ói to dow laamii…ìe feere.
Nder duu…ìi 1660, mo lamtuna mo waajotoo…óo biyetee…óo Ashfaga o hoo'i 'Nasr ad-Din', ma'ana '…ìalli diina.' O fu…ó…ói waajugo habaru, nden habaru maako …ìaawo …óon o haajiri nder maayo Senegal. Nde laamuu…ìe Futa Toro, Jolof, Waalo e Cayor nja…ìi ko o wi'i, yim…ìe maako e ardii…ìe diina …ìen ummii, …ìe ummi laamuu…ìe Islaam'en nder nokkuure aristocracy ardii…óo.
Nasr ad-Din maayi nder konu nder hitaande 1674 nden konu Char Bouba (ko konu duu…ìi 30) maayi ngam lenyol Berber'en. ∆Åe …ìooydi haa …ìe …óowtana nder …óemngal …ìurngal …ìurgal …ìurgal ngal …ìe …ìamtaama e yim…ìe Arab-Berber Moorish …ìe …ìeydi e …ìeydi hakkunde yim…ìe …ìeen e …ìeen. Fedde laamuji nder Wolof e Fula dow lesdi Senegal fu…ó…óii hokki laamu ma…ì…ìe, …ìe …ìeydi limtu…ìe leydi ndii to yim…ìe diina …ìeen.

Kwadwo Akyampon:
Kwadwo Akyampon (C. 1767 - 1832) o wonnoo wakiilu Osei Bonsu mo o golli hooreejo laamu Fante to Elmina e hooreejo leydi Holandii…ìe to nokkuure nden. Nder darnde nde o huutoraama no gomnaaru laamu Ashanti dow El Mina. Nder hitaande 1828 Akyampon wa…ói hooreejo gardii…ìe nder ha…ìugo Elmina ngam ha…ìugo Fante, Denkyera e Wasa.
∆äum holliti …óum kanko woni Akyampon mo wa…ói golle nder 1808 ngam nastina huccitaaku nder nder Accra …ìaawo du…óal hakkunde …ìaawoji feere feere. Nder 1811 o wurtini …ìaawo ummugo dow laamu Ashanti nder Akuapem nder nder nder …óo Ashanti 100 maayi. Akyampon wa…ói ha nder kuu…óe maako bana mo kollitii dow siyasa e jawdi to konu dow hooreejo Opoku Frefre, ngam o nastini laamu Ashanti nder nokkuure nde.

√Ålvaro X nder Kibangu:
Alvaro X Nimi a Mvemba √Ågua Rosada wonnoo laamii…óo Kibangu e wonnoo √Ågua Rosad arandeejo arandeejo Laamu Konngo nder konu mum. O laamani laamu Kibangu diga 1688 haa 1695.
Fedde.
Nder laamii…óo Kibangu, √Ålvaro e sakiraa…ìe maako ardii…ìe partii…ìe …ìe ngalaa seyo dow laamu maako. ∆Åe mba…ói ngam …ìe mburtina Manuel I nder 1688 nden √Ålvaro wa…ói laamu. Nder laamu maako, laamii…óo …óon mbaawka hokki yim…ìe …ói…óo …ìe …óon yi…ói laamu Kongo. Laamii…óo woni laamii…óo konu arandeejo konu Kongo ngam o jeyaa e wuro √Ågua Rosada, to woodi maw…óo nder wuro Kinlaza e Kimpanzu. ∆äo'o naa' …óum wuro goonga wakkati laamu √Ålvaro, nden ko …ìaawo mayde maako nder 1695 nde mo …ìaawo maako, Pedro IV wa…ói …óum bana wuro ngam timmugo konu lesdi e ha…ì…ìugo laamu Konngo.

Salah Ameidan:
Salah Ameidan (dodu…óo 1982) ko ja≈ãde Saharawi. O mawni nder El Aiun. To duu…ìi 12, o jeyaa e nder gardii…ìe marocko'en e …ìe neldi to Rabat ngam …ìe njanngina. Haa duu…ìi sapp o jokki nder nder nder nder…óe caa…óeele nder lesdi Marok. hitaande 1999 o wonnoo jaagor…óo jaagorgal leydi Marok, o he…ìi nokkuure …ói…ómere nder jaagor…óe Afrik e o wonnoo joofnde jaagor…óum duuniyaaru Arab …ói…ói. Nder hitaande 2004 nder nder nder nder Farayse to o hawti e dow fu…ónaare Marok, o ummorii fu…ónaari Saharawi dow hoore maako nder mitaji ujune ujuneeje …ìaawo nder fu…ónaaru. ∆äon e …óon …ìaawo maajum o …óa…ì…ìiti dilli siyasa nder Farayse, ngam kuu…óe …óe'e footi wa…óugo mo nder kaso nder Marok. Ameidan ha…ì…ìani ngam wakkati se…ó…óa nder 2009 ngam hawti e dow dow dow dow El Aiun. Gila 2004 o …óon hawta bee kawtal Farayse nder gasaji …ói feddeeji jaaynde Farayse hawta, amma bana mo hawta nder nder nder nder lesdi Sahrawi nder gasaji duniyaaru. Nder hitaande 2013, filim, biyetee…óo The Runner, wurtini dow maako ngam jaayndiyanke film dowlaaku Misra/Palestina/Britaniya Saeed Taji Farouky.

Ana Joaquina dos Santos e Silva:
Ana Joaquina dos Santos e Silva (1788-1859), wonnoo jaayndeere garbaaji e nder Afrik e nder Afrika, jaayndeowo ceede e jaaynde nder Angola. O laati ko'e maccu…ìe …ìur…ìe mawnude nder Angola, …ìe …ìe mba…ói e lesdi Brazil nder duu…ìi 1830'en, …ìe …ìe mari ceede Joaquim Rodrigues Gra√ßa.
Biography.
Ana Joaquina dos Santos e Silva o wonnoo goomu nder darnde Afro-Portugal maw…óo, o jogii darnde maw…óo nder yim…ìe jaaynoo…ìe Luanda, …óo yim…ìe Europeeji laatii…ìe e nder yim…ìe ujune. 
O wonnoo gooto e maw…ìe jaayndiyankoo…ìe maccu…ìe nder jaayndi maccu…ìe hakkunde Angola e laamu Brazil nder duu…ìi 1830 e 40. Jaaynde maccu…ìe …óon ha…ì…ìaa nder hitaande 1836, ammaa …óon tokki nder Angola, to jawdi …óon mari hakkiilo. Ko woni 
Ana dos Santos e Silva mari lam…ìe feere ngam sukka e kawre, e suudu suudu maare tati nder Luanda, waato …ìaawo …óon o laati suudu museum.
Nde Brazil haani jaaynde maccu…ìe nder 1850 nden jaaynde nden fu…ó…óii, o wa…ói hoore maako bana banki mo he…ìata, jaaynde e jaayndeejo jaayndeeji, maw…ìe e jaayndije.

Abdou Baco:
Abdou Salam Baco (danyaamo; 1965) ko winndiyanke maw…óo Mahoraisan. O jibinaa nder Mzoizia nder Mayotte. O winndi defte tati, o wa…ói bandel muusikal Mobissa.

Samuel Manuwa:
Sir Samuel Manuwa jibini nder saare Reverend Benjamin Manuwa, mo diina kiristaanu mo hoore maako …ìii Oba Kuheyin, laamii…óo Itebu - Manuwa. Maama maako woni debbo Matilda Aderinsola Manuwa, mo o ∆¥iwoyi diga saare Thomas nder Ondo Town.
O yahi nder eklesiya missionary Janngirde, Lagos, e King's College, Lagos, ngam jaangooji …ói…óa…ìo, o timmini janngirde maako nder 1921. Nden o yahi janngude e University of Edinburgh, to o he…ìii ja≈ãde bachelor nder Chemistry and Medicine e 1926. O ja…ìi jaayndeeji feere feere, o he…ìii jaayndeji fuu nder jaayndeere, hawti e jaaynde Robert Wilson nder jaayndi e jaayndi. O yahi janngude to Liverpool, o timmini darnde dow Tropical Medicine. O laati doktoor nder hitaande 1926.
==∆Åi…ó…óo e janngirde=
O wartii Naajeeriya nder 1927 caggal nde o timmini janngude maako dow woote woote e o hawti nder kuugal woote nder lesdi boo bana gardii…óo woote. ∆Åaawo maajum o laati mo'o mo'o warugo mo'o mar…óo e mo'o maw…óo nder kuugal, to o he…ìii anndal bana mo'o walli…óo. Koo nde o he…ìii feere feere ngam ja…ìugo kuugal maw…óo haa …ìaawo, o tokki kuugal maako nder nder duu…ìi 18. Nde o …óon huutora bana dokkal, o he…ìii ka…ìirgal …ìanndu ngam huuwugo …ìannduji …ìanndu…ói.
Kuugal.
Nder 1948, o ummi limgal maako dow kuugalji laamu nde o laati ardii…óo darnde kuugal. Nder 1951, o wa…óii ardii…óo Leysdi Naajeeriya ardii…óo kuugal kuugal kuungal e …ìaawo maajum o wa…óii ko ardii…óo kuu…ìal kuugal kuutor…óe. Nder 1954, o fu…ó…óii hawti bee kuugal ummaatoore lesdi Naajeeriya nde o laama hooreejo ja…ìoowo ngam ja…ìugo laamu lesdi Naajeeri. O …ìeydiima warugo ardii…óo ja…ìde hooreejo fedde feddeere Naajeeriya, hooreejo feddaaku cukalel e fannu…ìe to Afrik hirnaange e hooreejo Leysdi Naajeeriya ardii…óo feddeere ngam huutoraade ummaatoore.

Ira Aldridge:
Ira Frederick Aldridge (24 Colte 1807 - 7 Oggoos 1867) wonnoo…óo Amerik,…óo winndiinoo…óo, e maw…óo suudu ja≈ãde, anndiraa…óo ngam darnde maako dow yim…ìe Shakespearean.James Hewlett e Aldridge ina …ìeen e…ìe ndaara e …ìeen ardii…ìe Amerikaa…ìe …ìalee…ìe. Aldridge jibini nder New York, anndal maako arande nder kuu…óe nder nder nder duu…ìi 1820's bee bandol African Grove Theatre.E lewru Mee 1825, e duu…ìi 17, Aldridge artii e nder London nder fijirde lowre nder Othello. Nder lewru Oktoobar 10, 1825, Aldridge wa…ói arandeeji …ìur…ói …ìurnde mawnde nder Royal Coburg Theatre London, o laati arandeejo afriknaajo-Amerikiyankoore je …óon ha…ì…ìii hoore mum nder lesdi feere.
Nde o hawti e feere feere nder Amerika, o dilli nder 1824 to Ingiltere nden o wa…ói gollal maako nder Royal Coburg Theatre London. Nde golle maako …ìeydi, kuu…óe maako dow kuugal Shakespeare …ìaawo …óon …ìe nja…ì…ìi mo ngam …ìe nja…ìa mo, nden o laati maw…óo Coventry Theatre Royal. Daga 1852, Aldridge …óon yaasi nder lesdi Europe e o he…ìii teddu≈ãgal maw…ói diga hooree…ìe lesdi. O maayi bee …ìernde nde o …óon nder nder Polonje, nden o ha…ì…ìii bee mangu nder ≈Å√≥d≈∫.Aldridge woni laam…óo tan nder lesdi Afrik-Amerika mo …ìe teddini e dowla bronze nder Shakespeare Memorial Theatre nder Stratford-upon-Avon. ∆Åi…ì…ìe Aldridge …ói…óo, Amanda e Luranah, laati maw…ìe maw…ìe maw…óo.
Fedde fu…ó…óor…óe e golle.
Aldridge jibini nder New York City to Reverend Daniel e Luranah (so lurona) Aldridge nder 24 lewru Duujal 1807, ammaa feere biography fu…ó…óii wi'a o jibini nder duu…ìi 13, Aldridge yahi nder Afrik Free School nder New York, tawon nder New York Manumission Society ngam …ìi…ì…ìe yim…ìe …ìe …ìe …ìe …ìe …ìalee…ìe e maccu…ìe …ìe …ìe …ìe mari hakke. ∆Åe ke…ìii janngirde classique, e janngirde …óemngal Engele, winndaade, limngal, geography, e astronomi. Yim…ìe 'o nder suudu du…óal hawti bee.Aldridge'en arandeeji golle golle nder duu…ìi 1820'en fu…ó…óii e nder Afrik Company, ko …óum wonnoo ko jamma wonande William Henry Brown e James Hewlett. E hitaande 1821, bandiraa…óo wa…ói suudu tawonngo African Grove, wonde suudu tawonnge Afrik-Amerikiyankoore arande nder leydi Amerik. Kampaaniji …ói …óon …óon …óon …óon …ìeyda …óon …óon …óon mari tagdiji diga …ìooyi, …óon …óon …óon ha…ìa ngam ngam ngam ngam …óum …óon ha…ìa, …óon …óon hawtata ngam ngam …óum hawtata yim…ìe, …óon hawtita ngam …óum ha…ìa ngam yim…ìe …ìe …óon hawtana. Sheriff wakkati …ó boo o laati mar…óo bolle, o holli bana Aldridge'en nder nder lesdi America …óon mari …ìernde. Aldridge wa…ói gollal makko ngal fu…ó…óam nder nder nder Rolla, laral Peruwiyanke nder Pizarro Richard Brinsley Sheridan. waawi kadi jogii …ìaawo …ìaawo nder Romeo e Juliet, bana …óum annditi …ìaawo nder nder nder nder defte nder hitaande 1860 diga to'o maako, Dr. James McCune Smith's.
Jedde,on.
Aldridge'en arandeeji golle golle nder duu…ìi 1820'en fu…ó…óii e nder Afrik Company, ko …óum wonnoo ko jamma wonande William Henry Brown e James Hewlett. E hitaande 1821, bandiraa…óo wa…ói suudu tawonngo African Grove, wonde suudu tawonnge Afrik-Amerikiyankoore arande nder leydi Amerik. Kampaaniji …ói …óon …óon …óon …óon …ìeyda …óon …óon …óon mari tagdiji diga …ìooyi, …óon …óon …óon ha…ìa ngam ngam ngam ngam …óum …óon ha…ìa, …óon …óon hawtata ngam ngam …óum hawtata yim…ìe, …óon hawtita ngam …óum ha…ìa ngam yim…ìe …ìe …óon hawtana. Sheriff wakkati …ó boo o laati mar…óo bolle, o holli bana Aldridge'en nder nder lesdi America …óon mari …ìernde. Aldridge wa…ói gollal makko ngal fu…ó…óam nder nder nder Rolla, laral Peruwiyanke nder.
Taarihi.
Nde Aldridge hawti e hakkilantaaku …ìeydi-…ìeydi…óum …ói laamii…ìe …ìalee…ìe …ìaleejo mari nder lesdi Amerika, o yahdi to Liverpool, Ingiltere, nder hitaande 1824 bee laamii…óo James Wallack. Nder wakkati oon fu…ó…óii fu…ó…óam fu…ó…óam ju…ì…ìule faggudu, wa…óii wayloore jawdi fu…ó…óam, waawiri …ìeydaade …ìamtaare cuu…ói kin. Ja≈ãde Leysdi Britaniya …óon …óon ha…ì…ìana jaaynde maccu…ìe e …óon …ìeyda ngam halki maccu…ìe nder laamu Britaniya, …óum …ìeydiima …ìeydaago yim…ìe …ìe …ìe …ìeydaani …ìeydaaki …ìeydaari …ìeydaare …ìe …óon …óa…ì…ìita jaaynde.Nde woodi anndal dow dow dow dow nder nder nder nder suudu, o anndinaama yim…ìe, o wa…ói haala dow …ìaawo maako nder lesdi Afirka, o wi'i o …ìadi diga lesdi Fulani. 1831, Aldridge wa…ói ko …óum wa…ói, o hoo'i innde Keene, ko …óum woni ko …óum wa…ói ko o woni ko o woni e nder leydi Britaniya, Edmund Kean. Aldridge holli huutoraade innde nde no yim…ìe anndiraani …óum ngam …ìe mba…óata no …ìe anndiraani. Ha≈ãkadi innde F.W. Keene Aldridge, o nodditaama …ìaawo …óun African Roscius, e innde Roman actor maw…óo nder karnijum arandeeji BCE.

Fedde Fedde Fuuta Fedde Fuu…óugo Fuuta, Dadin Kowa:

∆Åaawoore.
Ja≈ãde nde e ja…ì…ìorgo National Board for Technical Education, ko ja…ì…ìorgal ja…ì…ìorgol National Diploma e Higher National Diploma e ina ja…ì…ìorgi janngoo…ìe 1,354. Bill for Conversion.
Gooto nder suudu wakiilo, hono Abubakar Yunus Ahmad Ustaz, wa…ói doolaaji to jamiroore 8 ngam tiggugo ja≈ãde ja≈ãde feddeere, Dadin Kowa. , jaaynde nde'e …óon …ìilla nder Senate.Nder hitaande 2019, …ìaawo jamiroore 9th hawriti, jaaynde nde'e fu…ó…óiti nder suudu bee laawol jaaynde suudu fuu, nden …óum ja…ì…ìi nder lewru feebari 2020. E …ìaawo …óun sendugol to Senate ngam wa…óugo jamiroore dow sari'a on. Bill wartii nder nder nder nder senate nder nder nder lewru junngo, 2021 nden nder nder nder …ói…ómere nder nder senat nder nder nder 15 lewru feebari 2021 nden nder tata…ìre nder nder nder wakkati nder 9 feebari 2022. Ganndal Ja…ì…ìorgal Fedde ∆Åamtaare, Dadin Kowa.
Cee…óol.
Dadin Kowa Climate …óon ha dow mita 0 (0 feet) dow maayo, …óon woodi clima tropical humble e ma…ì…ìo (Classification: Aw). ∆Åuuru hitaande nder nokkuure nde …óum wurtini haa 31.55oC (88.79oF), ko …óum …ìeydi …ìeydiinde 2,09% ha tawii …óum …ìeydii ha nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Maggie Aderin-Pocock:
Margaret Ebunoluwa Aderin-Pocock MBE (n√©e Aderin;9 Maars 1968) woni anndudiyankeeru e jannginoowo anndal dow dow laabi.O wondi ardii…óo anndal teddungal to jaango Fisiiki e Astronomiya to Jaangoore London,o woni jaangoore jaangoore Leicester gila feebariyee 2023. Conny Aerts:
Conny Clara Aerts, jibinaa…óo 26 lewru janvier 1966,o woni jannginoowo (Flemish) Belji to astrofisika.O …óon anndina nder anndal astroseismology. Aglaonice:

Adelaide Ames:

Anne Archibald:
Anne Murray Archibald ko jannginoowo anndal dow dow dow dow ko'e maako dow pulsars e nder …ìe …ìe …ìe …ìe …ìamta SciPy,deftere anndal ngam …óemngal programming Python.¬†
Ja≈ãde e golle.

Stefi Baum:

Caggal ngal e nder suudu cuwugo ngam yim…ìe:

Diane Awerbuck:
Diane Awerbuck (dimaa 1 abriil 1974) ko winndaako nder Afrik worgo. Wolof maako, Gardening at Night, he…ìii 2004 Commonwealth Writers' Prize, Best First Book (Africa e Caribbean), nden o wondi nder nder nder nder darnde darnde daranaaku Dublin International Literary Award. Nder hitaande 2011, ko'e maako nder kuutor…óe, Cabin Fever, wurtini nder Random House Struik. Roman maako, Home Remedies, wurtini nder Random House Struik nder lewru August 2012. O wonnoo nder nder nder nder jaajol Caine Prize nder 2014, o he…ìii jaajol Short Story Day Africa nder hitaande nden.

Ethel Anderson:
Laamu.
Ethel Anderson jibini nder Lillington, suburb Leamington, nder Warwickshire, Ingiltere, to waalidiyankoo…ìe Australia jibinaa…ìe Cyrus Mason e Louise Campbell e 16 Maars 1883. ∆Åaawo maajum saare maako …óon maaro to Australiya, o mawni nder Sydney e nder wuro maw…óo maako, Rangamatty, …ìadi Picton, New South Wales. Tunji Sowande:
Tunji sowande
Hankoni tunji sowande er
iminmo eii Leysdi lagos,eii Naajeeriya dubi makobo (1912) kadibo imoder bandirabe gimobe,inde maunirawo makobo fela sowande. Jomu wuro mabbebo Anglican priest, Emmanuel sowande andado mo inde eii wigere gimol dina mabbe(church) iton Leysdi lagos and a contemporary o janja classical composer and organist Ekundayo Phillips.

Efunsetan Aniwura:
Efunsetan Aniwura
Hankoni Efunsetan Aniwura orimama i (c.1820s-June 30,1874)nden hankoke didabo I iyalode mo ibadan kadimabo imonder pre-eminent Bewala gata I lesdi duniyaru saini sore sore I 19th century ibadan.owarti I maudo hokkuki shede I kolte waje sore sore wala bo makko I Dundonma kadi oburi waltinki hankali mako tonto political, military, joddiki economic I wigere dina yimbe iton lesdi ibadan.
O andado nden wiowo innana kadin iburki sembe fukowari dowmako,one of the wealthiest yoruba debbo mbido jododoto imako.

Ghali Umar Na'Abba:
Ghali Umar Na'Abba
Ghali umar na'abba CFR eriminmo eii duubi 1958nden kadi omainama eii 2023 emonder ngadobe siyasajju eii Leysdi Naajeeriya ojogake jodorgal 8th metowo i honduko ko moye i house of representatives of Naajeeriya 1999 toh yari 2003.
